name: Oceanfront Condo with harbor view
summary: Ocean front condo centrally located in Maui.  Conveniently located with an awesome view from the lanai, nice swimming pool and restaurants and attractions within walking distance.  This is a full week rental from Saturday to Saturday.
description: Ocean front condo centrally located in Maui.  Conveniently located with an awesome view from the lanai, nice swimming pool and restaurants and attractions within walking distance.  This is a full week rental from Saturday to Saturday.

reviews.comments:
Mark and his family are such fantastic hosts.  They checked on us regularly to make sure we didn't need anything.  They are so easy-going and flexible they let us check out late because our flight didn't leave until 11p.m.  

Maalaea is very central, close to the airport, close to lahaina, close to Kihei, close to Haleakala.  very convenient and you don't have to deal with the traffic in Lahaina and Kihei.  Maalaea was also quite windy during our stay (not sure if it is that way year-round), so if you're reading this, bring some ear plugs and you will sleep like a baby! 

The condo is beautiful with an astonishing waterfront view from the spacious balcony.  Modern finishings, beautiful bathroom, large king size bed and Mark even included beach towels and beach chairs for his guests to use!  The pin pad door lock was super convenient (means we didn't have to carry a key around with us).  The unit included a parking stall for our rental car, and the complex has a lovely pool if you get tired of all the snorkeling and salt water swimming on the island.    

Cannot say enough good things about Mark, his family, and this Air Bnb!  Highly recommend!

*CLEAN
*GREAT LOCATION
*GREAT AMENITIES
*AMAZING VIEW

We have used airbnb many times, and this was by far our favorite stay and the most transparent in terms of what was listed online. Often times, you arrive at a place and it doesn’t look as good as the photos, but this was the opposite. Photos didn’t do justice at how spacious it actually was or how great the view is. 

Mark was beyond accommodating. Met us when we first arrived. Gave us a quick tour and assured us he is there to help us if we needed anything

I loved everything about this condo. The location was wonderful. You aren’t in the crowded, overly touristy Kaanapali area, but you’re still centrally located to everything. The pool was great. Very clean. Never more than a couple of people laying out, so it was relaxing. It’s right next to the harbor, so if you want to snorkel it’s a 2 minute drive. I’d recommend snorkeling with a company who snorkels at Turtle town if you want to see sea turtles.  

The bedding was so comfortable. I slept so well. There were a few k cups for coffee, wine in the fridge, and laundry pods to do our laundry. Being able to do our laundry right in the condo was so convenient! 

Overall I would recommend this to anybody.  Thank you Mark. Can’t wait to visit again!

The Maalaea harbor neighborhood is quiet, relaxing, and very close to any action you might desire. Right there is an awesome beach, snorkeling, a beautiful pool and bbq, convenience store, an aquarium and shopping. But access to Kehei, Kahlahui, the north shore and the Maui Arts and Cultural Center is excellent. This collection of residences east of the harbor is the best kept secret in Maui. The digs themselves are well thought out, stylish (not just designer touches but a thoroughly conceived and accomplished feeling), and comfortable. We loved the place, the view, the ease of access and the people. It was a stunning and fulfilling five days in paradise. Thanks Mark!
Beautiful space right on the beach. The space is clean and very roomy.
The location is great. Mark is a gracious host. This condo is really nicely decorated and has everything you might need for a comfortable stay.

This place was great. Perfect location, the balcony had a beautiful view. Mark was an awesome host and all 4 of us loved staying here and definitely would again. Heaps of turtles at the beach just a couple minutes away. So rad!

First off, the place is beautiful! The space was clean and bright. We had coffee on the balcony every morning of our stay and was able to see whales off in the distance. The area we stayed in was very quiet, and the people very friendly. Our host Mark and family greeted us, and made us feel very welcome. Mark responded promptly to any questions we had. 

We had breakfast a couple of times at Maalaea General Store, which is within walking distance. The food and staff were amazing. Staff provided local tips and “must see” places. There’s only a couple of restaurants in walking distance, so renting a car is a must. Overall our experience was one of the best times we’ve ever had.

Mark was great to work with!  Despite leaving my phone in Canada (I was on vacation), he ensured I had all the information I needed.  Check in was easy; he gave me the parking spot number, condo number and the access code.  We had all our bags and groceries in the space when he came to check on us.  He answered all our questions clearly and immediately.
The space is amazing!  Mark has all the essentials including beach towels and chairs.  Every morning we watched the whales as we had our coffee and made our daily plans.   Don’t forget your binoculars so you can see the barnacles on the whales as they frolic.  Every evening we stood on the small beach and watched the turtles.   
Location is perfect.  The Ocean Center is a quick walk away and can be visited multiple times to get your marine questions answered.  It was a scenic drive to Ahihi-kinau natural area reserve to amazing snorkeling.  It was a short jaunt to Iao Valley State Park.  You could get groceries in Kahului after arrival at Costco or Target.  Or you can swing by Safeway in Kihei.  The harbour is very close with tours, shops and restaurants.
Thank you Mark, this was my best trip to Maui!

Where to begin..The place is amazing.  From the breathtaking view from lanai to the spacious surroundings. Great comfortable  bed and well equipped kitchen.  Luxurious towels too. Cleanliness was outstanding.  And I am a picky traveler. Mark lives in the same building and he's just a text away. Responded to all our questions.  Loved this particular spot on Maui. Close to the beach that goes on for miles.  Whale watching right from the balcony. Mahalo!
Great place!  We enjoyed the harbor view and central location.  A great stay.

We had a great time, the space was exactly as described and the view of Ma'alaea Bay was spectacular.  Excellent whale watching from the balcony. Mark was very responsive to any questions or concerns that we had.  We will definitely stay there again when we return to Maui.
This condo was amazing! The opportunity to have breakfast on the balcony and watch the whales was breathtaking.
Central location with a wonderful view. Excellent host - always responded quickly. Had everything we needed to have a wonderful time in Maui.

Our stay was great! Nice view and conveniently located in an area that you have easy access to any part of the island. It is family friendly and have nice amenities. Mark and Debbie were very nice and always responsive to our messages or needs. I definitely recommend their property!

We stayed here for part of our honeymoon and it was incredible. You cannot beat the view! We loved watching for whales from the balcony and enjoyed the Cool breeze from the door and the windows. It was nice having the privacy of our own space but in the safety of a large condo complex. Loved every minute of our stay.
This was a great spot for my family to explore both East and West sides of Maui.   We saw lots of turtles and enjoyed the Maui Ocean Center which was walking distance. A  fun spring break!

Awesome hosts!  
Quick response to questions, great location, incredible views, parking and Wi-Fi included, swimming pool and BBQ area, washer and dryer and dishwasher.  Also had beach chairs, beach towels and a boogie board.   
Would highly recommend this Airbnb.

This a great place to stay for a visit to Maui.  It is very centrally located between the South and West beaches.  As a result of the central location, we explored many different beaches.  Mark is a great host and is extremely responsive.  The condo was spotless and offered a fantastic view of the Maalaea Harbor.   It is very windy there so just be prepared for that however it did not bother us.  This location on the harbor seems to be turtle hangout because every day we saw multiple Hawaiin sea turtles near the shore, more than we did on our snorkel trip to "turtle town".  We would definately stay here again.
Mark was very responsive and checked in with us in person. The condo was great with an amazing view of the ocean and was close to everything. We will definitely stay again!

Mark is an excellent host. Fast communication, clear instructions. He stopped by to say hello and meet in person. 

The place is great - exactly as described. Great location and ocean view. I would recommend Mark's place to family and friends.

We had a great stay for 6 nights. The bed was big with a fan, it also had air con but we didn’t need to use that. The kitchen well equipped, and the balcony was wonderful for breakfast. It was pretty windy when we were there so couldn’t use the pool but we went to the beaches that were protected. We enjoyed our stay in this unit.
Perfect!

We loved staying in this apartment for 4 nights in June. The space is very clean and comfy with a big master bedroom and updated hotel-like bathroom.
We especially enjoyed the balcony/lanai overlooking the pool and the ocean. 
So relaxing to have morning coffee and meals out there!

The location is a convenient spot for exploring Kihei and Wailea to the south and Lahaina, Ka'anapali and beyond to the north. We also enjoyed walking to the aquarium and to the dock for a boat trip to Molokini.

**Mark and Debbie are super responsive hosts and were right over on the day we arrived to bring by a few things that we needed***
We had a great stay at the condo. Very clean and a great central location. Will definitely look to stay here again when we come back to Maui!

Mark runs an A+ AirBnB. He is a great communicator and stopped by to check on us. The place was perfect for our needs and located in a great area; also offers really superb view of the ocean from our living room.

Mark and his wife have many little attention to be sure you have a perfect stay. The condo is very nice with quality bedding and confortable king size bed in the room. The view from the lanai is amazing and from the lanai you can also take a look to your teenagers in the pool. There is always wind in the condo so it's never too hot.  The condo is well located to go everywhere on the island.   I really recommand everyone too stay there!

Mark’s condo was in a perfect location where you could walk to grab necessities, if needed. The view was especially nice on days we stayed in to relax. Overall our stay was a good one and I’d recommend their place to friends!
We had a great stay here. The apartment is very clean and well equipped. Love the view, would definitely return.

We had a great time here.  The location is excellent, centrally located between Lahaina/Kaanapali, Kihei, and Kahului/Paia.  This place is perfect for a couple.  Mark and Debbie were very responsive through our stay.  We were there when Hurricane Lane threatened Maui. They offered all assistance and stayed in constant contact.  We definitely recommend!

Mark and Debra’s condo feels like home away from home. It’s clean , it has everything you need to cook in, and has a great ocean view. They are very nice, they stopped by to meet us and to make sure everything was okay and if we needed anything else. Me and my friend had an amazing stay at this condo and totally recommend it! Everything about their condo is perfect.

We enjoyed our stay! I really enjoyed being on the harbor. Amazing view, clean and cute condo. Easy check in, good communication with the hosts.

One tip for other guests is that it was pretty “no frills” ammenities wise. They did supply the standard towels, paper towels, kneenex, guest soap, toilet paper etc. There were two beach chairs, a beach umbrella, some kid beach toys, and some beach towels... but unfortuntely the umbrella and one chair were broken. We did enjoy the use of the beach towels though. There was no soap for the dish washer or washing machine which would have taken it to the next level for us ammenity wise (we left ours so hopefully the next guest can use it!) We also found ourselves sleeping on the pull out couch near the AC because the bedroom did get quite warm.

Overall a great location, very close to Kihei and most other cities, and was a nice home base to come back to. It’s a great value so I understand why the ammenities were what they were. We enjoyed our stay and would come back and/or recommend the place to friends.!

Mark and Debra were very prompt in replying to any questions or needs we had.  Great location. Comfortable condo. Lovely view from the patio. We enjoyed watching the surfers from the patio and the turtles playing in the surf in the evening down by the beach. Very friendly people in the condo. We enjoyed our stay.

Mark and Debra’s place is very well located for whoever wants to explore Maui. It is literally in the middle of the island and you can access everything very quickly. We also liked the apartment cleanliness. We strongly recommend the place.

A fantastic condo with great views of the bay.  All the basic amenities you might need and a few extras too.  The pool was warm, the sheets and the condo were clean and the air conditioning kept us from overheating.  Also, the balcony provided a beautiful view and a great place to hang out and watch the sun set.  Our flight didn't fly out until 11pm and Mark and Debra let us stay until 6pm, 7 hours after checkout!  Awesome hosts.
Mark and Debra’s place is sparkling clean, has an amazing view, and is overall a very comfortable place to stay. Highly recommend it! We had a fantastic time in Maui.
Great location and view. The condo was clean and filled with extras for the beach. Place is exactly as you see it on the site. Hosts were friendly and easy to get a hold of, and responded quickly.

If I could give this place and the hosts 10 stars I would. Everything is spotless and comfortable and everything you would ever need is provided. The view overlooking the bay is so peaceful and the location is perfect and central to everything. Highly recommend!

We loved the location, views, and space. It was everything we needed ans so relaxing. Lots of whales from the lanai and easy walk to beach, coffee shop and restaurants. We appreciated the beach chairs.

Easy check in,  hosts live in the same complex so easy to get help. Clean,  great view, great lanai furniture, good beach chairs, boogie board and nice beach towels. And we love the location. Thanks Mark and Debbie!

This condo was more than we expected. The photos are very accurate, but nothing prepares you for the view on your balcony. The place is in a great location to be able to travel around the island. You do need a car if you want to explore. There is a fabulous beach within a 10 minute walk and a couple of very good restaurants also within a 10 minute walk. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend staying here.

老板娘很热情,人很好哟~下次再来还会住在这里的~
非常好
The host canceled this reservation 85 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
This is a really basic place, but you can hardly get better for this price in HK. Proprietor is a really friendly lady who tried to make the stay more comfortable.
Nice and warmest host.
老板娘很热情好客,等我们到了快11点,最后给我们换了间三人房,屋子外面有热水,房间有吹风机转换器毛巾拖鞋,很不错的一次体验!!重点是楼下就是地铁站!!!

You’ll find this nice place and great host really lovable.

name: Causeway Bay Studio for 2 persons 5 mins frm Metro
summary: This open studio is located 5 minutes from the Causeway Bay station exit C, from which you could arrive at Central in 8 minutes with the MTR service. Causeway Bay is also the shopping centre offering good dinning options. Because of the convenient transportation from Causeway Bay, this would also be a good base for you to explore the countryside.
space: Spacious environment with functional and comfy furniture

Causeway Bay is also the shopping centre offering good dinning options. Because of the convenient transportation from Causeway Bay, this would also be a good base for you to explore the countryside. Spacious environment with functional and comfy furniture You will be given a password, changed everytime a new guest comes. So you do not need a key to enter the space. I will be reached via whatspp, email, or telephone for any questions or travel advice. Causeway Bay is the shopping center from luxury items, medicines, to daily necessities. You will also find all ranges of western/ Japanese/ Korean/ South American/ Indian restaurants of very different price ranges. 5 mins walking from the metro station

host.host_about:
Hello! I am both a host and guest here on Airbnb. I am an open-minded and easy going person, I like to share stories, put colors on lives, and simply make people happy along my life journey.

I was born and raised in Hong Kong, with also experiences living in the Netherlands (2008), Sweden (2010 to 2012), and Shanghai (2012 to now). I have a curiosity to differences, and a pursuit to be unique in order to bring diversity to the world.

Acadmically specialized in Economics and Statistics, I am now a risk management professional in a Fin-tech company. I love nature, and I like history, sports, salsa dancing, and traveling to new places. I enjoy diverse topics of conversations and reflections, ranging from cultural difference, economy and politics, traveling and foods, to simply life values and planning.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Great location, area has a vibrant feel to it, close lots of good food options, shopping and transport links. Apartment is neat, tidy, well setup, secure, very easy to access and quite roomy (by Hong Kong standards). Kinwan is friendly, helpful and great with prompt correspondence.

I recommend staying here and will certainly do so again myself next time I'm in Hong Kong .

name: Cosy 2 levels Apartment near Central Station
summary: Beautiful and cosy 2 levels apartment with an amazing city view from level 8. Located in the heart of Sydney near Central station. Walking distance to most of the tourists destinations. Ideal place to be able to discover Sydney CBD or travel by train to anywhere. 1 minute walk to the brand new swimming pool, as well as tennis courts and the park. 2 bathrooms, laundry, huge master bedroom with the wardrobe. Balcony on each level.
space: The bedroom is on its own level, has its private bathroom with the bath tub.
description: Beautiful and cosy 2 levels apartment with an amazing city view from level 8. Located in the heart of Sydney near Central station. Walking distance to most of the tourists destinations. Ideal place to be able to discover Sydney CBD or travel by train to anywhere. 1 minute walk to the brand new swimming pool, as well as tennis courts and the park. 2 bathrooms, laundry, huge master bedroom with the wardrobe. Balcony on each level. The bedroom is on its own level, has its private bathroom with the bath tub. The apartment will be for your own use without sharing. The host will be at your disposal 24/7. Tour guide services could be provided as an extra, if needed. A lot of cafes and restaurants near by will make your travel much easier. 30 seconds to any public transport (Subway, Trains, Buses). 20 min walk to Opera House. 10 min walk to UTS, TAFE. 10 min walk to China Town. 5 min walk to the swimming pool and park. 2d small bedroom on level 3 is locked with personal things and has no acces
neighborhood_overview: A lot of cafes and restaurants near by will make your travel much easier.
notes: 2d small bedroom on level 3 is locked with personal things and has no access. Please note this is the heart of Sydney near Central Station, and not a quiet house in the forest :)
transit: 30 seconds to any public transport (Subway, Trains, Buses). 20 min walk to Opera House. 10 min walk to UTS, TAFE. 10 min walk to China Town. 5 min walk to the swimming pool and park.
access: The apartment will be for your own use without sharing.
interaction: The host will be at your disposal 24/7. Tour guide services could be provided as an extra, if needed.

reviews.comments: What a fantastic apartment right next to Central Station. This opens up the entire city to you through the trains, buses and light rail. Use the Opal card to save on costs. The living room is well laid out and the couch is well built and comfortable. The TV is run through the Internet so there are many options to chose from. The closest market is downstairs and a small Woolworth a block away. The unit is in a secure building and on the top floor for great views. If you like trains, you will love it more! The kitchen has everything to make your own meals, which we did. When we arrived Alexey and Olga had a lovely bottle of wine waiting for us. Very thoughtful and considerate host. The bed was very comfortable. We used the downstairs bathroom with the large tub and shower, so convenient. The stairs are easily manageable but not for wheelchair users. The bathroom upstairs has a shower and the washer and dryer. That is such a plus for travelers. I would say we were able to enjoy our week in Sydney so much more because we rented this apartment. This is the very best value to be found and we're thankful we booked it. Highly recommend and would book it again if in Sydney.

Great centrally located apartment. I loved the balcony - it's a real suntrap and a lovely place for an afternoon drink. The bed was comfortable and it's great there are two bathrooms - one on the living/dining level and another off the bedroom. 

It's opposite central station, so it's really easy to get everywhere via train. 

Just note there is some construction going on - firstly on the road outside (it's literally all ripped up) so you need to catch a Uber from the road around the corner. Secondly the building is under maintenance (roof terraces being are renovated) - but it didn't concern me at all. 

Wifi was good and quick. 

Overall I'd happily stay there again and really enjoyed my stay.

The apartment is very stylish and lovely. Alexey was very thoughful during our stay. Great location, 1 min walk from central station. We cut short our stay due to unforeseen situation. But overall the stay was wonderful! Thank you Alexey!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

A very clean and neat apartment, provided by a fantastic host who communicates promptly, was happy to accommodate my very late arrival time, and provided a number of thoughtful touches like a bottle of wine on arrival. Proximity to Central station is great, meaning access to the CBD is very simple, and the background noise is not disruptive (and ends completely in the later evening anyway). A great place to stay for solo or couple travellers looking to get out and explore, or a business person (as in my case) who need quick access to the CBD paired with a clean, safe place to come home to each night.

Alexey's flat is awesome. Amazing location right next to central station and offers a lovely view overlooking the hustle and bustle of central station. The apartment is in immaculate condition and is very homely. Alexey has furnished it beautifully and we were availed ourselves of the nespresso coffee machine and various DVDs available. Thanks Alexey!

This place is fantastic. Feels like a New York loft apartment with cool bedroom and trendy decor. The apartment is a stone's throw from both Central station and Surry Hills which has some awesome cafe's, restaurants and bars! Alexey was delightful and showed me through everything during check-in, and was flexible with check in times. He was also quick to respond to any questions I had.
Simple, clean, and good location. Alexey was very helpful and good to communicate with.

Alexey was a great host, very quick to communicate and has a lovely, small but split level apartment in an excellent location. It worked perfectly for us with a small child, we could put him to sleep and still stay up without waking him. We went to the park and the pool, very easily got around to the rest of the city.

The place was great and Alexey was an amazing host. It’s a central location and easily accessible to the train. This place is perfect for those who have never used a train before because all trains end up at this location. The train system starts in a loop first and then branches out into the rest of the city and his place is within this loop. The place is much larger than what the pictures depict. 2 floors with 2 full bathrooms and 2 balconies. There is a very nice restaurant below. Prior to staying in the apartment we thought the noise from the trains would be a problem at night but I️ dont actually remember hearing them.  So I️ basically slept like a baby and I’m a very very light sleeper. It could be that the trains stopped running at night but I’m not actually sure. All in all, this is a great place to stay. We highly recommend it.

Very clean, Stylish decoration, Easy access to Central Main staion, Excellent communication, Good matress for traveler, My family had really good time in this double floored apartment. The building is the best for traveler by train and also could be used for ones who wants walking along to the City, Hyde park. Addiotnally, the nice cafe and restraunt in SurryHills are recommnedable.
Lovely two level apartment just by the Central station. Lots of lovely cafes and restaurants for all budget and taste in the neighborhood. Thank you for hosting us, Alexey!

This is a fantastic apartment right in the middle of things. Alexey was a great host and went out of his way to make sure we had everything we needed. The apartment is very thoughtfully provisioned - you have everything you could need so you do feel very much like you are home away from home. Fanatastic location just near to lots of great eateries - and directly opposite Central Station. I have already recommended this place to friends. Their is construction on the street outside but this did not impact on us at all. The apartment really added to our experience of Sydney.

Love love loved this apartment! The personal touches around the space with the paintings and books really made it cozy and comfortable. Complimentary Nespresso pods were also definitely a plus; however, once we discovered the breakfast place downstairs, we took every chance to order coffee from there. Seriously, some of the best food just in the next building over. Multiple other eateries and shops in walking distance. The train station is less than 3 minutes walking and Chinatown is 15 minutes walking. Usual city sounds come in from the outside but nothing loud to complain about. Would definitely stay at Alexey and Olga's place again if I ever return to Sydney.
Perfect location right next to train station and lovely host with excellent communication!

Where do i start. 
This is a fantastic location, right beside Central train station. If you wanted to walk the town, you had great access to walk to Circular Quay, Paddy's Market  or Darling Harbour.  Your were pretty well within walking distance to grocery stores, restaurants and liquorland to name a few.  The apt is kept in great condition and had comfortable beds.  The balcony was a great place to wind down for the evening.  WiFi is provided and was pretty solid. 
Our host, Alexey, was always on top of things.  He met us upon our arrival and was always just an email away with quick responses to any questions i had. If you want a host that is looking out for your best interests, and is a great communicator Alexey fits the bill.
Thanks for a great week Alexey!

Fantastic apartment, central location within walking distance of everything but also right next to public transport. Great host, so friendly and was there if we needed anything. Would recommend to anyone and would definitely come back to stay again soon!

Die Wohnung ist einfach klasse!
Liegt direkt vor dem Hauptbahnhof von wo aus man im minutentakt in alle Richtungen fahren kann.
Mit der Bahn ist man in 10 Minuten am circular quay und es gibt auch eine direkte Verbindung zu den Blue Mountains!

Alexey ist ein toller Gastgeber!
Er hilft bei allen Problemen, gibt dir Tipps und fährt einen sogar zu orten zu denen man möchte :)

Die Wohnung an sich ist super!
Sehr viele Küchenutensilien, Shampoo und der Rest ist alles vorhanden!

Wir würden sofort wieder diese Wohnung nehmen, wenn wir nach Sydney kommen!

Lindo apto en un lugar ideal, ya que está a unos metros de la estación central, y a pie pudimos recorrer el centro de la ciudad! Recomiendo a los futuros viajeros, destacando la prolijidad del mismo y con todo lo necesario para sentirse como en casa.

Great location!! Well presented with good amenities. It was way closer to everything than expected. We wished we stayed here for our whole stay in Sydney. Beautiful home, very comfortable bed! Alexey was very helpful & prompt with communication. Complimentary wine was a lovely touch, thanks so much. Recommend!

Alexey's place is comfortable, spacious for 2 people, and in a great location. The unit is in an apartment building just across from the Central train station with easy access to CBD of Sydney (10 min train ride or 20 min walk). The unit is 2 levels, with a full bathroom, washer/dryer and kitchen. Communication with Alexey was fast and straightforward. We were able to self check-in early, and the instructions were clear and easy. We didn't have a chance to meet Alexey, but he checked in with us during our stay. We had a great stay and hopefully will be back to visit Sydney and stay here again!
Superior communation with fast answers! Location is great, especially for flight passengers: trains are close and the apartment is easily accessible with luggages. Thank you!

Alexey's place is an excellent apartment opposite Central Railway Station and had us fascinated watching trains coming and going all day.  Ideal for getting public transport to anywhere in Sydney and beyond.  Two bathrooms and great cooking facilities. Washing machine, dryer, and dishwasher all there.
If you like quirky you will love this place. Conveniently located opposite Central station and close to Woolworths and park.

Alexey's place is very nice with everything we need, including all necessary consumables and some food.   The flat is spacious with two floors + roof separating living room and bedroom, together with two washrooms. We enjoyed staying at the roof for the sunset.     Alexey is one of the Best Host I have met. He has tried his every effort to let us have a nice stay and responded promptly. He was willing to offer us helps when we were in need. Incidentally, the lift was out of order for a couple of days during our stay. It was really out of Alexey's control. He has even come to carry luggages and drive us to the airport. If you are looking for a place in sydney, please dont hesitate to stay at Alexey's place. Thanks so much, Alexey =)
Thanks for having me Alexey. Great location and a lovely bottle of wine on arrival- much appreciated.

Great location in Sydney, close to Central Station easy walking distances to everywhere we wanted to go...thanks Alexey for being a great host and your great customer service... Nice touch with a bottle of wine... Thankyou ... Steve and Nicole
Fun and spacious apartment, in a great location. Would certainly recommend.

Alexey's apartment is in a great location and has everything needed.  He was a thoughtful host, communicated promptly with us at all times, and answered all our queries.  We would be very happy to stay there again when next in Sydney.
Perfect host and great place - thanks Alexey!
Great place and value for money, Alexey was super helpful and easy to communicate with
Alexey was a great host. His apartment was exactly as described an the location was idea for the trains to everywhere.  When I come back to Sydney I'll definitely be looking to book here again.
Great! Perfect location and lovely decor.
Great location. Right next to Central Station. Cozy place with lovely deco. Highly recommended!

The location just right next to central station
Plus wifi supplied. I m highly suggest this place for ppl travel or business :)
Great place to stay for a visit in the city. The view was incredible

Excellent spot and a great space to spend a week, with easy access to downtown Sydney (and anywhere else via the train).

Alexey was an extremely responsive host, both leading up to and during our stay. Could not have asked to for better from him.

Alexey's place is centrally located, just  metres away from Central Station. It's clean, comfortable and Alexey went out of his way for a flexible check in for us. There are also very thoughtful touches around the house - such as chardonnay on arrival. Highly recommend.

The apartment is excellent, located literally steps from Central Station. Very easy for transportation, especially to/from airport. Comfortable place, really enjoyed my stay. Balcony is nice! Alexey is a great host, fast responses to messages. Easy arrival/departure.

This place is charming and close to public transport. It made taking the train to an from the airport very convenient. It was walking distance to some tourist areas and close to a grocery store. I was very happy with my stay and communication was always prompt. There was a lovely touch of wine on arrival. It was clean with convenient amenities.

This was my first AIRBNB Experience, I truly enjoyed the creative and functional space. Three balconies were incredible, great city skyline views. Very quiet building. It is close to the train station, but this does quiet down around 11pm every night. 

The place is warm, the heaters are warmer and the two guest bathrooms meant I could enjoy the privacy of my own space and visitors could use the one upstairs. 

The tv didn’t quite work with limited reception; but if you don’t want to watch television or sports the whole time you’re there - head on out and experience SYDNEY night life just a stone throw away and in some cases, right next door! If you want a cheap quick eat - dominos pizza is down stairs; that was great for a sobering up recovery with my parents who visited. 

For my first AIRBNB experience this house was exceptional and Alexey was very hospitable, I had planned on visiting with my partner but they broke up with me before I arrived from Melbourne. Alexey was very sweet leaving a bottle of wine for me and checking in on me to make sure I was okay. 

All in all an amazing experience.
Amazing location!

The apartment was as descibed, Alexey was a responsive host. 

There was something happening at Central Station in the wee hours that meant sirens were going off all night, and the construction in Chalmers St was noisy, but that didn't start til 9 am. The first night was totally fine, slept like logs.

You need to be ok with stairs and the mattress is on the floor. The mattress is a good one. The apartment has everything you could want, great kitchen and bathroom. It was handy having two bathrooms.

Being right near Central is great for transport, we got to town late and were still able to get the train to Circular Quay in time for the show.
Great place to stay - amazing location! :)

Look, some Airbnb host could be an agent which just set the accomodation purely for business BUT Alexey is totally different, the host is care & thoughtful, it feels like home. BASICALL ALL YOU NEED FOR YOUR TRAVEL.. & wait for it... it (literally) only 86 steps away from the Central Station exit 6 ! amazing location to go anywhere....

Alexey was amazing to work with. He worked to make our check in/check out times best to fit our schedule. He had wine waiting for us, which was a nice personal touch. Everything with keys exchanging went very smooth. He kept great contact throughout the stay. The area is right by the train station, at the moment there was some construction so parking would be very difficult to find. There is a cafe/pizza place and servo on the bottom floor which was very convenient. The apartment itself is very trendy, with a small lounge are, but bring DVDs to watch! The balconies were lovely, and caught the sun all day.

Alexey’s place is awesome, very unique and in a great location. Alexey was also great at communication and made me feel at ease as I knew we were looked after prior to coming to stay. The apartment is quite loud and the TV has very little reception but other than that it was a great stay! Thanks Alexey :)

We had a very brief stay and the apartment was literally across the road from Central Station. Our booking was very last minute and Alexey's responses were very prompt - very good communication. The one negative was the noise from the station which was quite noticeable from the bedroom.

Alexy's flat is next to Central Train Station. That makes it very convenient to get around Sydney.  The deck is nice.  Flat is small, but that is expected in middle of a big city. Everything you need is provided. There is no WiFi, which was disappointing.  The blinds don't  cover the whole window,  so there is quite a bit of light at night.  There is also noise from Central Station. If you are a sensitive sleeper,  this might not be the best spot. Otherwise I recommend it. He is a responsive host.
Really great place, I would highly recommend staying here. Alexey was a great host very communicative. The apartment had everything you could need and the location was great!

Alexey is really nice and kind. He replied quickly and let us early check-in without any fee. The apartment is very clean and all things needed are well prepared. It got a super good location, just two-minute walk to Central Station with a beautiful view of the city through the window. Self check-in is really easy. Highly recommend!!

Communication was great, less than 50mtrs away from central station, easy check in and out, room was very clean 
really enjoyed my stay
Great place, awesome location. Clean, cozy and comfortable. would recommend to anyone. Alexey was very communicative and helpful. 10/10

Alexey’s place was absolutely perfect for our visit to Sydney. Steps away from the train station, which was incredibly convenient, and the home itself is very well appointed and had everything we could have needed. Highly recommend!
Great place good host

Ideally located next to Central Station and plenty of cafes in the area. The apartment was easy to find and felt secure.

The apartment was clean and bright with a balcony on both levels. 

Pleasantly surprised to find extra touches, such as extra towels and some toiletries also available. 

The kitchen was well equipped and we enjoyed the complimentary wine on arrival. 

Would highly recommend. The apartment is close to transport and a 30 minute walk to the CBD.
good

This apartment is very interesting on 3 levels so make sure you can handle stairs;)
I found the location fascinating. Directly opposite the railway station and work going on putting in the light rail but it did not impact in the evening at all. 
Loved sitting on the balcony with generous bottle of supplied Chardonnay,  people and train watching. And the lovely city lights beyond. Though the trains seem to go through the night ( I looked if I got up) I did not hear (Email hidden by Airbnb) fortable mattress (on floor as in photos) and lounge to relax on after a long day out and about. 
I wish I’d had time to read some of those great looking books!
Very homey and comfy and great location to get to anywhere!

Alexey’s space was lovely! A great host, he made sure we could check in and out when needed, and responded to messages quickly. Extra touches like bringing us coffee, and providing a bottle of wine on arrival made the trip even better!

This is the ideal location for a single person or couple if you plan on travelling around Sydney and to country NSW. Public transport to everywhere is at your doorstep including trains, buses and light rail. A small convenience store is next door for milk and snacks. The range there, however, is limited and you would struggle to find ingredients to make a meal. Other food options are very close by. The bed is very comfortable and the balconies have nice views over Central Station towards Haymarket. Although there was a little bit of noise from the trains, it was minimal.

The best choice if you travel in Sydney first time.Very good location and you can walk to Sydney maybe 40 minutes. Clean room and we slept tight. You can cook Chinese food since there is Chinese soy sauce.

One of the best location. infront of central train station. this place have everything you need. quick to response to inquiry. and going over and beyond with the personal touch of a welcome wine . If you are looking for a place to stay, do not hesitate to book this awesome apt. great place and great host!

The place was absolutely amazing and in the perfect location! Communication was so easy and the little touches like the bottle of wine made it extra special. Honestly could not have booked a better place for our time in Sydney!
Fantastic location; My first time in Sydney and the apt is at the heart of almost everything. Such a convenience to go around

Alexey’s place is very nice & clean. I love his two storey place which is close to everywhere. Close to many different kinds of restaurants. I love it coz it’s walkable to China town where you can buy cheap different kinds of souvenirs from Australia. Alexey was very helpful & upfront in answering our queries. Very good host who was very easy to reach out when we have questions. 

Definitely recommendable 100% & definitely will stay again when we decided to go back to Sydney.

Alexey 's house located next to the Central Station which is very convenient for all travellers. The house is clean, stylish design, with a lovely balcony, all amenities are provided. However there were little problem about the shower tap and aircon, but Alexy responded quickly and promised to fix it. So the house still highly recommended.

Everything was as expected, great price and location. 
Very strong communication with host. Would recommend for anyone wanting to stay somewhere close and affordable to the CBD as the train is across the road and lots of ammentities near by.
A great location and a great host. Everything we needed was there and it was an excellent house.
Cozy little place literally right next to Central Station.  Alexey was quick at responding and the early check in was also so helpful. Loved the balcony!

Alexey’s place is exactly as pictured and is very clean. It might be a little noisy for light-sleepers due to the close proximity to the Central railway station, but the location is perfect for travellers wishing to explore Sydney CBD on foot or public transport! The main issue we had during our stay was that the only elevator in the building was not working. Carrying heavy luggages up and down 8 levels would not be ideal so it may be good to check if the building management has repaired the elevator

Pros:

Central location: This Airbnb is  Surry Hills and is extremely close to the central station which has ties to many lines. Perfect for those who want to convenience and close to some of the popular and trendy bars. 

Quick responses:  Alexey's response were quick which we appreciated. We had a change in date in our Airbnb and he was flexible in changing dates.

Cons:

Unclear directions:  We would have preferred more clear direction and a step by step using AirBnB check in process. We spent (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minutes looking for the building because the (Hidden by Airbnb) Map didn't pin point us the cab to the right location and the direction detailed was confusing. We used both Uber and 13cab and they both dropped us to the back of the building.  

Broken elevators for the entire trip: We completely understand that this is out of Alexey's control. This is an old building so it was not a surprise. That said, we wish Alexey informed us about the broken elevator in advance. One of the neighbours mentioned that the elevator was broken for a few days and it's not an uncommon thing for it to happen to the building. Carrying 2 luggages + carry on to the 8th floor was extremely challenging. Please watch out if you are carrying luggages or have a small family. 

Initial feedback given:  When we shared with you our initial feedback about the direction, elevators and the humidity in the room, Alexey's responsive was defensive instead of finding a solution.  He subsequently suggested that we could leave to a new hotel/airbnb with a full refund with receipt. We were taken by surprise because our feedback was honest and were simply looking to help him as a host. We were surprised to have read that message without any solutions. It felt like he'd  rather have us leave so that he can avoid any possible reviews.
Neat, tidy, stylish and convenient. A great place with a equally great host.

Unfortunately we only stayed one night, instead of the intended 5 nights. The lift had broken down and the apartment was on the 8th floor.  2 large suitcases and 8 flights of stairs for 5 nights, it just wasn't convenient so we moved to a hotel. Alexey (the host) was very helpful and quick to respond to the issue, refunding the rest of our stay. The lift was fixed the next day, but by then we'd booked the hotel already. 

On the upside, the apartment is as per the pics. Very clean, the mattress was comfy and lots of space in the apartment. Nice white wine on arrival too. The location is great, but do pack ear plugs if you're a light sleeper - right opposite Central train station, which is very busy. Also some roadworks taking place.

Nous avons apprécié l'appartement  qui est très bien placé pour tous déplacements dans Sydney, sa vue, le confort  de la chambre et la réactivité d'Alexey. Nous avons aussi eu droit à la panne d'ascenseur, mais que sur 2 jours. Les travaux pour la nouvelle ligne du tram étaient au pied de l'immeuble et très bruyants (ils seront terminés fin 2019) mais cela était gérable avec les boules quies. Aussi, nous avons évité de nous asseoir dans  le canapé, rigolo, ancien mais défoncé et poussiéreux. Au final, nous avons apprécié notre séjour chez Alexey et n'excluons d'y retourner peut-être en 2020

Quirky artsy apartment in amazing location. 

Alexey was super helpful and responsive and would definitely recommend staying with him if you’re heading to Sydney :D

The place was just as advertised. We loved staying close to the Central train station as it really saved us time because trains were central to our trip itinerary. It was clean, close to everything, plenty of amenities, and one of us snores, so having two different levels really helped!  :)
Excellent location for a great price - thanks Alexey:)
the location is great if you come from the airport or want to explore the city by foot or using public transport.   I cannot fault my experience.

Good location next to central station. Fairly spacious unit with lots of amenities. It is particularly suitable for younger people. Alexey is an excellent, caring host. The unit can be hard for taxi or Uber driver to find, but the entrance is just a few meters left of Dominoes Pizza. Light sleepers may have difficulty with light as the blackout curtains do not fully close.
Alexey is very helpful
Charming quirky space. Lots of towels, shampoo and conditioner. Condiments in the fridge. Good coffee maker. Bring ear plugs for the night because you can hear the trains.
Friendly host, great location

name: Boutique Bright Private Studio Close to the City
summary: This is a modern studio in a leafy quiet street in Ultimo, a suburb full of character with all its cafes, restaurants and art galleries. This studio is centrally located for you to make the most of your visit to Sydney. My home is the perfect place to relax and unwind during your time away. My home has a refined feel, with bright, crisp interiors and ultra-modern finishings. Including a sleek kitchen, executive living spaces and generous bedroom this is a place where memories are made.
space: Welcome to one of the most sought after addresses in Sydney. My studio is the perfect spot to begin your travels in one of Australia’s exciting cities. You’ll find no room left behind in my stylish apartment situated only moments from shopping and restaurant precincts, leafy parks and direct access into Sydney CBD. Upon entering my apartment, you’ll be amazed by the abundant light and spacious interiors that flow through all the rooms. The grand, open plan living space features chic fittings  modern styles that are perfect for entertaining or before heading out for the night. Soak up the morning or afternoon sun throughout the living space, whilst also enjoying the outdoor balcony and dining area. Moving to the dining area, you’ll be able to fit four guests very comfortably with added room in mind for big dinners and sharing plates! My home has been designed with entertaining in mind - with plenty of room for guests to enjoy themselves. The dining table also acts as a workstation for t

This studio is centrally located for you to make the most of your visit to Sydney. My home is the perfect place to relax and unwind during your time away. Upon entering my apartment, you’ll be amazed by the abundant light and spacious interiors that flow through all the rooms. The grand, open plan living space features chic fittings  modern styl
neighborhood_overview: 2mints walk to UTS or coles express 5 mints to central park shopping center or powerhouse museum 8 mints to broadway shopping center or chinatown 10 mints to the university of sydney or central station 15 mints to fishmarket or darling harbour
notes: no car parking,small money parking on the street,or lucky to park on the Macarthur street for free.
transit: 如果乘火车到central station,步行五到十分钟就到了｡如果打车或者开车,直接开到后面小路,从我们私有的后门出入特别方便｡机场乘uber只要30澳币左右就可以到达!
access: Guests have access to the entire home – you are booking the ‘entire place’ which means you can make yourself at home throughout. A set of keys will be provided to the doors, allowing you to come and go as you please throughout your stay, 24 hours a day.
interaction: In most instances I will personally meet guests upon arrival to hand over keys and explain where everything is and how easy it is to get around. For those checking in at unusual hours or while I’m at work, alternative arrangements will be made. During your stay I will be nearby in Sydney and available for contact by email or phone.

reviews.comments:
The rental lives up to its pictures.
Brand new, spacious and well equipped.
Very responsive host. Conveniently situated. Good value in an expensive city.
Nothing less than 5 stars!

Unsafe secondary stove top plugged into the wall with a Chinese adaptor that makes physical sparks and that could burn the place down, dead cockroaches in shower and kitchen cupboards, not very clean.

Xinhui's apartment is in a quiet little street, very clean and tidy, and everything is the same as the picture. There is a  convenience store nearby, everything is convenient and totally beyond our expectations. Thanks to xinhui for providing free luggage.

The apartment was cosy for myself as I was travelling alone and stayed for 3 nights. It would fit a couple perfect. There is a double bed with nice quilts, it was comfortable for me. Good lightings, internet and TV were all working well during my stay. What you see in the picture, is exactly how it is. The Location is very safe, especially since it is very nearby UTS where u have lots of students roaming around. The location is excellent, very near Central Mall and HayMarket. I could even walk to the Fish Market and Darling Harbor in 15 mins.  I highly recommend the apartment by Xinhui. He made renting very easy and was very very quick in responding if you needed any information.
Nice room in convenient location. Xinhui was easy to get in contact with & helpful.

A clean and very spacious apartment with tons of storage. The Bosch washer / dryer is a great addition although an iron would also be useful for business travelers like myself. Xinhui is friendly and accommodating. Check in is super easy with keys in a combination locked box and the apartment is quiet but well located for the city.
Had a great stay, would definitely stay again!
Fabulous! Thanks!
The place is located right in the central Sydney. Short distance to everything. Everything is great except the room could be much cleaner. There was dust in the bathroom. And there was no dish rack.

As per previous comments, issues with cleanliness and lack of crockery/towels upon arrival. Able to contact owner and he provided new towels, coffee cups, dishrack, tea towels etc the first morning and provided a small refund which was appreciated.  Main bed is soft but comfortable.  Very convenient location, mostly walked to nearby places or into town.  Easy to get to/from airport.
Great location. Very clean and nice layout. Quick communication with host.

Nice appartment and good localisation to visit Sydney.
Good adress to stay.

Studio apartment, about a 10-15 minute walk down to darling harbour, which was perfect for us attending a conference at the convention centre. Easy checkin. Good apartment all round. Would stay again!
Excellent location in a quiet leafy suburb. Within walking distance to many good eateries and shops. Great place for exploring Sydney.
Great stay! Clean
Keurig en praktisch appartement in rustige straat. Heel dichtbij de technische universiteit, openbaar vervoer en op loopafstand van alle belangrijke attracties van Sydney. Perfecte WiFi.
位置在中国城后面街区,去中国城很方便,还有小露台可以喝喝茶
If you do not mind with place that needs more than 1km to station, it is a very good place to stay. Very cozy and convinience to stay.
Perfect location and friendly neighbours. Would definitely stay again and recommend!!
Great, comfy little apartment very close to the action. Clean and new. We had a great stay.

What a great spot! Easy access and fantastic little apartment. Such an easy walk into China Town and darling harbour. Coming from Sydney ourselves we have stayed in lots of places and this little part of town was great for us and our kids. You do need to sort out parking but small price to pay. Our host was a champion and place was clean and well set up. Will be back.
Nice apartment, super clean, great location.
Amazing location and great host communication, the apartment looks exactly as advertised.
Great location and spacious studio apartment. Perfect for two but could easily accommodate two couples with the fold out sofa. Everything you need to be a good base for Sydney:)

Neat and open studio space with lots of storage units. The bed was super comfy. The walls are very thin though so you can hear noises from next door, however the neighbourhood itself is very peaceful. 
The bathroom is nicely renovated and clean but there were mosquitoes hanging around possibly because the front window was left open before we arrived. 
Would not recommend cooking as the kitchen is very small. The fish market is also a walkable distance away. 
Overall great spot :)
Amazing location
Place exactly as described. Very spacious and clean. We had a very enjoyable time.
很好的主人,不错的体验｡
I love the place! It's warm and at grate location! The place feel like home:)

I love the location, very closed to next bus stop( just 15 minute walk- turn right and turn left) walk to broadway street. Near spicy alley and shopping mall.China town is just 15-20 minute walk. Great location and room as described.1 thing is minus just the master bad. To soft for me, but i really love the Room design.I will stay here again next Time.
Quiet, comfortable apartment and easy to find.
这是一个十分友善贴心的房东,对住户需求响应十分迅速,住宿体验很棒
Central location. Great communication from host before my trip made checkin a breeze. It’s a nice apartment, but had trouble locking the door which easily jammed, so at times didn’t feel as secure.

最寄り駅からは10~15分と程よい距離ですが､大きいｽｰﾂｹｰｽを持って移動していくのは少し大変だと感じました｡
お家自体は路地を入ったところにあるので車も殆ど通らず静かな環境でとても落ち着けました｡綺麗に掃除もされており特に不自由さは感じませんでした｡
Fantastic, stylish and spacious apartment in a great location!
Great apartment in an ideal location with easy access to the CBD.

房东人很nice,反映迅速,房子地理位置超级好,离市中心非常近,走路就能到｡周围有著名的科技大学,悉尼大学,环境优美,随处可见大学生｡

唐人街走路过去没几分钟就到了,能轻松选择好吃的的中国餐｡

住在这里性价比很高!

下次还会考虑你家!谢谢让我和朋友在悉尼度过愉快的两天一晚!

This is in a great location, being walking distance to Broadway Shopping Centre and the ICC.  The space is one room with a bedroom cupboard as a divider which I didn't realise at first.  The only major downside for our stay was there wasn't a microwave.  Otherwise it's a lovely, fresh & clean place to stay.
Nice studio, close to anything you need!
Listing and photos accurate. Clean.
Xin is a great host!

Thanks for having us Xinhue however I wasn’t really pleased with the stay. There is only 1 bed and a fold out couch that is claimed to be a bed but really isn’t. There’s bugs in the shower and a hotel is cheaper. Wish I had a better experience but I didn’t.. The place is smaller than expected too... Thanks for preparing the rooms though.

Great location and base to explore the city, near the central station, short walk to Darling Harbour.
The flat is as you can see on the pictures, nice, modern and spacious. 
The kitchen is relatevely well equipped for some small cooking or breakfast. There are also really good place for coffee and breakfast right around the corner. 
The host is really reactive and nice, indications to find and access the appartment were clear and easy. Check-in was smooth. 
Only the cleanliness was not up to my preference.
Amazing apartment and close to everything. 15 min walk to Darling harbour and 20 mins to the local Ferry. Great location.
Veldig fin leilighet med meget god beliggenhet. Mange utesteder og butikker i nærheten.
Modest home in a great location.
Great location and place! Perfect size, everything you need. Easy check-in and great communication

A bright and airy space, private entrance, and amazing location - right near UTS, minutes to the city, and around the corner from many great eateries along Broadway. I would definitely be back to stay here again!
This place is in a good location! Beside the quite street, things are clean and the host is very helpful!

perfect house, good location, nice and warm reply with reasonable price, Xinhui is a good host with a wonderful accommodation. 
Recommend to everybody.
Very clean and quiet. Good place to stay!
Very good space to stay in. Lots of room and super clean too! Quick replies from host :)
It was wonderful stay.
Hermoso dto y genial la ubicacion. Volveriamos sin dudarlo. Muy recomendado !!
Great place would highly recommend
great experience
As described. Default check out time is too early at 10am, but got the feeling it would have been extended if I had asked. Normally airbnb is at midday.
This place is near the China Town and Sydney Uni. Just no train station in this area. The house is clean and lovely.
No reply when I asked how to use the oven.
great space in a great location.

Good value for money - location was an excellent base for exploring Sydney, being so close to Central Station. 

Fitted out with all the basics - kitchen had cooking utensils, but the microwave/oven is a bit confusing and we couldn't find any instructions. 

The sofa-bed was more comfortable than the mattress and there was plenty of space in the studio apartment.
Location was great as it was near city and chinatown. However, the floor was not very clean but overall a value for money stay.
好房子,好位置,交通便利,下次还会选择预订
Would book again!

name: ²LARGE DOUBLE ROOM SLEEPS UP TO 4  IN FLAMENGO
summary: Big lit room of natural daylight, two large windows (Green view fron the window you can see marmosets in the trees.) with double bed, bedside air conditioning table, 1 two bed, 1 closet, ceiling fan,  floor lamp in wood, wi-fi.
space: There is no cleaning fee Not even using the washing machine but provide your soap We offer clean linen and bath linens with weekly change We offer services such as frozen food, home care and cleaning according to your need to combine. The room can accommodate up to 4 people that will be charged as extra guest R$ 90.00 Reais (Brazilian currency) per night The room has two large windows and air conditioning and ceiling fan. There is no cleaning fee Not even using the washing machine but provide your soap Our house is warm with many plants. The morning sun comes through the windows and illuminates the entire apartment . It´s very light and airy with a sea breeze carrying the smell of the sea. Our house is spacious and colorful. We are a childless couple and there is enough quiet in our house. It´s a 5 minute walk to the Flamengo subway station. Also, a bus stop and taxi stand are on the corner in front of the building. You will be close to supermarkets , coffee shops , malls , restaurants
