neighborhood_overview: Flamengo is like a community. We usually greet each other in the street.  The people are friendly, calm It is a quiet, safe  and well policed neighborhood with many historical and interesting  places to visit   Our building has doormen 24 hours Flamengo is a great place to live and have fun with many historical and interesting places to visit. Here is quiet enough to live and still has excellent shopping, with great places for food and fun  here we have a little bit of everything
notes: Any adjustment or extra payment shall be made at the check-in We offer services such as frozen food, home care and cleaning according to your need to combine. IN THE KITCHEN: The use is shared and only for breakfast, snacks and quick meals with the help of microwave  it's equipped with coffee maker, toaster and blender We have a water purifier with natural and ice water. A refrigerator for guest use and a large table where you can sit comfortably to eat besides dishes and utensils
transit: Arriving By Bus: Public transportation via a special bus line (Linha ALVORADA number 2018) to go from Tom Jobim airport (GIG) to my home.  Arriving by Taxi You can hire a taxi in the airport, but it will pay more, despite knowing the price in advance. But this is not our custom here,paid taxis after arriving at our destination. You should not pre-pay for a taxi inside of the airport because they are expensive. You should find a taxi outside of the airport. It`s best to locate a taxi driver who uses a meter is safe and easy.   You can also use Uber it is safe and easy and you will have the price in advanced. Near my home you have: subway  Public transportation (bus)  Taxi and you also can call Uber
access: You will have access to the entire apartment .  My husband and I like to be the best possible hosts for our guests We have everything here to make you feel at ease and comfortable. You can use the kitchen, appliances, washing machine,and the service area. You can also use the living room to watch TV, chat, play cards, read.
interaction: We are a quiet and reserved couple. I am friendly, good-humored and cheerful. I like to receive, but mostly to let my guests relax. We will help with anything you need. Count on us for everything.
house_rules: CHECK IN E CHECK OUT Por favor observem atentamente o horário de CHECK IN 14:00 horas e CHECK OUT 12:00 horas Preciso de tempo para preparar o quarto para receber outros hóspedes. A casa é grande há espaço bastante para que fiquem aqui segura e confortavelmente e tomem um café comigo até a hora de seus vôos. Quando puder ser flexível serei Respeite a casa Não Bata as portas  Por favor não fume Por favor não utilize bebidas alcoólicas  Estranhos não são permitidos, apenas os hóspedes podem permanecer na casa. Por favor  ao sair feche as janelas do quarto, desligue luz, ventilador de teto e ar condicionado. Utilize a pia da cozinha apenas para lavar louças, frutas e comestíveis. Utilize o tanque de lavar roupas para lavar chinelos, bolsas, sacolas, bolsas térmicas ou qualquer outros utensílios que não sejam relativos a cozinha e pendure na corda de secar acima do mesmo para não molhar o chão e provocar acidentes já que ficam pingando água. Para utilizar a máquina de lavar avisar com ante

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Somos um casal sem filhos caseiros e notívagos. Vivemos com simplicidade e gostamos de conforto. Amamos a natureza, plantas e animais.
Eu cursei Letras na Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro (URFJ) 
Sou culinarista, hostess e organizadora profissional.
Eu falo o que me vem á cabeça sou muito sincera direta e espirituosa. Gosto de ciências ligadas a área de saúde pública infectologia e microbiologia  
Meu marido Toni é hardware e tem interesse em todas as tecnologias ligadas a informática e softwares. Tem grande conhecimento em sistemas de sons música, eletrônica, política e geografia.  Ama futebol cinema música e tudo ligado a essas áreas.
Nós não podemos viver sem DEUS, sem paz, sem amizade, sem dignidade e sem privacidade. Viajar para conhecer o mundo todo faz parte dos nossos sonhos mas conhecer todo o nosso lindo Brasil já estaria de bom tamanho!
Amamos o nosso pais!
Conhecer pessoas de diferentes culturas recebê-las em nossa casa é muito gratificante! Não medimos esforços para deixar os nossos hóspedes o mais confortável possível, oferecendo um espaço muito limpo e organizado, respeitando-lhes sempre a privacidade e ajudando no que precisarem. 
Nossa casa é grande e tem uma localização privilegiada e segura na zona Sul do Rio de Janeiro Temos três excelentes cômodos para locação 
Eu costumo sempre lembrar que toda moeda tem dois lados. 
Nunca acho que o copo está metade vazio, mas sim metade cheio!  
Nós temos fé e quem anda com fé sabe que a fé não costuma falhar.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Marlene and her husband are the sweetest! The place was really well located, and well maintained. One cannot ask for more.

Thank you Marlene! I had an awesome awesome stay!
Passamos o reveillon na casa da Marlene. Ótima anfitriã, sempre atenta e preocupada com o bem estar dos hóspedes, nos deu ótimas dicas suuper atenciosa e super recomendada.

Super educado casal Marlene e Antônio fizeram de tudo para deixar a gente bem a vontade na casa deles em Fllamengo... Até bolo de aniversário feito em casa com eles cantando! Casa super limpo, confortável com ventilador e banheiro de uso exclusivo para cada quarto.  E aquele salão; tamanho de um quadro de tênis. ... so toma cuidado brandindo a sua raquete! !! Foi uma estadia muito legal que vou repetir cada vez que eu retorno a cidade maravilhosa. Obrigado

Não existem palavras para descrever a ótima estadia que eu e meu namorado tivemos na casa da Marlene e do Antonio. O casal nos recebeu muit (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) bem, sentimos como se estivéssemos em casa, eles sempre muito atenciosos e carinhosos realmente não só recomendo como iremos retornar mais vezes. O local é super bem localizado, próximo de várias atrações turísticas da cidade, bem como de fácil acesso ao transporte público.
O carinho e a atenção do casal conosco foi muito marcante, são pessoas incríveis, exemplo de casal!!! Adoramos muito a estadia!!! Ah e os gatos Eros e Mia são muito fofos!!!
Bom se vcs estão procurando um local agradável e pessoas encantadoras sem dúvidas o apto da Marlene e do Antonio oferece isso e tudo mais!!!! Adoramos ter conhecido o casal e foi ótima a estadia!!!! Recomendadissimo!!!!

La experiencia en casa de Marlene fue maravillosa. Fuimos muy bien recibidos y nos sentimos como en nuestra propia casa. Ellos son seres excepcionales que te hacen sentir a gusto y confortable. Nos ayudaron en todo, Marlene es una cocinera estupenda y en la mañana disfrutamos sus magníficos pasteles. Deliciosos. Antonio siempre nos prestaba su ayuda y gentileza. Estuvimos muy bien en Rio con ellos en su casa. Es la mejor experiencia que alguien puede tener en Airbnb, les deseo lo mejor

Ficando na casa de Marlene foi uma maravilha. Um apartamento super limpo com muito estilo num bairro muito bom. Marlene e Antonio representam a alma Carioca. Me sentava como em casa. Um abraco Paulo

To stay at Marlene' place was excellent. A very clean apartement with style situated in a very good area. Marlene and Antonio represent the soul of Rio. I realy felt at home. Paulo

Der Aufenthalt bei Marlene war ganz großartig. Eine sehr saubere Wohnung, eingerichtet mit Stil und in einer sehr guten Gegend gelegen. Ich habe mich zu Hause gefühlt. Paulo

Marlene is an excellent host. She is one of the nicest, most welcoming people that I have ever met. My room included breakfast, wi-fi internet, plenty of space, and a comfortable loving atmosphere. I truly felt like a member of the family. I STRONGLY recommend her home for your stay in Rio de Janeiro.

BEST HOST EVER! Marlene and Antonio think about all the details to offer the best stay in Rio. Besides, their apartment is gorgeous, bright, clean and comfortable. In other words, if you want great location, comfort and a host that treats you as its best, you got it!

ps: If you are lucky enough you might get some delicious carrot cake!

Nuestra estancia en la casa de Marlene y Antonio fue maravillosa, como si estuviéramos en casa.
Son muy buenas personas, atentos y te ayudan en todo lo que puedas necesitar.
Es la mejor opción para alojarse en Río, buena zona, con parada de metro y de bus cerca, zona muy tranquila y segura
Ahhh por cierto Marlene hace unos pasteles riquisimossss 
Nos han tratado de maravilla  y repetiremos algún día

Hospedarse en la casa de Marlene fue sin duda una gran experiencia y muy buena decisión, Marlene y su esposo son dos grandes personas, muy amables, serviciales, y atentos que nos brindaron todo lo necesario y mas para tener una muy buena estadía en Río, nos compartieron sus conocimientos de la ciudad con una magnifica disposición y atención,  nos sentimos como en casa todo el tiempo. Mil gracias Marlene y Antonio por toda su ayuda y colaboración y por abrirnos las puertas de su casa, a la cual sin duda alguna volveré.

Adoramos nossa estadia , quarto grande e bem ventilado com ar condicionado funcionando perfeitamente para refrescar o calor do Rio  , limpeza do apartamento impecável , anfitriões muito educados , extremamente prestativos e preocupados com a segurança e bem -estar dos hóspedes.  3 banheiros à disposição , não tivemos problema algum . Café da manhã com pão fresquinho todos os dias, além de um banquete no dia primeiro. Boa localização, a 2 quarteirões do metrô do Flamengo .Marlene e Antônio  obrigada por tudo e esperamos voltar em breve.
主人的家位于弗拉门戈地铁站附近,交通非常方便｡主人家很干净,房间很大｡Toni&marlene人特别热情,我们愉快的聊天交流｡希望下次还能住在那!thanks Toni&marlene

I think Flamengo is one of best neighborhoods in Rio. Safe, everything is near, the Flamengo beach, metro station. Between city centre and Ipanema beach. Flat is spacious, bright and filled with love. There are bit noisy bus traffic on the street as the flat is on the third floor, but hey, this is city life! If you are not speaking any portugese as me, better prepare yourself, because doorman can ask many unknown questions, but if you keep your side, he finally lets you in. Marlene and Tony treated me as family member always asking, is everything ok. Absolutely great experience!

Marlene和Tony是非常棒并且很热心的一对房东 房子非常大并且地理位置十分方便 5分钟就可到面包山的沙滩和Flamengo的地铁车站 下次来Rio还会愿意回来住哈~

Marlene and Tony are very nice and helpful host in Rio, the place is quite easy to reach and location are perfect, only 5 mins walking to the beach opposite Sugarloaf mountain and Flamengo Metro station, I've love to come back next time to stay at Marlene's place.
Clean and big room in one of the greenest areas of Rio. In addition, Marlene and Toni are always happy to give travelling tips.

The pics of the room accurate and the bed is comfortable and nice. Very good location as Flamengo is a safe neighbourhood centrally located and nor far from Botafogo, Copacabana, and etc. Marlene & Toni are very nice people and I had a nice chat with them and they brought me to their favourite Pastel place around the corner. It was my first time in Rio and I enjoyed myself and had a good time. Thanks a for everything and looking forward to stay there again when I come gown to Rio in the future.

A casa da Marlene é incrível, super limpa e organizada, receptiva e aconchegante. O ar condicionado salva nesse calor diabólico carioca! A comunicação foi rápida, precisamos de um quarto com urgência e preço justo, e o da Marlene salvou a gente, literalmente! Recomendo a todos, próxima estadia no Rio já reservarei de cara!

Mais uma vez eu me hospedei com a Marlene e o Toni, dessa vez com minha família. A experiência foi ótima, os quartos e a casa são confortáveis e os anfitriões fazem de tudo para você ficar a vontade. A localização do apartamento é excelente, perto do metro e bem no meio do caminho entre as principais praias da Zona Sul e o Centro/Lapa.

Passei 3 maravilhosos dias hospedado nos aposentados do querido casal Marlene e Toni. Ambos são extremamente atenciosos e educados, sempre preocupados em fazer com que sua viagem seja perfeita, te deixam completamente a vontade. O apartamento é excelente, muito espaçoso e bem decorado, está sempre limpo e os chuveiros são muito bons! Recomendo a estadia com eles, um casal que posso já chamar de amigos, na próxima oportunidade que vir ao Rio de Janeiro não tenho dúvidas que procurarei a eles.

è stato un vero piacere passare il weekend a casa di Marlene e Toni, solari e accoglienti! Al nostro arrivo ci hanno messo subito a nostro agio; sono estremamente disponibili e gentili e ci hanno aiutato in diverse occasioni!! In più la stanza era spaziosa e pulita, la casa molto grande e la posizione  molto buona per raggiungere diversi punti di interesse a Rio. Se dovessimo mai ricapitare a Rio torneremmo sicuramente qui!

I highly recommend Marlene and Toni as the host in Rio. They are great host. They are very friendly, helpful and take good care of us and help to make our stay in Rio de Janeiro more enjoyable. They even cooked typical Brazilian food for us and it was delicious. 
The house is conveniently located near Flamengo station and is very convenient to supermarket and eateries.
I would definitely stay in Marlene's house if ever I visit Rio in future.
God bless you Marlene and Toni.
FOI BOA ,MARLENE NOS RECEBEU MUITO BEM.

Es la mejor casa de todo Brasil !!! Marlene y Antonio son 2 amores ! La casa es divina, tienen todo a dispocision, muy confortable todo ! El barrio es divino, y tienen todo cerca !! Volvere a esa casa con certeza, si Dios quiere !
A hospedagem foi ótima! Marlene é super atenciosa!
A Marlene foi muito atenciosa e flexível na reserva. Nos recebeu com muito carinho e ótimas histórias. Voltarei com certeza!
Agradeço a Marlene e o Toni pela recepção, atenção e ajuda. Ótimas pessoas, bom papo, quarto, banheiros, cozinha  bem organizados e limpos. Recomendo a todos.

Pessoal, tudo maravilhoso! Casa limpinha, banheiro limpinho! Marlene ótima anfitriã é seu marido também! Muito solicita, sempre pronta a ajudar! Preocupada com nosso conforto, teve muito carinho conosco! Me senti em casa, super recomendo! Casa em um local privilegiado! Próximo ao metrô, a todo tipo de mercado! Gente podem confiar eu super recomendo!
Local amplo e arejado. Ótima localização; a 5 minutos do metrô (3 estações de Copacabana), próximo a comércio e restaurantes em área de muita atividade no bairro do Flamengo. Recomendo a todos.
Such amazing hosts, very nice and helpful people. The room was clean and nice, apartment is very big and well equipped.

A minha estadia na casa da Marlene está sendo longa, porém eu não poderia ter escolhido local melhor, o apartamento é grande bem arejado, muito limpo e organizado, cheiroso, silencioso, o casal é muito simpático, a Marlene não mede esforços quando o assunto é agradar os seus hóspedes.
Além disso é muito carinhosa e preocupada com os hóspedes.
Como sou de São Paulo antes de encontrar o quarto da Marlene, sofri muito com o calor do RJ. O quarto que estou tem ar condicionado e funciona muito bem, além de um enorme guarda roupa onde consegui colocar tudo o que trouxe e ainda sobrou espaço.
Realmente me considero uma pessoa de muita sorte por ter encontrado um local que atendesse todas as minhas expectativas e mais um pouco.

os anfitriões são muito atenciosos e super preocupados em fazer a estadia dos hóspedes o melhor possível! o quarto é espaçoso, e tudo funciona conforme anunciado. o apartamento está super bem localizado, enfim, recomendo muito o local!

Ótima estadia, ótima localização!!!
Marlene tem várias dicas ótimas de lugares interessantes para comer e conhecer, diferente do que geralmente encontramos nos sites de busca!! Sem contar nos ótimos toques do metrô, e dicas para o Réveillon!!!

name: King Bedroom with Private Bathroom and Rooftop !
summary: Old Glove factory turned into lovely 3Bd/2Bth loft apartment. Huge Rooftop deck with BBQ and view from NYC Skyline, large room and living room, open kitchen, Gym in the basement. Master Bedroom with private Bathroom available, HVAC/heater in room.  The apartment is located 3mn away from the L train subway - Graham Stop. - 15mn subway to union square (Manhattan) - 20-25mn from Soho - Citibike station 1mn away  - Grocerie shopping and Liquor store 2mn away
description: Old Glove factory turned into lovely 3Bd/2Bth loft apartment. Huge Rooftop deck with BBQ and view from NYC Skyline, large room and living room, open kitchen, Gym in the basement. Master Bedroom with private Bathroom available, HVAC/heater in room.  The apartment is located 3mn away from the L train subway - Graham Stop. - 15mn subway to union square (Manhattan) - 20-25mn from Soho - Citibike station 1mn away  - Grocerie shopping and Liquor store 2mn away Guest are free to access Kitchen, Living room and rooftop. Gym in the building available upon request
access: Guest are free to access Kitchen, Living room and rooftop. Gym in the building available upon request

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Sophie, French,  NYC

reviews.comments: Sophie's apartment was lovely. Huge bed! Whole apartment was very clean, including the bedroom and en suite bathroom. The communication prior and during our stay was excellent, both quick and helpful. Location was good, very close to subway that went straight into Manhattan. Sophie provided good tips of where to eat and have drinks. Would definitely stay here again if I return to the city and would recommend to others.

Sophie‘s Room is very stylish and very comfortable with its own bathroom. The bed is one of the best we ever slept in and the Metro is not far.  Unfortunately, the  rooftop was under construction but  sitting up there is certainly nice. We had a great stay and can definitely recommend the place. The communication with Sophie was great, she always responded superfast.

name: Sunny Chelsea 1 BR near High line has 3 beds
summary: This apartment is great for multiple guests because it has 3 beds. There is a 24 hour Grocery store out on 8th Avenue (in sight of the apartment) and the A, C an E subway trains are only 5 minutes walk as well as The High Line, Madison Square Garden, F.I.T. and Penn Station. There is a full large Ideal supermarket at the end of the block and drop off laundry service just around the corner.  Many restaurants, theaters, art galleries and the Empire State Building are all within walking distance.
space: This apartment is on the lobby floor so no walking to do. Midway between Madison Square Garden, A, C, E subways and The Highline is only a 5 minute walk.  Comfortably fits up to 4 guests and there is a kitchenette with dishes and utensils. Clean towels and linens included along with free WiFi.
description: This apartment is great for multiple guests because it has 3 beds. There is a 24 hour Grocery store out on 8th Avenue (in sight of the apartment) and the A, C an E subway trains are only 5 minutes walk as well as The High Line, Madison Square Garden, F.I.T. and Penn Station. There is a full large Ideal supermarket at the end of the block and drop off laundry service just around the corner.  Many restaurants, theaters, art galleries and the Empire State Building are all within walking distance. This apartment is on the lobby floor so no walking to do. Midway between Madison Square Garden, A, C, E subways and The Highline is only a 5 minute walk.  Comfortably fits up to 4 guests and there is a kitchenette with dishes and utensils. Clean towels and linens included along with free WiFi. Free Wifi, Flat Sreen TV, Linens,towels,hairdryer,iron included. Kitchenette,stove,refrigerator,microwave, dishes and utensils, Private bath and Seperate Bedroom in addition to Large Living room,dining tabl
neighborhood_overview: This is one of the most convenient neighborhoods in all Manhattan. Many subway lines are within a short walk so if one has a problem you can just pick another close by subway. Penn Station, the largest transportation hub in North America is only a 5 minute walk from the apartment and contains Amtrak, N.J. Transit, L.I.R.R, and the Train to the Plane.
notes: This building has over 200 Good Reviews.
transit: Only a 5 minute walk to the A,C and E subways as well as Amtrack and Long Island Railroad at Penn Station on 33rd Street and 8th Avenue
access: Free Wifi, Flat Sreen TV, Linens,towels,hairdryer,iron included. Kitchenette,stove,refrigerator,microwave, dishes and utensils, Private bath and Seperate Bedroom in addition to Large Living room,dining table,chairs.
interaction: Michael, the building's manager, is in the building several days each week and can be reached by cell phone.
house_rules: Check in is after 2 PM, Check out is 12:00 Noon. Please arrive before 11:00 PM.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I moved to Manhattan almost  right after graduating college and have since lived in almost every neighborhood. I  am a member of several local organizations for more than a decade. I  own properties in 3 different Manhattan neighborhoods.
I enjoy skiing,boating, billiards and tennis and have recently enjoyed a beginning in yoga. I would like to re- take up racquetball and golf which I used to play when I had more time and I love to travel.

reviews.comments:
A good place to stay if you want to discover the big Apple like a new yorker.
All you need is in the appartement. located near from everything. Michael and Tommy are really cool !
It was wonderful trip! Michael is very friendly and hospitable man!) Very good location apartment! Recommend to all!))

The best thing about this apartment it's the location, between the 8th and 9th, very close to the Penn Station and Port Authority if you want go outside of Manhattan and also it was close to the High Line. In this street there is a city bike station which was quite useful for us to discover the city.
On the downside I would say the use of the heating system was a bit strange because there were nights that we were sweating and had to open a window. Also if you are looking for glamour this is not the place, it is clean but the furniture is there to be useful not pretty. To be honest we only went to the apartment to sleep so for us it was quite enough.

Great location, a very short walk to penn station, subway lines, west village and shopping areas. Plenty of space within apartment and bed was comfortable. 
Being on the ground floor and right next to the building entrance it can be quite noisy hearing people come in and out of the building, and also the people on the floor above are heard walking around, but for the convenience of location these aren't major issues. 
Michael was a great host, checking in every couple of days to ask if I'd needed anything. Tommy, the super, was also there for any questions I had and both were very accommodating. 
Check-in and check-out were very simple. 
I would definitely stay here again next time I travel to NYC.
Magnífica experiencia en el corazón de NY. El apartamento es grande y está cerca de todo. Totalmente limpio. El anfitrión es excelente y atento. 100% recomendable.

La principale qualité de cet appartement est son emplacement: on a pu tout faire à pied (ou presque) durant notre semaine à NYC. L'appartement est propre et fonctionnel. Ce n'est pas le grand luxe mais ce n'est pas ce que nous recherchions. L'appartement est situé en rez-de-chaussée près de l'entrée de l'immeuble il y a donc un peu de bruit, mais c'est assez calme durant la nuit.
Michael et Tommy ont été très disponibles et réactifs lorsque nous avons eu des problèmes dans l'appartement. C'est rassurant lorsqu'on voyage.
Je recommande !

Appartement dans un quartier plutôt calme pour New York ( on entend les voisins plus que la rue), très bien placé, près de Penn station  pour l'arrivée depuis JFK.
Appartement dans un vieux immeuble, décoration minimaliste mais  confortable et propre.
Excellent séjour, Michael est très sympas.

Wir waren vom 03. Juli - 13. September 2014 für einen Sprachaufenthalt in New York und wohnten während dieser Zeit in der Wohnung im Erdgeschoss. Diese ist ein wenig grösser als die restlichen Wohnungen im Gebäude = hat ein separates Schlafzimmer, welches direkt ans Badezimmer angeschlossen ist. Die Lage der Wohnung ist top, ca. 15 Minuten zu Fuss zum Times Square und 3 Minuten zur Penn Station.
Obwohl die Wohnung direkt an der Strasse liegt, kann man nachts gut schlafen und es ist erstaunlich ruhig. Einzig die hereinkommenden Bewohner hört man ziemlich gut.
Bei unserer Ankunft war die Wohnung leider nicht gereinigt und mussten dies somit selber machen. Michael kam uns hierfür entgegen und brachte uns einen Staubsauger zur Benützung während des gesamten Aufenthalts.
Wir hatten zudem mehrmals Besuch von Kakerlaken. Am Tag unserer Abreise kam jedoch der Schädlingsbekämpfer - somit sollte dieses Problem gelöst sein.
Alles in allem haben wir unseren Aufenthalt genossen. Tommy wie auch Michael können jederzeit kontaktiert werden, wenn es Probleme gibt.
Wer keinen Luxus oder Schweizer Standard erwartet, ist in dieser Wohnung an perfekter Lage gut aufgehoben.
Michael was a fantastic host.  He was very welcoming and always available.    The apartment was everything that was advertised and in a great location.  I would definitely recommend staying here.

The apartment was perfect for us, three teenage girls. The location was perfect, with only minutes to Penn Station. 
Michael was really nice and helpful, couldn't wish for a better host. 
All the descriptions of the apartment were as expected and we had a really good time!

We stayed at this apartment for a little over 2 months. Upon our arrival, the apartment was cleaned, and we were given fresh towels and linen. The place was as described in the listing - one large room with 2 full size beds, a smaller room with another full size bed, and a bathroom connected to the smaller room. Very basic, but it was fine for us since we didn't spend much time there. Michael was very responsive throughout the summer and checked in with me several times to make sure things were going smoothly. The building super, Tommy, was also helpful when issues came up. Would recommend to students / young adults working in the city short-term. One should note that although it is located in a convenient location (near Penn Station, Chelsea Market, etc.), the block the apartment was on was somewhat sketchy at night. Overall a pleasant stay and a good value space.

The apartment was very well located to transportation, walking distance to grocery stores and restaurants. Michael was quick to access and in general the building is safe. Appreciated the clean linens and bed sheets.

We had a good experience renting from Michael. The location on the apartment is perfect, close to the high line, Madison square garden and penn station. The apartment was bigger then we thought which is a plus. We had a cockroach inside but a person came the day after to spray the apartment. 
Since the apartment is on the first floor it's easy to get in and out but it was not very soundproof so you could hear people in the hallway very clear. 
Overall a good place to stay, the location really is perfect! :)
Host is a really nice guy and is very accessible. The neighborhood is great and the apartment is as described.
Nous y sommes resté 2 mois, pour 3 filles c'était parfait. Très très bon emplacement.

Michael was an excellent host. He was easy to get in touch with and very friendly. The apartment was perfect for 3 college students living in NYC for the summer who want an alternative to NYU dorms. 3 beds was a huge plus.

The place and the neighborhood are perfect. It is very close to multiple subway lines, all of them in a walkable distance. The apartment is just like describe and the photos are accurate. We will definitely come back to Michael’s place. He is very nice and helpful.
Thank you Michael !
Michael 是个很棒的房东,热情好客,我们需要什么的时候就能提供!大爱房东!如果再回到纽约,我们一定还住Michael的房子!

Micheal is an awesome host. He is very responsive and offered us what we wanted but didn’t feel like asking for. He came to show us the place before we book which is very kind of him. The room looked exactly like in the picture. The beds were queen size and very comfortable to sleep in. The kitchen was sufficient with enough plates , utensils, and glasses. The only thing is the low flow toilet which clogs sometimes but Micheal will always come to help quickly when it occurred. Location is 5-7 mins walk to 34-Penn station and other lines which is super convenient. There is a supermarket close by perfect for long term stay if you need to cook. All and all i will definitely recommend this place and Micheal to my friends who might come to NYC. This stay exceeds our expectation. We had a great experience here.

Michael was a great host, we can't thank him enough. He was always around and available should there be an emergency. He also provided us with all the amenities we needed. Being 3 students studying abroad at FIT, this place was in fact closer than the halls of residence themselves. We were all extremely happy with our stay and even met some amazing friends next door who changed our experience of NYC. I would definitely recommend Michael to anyone who is studying abroad as he caters for everyone and Airbnb is your safest option for a shorter period of time. Thanks again Michael!

neighborhood_overview: 我的太空舱之家位于香港岛繁华中心区湾仔,是行政區,商业区,旅遊区,购物区. 附近是出名的太原街,軒尼斯道, 庄士敦道,皇后大道東. 看過好萊塢電影《蘇絲黃的世界》的人,對60年代灣仔區的燈紅酒綠大概有個了解｡如今灣仔的夜生活依舊燦爛,不變的還有這個舊區夾雜的平實味道｡ 皇后大道東一帶有好幾家籐製家具和中式家具店,販賣優質家具,並提供貼心的送貨服務,要佈置家居,推薦您到此一逛｡位於皇后大道東和莊士敦道之交界的春園街,是尋找美食的寶地｡從春園街可信步走到石水渠街的濕貨和乾貨市場,可買到平价的優質水果蔬菜｡至於太原街,就是一條玩具商店街,也是不少玩具收藏家愛到的地方｡軒尼詩道的灣仔電腦城,是香港島最具規模的電腦專賣中心,電腦迷不容錯過!
notes: 1.一个舱只住一人,多出一人要加订舱. 2. .请您事先通知我們到達时间,並閱讀房源描述下的入住說明以便自助入住. 3.自助入住前需仔细阅读入住手续说明,有问题请在到达前问清楚,以免到时产生不必要的惊慌.因为房东不一定在线. 4.如要求其他入住时间可申请｡ 5.有耳機(如有),遙控器(如有),锁匙(如有),保险箱匙(如有)和电脑舱卡, 退房沒交回各收( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 元, 和100元). 6.进門请脫鞋换室內拖鞋. 7..不允许吸烟.不可用明火. 8.用完廚房請清理和洗干淨用過的碗杯用具. 9..不可敲打舱内外任何部位,不可在舱内蹦跳. 10..艙內如有五孔插座與USB接口仅用於電腦/手機充電,不可使用其他高功率電器. 11.不要酗酒,赌博,涉黄,吸毒等,不要做违法/不道德的事情. 12..爱护房屋和物品,保持卫生整洁. ,住客有責任每天清理垃圾到同層的垃圾收集桶. 13.节约能源,保护绿色环境. 用完熱水請關閉電源. 14. 为了不对邻居造成影响,请保持安静,不必要的询问和大声喧哗. 谢谢您们的支持和合作, 歡迎光臨体验!
transit: 1.港岛线湾仔地铁站A3出口走1分钟 2.红磡火车站转屯门方向西铁,尖沙咀转1. 3.红磡火车站乘多輛过海巴士,  修顿球场下车走1分钟 4.电车修顿球场站下车走1分钟. 5.坐地鐵3個站到中環轉機場快線, 40分鐘到香港國際機場. 6.坐地鐵4個站到上環站的港澳碼頭,可坐船到澳門. 7.在皇后大道東灣仔街市門口乘6號巴士,15分鐘到淺水灣, 30分鐘到赤柱海滩. 8.在皇后大道東灣仔街市門口乘15號巴士,15分鐘到山頂. 9.樓下有多條公眾巴士線,小巴線和地鐵線去黃竹坑和香港仔｡ 10.12分鐘地鐵到海洋公园. 11.步行16鐘可到跑馬地馬場 12. 地鐵10分鐘到香港大學.

neighborhood_overview: Villa GOK is located in most prestige's area Emirgan in Istanbul Bosporus. It is a historic place on the western coast of Bosphorus north of the Fatih Sultan Mehmet Bridge. Visitor attractions in Emirgan are Emirgan Park, Sakıp Sabancı Museum, Tulip Museum, Emirgan Mosque, Istinye Park Shopping Mall, Istinye village and Michaelion, a famous church and monastery dedicated to St. Michael in Byzantine times. Tea gardens on the coastal street along the Bosphorus are very popular in Emirgan.  It is one of the finest seashore locations on the Bosphorus where people walk around during the weekends. Istinye is famous for its cafés and seafood restaurants.  Additionally, the neighborhood is in close proximity to one of Istanbul's newest shopping malls, İstinye Park. Istinye Park aims at the high-end consumer group and is mostly dedicated to the world's most famous fashion brands sucha as Gucci, Louis Vuitton, Cartier, Chanel, Hermes, Dior and many more... Villa only walking distance from all am
access: Guests have access to the entire 5 floors of the villa and its grounds, together with their private swimming pool and Spa. The sauna and Turkish bath is also available for use at 20EUR per hour.
interaction: I personally will not be present during your stay, but there will always be our living caretaker Ramazan there to answer your every question and tend to your needs. Or you can always call me on my personal telephone.

Os hóspedes podem se sentir a vontade para usar os espaços comuns da casa, e suas facilidades tal como tv, fogão geladeira e máquina de lavar. Disponibilizamos também utensílios de cozinha e roupas de cama e toalhas. O quarto possui uma cama queen size, ar condicionado e armário. _ Guests can feel free to use the common spaces of the house, and their facilities such as tv, oven, refrigerator and washing machine. We also provide cooking utensils and bedding and towels. The room has a queen size
neighborhood_overview: O Flamengo é um bairro tranquilo e agradável e muito bem localizado para quem está querendo conhecer o Rio de Janeiro!  A Praça São Salvador tem bares, restaurantes, supermercado, padaria e farmácia. De dia tem um ar bem bucólico e a noite é um dos melhores lugares para se beber uma cerveja ao ar livre da cidade!  _ Flamengo is a quiet and pleasant neighborhood  very well located for those who want to get to know Rio de Janeiro! São Salvador Square has bars, restaurants, supermarket, bakery and pharmacy. By day it has a very bucolic air and at night is one of the best open air places to drink a beer in the city!
transit: Nossa casa está a 5 minutos a pé do metro e a 10 minutos do aterro do Flamengo.  De metrô se chega tanto no Centro como em Copacabana em 10 minutos. De ônibus pode se chegar na entrada do Cristo Redentor e no Pão de Açúcar em 15min.  _ Our house is a 5 minutes walk to the metro and 10 minutes to Flamengo's Park . By subway one arrives either in the City Center or in Copacabana in 10 minutes. By bus you can reach the entrance of Cristo Redentor and the Sugar Loaf in 15min.
access: Os hóspedes podem se sentir a vontade para usar os espaços comuns da casa, e suas facilidades tal como tv, fogão geladeira e máquina de lavar. Disponibilizamos também utensílios de cozinha e roupas de cama e toalhas. O quarto possui uma cama queen size, ar condicionado e armário. _ Guests can feel free to use the common spaces of the house, and their facilities such as tv, oven, refrigerator and washing machine. We also provide cooking utensils and bedding and towels. The room has a queen size bed, air conditioning and a wardrobe.

The unit was clean, having two bathrooms was very convenient, the massage chair is wonderful and there is a nice view from the balcony. The only suggestion I would have is some more pillows on the bed, but this is a personal preference. I would definitely look to stay here again while in Sydney.

name: 2 Apês no mesmo apart-hotel (3 quartos e 1 quarto)
summary: São 2 apartamentos em um mesmo edifício apart-hotel! Ideal para famílias ou grupos que viajam juntos e não querem ficar em locais separados. O edifício é na praia. Você vai contar com segurança e recepção 24 horas, um supermercado embaixo do edifício (o que na região é um diferencial importante), serviço de buffet p/ café da manhã (a parte) piscina com vista para o mar e serviço de bar, academia, campo de futebol, parquinho para crianças, salão de beleza e muitas opções de lazer próximas!
space: São dois apartamentos em um mesmo edifício.  Um deles, o de 3 quartos, possui vista frontal para o mar. O segundo, de 1 quarto, possui vista lateral.  Perfeito para quem viaja em grupo mas faz questão de um pouco de privacidade! O próprio edifício é um "apart-hotel", frequentado por moradores e turistas do Brasil e do exterior. Recepção e segurança são 24/7. O edifício tem 2 piscinas (1 para crianças), 1 restaurante a kilo e um supermercado (por favor, vá tomar café e comer sua pizza - ela é realmente muito boa), academia, salão de beleza e mais!

neighborhood_overview: Barra da Tijuca é provavelmente o bairro mais moderno do Rio de Janeiro. A praia é ideal para a natação, surf, kite surf ou tomar sol. Há uma grande variedade gastronômica e animada vida noturna, de modo você não precisa realmente sair do bairro caso se não queira. É fácil chegar à "Zona Sul" ( onde Ipanema, Copacabana, Leblon, Pão de Açúcar e o Cristo Redentor são) de ônibus ,metrô ou de táxi.
transit: Desde que você evite os horários de trânsito, entrar e sair da Barra é bem fácil, especialmente agora com a nova estação de metrô "Jardim Oceânico"
access: Recepção e segurança são 24 horas;
interaction: Falo Inglês, Francês, Espanhol e Italiano e será um prazer  ajudá-los com qualquer coisa que vocês possam precisar.
house_rules: - Sempre lavar os pés ao voltar da praia antes de entrar no apartamento. Existem torneiras nas laterais do prédio exclusivamente para isso! - Verificar antes de sair de casa, se não deixou ar condicionado ligado ou luz acessa.

host.host_about:
Hello there!

I´m Aline, and I was borned and raised in Rio de Janeiro. Excepting some periods of my life ( education and working abroad  for a couple of years and a sabatical round the world trip) I have spent all my life in this beautiful city that I´m so proud of belonging to. Please be welcome to my place!  

I enjoy eating, reading, surfing, eating again and for sure...travelling. My time abroad have gave me not only languages skills but also one understanding of how life can be enjoyed diferently, according to each reality. I hope you will have a taste of how shinny and beutiful life can be in Brazil!

address.street: Barra da Tijuca, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Lindos departamentos, en un edificio muy comodo. En frente de la playa. El supermercado en la planta baja, con bar, y abierto las 24 horas, hace que la estadía sea perfecta. Aline una genia, siempre muy atenta a nuestras necesidades.

name: Top Floor Penthouse Unit with Giant Views!!!
summary: Our Penthouse, top floor unit is partially remodeled and beachy, for your comfort and enjoyment! Enjoy the amazing ocean, mountain, beach views & the gorgeous roof top lanai! This oceanfront location has a fabulous cross breeze as the trade winds pick up almost every day!
space: TOP FLOOR PENTHOUSE OCEAN VIEWS, is just the beginning in this partially remodeled condo! Light and bright describe this lovely oceanfront unit, awaiting your Maui dream vacation! Huge ocean AND Haleakala Mountain views from lanai, living room, kitchen and master bedroom. The living room features mirrors that brings the outside in even more, making the condo feel very spacious. Tile flooring throughout keeps the unit nice and cool. We offer a well-appointed kitchen with new, quality appliances and beautiful counter tops.  We also provide necessary toiletries to make your stay even more convenient and comfortable: shampoo, conditioner, body wash, cotton swabs/Q-tips, etc. The master bedroom features a wall of windows looking out onto the ocean, beach, and even Kahoolawe! This condo does get a wonderful cross breeze when doors/windows are open. This unit is also on the South side of the building, so you won't be overheating in the afternoon sun & it's quieter!!! Our spectacular ocean-fro

neighborhood_overview: Our condo is located in North Kihei, for easy access to other areas of the island, including only 15 minutes from the airport!  Adjacent to the resort is the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary, along with the historical 16th Century Alii (Royal) Fish Pond of Kalepolepo. Protected by offshore reefs, the pond provides a safe swimming area for children and those who prefer a gentle surf.
notes: If you are interested in using the kitchen on the roof lanai then you need to call the front desk at Menehune Shores to discuss booking it for your event.  The nightly rate includes mandated Hawaii State taxes.  We collect and pay TAT (Transient Accommodation Tax) and GET (General Excise Tax)  for a total of 14.4166%.  We pay these taxes to the State for each of our Owners.
transit: I highly reccomend having a rental car while on Maui because there will be so much you will want to see and experience.  However, there is. public transportation through the Maui Bus, with a bus stop right by the complex.
access: When you book this unit you have exclusive use of this entire condo for your dates of stay.
interaction: I'm very communicative with my guests and happy to answer any questions you have.  I remember how I felt the first time I was coming to paradise, and enjoy being able to share that experience with you!
house_rules: - No shoes in unit- Hawaiian Style! GUEST RENTAL AGREEMENT – Menehune Shores #621 1.  CHECK-IN/CHECK-OUT - Check-in time is 3 p.m. Hawaii time & Check-out time is 11 a.m. Hawaii time.  Late check-out will result in an additional charge unless arrangement are made IN WRITING.   2.  NO SMOKING - This is a NON-SMOKING unit.     3.  NO PETS - Pets are not permitted     4.  Hawaii State Taxes: the tax rate is always subject to change, by the State of Hawaii.  We are mandated to collect these taxes and pay them.  Therefore, if the tax rate changes prior to your dates of stay, we will need to collect any additional taxes due prior to your arrival. 5.    CANCELLATIONS - A sixty (60) day notice is required for cancellation of a reservation.  Cancellations that are made more than sixty (60) days prior to arrival date will incur no penalty.  Cancellations that are made within sixty (60) days of the arrival date, forfeit the full advance payment.  Changes that result in shortened stay or early dep

host.host_about:
I am a Realtor with Maui Ohana Real Estate, LLC. on the gorgeous tropical island of Maui.  I have been privileged to live here in paradise since 2004.  I have moved over 52 times in my life; born in Alaska and lived in every single corner of this Country,  and absolutely call Maui MY HOME!  I manage this unit beautiful unit for the owners.
Debbie Guimond
Maui Ohana Real Estate, LLC.
License # RS64095

reviews.comments: For our first trip to Maui this location was perfection. It is centrally located and has beach access. We really appreciated the beach gear included in the condo! The place was bright and clean with amazing views. Absolutely would stay here again!

This place is perfect for a family with small children. The protected beach was great for my two-year old and during low tide we would walk out and see massive sea turtles in 2-3 feet of water. The rocks reduce the waves and the beach wasn’t crowded. 

The condo has a great location and is ideal for visiting other places on the island. It is also close to good food and Safeway. The condo has been remodeled and it has an amazing view. The only downside could be a lack of air conditioning but it wasn’t a problem on our stay.

Debbie is super easy to get ahold of if you have any questions and willing to help give you tips/places to see when you're visiting. As for the condo, the views from the lanai were wonderful and the kitchen was updated and had everything we needed. Having our own in suite laundry was great for a long stay and the barbecues on the roof provided a great location to relax and enjoy a sunset. That said, the showers behind the curtains could use some updating and we did have some visitor geckos for our stay inside the condo which we weren't used to. Debbie was great about everything and I suppose it's all about the island experience. Overall great stay and beautiful place. Hope anyone visiting has a wonderful stay.

This is seriously the best family air bnb we have ever stayed in. The view was fantastic, apartment was quiet, Debbie was great with communication and it was well stocked with general kitchen amenities. We love to cook, so this was a huge bonus.
But by far the best part was that they had beach gear including snorkels, boogie boards, towels, beach toys and beach chairs for us to use while on vacation. 
Below the apartment is a beach that usually has no more than 4 people on it(no tourists and not crowded) and in front of the complex is a cove(an acorns fishing cove), perfect for our whole family. Fairly shallow, protected from the waves, and full of fish and other Maui sea life. Not to mention sea turtles from morning til night. We literally swam with them every day and they easily won our hearts. 
Traditional Maui boats get launched here and I’m sure you can book a ride on them but we didn’t have time. Too busy relaxing! Nice pool but the cove was too exciting so we never tried it out.
We loved the location and would absolutely return (and hopefully will) in a heartbeat. 
Be sure to visit Ululani’s shave ice down the street! Best on the island. 
A true air bnb that feels like home from the minute you arrive.
Debbie’s place was awesome! The place was very well equipped, clean and in a good location. Balcony views were great while dining. We thoroughly enjoyed our visit!

The views were amazing. Sunsets to die for. The Property was kept clean and people were very friendly. We snorkeled in the lagoon where we were very close to some beautiful huge turtles.  The kids enjoyed swimming in the pool after dark. while we used the bbqs to make dinner. the shuffle board was fun too. The beach was beautiful and not many people on it we were the only ones a few times when we wanted more waves  we just drove down the beach a couple miles to charley young and kamaole beach 3 for bigger waves to body board. We have traveled around the island this trip and I have to say kehei is my favorite area, relaxed pace, great beaches, every thing you need within a mile or two. We had a couple issues with appliances and being a holiday weekend they couldn’t be resolved timely however Deb was in communication and worked hard to find solutions. Yes we would stay again, We couldn’t ask for a better Vacation spot.

name: Studio with Terrace next to Rambla and Monjuic
summary: Estudio acogedor con terraza comunitaria con sol todo el día. La cama doble es de colchón viscoelástico de alta calidad (150 x 190 cm) y desde ella se puede ver la TV de 30 pulgadas. Dispone de un ordenador con internet de fibra óptica y su superficie es de 23 metros cuadrados útiles. Está situado a solo 800 m de la Rambla y a 400 m del mirador de la montaña de Montjuïc
space: Es un tercer piso sin ascensor reformado en 2018 con mobiliario nuevo. El entrono tiene la tranquilidad de los grandes espacios verdes de Montjuïc y toda la actividad propia del centro de Barcelona. Justo delante hay un pequeño supermercado y a 200 metros una calle peatonal (C/ Blai) llena de terrazas, bares y restaurantes. Su situación es EXCELENTE para visitar la ciudad. El paseo marítimo y la playa de la Barceloneta estan a 10 - 15 minutos a pié. La estación de "Paral.lel" está a 300 metros y allí tienen parada dos de la lineas de metro. La linea verde (L3) te llevará directo a la Plaça Catalunya, el Paseo de Gracia, el barrio de Gràcia, el Park Güell o el estadio Camp Nou. La linea lila (L2) te llevará directo a la Sagrada Familia. Siempre con trayectos de 10 o 15 minutos como máximo.

neighborhood_overview: Poble Sec está situado al pie de la montaña de Montjuïc. Se trata de un barrio de clase media con una vida de barrio muy interesante.
notes: La tasa turística de 2,48 € por persona y noche no está incluida en el precio. Se paga en efectivo a la llegada y se aplica para las primeras 7 noches a los mayores de 17 años. Las llegadas a partir de las 20h tiene un recargo de 35 €.
access: El acceso al estudio se realiza a través de una gran la terraza comunitaria que dispone de mobiliario de uso exclusivo de los huéspedes

name: InSitu Formosa 178 - Citrine

Proporciona um espaço acolhedor com todo o conforto de uma casa moderna, como ar condicionado, wi-fi e TV. Organizado em plano aberto está pensado para lhe proporcionar o máximo conforto e responder às suas necessidades com uma sofá que abre numa cama de casal, WC com produtos limpeza grátis e cozinha totalmente equipada.

Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it with an additional cost. Please do take care of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please feel free to contact us. reviews.comments: I have to say: everything was absolutley perfect! The appartement is very well equipped, cozy, friendly and super clean. My favourite place was the shower bath in the flat. It's simply fantastic. :) Special thanks for the remarked map ( and for the morning coffes) it was very kind and useful. Near the appartement you can find everything what you need in a walk distance. Porto is an awsome city with a beautiful placese, with very special gastronomy. Miguel and Joăo are the best hosts, you will feel safe with their advices. Worth it! ;)
The apartment was comfortable, clean and stylish. Fantastic location in the centre of Porto. Really helpful and friendly staff. Would definitely recommend!
Un apartamento precioso, es exactamente como aparece en las fotos. El servicio inmejorable, todo muy limpio y cuidado al detalle. Recomendado 100 %.

This place is perfect to stay in while in Porto. The location is easy to get to from the airport, and within walking distance from all the points of interests, just next to a shopping street. 
The apartment is exactly as pictured, brand new, well equipped and perfectly clean (I stayed there for 4 nights and even got a cleaning service). The hosts are very friendly and helpful. 
I would definitely recommend staying here!
Muy recomendable!
Die Lage ist top für Essen sowie Shopping. :-)
Brand new Apartment in great location. Excellent service and highly recommended!

name: Luminous dúplex apartment in Gracia district
summary: Duplex Gracia is a very stylish vacational apartment located in the Villa de Gracia district, one of the most charming areas of Barcelona. This cozy touristic apartment is perfect if you are looking for a quiet place to stay. Also, you will be close to the pure local culture of the city and get to used to its traditions.  Licence number: HUTB-005875
space: Duplex Gracia got its name due to the particular distribution that it has. In fact its 40m2 surface is divided into three different levels creating a feeling of spaciousness and luminousness. The apartment has a lot of natural light thanks to its wide windows. The first level coincides with the entrance of the apartment. There, you can find the living room with a dining table and a sofa bed for two people. On the lower level there is a small space with a desk that can be used as working or studying space, a kitchen with access to a small patio and a bathroom with a tub. The bedroom with a king size bed is located on the upper floor that is accessed by stairs.  Licence number: HUTB-005875
description: Duplex Gracia is a very stylish vacational apartment located in the Villa de Gracia district, one of the most charming areas of Barcelona. This cozy touristic apartment is perfect if you are looking for a quiet place to stay. Also, you will be close to the pure local culture of the city and get to used to its traditions.  Licence number: HUTB-005875 Duplex Gracia got its name due to the particular distribution that it has. On the lower level there is a small space with a desk that can be used as working or studying space, a kitchen with access to a small patio and a bathroom with a tub. The bedroom with a king size bed is located on the upper floor that is
neighborhood_overview: For a real traveller, living in Gracia it's a great opportunity since there are no endless crowds of tourists. It is a true Catalan neighborhood where traditions and the authentic atmosphere of Barcelona are still preserved. Anyway, it is very easy to reach the centre of the city from there. The apartment is very close to Sagrada Familia, Park Guell and it is only 5 minutes by bike or metro from Passeig de Gracia, where the tourist area begins. But you’ll have plenty of time to see the main attractions, it is better to stay a bit in Gracia, because it's worth it!  Start your day in one of the cafes that serves fresh coffee and pastries, after get lost on the winding streets of this amazing quarter. For lunch go to the Plaça del Sol and feel free to choose any of the restaurants there. Be sure to order homemade vermouth before your meal, this drink is very popular among the locals.
transit: During the evening you can explore the local bar culture and feel on your skin the Catalans' hospitality. If you are lucky, you can run up against one of the local holidays or festivals that usually take place here throughout the year. As for example the Gracia Festival in August or the Calçotada in late winter are really appreciated. You will be filled of unforgettable emotions.  The nearest metro stations are Verdaguer (L4/L5) or Diagonal (L3).
access: This apartment features includes air conditioning, DVD, TV and WiFi. It can accommodate up to 4 people, which makes this apartment ideal for couples and small groups. Also, this is the perfect solution if you are on a business trip.
interaction: Guests will be provided with an emergency number in case of problem during your stay.
house_rules: APARTMENT RULES  1. The day of check-in will be charged a deposit depending on the length of stay, this deposit is against damages that must be paid by credit card. Once the guest has left the apartment, it will be revised. If no break or damage is found and the rules of the apartment have been respected the damage deposit will be refunded to the same credit card number (with an additional 1% fee) in 3 to 8 days period following departure and after apartment revision.   2. Make sure you take the keys when you leave the apartment and lock the door from the outside. Losing or forgetting the apartment keys has a minimum charge of 50€. If you need to use the inter-phone make sure you ring the right number so you will not bother the neighbors. 3. Please turn off the lights and the electrical appliance when you leave the apartment. We have to appreciate and take care of our resources. If the guest´s general supplies expenses are much higher than the standard, the owner has the right to charg

host.host_about:
Soy extrovertido, alegre y amigo de mis amigos... Me encanta Barcelona, soy de aquí, he crecido, reído y llorado en esta magnífica e inacabable ciudad.
Ahora me gustaría ser tu anfitrión para enseñártela y compartir sus secretos.
Barcelona es única e incomparable, ven a conocerla... y te la enseñaré con mucho gusto!

reviews.comments: I had wonderful experience in Barcelona with this apartment! It's in a quiet and convenient region, and the street view from the balcony is great! Everything is pretty new and clean!

The flat is ideally situated, in the Gracia district. Even if the street is not the most beautifull. The flat is rented by an agency and the communication prior to entering the flat was not that smooth unfortunately. When entering the flat, they asked me to pay an additional deposit and as I checked it with airbnb, it was abusive. They finally let me take the flat without paying this extra deposit after a long "conversation". The flat is very clean and well equiped but as the weather was quite wet, there were smells of humidity and the luminosity was poor.

Hemos pasado 4 noches en este alojamiento; LO POSITIVO: el barrio; hemos conocido un barrio al que podríamos irnos a vivir muy pronto, y ese era el objetivo de la estancia. LO NEGATIVO, el piso es un bajo que da directamente a la calle, hay que fijarse mucho para apreciarlo en la foto del anuncio y no cuesta nada avisarlo; como todo bajo es un tanto ruidoso y poco luminoso ya que se deben dejar los estores bajados en todo momento para tener algo de intimidad. Es perfecto si no se va a parar en casa más que para dormir. El equipamiento es bastante básico y no siempre coincide con la descripción del anuncio. Los anfitriones son muy comunicativos y flexibles, permitiéndonos la reserva para el mismo día. A las once en punto, hora del check out, tienes a la empresa que les hace la limpieza en la puerta de la casa.

We arrived at the apartment and where a bit late because of the flight delay. We had to pay an extra EUR 30 for late check-in (we were 15 minutes late and told that an hour before). On top we had to pay a deposit of EUR 300.-. This wasn't the best welcoming we had.

But the apartment is nice, in a good area and very close to several attractions in the city. It's perfect for 2 people, if you want to go for a weekend trip and don't want to chill at home all day.

The listing is managed by an agency.  We had a small problem finding the address as the street number is different from the listing. It was okay though as it didn't take us too long finding the place. 
We were staying for 6 days, 1 small set of shampoo and shower gel were provided as a welcome gift. 2 sets of towels were provided. Some great appliances are provided like electric coffee maker, espresso coffee maker, kitchen, washing machine, DVD player, sound system etc, but we were not able to use them as rubbish bags, coffee, condiments, washing machine detergents were not provided. When we asked about these items that usually come complementary with other AirBnB, we were told to buy them at a supermarket nearby.  The neighborhood is a good one if you don't mind taking a 20-30mins walk to and from major attractions everyday.  It takes ~10mins walk to nearest metro station.  It might be okay for a very short stay but not recommended for long stays.

The colleague of Ramon who met me was so nice and helpful. 
The location is good and calm, the apartment was equipped with all the necessary things.
I loved my stay in Barcelona and definitely come back!

host.host_location: Room with private bathron in penthouse in heart of Ipanema
host.host_about: Hi, my name is Rose. I'm a professional in Project Mgmt divorced and live with my son 19 y/o in Ipanema, Rio de Janeiro. I love rowing down the Lagoon, close to our address, cycling, working out and going to the beach, I am very easy going person, Buddhist of Nichiren Daishonin philosophy which our goal is treat people with kindness and respect!  And we love to meet different cultures... See you soon in Rio!

reviews.comments:
O apartamento da Rose é super bem localizado em Ipanema, é perto do metrô, perto da Avenida Visconde de Pirajá com todo tipo de comércio disponível e muito fácil de chegar à praia andando.

O Quarto conta com um banheiro, ambos pequenos, porém totalmente conveniente para uma pessoa solteira que busca apenas um lugar para dormir e tomar um banho tranquilamente.

Rose é uma pessoa simpática, tive mais contato com seu filho Pietro, que é um jovem muito solicito e simpático, sempre me tratou muito bem e disposto a dar dicas sobre os melhores lugares onde eu poderia gostar de ir. Os funcionários de portaria também são muito gentis.

Totalmente recomendo o apartamento da Rose!!

Rose’s place is really well located at Ipanema, close to the metro, close to Visconde de Pirajá avenue where you can find anything you need from supermarkets, drugstore and restaurants.

The room has a bathroom, both are small, but fits perfectly to a single person like me who was just looking for a place to sleep and have a shower.

Rose is friendly, I’ve had much more contact with her son Pietro, who is a young guy really friendly and always willing to give me good advices of places that a guy like me would like. I really appreciate that. 

I totally recommend Rose’s place!

Si bien las fotos de la publicacion no coinciden con la habitacion que nos dieron, ya que nos toco una mas pequeña, igual nos sentimos comodos. Excelente ubicación. Rose es muy amable y una inquilina que vive alli tambien. Tuvimos un problema con el inodoro  y rose estuvo muy predispuesta a solucionarlo rápidamente. Como no se pudo arreglar nos permitio usar otro. La ducha del baño no es muy comoda. El espacio de la pileta es hermoso aunque su acceso no es completamente libre ya que hay que pasar por la habitacion de la inquilina. El resto del departamento es muy lindo y confortable, asi como tambien el edificio, que tiene seguridad. La pasamos muy lindo. Muchas gracias!

name: Twin Room with Shared Bathroom
summary: House offers simple and comfortable accommodation. Each room has central heating, and is equipped with a TV, wardrobe and desk. The rooms all have a shower and sink and some have a private bathroom.
description: House offers simple and comfortable accommodation. Each room has central heating, and is equipped with a TV, wardrobe and desk. The rooms all have a shower and sink and some have a private bathroom.

host.host_about:
Someone who thinks positively,I would describe myself as someone who is honest, caring, hardworking, and ambitious. I have a great sense of humour. I am an easy going person & don’t get easily disturbed by up/ down’s in my life. I also enjoy travelling, watching movies, going out for dinner, and having great intellectual conversations!

Location of my guest accommodation is just a 2-minute walk from Gaudi’s iconic Sagrada Familia basilica, it is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district. It offers free Wi-Fi, free coffee and hot drinks, and is 300 m from Sagrada Familia Metro Station.

We offers simple and comfortable accommodation with private room and each room has central heating, and is equipped with a TV, wardrobe and desk. The rooms all have a shower and sink and some have a private bathroom.

The property offers free luggage storage, as well as free tourist information, maps and discounts.

The house is situated in a quiet area, ideal if you want to be out of the city centre, but have the city’s famous landmarks within easy reach.

The spectacular Hospital Sant Pau is just an 5-minute walk away, while the city centre can be reached by metro in 5 minutes from Sagrada Familia station. 

Eixample is a great choice for travellers interested in architecture, food and shopping.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews

name: Cosy interior room for 2! I CA
summary: Cosy interior room with double bed! Big shared apartment with huge sunny terrace where you can enjoy Spanish sun! Also has two bathrooms, fully equipped kitchen and living room!  Its located in a beautiful neighborhood Clot which is close to city center. Metro Clot i just 5 minutes by foot from the flat.  The train station Clot Arago from where trains go to the airport every 30 minutes!  Fast WIFI connection!  Feel yourself at home!!
space: Cosy interior room with double bed in a big shared apartment with a huge, beautiful terrace. Ideal for open minded persons who wants to share their experiences and meet new people form all over the world! Everybody here is from Airbnb. The room is full-furnished, it has a great wardrobe. The flat has a huge, beautiful terrace, where you can enjoy the sun and a quiet talk with another guests from the apartment.  There is a big living-room with a table that you can use as well. 2 bathrooms, adapted for a people with a disability. The kitchen is full furnished as well (fridge, microwaves, oven, plate, coffee machine, kettle, toaster and squeezer). High speed, free WIFI with a good signal around whole apartment.  If you need anything, dont hesitate to ask me!

neighborhood_overview: The house is not at the city center, but situated in a quiet, beautiful, safe neighborhood of Barcelona Clot!  Its 25-minutes walking to the beach Marbella, the best of the city!  On its area, there are all the supermarkets with a very good prices, a lot of bars, restaurant. A 10-minutes walking, it’s a big shopping center. Nearby, you can find a beautiful green parks.
transit: The metro station Clot (L1 and L2) or Navas (L1) is situated 5 minutes away from the flat. These lines leave you in the city center in just 5 minutes (Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia).  Good connection with the airport: train station Clot-Aragó is about 7 minutes walking from the flat and train runs every 30 minutes.  The bus station Nord is 5 minutes by metro form the apartment (Arc de Triumf L!).  And train station Sants is 15 minutes by metro (L2 and the L5).  Nearby there is a bus line, including the night ones, that will take you to everywhere you want!
access: The common areas are shared with other guests, like kitchen, living room and bathrooms. We clean it every day in order to keep everything in a proper and nice way!  The towels and bed sheets are from laundry. If you need any change of sheets, towels or just cleaning, please let me know and Ill go immediately to fix it :) Washing machine: the cost is 5€. If you would like to wash some clothes, please, put it on a bag and give it to me or leave it next to the wash machine. I'll wash it and will give it back to you on the next day!
interaction: I would like to offer you the best service so you could feel yourself here at home! As its not a hotel, but just the apartment, I would ask you please to let me know about any detail that could improve your stay!  Also dont hesitate to ask me any doubt before booking, ill be happy to answer all your questions so to avoid misunderstandings.  I dont live at the apartment, but Im always online to help you!
house_rules: - 1. Sonreír! 2. GUARDAR SILENCIO ABSOLUTO desde las 21hrs hasta las 8hrs: -no hablar alto -no andar con tacones -no arrastrar las maletas, sino llevarlos en la mano - no secarse el pelo con el secador - cerrar las puertas con cuidado 3. Las fiestas están prohibidas, igual que el consulo de alcohol 4. Fumar solamente en la terraza. Esta prohibido fumar dentro de la casa 5. Desde las 21hrs hasta las 8hrs en la terraza solamente puede estar una persona. 6. No tirar nada del balcón, ni las ventanas 7. Las visitas de amigos se hablan conmigo con antelación. El incumplimiento de las normas puede causar la cancelación de la reserva por mi parte en cualquier momento. Os estaré muy agradecido si seguís las normas y respetáis a los vecinos.

name: AMAZING Apt Botafogo Beach - 1 min to Subway
summary: This is an apartment that is almost like a hotel due to its services. Cleaning maid 5 days a week, 24h porter, sauna, gym, parking spot.
space: The apartment is one block away from Botafogo Beach. You can go for a walk and when you come back you will find everything clean, your dishes washed and your bed made. From monday until friday there is a maid that does all that during 50 minutes (except holidays) ;) One car spot in the garage.  It has a homy feeling with a great view to the Christ. The kitchen has: - microwave - toaster - oven with stove - fridge  - basic utensils for cooking. The building offers 24 hour security. Wi-fi, 32 inches plasma TV (for dvd movies only. No broadcast or cable TV) and air conditioner at apartment. High speed wireless Internet (10mb speed) Botafogo is a neighborhood that you can do everything by foot. It has some of the greatest bars in town and some of the greatest restaurants. It's one of the few neighborhoods in Zona Sul that has cheap food and beverages and at the same time fancy and expensive ones. The apartment is close to everything: grocery stores, bars, bakeries, restaurants, shopping ce

neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood has everything. From movie theaters to the subway very close. The variety of bars and restaurants is amazing. You can go to the end of the Voluntários da Pátria Avenue (2 minutes away) with its crazy bar vibe or to a fancy Michelin star restaurant like Lasai (10 minutes away). And it's a central spot in Rio so you can get anywhere very quickly by Uber, bus or subway.
transit: One minute away from subway station and access to buses that go all over the city.
access: Gym, swimming pool, sauna and one spot for a car in the garage. Big closets with lots of drawers in the bedroom.
interaction: Guests can make self-check in by identifying themselves and getting the keys with the porter.
house_rules: Smoking is allowed in the balcony only. Please, DO NOT SMOKE INSIDE THE APARTMENT. Feel free to read any of the books available, but please don't take them outside the apartment.

host.host_about: Wildly outgoing!

reviews.comments: O apartamento fica no bairro carioca do Botafogo, bem a meio-caminho de todos os pontos mais interessantes do Rio de Janeiro. O apartamento é muito bem instalado; quarto tem cama gigantesca (tenho 1,90 e não tive problemas), ar condicionado e ventilador para os mais friorentos; sua cozinha é bem instalada (fizemos café da manhã e lanche noturno todos os dias), sala e varandas aconchegantes com uma excelente vista do Cristo redentor. Conta ainda com internet de alta velocidade. A estação do metrô do Botafogo fica à distância de um cuspe, e há nas redondezas ótimos barzinhos e restaurantes, supermercados, padarias, e até um Horti-Fruti a 50 metros. O Márcio é uma pessoa adorável, e, tendo sido muito bem instruídos por (Hidden by Airbnb) durante as ultimas horas de nossa viagem Vitoria-Rio, não tivemos problema nenhum para encontrar o apartamento. A experiência que tive foi ótima, e vou com certeza procurar o Márcio novamente na próxima vez que for ao Rio de Janeiro.

It was a great stay at this home. Closest to the main touristics places, groceries stores, malls, metro station, etc. 24h ordinance and private parking lot are great advantages. The apartment had everything that we need, a wonderfull view and its a cozy place also.

Minha estadia no apto do Márcio foi ótima, o local é demais, super bem localizado, ao lado do metro, e bem espaçoso.
O Marcio foi super atencioso com a (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei e indicarei.

Bel appartement et excellent rapport qualité prix 
3 gros atouts :
- l'appartement est spacieux, agréable, propre, bien décoré avec une très agréable terrasse avec une belle vue sur le corcovado
- dans un immeuble "de services" proches de ceux d'un hôtel : portier/gardien h24, femme de ménage tous les jours, (petite) piscine, salle de sport 
- et idéalement situé dans le quartier, central et sur de Botafogo, à quelques pas des commerces et des métros

El apartamento es realmente como lo vimos en las fotos, es limpio, amplio, decorado, cómodo y con nuestro hijo pudimos aprovecharlo. Mi hijo disfrutó del sistema de sonido, excelente para escuchar música y películas por internet. Apreciamos mucho la vista desde el balcón con vista al Cristo Redentor, hermoso!! También fue muy grato disponer de varios servicios (portería y guardia las 24hs, servicio de limpieza, espacios comunes con piscina y gimnasio). La localización fue perfecta para nosotros, cerca del supermercado, de otros negocios y, especialmente, del metro que nos llevó a todos los puntos turisticos de la ciudad. Muchas gracias Márcio por tu hospitalidad!! un gran abrazo!!

Nice flat ideally situated in a nice area of Rio, near the metro and many bus stops and not far from some of the main attractions. The flat is also nice to live in: good size, even for 4; balcony; swimming pool; cleaner comes daily and there is a porter all the time. The only thing is the sofa which a bit small for 2 (but we knew it before as Marcio made it clear in the description).
Marcio was very responsive before and during our stay. We would definitely recommend to stay at his place!

o anfitrião foi atencioso, demonstrou interesse em saber se haviamos chegado bem , deu tudo certo conforme o combinado
o apartamento é bem localizado.
mas merece algumas melhorias as quais informamos diretamente ao anfitrião

Departamento muy bien ubicado, a pocos metros de la estación de metro de Botafogo, departamento amplio, terraza muy agradable con vista al Corcovado. 
Departamento bien agendado, living  y piezas grandes. Baño con ducha cómodo.

- poils et tâches sur les draps
- poils sur les toilettes 
Les chaises sont déchiquetées (comme si un chien les avaient mangées)
- Les casseroles ne sont pas propres (ça ne donne pas envie de cuisiner dedans)

C'est très bruyant car il manque un morceau de vitre sur une fenêtre et il a des trous dans le mur où est placé la climatisation

Les rideaux ne sont pas occultants. Donc les nuits sont très courtes 
> impossible de se reposer la nuit

Point positif :
L'appartement est très bien situé (à quelques minutes de la station de métro et du supermarché)

Marcio nous a permis de rester quelques heures de plus le dernier jour car notre avion était prévu en fin d'après-midi

I am extremely happy about my choice of Marcio’s place.
The apartment is very well located and the facilities of the building arr amazing! I recommend!!
Great location, good apartment with full service and amenities. Marcio was very responsive on everything we needes during our stay.

The location is really great and the front desk guys were really helpful. We didn’t see the host or talked to him during the staying but everything in the apartment was good, especially the kitchen and the balcony, amazing view to the Christ. 
One advise, bring your own towels and bed sheets if you want to avoid dust.

Exactly like on pictures. Perfectly located in Botafogo, 1 min walk from the metro station. The view of Christo Redentor  during sunset while chilling in the hammock... how amazing!! This helps  a lot to have air con in the bedroom when the heat get crazy outside. A maid is coming 5/7 to clean the flat. This is also great to have the sports area in the building (fitness machines and tiny pool). We spent a relaxed time there.

El apartamento esta muy bien ubicado, la estación de metro cruzando la calle, supermercados cerca y boliches para cenar a dos cuadras. Tiene una vista hermosa al Cristo y los servicios del edificio muy completos.
EXCELENTE LOCALIZAÇÃO ANFITRIÃO SUPER ATENCIOSO APTO ÓTIMO.
Lovely apartement, exactly as it shows in airbnb. Great stay, hopefully we will repeat it!

description: Excelente quarto no melhor bairro do Rio de Janeiro! 300m da praia, ao lado do shopping Leblon, estação de metrô Jardim de Alah, bairro de Ipanema e Lagoa. Apartamento novo e reformado. Super agradável.

Excelente ubicación!!! André siempre estuvo en constante comunicación y al pendiente de que todo estuviera bien. Muy buenas recomendaciones para qué hacer un fin de semana en Rio. Gracias André!

O apartamento do André está localizado em uma das melhores áreas do Rio. Fica pertinho do Shopping Leblon e Rio design. Tem vários restaurantes e comércio por perto, além de ser muito perto da praia. Ele foi educado e prestativo. Eu com certeza voltaria a ficar no apto dele :)

André tem um apartamento estiloso e muito bem localizado. Cama e ducha ótimos, sempre importante esses quesitos.

La habitación muy cómoda y limpia. Muy bien equipada y todo el departamento es impecable. André muy amable y cordial. Recomendable 100%. La ubicación es en la parte más linda de Leblon, cerca de Shoppings y el metro a pocas cuadras.
Recomendamos e muito. Fomos muito bem recebidos. Superou as expectativas.
Localização ótima!!! Altas dicas pegamos com o Andre! Uma graca o apartamento!!!

O André é um ótimo anfitrião. O apartamento é uma graça e a localização não poderia ser mellhor. Fomos muito bem recebidas e tratadas em nossa estadia. A comunicação foi  fácil e rápida. Voltaria com certeza.

Fue mi mejor alquiler en airbnb. Ninguna duda para recomendarlo por pocos o muchos días. Está a media ccuadra del Shopping, al frente de la policía, seguridad 24 hs, cerca de la playa y de la estación del metro. Completísimo el interior.
Tudo perfeito, localização, limpeza, espaço, dicas, com certeza voltarei o ap é maravilhoso!!!!

Excelente pessoa, super prestativo e acessível. Deixa os hóspedes super a vontade, apartamento aconchegante e delicioso, e tem um excelente gosto decorativo e musical. Desejamos tudo de melhor, e esperamos nos hospedar lá mais vezes.
Excelente hospedagem, muito bem localizado, tudo limpinho e bem organizado.
Muito bom, muito boa localização, conforto e estilo! Sem contar que André é muito querido!
Excelente localização, ambiente descolado é um ótimo anfitrião.

Andre is more than our Airbnb host! He is now our friend :) His apartment is super cute and looks even better than the photos. He was a great host and showed us around, we’ll definitely be coming back. Valeu!

La predisposición de André ha Sido impecable. Ante cualquier consulta ha respondido entusiasta y con disponibilidad para ayudar. Localização excelente, segurança nos acessos ao prédio, facilidades próximas ajudam muito na dinâmica da estadia. Além disso as instalações são confortáveis, limpas e o anfitrião demonstra empatia e simpatia. 
Super recomendo :D
O apartamento do André é um espaço bem charmoso, bem decorado, limpo e de ótima localização para quem pretende visitar a zona sul do Rio. Super recomendo!

O apartamento é extremamente estiloso e bem cuidado, o quarto e cama muito confortáveis, mas o ponto alto é a hospitalidade, gentileza, prontidão e simpatia do anfitrião que se mostrou muito flexível em favor do nosso bem estar.

Great location and a nice apartment. Jane, who checked us in gave us some awesome suggestions for eating out and things to do. It got a little cold at night but the hosts delivered an extra blanket immediately. The bakery downstairs is also a bonus!
We had a great time, this appartement is wonderfull, well situated, cafeteria nearby is a place to be in order to get a taste of the local live.
Super appartement, très bien situé et très propre, je recommande !
Bon appartement, bon accueil bon séjour

The apartment is very clean, confortable and well located, right near the river. Perfect for visit the city! Jane, who checked us in made a map for us and wrote down a lot of informations about monuments to visit and places for eating. We have a great stay!
Everything was Just perfect! Andddd there was this elecit aroma of the bakery downstairs every morning..

The apartment is really nice, clean and weel located, right next to the river! It got a little cold at night because there is no heating system but Jane - the host -  gave us extra blankets.
Jane was really nice and left us a map with lots of information about where to eat and what to see in Porto.

We had a great time!

Stylish apartment in a great location, close to all the best spots of the city and nice bars, restaurants, cool shops. We had a wonderful time and we’d definitely stay here again. The bakery downstairs was a great plus of our stay and Porto is a beautiful destination to visit. Highly recommended :)

We came from Sao Bento Metro Station, and it was 10 minutes downhill, however the opposite direction uphill from the apt takes a bit longer coz the streets r really steep!
Pedro welcome us to the apt and gave us some local tips, he was kind and very friendly.. U can communicate with him through (Hidden by Airbnb) .. Aline was also reachable by texting, even before the trip..
The apt is located at Ribeira near the Douro river, so it’s close to the seafood restaurants by the river.. It’s also walkable to the Luis I Bridge..
If u wanna catch the hop on hop off bus, I’d suggest u go to the Ribeira stop coz it’s downhill, however Se Cathedral is also walkable, eventhough it’s uphill..
There r supermarkets like 3mins walk to both sides of the apt..
The apt itself is super nice! Modern look and clean.. The kitchenette is equipped with basic amenities.. They have hairdryer, good wifi, tea, coffee, and some other basic stuff u need for traveling..
