1 thing that can be improved, about the portable heater.. It was still winter at end of Feb, and the temp rise from night till morning, so it got a bit colder around 6 degrees.. There is a small mirror in the bathroom, but a big mirror would be a plus.. And bedroom sandal would also be a plus since it was kinda cold..
Overall it was a really good stay and we’d recommend this place for sure!

Nice and clean apartment. The location of the apartment is very central, everything is within walking distance and good restaurants are nearby. There is a supermarket on the corner, and the bakery downstairs has good bread!

Bien situé. Grand appartement agréable. Par contre, rien de consommable disponible à part de l’eau fraîche dans le frigo. Pas de savon, pas de shampooing et autres produits de première nécessité que nous avons du acheter. Nous avons aussi du insister pour avoir des draps pour le canapé lit (ce qui était soi-disant payant, elle a tenté le coup). Problème qui a finalement été réglé.

위치가 진짜 강가 바로 앞이라 야경 보러 내려가기도 짱 좋고 관광스팟 돌아보러 위로 올라가기에도 좋은 최적의 위치예요! 집 밑에 슈퍼에서 술이랑 과일 사서 집에서나 강가에서 먹기도 좋고 길가라 안전하면서도 시끄럽지 않고 너무너무 좋았어요 다만 집에 난방이 안돼서 겨울엔 좀 춥겠네요 전 3월 중순인데 마지막 날에 목감기 걸려 가요ㅠㅠ 그리고 소파베드가 짧아서 키가 150대이신 분들께 딱 맞아요 소파베드는 예약하실 때 베드로 쓰겠다고 미리 말 해야 세팅 해주시는 것 같았어요 여분 수건은 안 바꿔주셔서 개인 수건 하나 정도는 챙기셔야 할 것 같아요. 아무튼 난방문제만 없으면 재방문 의사 200%입니다 좋아요!!

The apartment exceeded our expectations. It is as in the pictures. Very clean, very beautiful. In a nice neighbourhood, very close to many restaurants and not too far from the center (like 10 min walking). Jane's welcome was very nice!  She gave us a map with many tips and places and local restaurants to visit. We will definitely come back if we go back to Porto!

We enjoyed our stay in dixo's apartment very much! The apartment was clean and cosy. It is located near the Douro, very central. 

Pedros welcome was very nice. He handed us the keys and a map of Porto with many great recommendations.

This apartment was the perfect to explore Porto! It is perfectly located, in close walking distance to the river, restaurants, and the train station. Jane was so accommodating; she showed us all the good spots in the city, and was very quick to respond to any questions during our stay. The apartment itself was stylish and comfortable, with two balconies to look out at all the activity on the street below. And the BEST part - there is a little bakery just below the building, with amazing pastries and bread!
Such a warm welcome for one of our best Airbnb experience so far! The flat is ALL RIGHT, well located - Jane was even better by giving us all the places we were looking for our quick stay in Porto!
Superb location for a beautifully appointed property.
recommended for sure. great location, fantastic apartment.
Very nice, super centrally located apartment! The hostess was waiting for us with various local recommendations highlighted on the map. Thank you for the beer :-) Highly recommended place!

Très joli petit appartement refait à neuf, avec goût. Parquet en point de Hongrie, salle de bain design, mobilier sympa… idéalement placé pour visiter la ville, on peut tout faire à pied. Très bon accueil, bonnes adresses, conseils... la petite boulangerie café située dans l'immeuble juste à côté fait des gâteaux délicieux, à monter en un clin d'œil pour le petit déjeuner. Un excellent rapport qualité prix. Une propreté irréprochable, et dieu sait si on est difficile. Idéal pour un séjour en amoureux.
Perfect location, lovely apartment. Quiet at night despite the central location. Definitely recommend!

O Apto tem uma ótima localização com uma vista maravilhosa!! Do lado tem uma padaria e logo cedo vc sente aquele cheirinho gostoso de pão. Fica perto dos restaurantes, passeios da para fazer a pé ou se preferir tem as lojas para comprar os tickets dos passeios. 
O Apto é muito limpo e novo, cama muito confortável!!!
Amamos tudo em Porto, em especial o Apto da Aline que nos acolheu tão bem!!
Amazing place, I recommend it warmly!

Superó nuestras expectativas, con una situación inmejorable, con todas las comodidades.. si algún día volvemos a Oporto, volveremos a alojarnos allí sin lugar a dudas.. 

Muchísimas gracias por todo de verdad..

Ideal location, beautiful apartment, very modern in an older building. We could walk every where. The arrival was late, but we were warmly welcomed by Jane who took the time to explain everything about the apartment and the main sites in Porto. We will go back.
Lovely place. In the heart of the historic district. Close to many attractions. Highlight was the bakery on the first floor. Great croissants that you can then bring up and eat on the balcony!

This apartment was not only clean and close to everything but the host was very very nice! Aline responded in timely manner and very accommodating! I would highly recommend this place. And I will def come back here. Thank you!!
Beau studio bien situé, mais un peu bruyant la nuit. L’accueil de Jane fût exceptionnel et la communication excellente!  Nous avons aussi apprécié les bons conseils d’endroits à visiter.

Such a great apartment! Easy check in, excellent recommendations, super comfy bed, so much space, well equipped kitchen, it was all great! Slept for 14hours accidentally because it was so quiet and so dark which was amazing. Perfect location. If you’re going to Porto this is the place to stay.

Amazing place with a great view. Truly wonderful hospitality. We were in communication with Jane and she was very helpful and prompt with her responses. When we arrived at the Airbnb she even sat us down and went through what we could see and do around the area. Highly recommended!

Excellent location, beautiful home and clean!!! Joanna gave us great recommendations on what to see and where to eat while in Porto. Very helpful! Would definitely stay again and recommend to friends.

사진보다 훨씬 좋았어요! 화장실이나 부엌을 포함해 전체적으로 깔끔했습니다. 엘레베이터도 있어서 무거운 캐리어 옮기기에도 편리해요! 커피포트도 있어서 커피도 매일 마셨고 간단한 요리도 할 수 있어서 좋았어요! 밤 12시에 숙소에 도착하기로 했는데 비행기가 연착되는 바람에 좀 더 늦게 도착했는데도  호스트분께서 반갑게 맞이해주셨습니다. 같이 갔던 친구는 호스트가 친절했다고 생각했고, 저는 조금 형식적이라고 느꼈습니다! 그래도 늦은 시간임에도 불구하고 지도에 맛집이나 관광지를 꼼꼼하게 설명해주셔서 감사했어요! 아 그리고 다 좋은데 1층식당?에서 조금 이상한 냄새가 났어요 ㅠㅠ 그래서 집들어가고 나올때마다 코 막고 다녔어요! 이거 빼고는 정말 다 좋았습니다! 숙소 덕분에 포르투가 더 좋아질 정도로 좋은 숙소였어요 !! 감사합니다.
Excellent apartment, centrally located. A really lovely space, appreciated the coffee machine and bottle of beer on arrival.
Great flat idealy located close to many of the attractions in Porto. We would stay there again if we visit Porto again.
Perfect gelegen schoon en comfortabel appartement. Meer dan goede prijs kwaliteit verhouding.
Great place to stay in Porto

Overall great stay.. Location was absolutely perfect, very close to the water. The apt itself was clean and comfortable, we loved the balcony! Their team was mostly good with communicating while we were there.. I would definitely recommend for a few days in Porto!
Great location.  We highly recommend

The apartment‘s location is fantastic! It was clean, sunny, and spacious. We were met for check in and given a map and lovely list of suggested restaurants, wine bars, shops and sights. I highly recommend staying here.

One of my best airbnb experiences! Super nice welcome from the host Jane, with great tips for the city, which are not necessarily written in the tourist guide, such as hidden restaurants and current exhibitions. Top location, very clean, very comfortable huge bed for a good sleep after a long trip/journey. Highly recommend. Thank you very much.

Très joli appartement situé dans un quartier vivant et parfaitement situé pour visiter Porto. la gare est à moins de 10 mn à pieds. Il y a une boulangerie au RDC ,c’est une chance car tout y est bon, croissants portugais, pasteis etc. appartement calme grâce au double vitrage et volets intérieurs. Décoration moderne , équipement, quartier, séjour très agréable.

Clean, spacious apartment in an excellent location!  Really a perfect location to see all of Porto.  Hosts were very communicative.  They were also understanding when our arrival was delayed due to a cancelled flight.  I highly recommend this apartment for Porto.

Unfortunately, this was by far the worst Airbnb experience I have ever had. I stay in Airbnb locations a number of times a year, each of them different with their own quirkiness but this was by far the worst place I have ever stayed in on an overall experience perspective. The stay was completely unauthentic and does not represent what Airbnb means to me which is staying like a local and ability to live in a homely place with all relevant items of a home. This place was neither. Aline's apartment and 'experience' is extremely commercialised and more like staying in a hotel but with none of the benefits of a hotel. The check in with Aline was particularly difficult and to a very poor standard. Whenever I stay in an Airbnb I provide them with my mobile number in case my flight is delayed. In this instance my flight was delayed by over an hour which I text Aline to let her know of and that I would text her when we landed and also when we were on a taxi to her place. Not one message was acknowledged and no communication was received. Aline had outlined she would meet us outside the apartment. However, as I was abroad I did not have roaming and could not use the internet. We arrived at the apartment to no one there and the gate being key or code access. I then had to treck to Starbucks up the road to get into the Wi-Fi to see if anything had been received from Aline, despite my four text messages to her that day. Aline had messaged me on the code for the front door and the apartment which we were then able to gain access, after some effort. We didn't receive any communication from Aline to see if we had checked in successfully, so instead I let her know we were in. The apartment is on the second floor and has a cafe right beside the front door to the entrance. While the cafe is open the customers literally sit at the front door to the apartment block. There is no air-conditioning in the apartment and no fans either. Both nights we stayed were extremely warm and there is also no window in the bedroom to allow some air to come in. Instead we had to open the front windows to cool the apartment. The street noise was unbearable and went on til 4am both nights. Morning traffic starts again around 6am. This was two of the worst nights sleep I have ever had due to the noise and heat of the apartment. There is no oven in the apartment, only a microwave and very very limited utensiles/ items. There's 4 mugs, 4 glasses and little cooking items. This apartment has no lived in sense and seems to only have been utilised to rent out on short term stays. There is also no window in the bathroom which means a lot of...
Beautiful and spacious apartment in the center of town. Walking distance to all the main attractions. Full equipped and well maintained apartament, included everything you need. I would come back!

Wonderful apartment right in the heart or Porto. Very central location which made it very easy to walk everywhere. We were given a lot of local tips on where to eat and visit which was great. The apartment was very spacious and clean. Recommended to anyone visiting Porto.

The place is perfectly located which really made our stay in Porto super enjoyable! The apartment is clean and comfortable, just a bit noisy in the morning due to downstairs bakery. Very easy check-in but wish communication had been easier prior to arrival.

Not a great stay in Porto. This is quite clearly a serviced apartment masquerading as an Airbnb. It is not lived in and you will notice that when you arrive. It looks great in photos - and by all means does in real life too. Though the communication between myself and Aline was non existent. I spent most of my time talking to someone called Joana? She must manage the apartment for Dixos - have a look at their profile pictures they’re all the same (lol). After initially being told someone would meet us at the apartment, the day before Joana informed us that she would no longer be able to do so. The key would be waiting for us in a lockbox attached to the door. On arrival there was no key in the lockbox. Always a great start when visiting a new city. After messaging and calling the owner for 20 minutes the owner frantically responded with a variety of excuses (I couldn’t really understand). Though assured us that someone was on the way asap. 30 minutes after that a woman arrived with a key to let us in. She didn’t say hello or introduce herself - just went straight to the door and unlocked it. Asking her what had happened she laughed responding ‘I guess someone forgot to put it in’. Bizarre. Not even sure who she was.. maybe Joana? Maybe someone else. Oh well. Let’s get to the fun part - like sleeping? That’s a shame. This place is conveniently placed amongst the buzz in Porto, there’s no doubt about that. The street is a major thoroughfare for tourists and aggressive taxi drivers. This will be busy almost 24/7 during summer. During the hot weather with no fan or air conditioning, the only way to cool the apartment is by opening the windows to the street. I spent most of the night frequenting the window to cool the apartment and then having close them due to the excessive noise. This place is ridiculous. I’ve had some of the worst sleeps of my life. You’ll hear the locals yelling at each other across the street. Drunk tourists singing their favourite tunes. Taxi drivers beeping furiously at tourists trying to cross the street. I can imagine this is less of an issue during winter (maybe?). We were also pleasantly surprised with someone ringing the doorbell at 4:45am on our final night. Absolutely scared my girlfriend which was fun. Oh, and don’t be fooled by the other comments regarding the great ‘local suggestions’ either. They’ve cleaned out their local tourist center and have a bunch of pamphlets. Great right? Nah. The idea of Airbnb is that you get that ‘personal touch’ from the locals. This is everything but. Feels more like a British ex-pat trying to make some side cash from his Portuguese investment. I would suggest staying in a hotel as it’s of relative cost - you’ll essentially get the same thing PLUS air-conditioning and the bonus service...
Great location! Well furnished and super spacious.

From pre check-in to check-out, our host was professional, accommodating and very friendly. The apartment is a stylish, open, airy space that offers river views from the balcony. Located in a great location for everything Porto has to offer, I would highly suggest this apartment for anyone looking to visit the city!

We had a wonderful week in Porto and in this cosy and beautiful apartment. It is central and perfectly located near the river Douro..you can see part of it from the balcony. We enjoyed the mornings (with coffee & bread from the bakery downstairs) and the evenings (with wine from douro) on the small (Website hidden by Airbnb) was fantastic! The friendly neighbours gave us a Hello when we sit there..feels good! The apartment is very clean and comfortable. Best bed ever!  Joao gave us the best tipps for our stay and marked them in the map..so helpful! We enjoyed all of the places he told us..oh..the francesinha was so good! :) and the views from the hills..wonderful! Thank you for everything..Peggy & Jens
Perfect and clean place! Great Location to visit Porto and wonderful host!
Nossa estadia foi excelente! Joana foi muito atenciosa conosco! A localização do sim apartamento é perfeita!
Lovely place to stay in a great location. Clean, homely and lived up to the pictures. The hosts gave some great local tips which made a big difference. Definitely recommended.

This apartment is the perfect spot for a single traveller or a couple. The flat is located in the absolute perfect spot within short walking distance of The Ribiera and Porto’s finest dining and sites. 

Joana was amazing at check-in and provided a map with all the greatest tips and spots. I will recommend this flat to everyone I know.

The location of the apartment is super and the flat is equipped with modern facilities and is well kept and clean ! You can literally walk to each part of the old town and sightseeing spots within walking distance!
The host is hospital and knowledgeable on local tips on where to visit and dine !
Beautiful apartment in the best location possible. Great communication, extremely comfortable. Stay here!

We had the most fantastic stay at Aline’s apartment. The location is amazing - really close to the Douro river and bridge and the bars and restaurants - I’d struggle to think of a better place to stay. The apartment itself is just lovely - very spacious and clean and the decor is fab! We loved the little balcony for eating breakfast in the morning. Communication with Aline was excellent - very quick responses and so helpful. We were also left a map inside the apartment which was marked up with places to visit and this came in really handy. I would highly recommend this place - we loved it!
We kregen bij aankomst leuke tips over de stad van Joana. Schoon en erg centraal gelegen onder in het oude centrum. Voldeed aan alle verwachtingen.

A very stylish flat in the center of Porto. We enjoyed staying there. Clean and spacious, it would be enough for 3-4 people or a family with a child, as they have a sofa-bed in the lounge. The double bed was very comfortable. I was worried that it might be too noisy at night, but once the shutters were closed we couldn’t hear anything from the street. Highly recommended!
Great stay at the flat! Super central location, easy communication and stylish space that had everything we needed for a short stay! Thank you!!!

Great location! Super clean and spacious for family of 4, or small group of friends to stay and enjoy Porto! Every major tourist POI are in walking distance! I’ll definitely stay here again! Highly recommended!
This flat was perfect for us—super clean, spacious and well located. Nice to have fresh coffee and a couple of beers in the fridge :) The bed was comfortable too. Would happily stay here again.

Great apartment with everything you need for a few days away. Close to the river and eateries. Very clean and someone always close at hand if you need help with anything. Definitely recommend Alines place.

Un apartamento muy acogedor con decoración excelente. Todo muy limpio y ubicación inmejorable. El único problema es que tardaron un poco en contestar. 


Lo que recomendaría al dueño es colocar un espejo grande en la habitación ya que solo había en del baño y estaba demasiado alto.
Le logement était parfait. Super bien située, à deux pas de tout. Super propre, confortable et décoré avec goût. La communication a été vraiment facile. Je recommande sans hésitation!
Logement correspondant parfaitement à l'annonce , pas du tout déçu et accueil parfait avec quelques bonnes idées locales. Très bien situé
Todo genial, recomendable 100%.
Recomendable 100%
Great place, in a central location. Would definitely recommend.
Bom apartamento, boa comunicação, óptima estadia.

A good price and very good location for this renovated apartment with lift (just 100m from Douro River touristic area, in the middle of medieval town center). It looks like an hotel romm but bigger with a kitchen. Good communication and advices too. Here’s a bakery down the building and planty of restaurants around. I recommand.
El apartamento correcto, muy bien ubicado. No obstante, no funcionó el wifi durante toda la estancia, lo cual nos perjudicó. Todo lo demás muy bien.
Perfect apartment and in an amazing spot! Would definitely recommend!

Overall, a great place to stay. The location is perfect: we were able to explore Porto and Vila Nova de Gaia easily, and there were plenty of great restaurants and landmarks near the apartment. Doing the check-in and check-out was easy, and we were given plenty of information and recommendations for the city. The flat was nicely decorated and had everything we needed. The one thing we didn’t like, however, is that the apartment feels quite cold. We know it’s January, but with only a little heater it was impossible to have a warm apartment and that subtracted noticeably from our experience (the only reason we don’t put five stars). Would still recommend it 100%, but hopefully you will get another heater!
Aanrader! Zeer fijne plek. Brandschoon.
Ótima localização e o apartamento com excelentes condições

Très bon emplacement, hôte réactive et sympathique! L’appartement est conforme aux photos et à la description!
Nous avons passé un bon séjour merci.
Peut être un peu plus de chauffage en hiver et une douche avec un jet d’eau plus fort! Sinon le reste très bien! Nous recommandons!
Я просто в восторге ! Квартира шикарная, очень чисто, расположение супер. Удобный чек ин и чек аут. С удовольствием рекомендую !
Très bon appart à deux pas du Douro et de la Ribeira !

name: Private, double room in Barcelona
summary: The apartment is located in city center, 10 minutes metro distance to the touristic center of Barcelona. The apartment is found at the 4 floor of the building with lift. A private, double room is equipped with two beds, one double bed and one single bed if the guests want to sleep separately. In the room you have at your disposition two big closets and Wi-Fi connection. There is a shared bathroom outside of the guest room and the living room/workroom for a disposition of our guests.
space: The private double room can accommodate two persons sleeping together or separately.
description: The apartment is located in city center, 10 minutes metro distance to the touristic center of Barcelona. The apartment is found at the 4 floor of the building with lift. A private, double room is equipped with two beds, one double bed and one single bed if the guests want to sleep separately. In the room you have at your disposition two big closets and Wi-Fi connection. There is a shared bathroom outside of the guest room and the living room/workroom for a disposition of our guests. The private double room can accommodate two persons sleeping together or separately. Our guest can access living room/workroom and shared bathroom. The neighborhood is very safe and located in the city center near two main Barcelona metro stations L1 (Red Line) and L5 (Blue Line). There are two restaurants in the location: Chinese restaurant and budget casual dining restaurant. There are plenty of coffee shops around our place, fruit stores and two big supermarkets. We provide all bedclothes necessary.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very safe and located in the city center near two main Barcelona metro stations L1 (Red Line) and L5 (Blue Line). There are two restaurants in the location: Chinese restaurant and budget casual dining restaurant. There are plenty of coffee shops around our place, fruit stores and two big supermarkets.
notes: We provide all bedclothes necessary.
access: Our guest can access living room/workroom and shared bathroom.
house_rules: - You have to deposit to the owner of the apartment 50 euros in cash in case of any damages or losing apartment’s keys. Your 50 euros security deposit will be fully recovered back in your departure day.

name: Beautiful North Shore Oahu,3 Beds!
summary: The North Shore Loft is located near so many amazing beaches. It has 2 queen size beds upstairs in the loft bedroom. There is also a fold out foam futon mattress or air mattress.  Has full kitchen and full bath. It is about 650 feet to the beach. You get an ocean view from the upstairs loft bedroom.  There is also off street parking. Great, safe neighborhood. Foodland grocery store is 3 miles away, and Turtle Bay Resort is only a 5 minute drive in the other direction.
space: Welcome to the North Shore Loft!    The North Shore Loft is at a location that can not be beat, one of the most beautiful beaches is about 650 feet (a very short walk) away, an ocean view from the bedroom upstairs. There is a walking/bike path that starts at Velzy Land, and goes 3.5 miles to Waimea Bay. This amazing 3.5 mile stretch includes some of the worlds most beautiful and famous beaches and surf breaks, including Banzai Pipeline, Rocky Point, Off the Wall, Sharks Cove(great snorkeling!!), and many more. No matter is you are a serious surfer or a family looking for fun in the sun, this location has something for everyone. The North Shore Loft is much more private than a condo. It has a large loft bedroom with an ocean view and  two queen size beds, there is a foam fold out futon mattress or airmattress that is great for kids, a full kitchen downstairs in the living area, (stove, fridge, microwave, coffee pot, toaster oven, toaster,blender,utensils, iron,etc), full bath, with full
description: The North Shore Loft is located near so many amazing beaches. It has 2 queen size beds upstairs in the loft bedroom. There is also a fold out foam futon mattress or air mattress.  Has full kitchen and full bath. It is about 650 feet to the beach. You get an ocean view from the upstairs loft bedroom.  There is also off street parking. Great, safe neighborhood. Foodland grocery store is 3 miles away, and Turtle Bay Resort is only a 5 minute drive in the other direction. Welcome to the North Shore Loft!    The North Shore Loft is at a location that can not be beat, one of the most beautiful beaches is about 650 feet (a very short walk) away, an ocean view from the bedroom upstairs. There is a walking/bike path that starts at Velzy Land, and goes 3.5 miles to Waimea Bay. This amazing 3.5 mile stretch includes some of the worlds most beautiful and famous beaches and surf breaks, including Banzai Pipeline, Rocky Point, Off the Wall, Sharks Cove(great snorkeling!!), and many more. No matter i
neighborhood_overview: This is such a great neighborhood. It is quiet, and safe. The neighbors are all wonderful and helpful.  And we have one of the most beautiful beaches, that's not crowded, just about 650 feet from the property.
notes: There is a binder book on the end table or in the drawer next to the fridge. It has helpful information inside like how to work the shower, etc.
transit: I would suggest renting a car, since we are in the country. However there is an excellent bus system on the Island that can take you where ever you want to go, it just may take some time getting there. And you are only allowed a carry on bag on the bus, no luggage. The property does have off street parking. I have detailed directions with your itinerary.
access: I don't supply beach gear, however, there is an assortment of snorkel gear, etc. in the unit, and you are welcome to use what you find, just please rinse salt off after use. There are several beach gear, and bike rentals in the area. There are some beach toys for kids to play in the sand.  There is the "Wash N" Go" in Waialua for laundry. I do have a washer/dryer that works fine, but the body is rusty  from being outside in the salt air.  It is old but you are welcome to use it if you like, or the laundry facility is located in Waialua (about 8 miles). My washer  can only do medium loads, please do not change the dial to large load, or it will over flow. The laundry facility in Waialua does large loads.  There is also off street parking, you may park in the gravel driveway next to the stairs. You may want to back in if you have a low car.
interaction: My guests are free to let themselves in with the key left in the lock box, and make themselves at home. I know their time here goes by so fast and they will be busy enjoying the beach and the site, so I give them privacy and let them enjoy the property. But I am here if they need me. If I see you out in the drive way, I will come over and say hello. If I don't see my guests in passing, and they would like to meet, please let me know. Feel free to email, text, or call me any time with any questions or concerns. I want you all to have a wonderful time here on the North Shore, and I am so happy to be able to share my piece of paradise.
house_rules: Aloha and Welcome to the North Shore Loft!  Kindly please observe the following house rules when you are staying at our home.  Also, there is a book on the end table with some helpful info. like how to use the shower, etc(URL HIDDEN) ***CHECK IN is any time after 3:00 PM. CHECK OUT is any time BEFORE 11:00 AM. There is only a 4 hour window of time to completely clean and set up before the next guests arrive. Please do not arrive early, or check out late unless you have permission from Rainey. Late check out with out permission, may result in an extra fee. - Please please please wash the sand off your feet and your body in the outdoor shower located under the stairs, before coming up to the home.  Hawaiian sand is very abrasive to floors and it clogs up the drain in the shower and causes overflow, and we would love it if we kept the sand out of the house.  -Please don't flush ANYTHING except toilet paper, We do NOT have city sewage, only a septic system that is very sensitive. We do not

host.host_about: I live on the North Shore of Oahu in Hawaii. I love it here.  I live so close to so many of the worlds most awesome beaches. I love to ride bike on the bike path that starts at the end of my street at "Velzy Land" and goes to "Waimea Bay".  I like to hike and see the many breathtaking views that this area has to offer. I read a lot. I mostly love to enjoy all this with my family. I have two daughters.

reviews.comments: The north shore location is awesome.  A perfect spot to getaway and just relax.  The loft was nice, and more than enough room for the 2 of us.  There's a W/D and BBQ outside downstairs, and Dish TV.  There's no WiFi, but someone in the neighborhood has an unsecured router.

Rainey was an excellent host.  The Loft was clean and we felt at home straight away.  Little touches like the fruit and bagles in the fridge were great and it is only a stones throw away from the beach.  It was a cozy beach house.  We loved it!
The loft was perfect for our stay on the North Shore. Couldn't be any closer to the greatest waves in the world. We would definitely stay here again.
The North Shore Loft was comfortable, cozy, and very close to all of the popular beaches! Rainey was a very hospitable host and accommodating to our schedule requests. I will definitely return!
Great location, minutes from the beach. Loved our stay at Rainey's place. Thanks for leaving us fruit and extras! Loft was spacious, clean and homey!
The loft was great! Very private and a two minute walk to the ocean. Really fun surfing at velzyland and a short walk to teds bakery.

The Northshore Loft is near to the sunset beach, where you can watch the surfers. It was the perfect start of our Hawaii holidays! The house is in the death end of a small street and you feel you like a inhabitant! The loft was clean, with beach towels and snorkelling equipment.

The loft was very nicely furnished, and Rainey had stocked our refrigerator with some bagels and juice:) 
The kitchen worked well for us in that we cooked most of our meals.
The location was good relative to the beautiful beaches of the North Shore.
The only problem had to do with the internet and the DVD/player TV, for some reason they worked for only one day out of the 5 days we were there.
The loft upstairs has a very low ceiling and I bumped my head too many times.
Fabulous place! Great beach access nearby and so helpful as a host. Thanks Rainey! We'll be back!

We had a great time at Rainey's on the North Shore. Located perfectly, away  from the hustle and bustle, but still conventiently close to grocery stores, Starbucks and food ( about a 5 min drive).
The place was clean and had everything you need for a comfortable stay. All kitchen utensils, including toaster, microwave, coffee maker, blender etc are provided. There were also bath towels / beach towels and snorkel gear. 
The beds are comfortable. The washroom could use a little updating, but overall the house was great! 
Unfortunately the Internet wasn't working during our stay, but if that's not an issue for you I would definitely recommend staying here! 
We had an amazing time! The beaches are gorgeous and not too "touristy".
Thanks Rainey for making our stay so pleasant!!

Rainey was an awesome host. Very helpful and on hand if needed. She made us feel very welcome and gave us a lot of advice and recommendations. The lodge was very nice and very central in the north shore, quite a drive though to the main central centre of Waikiki. I'd highly recommend Raineys lodge if you like somewhere peaceful,tranquil and  near the beach. 
Great stay all round
Thanks Rainey

The place is great and has all you need in a home and also for your vacation close to water to be great. Also the host is very helpful and has thought of it all to make your stay even better with info folder in place once you arrive. Clean, spacious, close to beach and perfect for family or friends wanting to enjoy the north shore.

The perfect location for us to explore the north of the island. Rainey was a great host and was able to help us out with checking in a bit earlier.  The house had everything we needed with a fresh beachy feel. We had a great time and would highly recommend to anyone else heading to the north shore. Lots of gratitude Rainey. Thank you.

a pleasant stay--great location and beach within short walking distance.

check-in was very smooth. with two beds and a futon (although it's more just a futon mattress than a futon since the frame is broken) it'll sleep a lot of people!! rainey was also super accommodating with a later checkout.

minor and may not matter to most people, but from a home maker's perspective, the house didn't feel quite lived-in. kitchen was stocked with utensils but without any condiments, and it was a little dusty in places.

but all in all, a great hassle-free stay.

My friends and I had a great time on the north shore . Raineys place was perfect, peaceful and a pretty good bargain.The Place was very clean and Organized.Great beds, pillows and blankets, no problem with the low ceiling upstairs, as I have lived in a loft very similar for quite some time. next time I hope to stay longer, maybe we might actually get to say hello to our host  .

The loft is in a perfect position, just a couple of minutes walk to the fabulous beach, and close to the bakery and supermarket.  It was well equipped and comfortable, but I think that it would be a good idea to replace the futon frame! 
Rainey responded quickly to our emails and calls, and was very helpful. The fresh fruit left for our arrival was a nice touch.

the North Shore apartment was great. Beds are comfortable & the Location is the best on the island, at least for our needs. And we really loved that small sandwich oven! We wish, we had stayed there for the rest of the trip and not switched to Honolulu. We directly came back to the north today and are planning to do the same tomorrow again.
Not everybody might rate the apartment with 5 stars, but for us it was just perfect, comfy and convenient!
Anyway, thanks for these great two days.

We stayed at Raineys Place at North Shore for 7 nights and it was just great. it was four of us and the house was just perfect. everything we needed was there. its a great neighborhood and a real short walk to the beach, the Stay was very comfortable. 
The closest town is Haleiwa which is a surfers paradise with the famous Sunset Beach and Pipeline.Oahu’s North Shore means one thing: surfing! World-famous Waimea Bay and the Banzai Pipeline are sacred sites to surfers the world over, and some big-name surfing contests are held here. Several restaurants, a couple of markets and farmers markets, good coffee at the Coffee Gallery, and plenty of shopping. We can recommend it to everybody who wants to go on a unforgetable vacation .
Thanks to Rainey for all the preparation! 
Aloha! 
Nina

The stay with Rainey was great.
They respond our request in late night. We didn't had any place that night and safe us.
Place was big and Cousy. Very clean and confortable.
Minutes to the incredible pipeline.
If you are in north shore this is the place

Had an amazing week long stay! We traveled with 3 adults and 1 child. Loft is quite spacious and has all the kitchen utensils you need to cook your own food. There is a grocery store right down the street to pick everything up. Beach is steps away from the property. Parking space on site keeps things simple, no need to look for street parking. Fresh basket of fruit upon arrival was a great touch. Boards and Snorkeling gear are all available in the little backyard under the loft (BBQ and Washer/Dryer are also located here). WiFi is also fairly quick, 2 of us were able to work remotely for a couple hours each day. It was my first trip to Oahu and first time using airbnb, I was a little nervous at how it would pan out. I read the previous reviews and went for it. Everything went perfect, felt like we were at our own home. Would def stay here again for a future trip. Rainey has thought of everything you would need for a comfortable stay.

Rainey's left was great for our family of 4.  Less than 5 minute walk to a great beach, quiet location with the exception of a few local roosters acting as alarm clocks.  House had everything we needed, modern appliances, good shower, boogie boards and beach towels to borrow, comfortable beds, lots of fans.  And we left a couple of items behind and Rainey generously offered to ship them to us.  A great host and a great place!  

Peter & Susan Cole

Our group of three stayed at Rainey's loft for 7 nights while attending a friend's North Shore wedding. The loft was very comfortable, conveniently located just a short walk from the beach, and had loads of amenities (wifi, beach towels, snorkel gear, cooking and grilling equipment). Foodland is a short drive away so you can stock up on groceries. Would definitely stay here again!
Rainey's place was excellent. Really close to the beach and a great getaway on the North Shore.

Rainey'splace is ideal. It was easy to locate, clean. Has everything that you would need and very comfortable. It is a quick walk to one of the best beaches on the island, very private. There is also the best bakery walking distance down the street, Teds, I would definitely want to stay at Raineys place again.
Great location! Rainey was kind and helpful. The loft was comfortable and clean.

Our stay at the North Shore Loft was excellent, and Rainey was an excellent host.  The place was very clean upon arrival.  Rainey left us a fruit basket and bagels - a very nice gesture.  This was a special trip for me and my daughter and it could not have been better.

We especially enjoyed the close access to beaches!  Having access to a washer and dryer was great.

Tom and Moriah Billups, Barrington, RI

Rainey was a great hostess, very attentive and accommodating.  Her place is nicely located near some wonderful beaches.  We saw many sea turtles and had a fun time snorkeling and playing in the waves.  The basket of fresh fruit was a nice touch & the washer and dryer were a great bonus as well.  Thanks for the great experience!  :)

Great place to stay and amazing location! Have a friend living in turtle bay and wanted to stay close and this location was perfect. Only a 2 min walk to a beautiful secluded beach area and house had plenty of room and loved the full kitchen. Also has a great terrace out front and being on the 2nd floor you get great sunsets. 

Ceilings are pretty low upstairs in the loft/bedroom but wasn't much of an issue. All and all a great place and excellent value! Will definitely return.

We had a fantastic time at the North Shore Loft. The loft was very clean and had everything we could need including snorkeling gear and bodyboards for the kids. Excellent location just a short walk to the beach, Teds Bakery and in a quiet street (best nights sleep we had are whole trip). Thanks Rainey we hope we can come and visit again!

We had a terrific stay on the North Shore at Rainey's place.  The house is snug for 2 parents and 2 kids but we never felt cramped. We felt welcomed by Rainey and the fruit bowl we found when we arrived and never had a reason to contact Rainey during our week in the house.  Our favorite kid beach ended up being a little drive north - Hukilau - and we loved the drive from this part of the island to Kaneohe.  Rainey was especially gracious when we were confused about our timing and late in checking out.  Rainey's aloha spirit was abundant and we were grateful.  Our vacation was restorative and super fun and this house was perfect for our paired down needs.
We stayed some days at Rainey's House. A wonderful place to be. We will be back next time when we visit Hawaiî.

Me and my family stayed in mid July and absolutely loved it! Very clean and well kept space, the surrounding neighbors were very gracious and friendly. The beach was beautiful and very accessible! The location is perfect if you really want to connect with island living, a bit of a drive to the other side but can't beat the views on the drive! The condo was a little smaller than expected but still worth it! Our two teenagers stayed upstairs in the loft and my husband and I used the sofa bed, would definitely recommend to friends and family...hoping to return and possibly stay again soon!
A wonderful and comfortable place to stay. Right near the beach and near great snorkeling and wonderful views! Thank you!
Great place for us to stay, close to everything. Nice and cosy, clean and comfortable. Nice gesture with fruit. We felt almost at home.
we enjoyed the loft very much. great location, clean and comfortable. recommended for anyone looking to spend some time on the north shore.
Great place for us to stay in Oahu - fresh fruit & flexible check-in & out times greatly appreciated. Very close to the best beaches on the north shore & beautiful stars at night. Highly recommend.

North shore loft was excellent! Downside was there were no places to eat out for dinner in the vicinity. Made a short trip by car further north and found a few places which we liked.
Rainey was thoughtful and provided beach towels and some fruit upon arrival.
Everything in the loft was easy to handle. Fullt equipped kitchen and good beds.
Would recommend this place to anyone who likes to hang out at the beach or go on daytrips around north shore.
Lots of surfers in the water but as Rainey said there was also a spot that was calm so we could bath with our kids.
We had a good stay!
Great place. Close to beach and has all you need.
We had a great time at Rainey's house. It has every thing you need to stay a week with a family. Lovely beatches are next by. We hope to come back some time.

We really enjoyed our time at the north shore. Raineys house is nice, clean comfortable and very well equipped. The beach is only one minute away. Rainey is a very kind and uncomplicated person. We really hope to come back one day and we would definitely choose this place again.

We stayed at Rainey's place for three nights. She was prompt and detailed in her communications and everything went smoothly. The loft was comfortable and very close to the beach. We rented a car and it wasn't a problem to shop, dine, and visit local sites.

So glad we decided to escape the madness of Waikiki and Honolulu and head to the North Shore instead. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Rainey's loft and even though we didn't meet her, communication and check in was hassle free and smooth. The loft is well appointed and amazingly close to the beach. Beach mats, snorkel gear and boogie boards provided was a big plus. Low roof in the upstairs bedroom but didn't really worry us. A tight spiral staircase up to the bedrooms - fun for the kids but not for those lacking mobility!! Highly recommended stay for anyone contemplating a visit. Thanks for sharing your loft Rainey!!

My friends and I had a great time staying in Rainey's home. We unanimously agreed we were so happy we didn't stay in Waikiki. The beaches right around the house are awesome for swimming, surfing and laying out. Plenty of empty beach space to be found. The house itself is great. The neighborhood is quiet day and night. Rainey was extremely helpful and made arrival super easy.

The Loft is spartan, but clean and sunny. You can't beat the location, just a few minutes to the lovely town of Haleiwa or to the Turtle Bay Resort, and a block from the beach. 

If you're tall (like me) watch your head upstairs. The sleeping area is fairly low, and there is a beam running through the middle of it. 

You'll enjoy bringing your loved ones to the North Shore of Oahu, and the Loft is a solid choice to stay in.

Rainey's Loft was just perfect for us. Having the two areas for our family of four gave us the space we needed. The Loft was well equipped and very comfortable. All four of us love to surf and the easy 200 m walk to Freddy Land and Velzy Land made surfing easy, we didn't need to get into the car. Sunset Beach, Pipeline and Foodland store were all an easy bike ride away. Rainey and Hector were excellent hosts. We look forward to staying at Rainey's Loft again in the future.
Rainey's Loft was exactly as she described both my partner and I had an amazing time. It was peaceful, quiet, and central. Recommend staying here to anyone that loves the beach and surfing.
The place is amazing. We enjoy the huge beds, the soft sofa, the greAt location and everything . And she is so helpful! Love the place !

We had the times of our lives at Rainey's place. She is a great host - the Loft is ideally located at the beautiufl north shore, just a few minutes from the beach, close to a great jogging path leading to all those big wave spots and very important to Ted's bakery - only 4 streets away. You can great breakfast, sweets, lunches/dinners and the famous chocolate cream pies. The loft is actually a free standing little house, has all the amenities including a small balcony. The house was super clean and is an ideal set-up. We enjoyed using the snorkeling gear and boogie boards - brief, we had a great time at Rainey's North Shore loft and would go back any time.

We had a great time. The apartment is very nice, and Rainey is a wonderful hostess. A big plus was that we hade the opportunity to use beach towels, beach chaires, boogie boards and snorkling gear för free. Great! 

I can warmly recommend Rainey and her apartment. The North Shore is really worth a visit.

We had a great time at the North Shore Loft! Rainey was a great host and the place was very clean, easy to navigate and in a fabulous location (just a short walk to the beaches). We only wish we had more time to enjoy the great accommodations! Also, Rainey was a great communicator - she let us know that the place was ready for early check in and all the check out processes were really easy and straight forward. We hope to make our way back to the North Shore again in the future!

We had a wonderful time visiting the North Shore and could not ask for a better location and host. All the nice beaches are nearby! The condo itself was very clean and spacious and is definitely well maintained. All the amenities were great and Rainey was kind enough to welcome us with a fresh bowl of fruit! She is also very attentive to her guests and will happily answer any questions. One of my favorite things about staying here was that we were free to use the beach supplies (snorkels, fins, boogie boards, etc...)!

We loved staying in Rainey's North Shore Loft!  The location is excellent, and it's in a nice, quiet neighborhood 2 blocks from great  beaches.  The loft was clean and comfortable - with everything we needed.  We really enjoyed the basket of fruit on arrival - what a treat!  We also used the washer and dryer and gas grill just downstairs from the unit.  If you stay here, you really should make sure to hit Ted's Bakery (just 4 blocks away) at least once.  The pastries and pies are fantastic.  The only warning - watch your head in the loft bedroom (and try not to sleepwalk).  The ceiling is low (as others have noted) - but we didn't have any issues - you learn quickly.  ;-)
Lastly, Rainey was a wonderful host - pointing us to several great beaches, hikes and restaurants (Luibueno's was fantastic - thanks Rainey!).  We wouldn't hesitate to stay here again when we come back to the North Shore!
Great house! One minute walking to the beach of Velzyland. The host Rainey was very helpful and the house had everything we needed. When we go back to Hawaii I will stay there again!

My friends and I all agree that we pretty much hit the jackpot with this loft on the North Shore.  It was the perfect amount of space for us four in such a prime location. We took full advantage of the proximity to V land & Teds Bakery.  The entire community of the North Shore is so welcoming and totally chill vibes; we instantly felt like home and there is no doubt we will be returning and staying at Rainey's again very very soon.  Mahalo!

Great location on the North shore.  Be sure to use the beach and to visit Ted's.  Cozy place with all the gear you'll need.  

Narrow staircase to the sleeping loft for those with big luggage or physical limitations.  Rainey is very responsive and great.

We arrived late at night to Rainey's abode, but her directions were great and got us there just fine. Rainey communicated very well and we had no questions, she was proactive in letting us know everything we needed to. We honestly did not spend much time at the house because we were off adventuring during the day, but it was always nice to come "home" to this cozy place. She even left a bow of local fruit on the door step when we got back from the beach. As for cooking, there were plenty of utensils/plates/pots/pans for us to use AND she even had basic condiments in the fridge, which I thought was grand. We ended up leaving a bottle of champagne in the fridge because we ran out of time to drink it haha, so whoever was after us I hope you enjoyed it! Thanks for the place, Rainey.

Our stay here was wonderful, it really is in a wonderful location. Rainey keeps a clean home that's well stocked with the things you'll need on your trip. Communication with her was incredibly fast and her recommendations were spot on. I hope to return to the north shore someday and stay here again.

Our stay at the loft was amazing! Less than a 5 minute walk to the beach and close driving distance to a grocery store and the incredible Ted's Bakery. You absolutely need to stop there for breakfast! I can't say enough positive things about the loft! Rainey was such a great host and it was exactly how it was portrayed in the photos. From the loft bedroom, there's an ocean view. Thanks, Rainey!

Rainey's beach house was a great place to stay and was surprisingly able to accommodate 6 people (although there are only individual beds for 5). The beach across the street is quite nice and not crowded at all, Banzai pipeline is just down the road and there are several places to eat by the Food Land north of Waimea bay, I highly recommend the thai food at the Elephant Truck! Would definitely recommend this house for someone looking for a place to stay on the North Shore for a few nights.

Rainey is a great host, very responsive, very helpful and made herself available for anything we needed. The place was very quiet, comfortable and had what we needed. It was loa relaxing street, with walking access to the beach, maybe a 5-10min walk. You'll probably want a car if you stay here so you can get around the island. Although you *can* get by without there is very little to eat or do nearby other than walk down to one of the local beaches. My only *very minor* gripe is that the description somehow gave me the impression that this place was right on the beach, and that you could sit and watch the waves from the balcony. This isn't the case as the house is set and the end of a street a couple of blocks from the beach. Otherwise everything was great!

We had a great time at this place. We were right across from the water, in walking distance to Ted's, and away from all the tourists. We loved sleeping with the windows open with the beautiful north shore breezes and the sound of the birds in the morning. Rainey was so quiet that we never knew she was there. The bed was comfortable and the rooms are all well equipped with fans, making it all very comfortable.
Rainey was awesome, and the loft is adorable, homey, and right near the beach!  Couldn't have asked for more.

What a great way to spend out vacation! We had everything we could possible need and want at this condo! We were steps from the beach and had all the amenities we could want and need! I will definitely be coming back to stay at Rainey's place when I come back to Hawaii!

Perfect Location whilst staying in North Shore, beautiful beach less than 5min walk. Would recommend having a car during your stay here.
The loft was very clean has everything you would need for an enjoyable stay. Beds were very comfortable. Would definitely stay here again.

We spent a couple of days at the north shore. It was very beautiful! We really enjoyed our stay at Rainey's. The flat was very comfortable and had everything we needed. The nearby beach is very beautiful.

My partner had a great time staying at Rainey's place. We were only there for 2 nights but it was perfect for what we needed. Rainey was very helpful and gave us good tips and places to eat. We loved North Shore and would go back in a heart beat. Rainey's place was in a great location as well being central to lots of things.
Rainey was great at communicating, made check in and check out easy. The apartment was comfortable and exactly as described. Loved that we could walk to the beach! Great location!

Raineys loft was perfect for our week long stay on the North Shore. It's clean, tidy and in an amazing location with so many beaches nearby. It was so easy to pop back to the house and so relaxing to hang out and enjoy the quiet neighborhood. Thanks again for everything Rainey, we'll definitely be back

Cheers!
Max & Sanya

Rainey's loft was in the perfect location.
We loved staying there, it was very clean and comfortable.
Our kids loved it more than staying in a hotel in Waikiki!
It's the best place to stay if you want to relax and enjoy North Shore.

Satoshi

Hello Rainey,

We loved our trip to North Shore. The location was ideal for us and gave us an opportunity to live like the locals. Great access to the beach and Turtle Bay. Although we never met, you were very responsive to our needs. Thanks for the care package of fruits and Macadamia Nuts. btw...The laughing lady across the street was hilarious!

After our previous Airbnb experience, in a beautiful home in Nuuanu Valley, Rainey's place felt like something of a disappointment, initially. Here, you are clearly paying for location and not for the quality of the home itself, which is a very modest 70s/80s-era structure. That said, the place was true to its locale and, after realizing how close it was to walk to Ted's Bakery and Sunset Beach, we enjoyed our stay. We definitely prefer to be closer to windward side / Kahuku so, again, location is good. The beach photo in the ad is a bit misleading though - this home is not on the beach - but is a relatively short walk away down the street, across Kam Hwy, and through a public access lane. So, while not luxurious, it's a clean, relaxing place, near some of the most beautiful beaches on Oahu, and close to good food at Ted's (and the fabulous Brazilian food truck down the road AND Fiji market in Kahuku).

Perfect place in North Shore! We walked to the beach, ate awesome food at near by Ted's Bakery, snorkeled at our favorite Shark's Cove and our highlight, swam with turtles at Waimea Bay! Thanks for the tips and convenient location!!
Very good access to popular spots in Northshore.  Clean!

It's all about location here... Within walking distance to Sunset Beach, Ted's Bakery etc., Rainey's place is exactly as shown in the pictures, clean enough and in a nice local neighbourhood. Small balcony overlooking the neighborhood, but you can spot the ocean from the upper bedroom. (Watch your head when coming up there at night ;) ). We needed all of the fans as it was REALLY hot in September. We didn't meet Rainey in person but she was helpful via Email. Thanks a lot!
Cute little place. Less than a 10 minute walk to Velzyland beach. No real ocean views from the house. It was rather warm and night and we needed all the fans on. Good price for what you get.

We enjoyed a nice relaxing stay on the North Shore.  Rainey was an excellent and very accommodating host.  Planning our trip and coordinating with Rainey was very easy and her responses were very timely.  Checkin and checkout was simple and went smoothly.

The home was clean, comfortable and in a great location and was as shown in the listing pictures.  The beds in the loft were comfortable with views of the ocean down the street.  The small deck allowed for a nice place to relax and chill after hot days on the great north shore beaches. A nice small kitchen and onsite waher and dryer made it very convenient .

A short walk to the beautiful Velzy Land beach, we stayed on week days and enjoyed a nearly private beach experience.  A short  walk to Ted's bakery where we enjoyed nice local plate lunch meals and fabulous pies especially liked those Macadamia nutcream pies.  Short drives to the fabulous North shore beaches : sunset, pupukea, Waimea Bay and the turtle bay resort and Kahuku shrimp trucks makes it a perfect spot for a north shore getaway.

The host did a few things made my family felt welcomed, a welcome email with detailed directions, a guest book with detailed instructions about daily activities, the loft was kept neat with everything we may possibly need, even a cute fruit basket filled with sweet-smelling pineapple and ripe bananas. The descriptions of this loft and it's neighborhood are accurate. We enjoyed our time here, would recommend to friends.

Great place to stay.  Our host made us feel very warmly welcomed.  Loved the location on the North Shore.  Short walk to the beach and short drive to all the other popular beaches and activities.  The neighborhood was very quiet and felt safe to be walking around day or night.  We often took evening strolls to the beach to listen to the waves and stargaze away from the street lights.  We were impressed with the welcoming basket of goodies.  The space was well set up.  It was everything as advertised.

The host made us felt welcomed with a welcome email with detailed directions, a guest book with detailed instructions about daily activities, as well as various guide books about Oahu.

Loft was kept neat with everything we may possibly need. We even got complimentary nuts and cookies, which we demolished in no time. The loft's descriptions and it's neighborhood are accurate. We enjoyed our time here, really felt like home, away from home.
Loved the neighborhood!  Very peaceful, quiet and family oriented...Neighbors are friendly with waving and very courteous as you come in and out the court.

The experience was great. 

Rainey greeted us as soon as we arrived. It was reassuring knowing that she was closeby, while also having the privacy of a separate unit. 

The unit is cozy and has all the means to make ourselves feel at home during the stay. 

The location is not as secluded as we had hoped it would be, but being so close to the popular north shore, we could only say it's a miscalculation on our part.
Rainey was super accommodating on such short notice. Made the trip seamless and pleasant. On top of that it's really an adorable place in a perfect location.

Trank you for sharing his beautiful Place with us. The loft everything we needed and more. We really enjoyed the stay here. We loved the birds in the morning (but not the cocks :-) ). It was perfect.
The beaches were naer and the neighborhood friendly.
Thank you Rainey for these nice days.

This was our second time staying at Rainey's loft and we came back to it for a reason! Its a great location and depicts the simplicity of the North Shore lifestyle!  Rainey and her family were close by and available if you need them but they also give you the space and privacy you need! Its safe to say my friends and I like to "make ourselves at home" a little too much =) . Mahalo Rainey!

The North Shore Loft was exactly as described.  Rainey left special touches for us like crackers and jam from Ted's Bakery, fruit, and macadamia nuts.  There were Christmas lights on the circular stairway to the loft.  Shampoo and conditioner in the shower with lots of other little extras.  The stairway can be a little daunting in the dark but there were plenty of night lights to make it comfortable.  Since we were there only one night and the weather was a bit stormy, we weren't able to use the beach equipment available to us.  Next time!  Overall, we had a lovely stay.

Rainey made everything wonderful for our Christmas Eve and Christmas Day celebration with our daughter. Everything is carefully thought out to make one have a carefree vacation. Although our time was short and we didn't have enough time to do all the many activities close by, there was snorkel equipment, beach chairs, beach towels, etc. All anyone needs is a bathing suit! The house was more than comfortable with nice furnishings and there is a spectacular beach a short walk away. 
Thank you, Rainey.
Lynn Max

It is hard for us to make a review of this place, since it has all to be perfect, yet it is not. Location wise is fantastic, steps away from a beautiful beach, quiet area, easy access. However, the loft itself is not in the greatest conditions, cleanness was very poor and yes it does have beach towels, snorkeling equipment and some nice books to read. We barely saw the owner, in fact the only time I saw her was when my husband insisted on going to knock her door to greet her after being there already 2 days. Nevertheless, she was very kind to us by allowing us a late check-out when my husband requested it.

My husband and I arrived late at night, so Rainey could not be there, but she gave us precise instructions on how to get to the place, and how to find the keys. The place was ready for us when we arrived, and she had left an impressive list of notes on how to find our way around the house, the neighbourhood and beyond.
The place is quite impressive, it is a very roomy loft with a direct view on the waves (from the upper level). It is about 100m from the beach, in a very quiet and safe area.
We were mostly here for the sea and the waves, and this place turned out to be perfect for us. There is no better motivation to get up in the morning than to hear/see the crashing waves in the distance (it has been difficult to sleep without them since we came back home). It could easily accommodate 6 persons, although we wouldn't recommend it for more than 4 if privacy is an issue (it is a loft after all).
Rainey was a very nice and thoughtful host. We are a young couple, so she respected our privacy, yet she made herself available when we asked to meet her to thank her in person.
We would definitely recommend the North Shore Loft for a visit to one of (if not THE) most impressive surf spot on the planet!

The North shore loft was an excellent choice for our family's first vacation.  It's located away from the hustle and bustle of busy Waikiki with a beautiful beach just a short walk away.  We loved the location.  
The loft was equipped with enough stuff for us to feel comfortable there.  We were able to wake up, make some coffee and breakfast and plan our day instead of getting up and going to find a good place to eat.  That was helpful since we have little ones.  
Being from Alaska, we don't have to worry about bugs too much so I was nervous about being in a tropical climate. We were very pleased that we didn't have to deal with bugs in the loft either. 
Overall, we had a great time and enjoyed having our own little space in Oahu.  Thank you Rainey!!

The loft made for a wonderful North Shore stay.  It's a fantastic location from which to walk to stunning Sunset Beach and/or to watch the surfers at Banzai Pipeline, and the neighborhood is quiet.  The unit itself is nice and comfortably furnished (of the two beds upstairs, one is on the softer side and one on the firmer, which we found very comfortable).  Rainey was great to deal with - wrote back to all communications right away and had everything set up nicely.  We hope to get back ourselves and recommend it most highly to others looking for a base from which to explore the beautiful North Shore.

Rainey made our short notice stay absolutely easy. Her loft home was exactly as described and very comfortable for us . It was located conveintly within short rides of everything you want to do on the north shore. Thank you Rainey for wonderful weekend.

Our stay was perfect. We recommend Rainey as a host and apartment as a perfect stay for a people who want expirience calm at Oahu. Few steps to the beach and amazing view on the waves. Close to every place on the island. 

It was an amazing holiday, we surely want to do it again

We enjoyed our week at the North Shore Loft--the space was clean, the neighborhood was very quiet, there is a dedicated parking spot, and there are some items in the bathroom and kitchen just in case you forgot anything.  I really appreciated that coffee and filters were there!  The only drawback was that I had trouble opening the lockbox when I arrived, but to be fair, I was exhausted and it was dark, so that might have been pilot error.  Being able to walk across the street to the beach was amazing as was being able to see the waves from bed.

We ran into Rainey as we were pulling up to the house. She helped us settle in and gave us a few tips about the area.  The house is pretty centrally located (in north shore terms) and it was really easy to get around.  The local food trucks are great and the beaches are super nice and super close.  Ted's Bakery is a must (5 min walk).
The house was really clean and comfortable, it had a ton of extra stuff we didn't even have time to play with. This was the tail end of our trip and really put the icing on the cake.

Great times, great place.

Rainey's lovely loft on the north shore is a short walk from an awesome surfing beach located in paradise....i mean O'ahu. Just up the street from the world famous Waimea bay, the vibe here is mellow, and very family friendly. The upstairs loft bed area was a lot of fun for our two young boys, and the spiral staircase was a highlight for my little one. There is a great kitchen, ample supplies if you want to cook or grill, and a really peaceful porch where a sunset drink is de rigueur.....pardon mon Français...
For the kids, there are boogie boards available, and a nice outdoor shower to rinse off the sand before you come in. Check in and check out were very easy, and Rainey was extremely helpful and responsive to all our needs. I woke up early in the morning, to the sound of roosters crowing, and took a nice walk out to greet the day and watch the surfers. We only stayed here for one night, but we think we found a new destination on the north shore for when our boys are bigger and better surfers. Life is good here, I'd recommend Rainey's place to anyone who loves the ocean and is seeking a wonderful place to stay on the north shore.

We arrived at the property on Sunday evening and it was exactly as described - even more so when we realized how close we were to the beach and the size of the home. It's perfect for two folks. After spending the weekend in Waikiki bunking down in Rainey's home was a total God-shot for us. you never really know what you are going to get but this place is a pleasant surprise!

We arrived after dusk, but Rainey's instructions made finding the place and settling in simple and easy. Having a parking spot right next to the studio was a blessing as parking in the area appeared limited. The house was clean and came equipped with everything needed for three days at the beach (towels, sun umbrella, bodyboards, snorkels and even flip-flops!). We loved having full access to a washer/dryer and the gas BBQ. The beach is two minutes walk away, offering gorgeous sand and surf for both beginners and experienced swimmers alike. The apartment works perfectly for those on a surf safari or for a family looking to enjoy the beaches on the North Shore, we being the latter. We enjoyed a take out meal from Ted's one night, but be careful walking the busy road to the bakery at night. A great place to stay, with access to Waikiki Beach (sixty minute drive) if you want it.

Great place, great location and great communication from Rainey. I would definitely recommend staying here and would return if I was to come back to the north shore. For a group of four girls, Rainey's place was perfect. The extra touches like fresh fruit, towels and cooking utensils/ingredients were a lovely and very handy extra which I didn't expect. Thanks for the stay Rainey - We loved it!

Rainey's place was not only cute and cozy, but it also came equipped with beach towels, fins, and snorkeling gear. Our group had a few extra people, and Rainey was considerate enough to provide extra towels and bedding for us. Thanks for making our stay extremely comfortable, Rainey!
AMAZING LOCATION. LOVELY PLACE. GREAT STAY.

Basic accommodation for exploring the North Shore. 
Pros:
-Location 
-availability of washer/dryer
-LOTS of fans! (needed w/ no A/C)

Areas for improvement:
-large, sharp palm frond blocking access gate to the washer/dryer
-dryer lint trap clogged with sand
-more pillows for the upstairs beds
Rainey was a lovely host, and her place is a wonderful base for exploring the North Shore.

Great place to stay with a location not to be beaten. Short walk to a beautiful semi private beach. Very clean and beds were comfortable. It is not for people with mobility issues. There is a spiral staircase to the beds upstairs and stairs to climb to get into the place. But very roomy and cool breezes at night. Just minutes from everything on the North shore.
Great
Excelente departamento, muy bien equipado, y comodo!! Muchas Gracias!
Amazing location, great listing and had everything we needed! Having the extra snorkel equipment was great. A+ Listing, and great value!
Awesome location. Perfect for a multitude of ocean activities.

We had a great time on the North Shore, great location close to the beach, local attractions and a plethora of amazing street food venues.
Rainey was quick to reply to all queries we had prior to travelling and importantly happy to give us some space once we landed on her door.  Overall a great experience

The north shore loft was AMAZING! This place was perfect for our trip. It's close to all the beautiful beaches North Shore has to offer. It is also great because it's situated away from the hustle and crowds of Waikiki. The loft is just as Rainey describes and she is also kind enough to give you a binder with all the wonderful things you can do while you're there. It was also great to have the extra beach gear which included beach chairs, snorkeling and body boards! I will definitely be back and stay here! The over all experience was great for my family. We WILL be back!!!! ❤️

The Loft was absolutely perfect. The location is fantastic and the extra beach gear that Rainey provides is great. Rainey also has a binder that lists all the things to do in the area and even provides restaurant menus. On a personal level, Rainey is wonderful. She is nice and very accommodating. In all, The Loft was a perfect vacation spot!

We had a good time ~
Beachs are very close! Especially sunset beach!!!!! 
Thank you Rainy!!

We had a great time at Raineys place. It was clean, cute and very central to everything. The neighborhood is really nice -- neighbors lovely and Rainey and her daughter are really great. 

The only difficulty is that my husband is very tall so he ended up hitting his head on the stairs in more than one occasion.

La casa está ubicada, desde mi punto de vista, en el mejor lugar de la isla: la costa norte. De hecho, está a muy pocos pasos de uno de los accesos de Sunset Beach. 

Por otra parte, Rainey se ha preocupado de que esté completamente acondicionada y equipada con todo lo necesario para disfrutar de una estadía, sin mayores preocupaciones. Si bien, pensé que la escalera a las camas del segundo piso podría ser un problema (estoy embarazada, lo que supone muchas ideas al baño durante la noche), no lo fue. Pero lo consideraría un pequeño detalle si alguien tiene algún inconveniente de movilidad o anda con niños muy pequeños que puedan "arrancarse" cuando uno está dormido.

Más allá de lo anterior, quedamos muy contentos y agradecidos con su hospitalidad y espacio. Sin duda volveríamos a allí.
Great location and very comfortable place!

Rainey's loft was the PERFECT way for us to start our honeymoon. We wanted quiet, peaceful, and relaxation, and that was exactly what we got. Everything Rainey described about her home was accurate and even better than we imagined. The walk to the beach was short, and it was amazing being on such a beautiful beach with no more than 5 people on it at a time. It was paradise. There were also other beautiful beaches a short drive away with more people, but we loved being so close to such a feeling of a "private paradise." Rainey's house was also a short drive to the infamous food trucks, Food Land, the Coffee Bean, and about a 20 minute drive to downtown Haleiwa. Renting a car is definitely a necessity, but we did walk to Ted's Bakery many times and walked to the food trucks (about 3 miles) when we wanted a little more exercise. Rainey's house is also right by the bike path (about 4 miles long) which made for beautiful morning runs. Rainey provided everything we needed - beach chairs, towels, cooking utensils. She was also an amazing host as she gave us our space, but responded quickly to texts when needed! This was a great spot in a beautiful location, and we would go back in a heart beat.

Listing was very accurate. The loft was clean and very cute as the pictures indicate. Location was ideal, close to many beaches (walking distance to Sunset beach) and food trucks. Host was very easy to communicate with and left detailed instructions/helpful hints about various items. The one drawback is that there is no air conditioning and the August heat was quite stifling, even with the multiple fans provided and the windows open.

Thank you Rainey for sharing your loft with us.  We had the most AMAZING time.  The loft was cute, cozy, warm and clean.  The descriptions were exactly as listed.  Being able to use the BBQ and washer/dryer was a super++++++.  

We would loved the place and it was convenient to everything!!!
The place was awesome. The beach was a short walk.  The unit was privite. The WiFi was not working but other than that it was perfect.

Best thing was that Rainey texted us to let us know the place was ready early. That helped so much as we were navigating two children across the island and trying to figure out where we would be in the middle of the day. 

The place made all the North Shore sites accessible and provided necessities. It was hot when we were there but Rainey provided many good fans and the place catches the breezes nicely. 

There are a few quirks. The screens don't all fit perfectly and rain comes in the side windows so you have to leave them closed. We used some duct tape to close up the obvious holes and then had no problems. 

As someone mentioned, the sleeping area has a low ceiling and even lower beam running the length of it. Didn't bother me but it makes the space just for sleeping, not hanging out. 

Loved that there was a gang of about ten children that gathered in the evening in the cul de sac and played.

Sandy's sandwiches (the little green truck nearby) is sometimes not there on Sundays, in case you're looking. 

With young children you won't likely use the beach that you can walk to (V land?). We drove the few minutes to Waimaea and Sunset for wonderful beach days. We had a lovely stay.

Rainey's place was awesome. Great location, right near sunset beach! The loft was clean and ready for us when we arrived. The place was awesome, would recommend to any friends and would definitely return next time I'm on the north shore.

Thanks for sharing your loft , great accommodation exactly as described on the website. Very close to the beach... We had visited the north shore before so knew we had to cross the highway to get to the beach, which was deserted most days. Great communication from Rainey, it was the first time I had used the airbnb site so was a little nervous. Was also nice to meet you Rainey Thankyou for responding to my many emails. Mahalo

I wish we could have stayed at this very homey place for longer than we did. We got in late in the evening on Friday, and had to be out the next morning. Rainey graciously offered us a late checkout without us even asking for it, and had plenty of information to give us both in direct messages, as well as a binder full of information waiting for us when we got there. The apartment is in a great neighborhood close to a lot of great beach/surf spots. I'll definitely look out for her listing next time I'm in the area.

Rainey's loft was great. Exactly what I was looking for during my short stay on the North shore. It was very close to Turtle Bay Resort and about a 10-15 min drive in to Haleiwa which is where we spent most of our time. The room was clean and nice and although the spiral staircase was a bit steep, overall the location was great.

Fantastic place for an easy getaway! We loved the laid-back feel of the North Shore. Rainey's place is in a great location - right across the street from the beach, 15 minutes to Haleiwa or Turtle Bay! Everything was comfortable and set up well, and Rainey's communication with us was impeccable - friendly and thorough. We hope to be back!

We loved every minute of our trip to the North Shore of Oahu. It was an easy drive from Honolulu, and a world away from Waikiki. Raineys loft was perfect, and only quick walk to the most beautiful beach! Thanks for having us to stay.
Raineys loft is a great place to stay on the North Shore. The loft was comfortable and clean, a nice quiet location with a short walk to a beautiful beach.

great location! great host!

easy access to the turtle bay beach.

love to stay again.

It was great staying at this place on the North Shore. Felt like we were living like the locals, totally laid back and relaxed. The place is well stocked with all the cooking gear you need. We enjoyed making breakfast and sitting on the front lanai. Lots of beach gear (boogie boards, towels, umbrella, buckets for sandcastles and more). Lots of windows let the wind through along with the lovely sound of the ocean overnight and then the local chicken population in the morning. Make sure you duck at the top of the spiral staircase it's a loft up there for sleeping. Great access to lots of North Shore and around to the east locations. Would stay here again.
Had a wonderful stay. Room was nice and clean. Upstairs area had low ceilings. However, overall  happy with the place. Location was very good.

Wir haben zwei Wochen bei Rainey verbracht und können diese Unterkunft weiterempfehlen. Die Unterkunft war sauber. Die Küche war gut ausgestattet. Die Betten / Matratzen waren von hoher Qualität, 1+!
