Waschmaschine und Trockner waren sehr von Vorteil und jederzeit frei zugänglich. Die Außendusche ist ebenfalls sehr praktisch und vor allem notwendig, der hawaiianische Sand klebt immens. Rainey stellte viele Handtücher und Strandtücher zur Verfügung. Ebenso stellte sie z.B. Strandstühle, Boogie Boards, Schnorchelausrüstung, etc. zur Verfügung. Der Strand (baden, surfen) ist in drei Minuten zu Fuß erreicht. Wir fühlten uns sehr sicher in dem Haus. Die Nachbarschaft gibt typische Geräusche (Hunde, spielende Kinder, Gartenarbeiten, Müllabfuhr, etc.) her. Für uns war es fremd, dass auch am Wochenende laute Geräusche wie flexen, sägen, etc. normal sind. Nicht gefallen haben uns der Aufgang und der Balkon. Der Balkon sieht nicht mehr wie auf dem Foto aus. Er war sehr dreckig (spackig), die Boogie Boards, Strandstühle etc. nicht aufgeräumt, sondern ein Wirrwarr aus Sachen. Ein zerbrochener Stuhl nahm dort ebenfalls Platz weg. Die Treppe und der Balkon waren extrem rutschig, wenn es nass war! Keine Gummimatten oder Stopper, auch nicht auf den Stufen, das war fast schon gefährlich (die Gummimatte, die auf dem Foto zu sehen ist, gab es nicht (mehr?)). Man muss beachten, dass der Balkon bei Regen nicht benutzbar ist, da er kein Dach hat. Nach dem Regen dauerte es, bis die Bambus-Stühle trocken waren.
We loved this space it was so great the loft was perfect  and so so close to pipe line and sunset .
We had a fantastic stay at the loft. Two minute walk to a beautiful beach across the road and everything you could possibly need in the loft. Rainey was a great host.

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Rainey's loft on the North Shore. She really went the extra mile, providing beach and scuba gear for us to use. Within walking distance to beaches and only a short drive to Turtle Bay.

The loft was exactly as described. It was a great location along the North Shore and was just a few minutes walk away from a gorgeous beach. Rainey was very responsive and was a great host. Couldn't have been easier. Would love to come back!!
We had a great stay at Raineys place. It is a nice house perfect situated near the lovely Sunset beach.

Rainey's place was in a great location, just across the street from Sunset Beach and about a 15 minute drive to Haleiwa.  Grocery store just down the street, and walking distance to Ted's Bakery (go there!!!)  The loft was very nice, and Rainey was very helpful and responded quickly to my questions.  The lanai was pretty unkempt, and that would probably be my only gripe.  Pretty minor considering what nice little place it was otherwise.  All in all my girlfriend and I had a great stay at Rainey's loft.  Thank you, Rainey, for your hospitality!

We loved the proximity to Velzyland Beach!
I was disappointed in the accuracy of the description of the loft for a number of reasons. See below.

Rainey had everything we needed and allowed our family a great North Shore Experience. You are truly next to everything you will want to see, including all the beaches, shrimp trucks, turtle bay, and country feel the north shore has to offer. I cannot speak highly enough of Rainey and the ease at which it was to communicate and enjoy our stay. One of the best Airbnb experiences I've had.
This is a very relaxing place. It is really nice to be within walking distance to food and the beach. Would definitely stay here again.

I would recommend the North Shore Loft to anyone looking to stay in the heart of the North Shore. It was an amazing time for my family and I and we were definitely sad to leave. The Loft is a perfect place for a family and is very comfortable.

Rainey's house was beautiful and cozy. There were kitchen and living room at the 1st floor and a spiral staircase led us to the 2nd floor with 2 large beds. The kitchen was equipped with most cooking utensils and spices which made our home cooking very convenient. My family and I had a great time there. Thank you!

Rainey's loft is perfectly located on the north shore and really nicely done. My 2 girlfriends and I couldn't have asked for a better setup with the pullout couch and 2 beds, kitchen area, and beach within walking distance.

Perfect location! Clean, walk to beach across street, and plenty of room. Didn't get a chance to meet our host but she was very helpful with check in. We were super busy doing stuff. Perfect ocean breeze and nice place to relax after a fun day. I'm 6'2" and the loft is shorter so if your tall just watch your head when going to sleep but it's no issue. Great place and comfy bed! Plenty of pots pans plates and silverware.

Fantastic! Rainey went out of her way to provide everything we might need, from fresh towels to snorkeling equipment to cooking supplies and a coffee maker! She even included a very helpful list of local sites to see. The apartment was clean and spacious. We had a great time, and hopefully will be back :)

Rainey was a great host! We had some last minute changes and she let us check in early on the day of. Very responsive with texts, and provided recommendations for getting around the neighborhood. The North Shore was/is my favorite area in Oahu - so lush and green and the people are so friendly. The Airbnb itself was well-stocked (though 4 girls went through TP pretty quickly :P ) Overall a great experience!

The home was spacious and comfortable four two, easily could have had a few more too.  There is a large living area and a full kitchen with everything you could need.  Wifi connection was good.  We loved hanging out on the lanai.  The beach gear that comes with the place is great as well.  The only small complaints I had were the low ceilings in the loft (we bumped our heads a few times) and no closets.

The location was ideal and walk-able to two Velzy and Sunset beaches and a very easy drive to Turtle Bay, Pipeline, Waimea, Halewia or any of the other North Shore destinations.  It's very nice that the house comes with parking as well.  Be careful pulling in and out of the spot so as not to bottom out.

Rainey was friendly when we briefly met her and otherwise had great communication.  Check-in was super easy.  I would highly recommend this house as an affordable option on the North Shore.

Staying at Rainey's loft was an awesome experience! I was there with my 2 friends for our last two nights in Oahu. It was the perfect place to relax and really take in the beautiful ocean views before heading home. The area is quiet and safe. I was able to walk to Velzyland beach at the break of dawn on a Sunday morning and it was a quick 5 minute walk! The bathroom was clean and the kitchen was well stocked (we were stoked to see that there were wine glasses, a coffee maker, and a toaster!). The beds upstairs were soft and comfy. The only thing that my friends had a slight problem with was that the wiFi was a bit spotty at times, but I never seemed to have a problem. We did not see Rainey during our stay, but she was very accommodating and was responsive to our questions. Highly recommend staying at this North Shore loft. Can't wait to come back!

La hemos pasado genial en la casa de Rainey. La ubicación es inmejorable, a una cuadra de un acceso a la playa. Desde esa playa y caminando unos metros se puede ver el mejor atardecer de Hawaii. La casa es genial. Muy completa, tiene hasta artículos de playa. Lo único que hay que llevar es algo de ropa y ya. La casa es amplia y cómoda.
Rainey fue siempre amable, desde antes de alojarnos hasta su saludo posterior. Además de envirte indicaciones clarísimas sobre la llegada y acceso a la casa. Incluso fue comprensiva con nosotros. Recomendable sin dudas. Y si lo que buscas es una casa para surf, esta es la opción sin dudas. Gracias Rainey!

It's an excellent location, across street we are on sunset beach. Watched the most beautiful sunset right there. The host has everything a family needs for couple days stay. We wish we could stay longer. Would definitely recommend to others. Not far drive to Polynesian culture center, dole plantation and Kualoa ranch. Thanks

This was our first trip to Hawaii and it's was absolutely awesome! We didn't get to meet Rainey but the loft was beautiful and everything was in order and perfectly clean when we arrived. We had a wonderful time!  We will be contacting Rainey in our next visit for sure!

Nice place, it has everything you need, and more, all in a fantastic cul-de-sac location! Minutes walk from Sunset beach, which as you would expect, is a great place to watch the sun sink below the horizon. A few more minutes walk and you are at Ted's bakery for all your breakfast/lunch and snack needs. the pineapple and coconut turnover is delicious!

Great location to appreciate the stunning (!!!) north shore beaches.  It's walking distance from Ted's bakery (those pies, deceptively simple but so more-ish and the BBQ chicken and steak sandwiches are quite nice too), not to mention the gorgeous Sunset beach. Raineys place is lovely,  airy (especially when you open all the windows to get the breeze) so didn't need the fan at night), filled with light, and contains everything you need for a holiday stay.  Just remember to watch your head in the loft,  as well take care when you climb the little,  windy metal stairs leading up there.  Otherwise,  a relaxing place for a getaway.  Definitely recommend to others

Great location on the north shore and a great place to stay. Rainey's place had everything one would need to feel at home. Location is walking distance to the beach. I will stay again when I return to Oahu.
We stayed at that place for the second time and we were again totally happy with it. We highly recommend this place.

What a great location! Just minutes away from beautiful beaches and delicious food. The place was equipped with everything we needed and it was nice to come home to at the end of a long adventurous day. Thanks Rainey for a lovely place for us to stay at for our first time to Hawaii north shore :)
Rainey's loft was amazing! We loved our stay here! It's very clean, well located and close to a lot of beautiful beaches. We highly recommend and would definitely stay here again! :)

We loved the loft.  It was really well equipped and very clean when we arrived. Although not air conditioned, it wasn't need as there is a beautiful breeze.  Rainey always answered queries when I sent them.  The only other thing that might makes things a little easier for those without a car is perhaps some info on the local bus - a timetable if possible. If you intend walking to Foodland to shop it takes about an hour, so would recommend if you are not a walker to catch the bus or hire a pushbikes.  Very close to beautiful beaches. Beds were very comfortable. Thanks Rainey!

Thank you for welcoming us.  The directions and helpful hints about the area were very much appreciated.  We felt safe, the loft was clean, we enjoyed the beach down the street, and had everything we needed.  Thank you for a wonderful stay.

Wir haben 1 Woche in dem Haus verbracht. Und alles war Top. Das Haus war sauber und genau wie beschrieben (kleiner Nachteil die Deckenhöhe der oberen Etage ist sehr niedrig). Kann ich nur weiter empfehlen.  Kommen gerne wieder.

Although we didn't meet them in person, Rainey and her husband were very sweet and accommodating. Rainey wasn't even in the state and she was texting me occasionally to make sure our stay was comfortable and fun. When we had a slight issue with the shower, Rainey had her husband contact me to figure out a good time for him to come fix it, which he did, and it was fixed by the time we got back to the house that afternoon. The location was also primer, seeing that turtle bay was a short drive away, and Ted's bakery was also so close! Overall we had a very positive experience and are thankful to Rainey and Hector for opening their home to us.

Great place!! We didn't get to meet Rainey but everything was perfectly arranged for us. The house is spacious, bright, and well equiped. Located in a nice and calm neighbourhood 3minutes walk from the beach. We really enjoyed our days there.

This seems like a great home base for visitors looking to spend their time at the North Shore doing outdoor activities. There's only one major road in and out in either direction, so expect traffic. Fortunately, there's plenty to do nearby, including snorkeling, rock jumping, surfing, and of course, swimming. The food options are of the truck and shack variety, but that can be charming. The loft itself is modest, but simple things like separate rooms and a w/d combo were much appreciated. There's no A/C, as the listing indicates, but all you have to do is open the windows and let the sea breeze take care of things.

The neighborhood was very much local, ending in a cul-de-sac with neighbors in their yards and on their porches each evening. The vistas were gorgeous - the brightest rainbow I've ever seen greeted us on our final morning.

Thanks Rainey for letting us stay at your beach house! It had everything we needed plus more :) The place was just as described, clean and in such a good location - we would not hesitate to stay there again or recommend it to others!
Thanks again Rainey, we were sad to leave!

Petit loft bien sympatique qui offre assez d'espace pour une petite famille. Il est bien situé et on accède facilement à une plage ( on y est pratiquement seul !). On y a même vu des tortues. Les foodtrucks et l'épicerie sont à proximité en voiture. Le quartier est tranquille. Je sentais bien que Rainey serait disponible pour toutes demandes (elle a d'ailleurs pris la peine de nous écrire alors qu'on annonçait des orages). Nous avons aussi bien dormi malgré le fait qu'il n'y avait pas de AC, les ventilateurs font le travail ! Mon fils a bien aimé l'armoire de jeux et de livres.

Rainey's place was just as described. It's perfect for 4 but definitely possible to accommodate 6 if you don't mind a pull out couch. Although you aren't right on the beach, it is a quick walk! Because the unit has no air conditioning we appreciated all the fans available which made the temperature very comfortable. Definitely a great value for the location.

It was nice staying at Rainey's. The listing was spot on, the place was clean and bright, and we had an excellent time even though we only stayed a night. The open floorplan and loft is great for hanging out with friends.

Everything sent prior to arrival was on point. The pictures match the house beautifully. If you're looking for a spot away from the touristy life of Waikiki, you should consider Rainey's place. They are hospitable and accommodating.
Great directions. Perfect location on laid back north shore. Easy walk to beautiful beach. Lovely!

Rainey's home was nestled in cute street on the North Shore of Oahu. It was a quick walk down to beautiful Sunset Beach and an easy drive to North Shore hotspots such as Waimea Bay and Haleiwa. We absolutely loved our time at Rainey's place and would recommend it to anyone seeking a relaxing Hawaiian getaway!
Rainy's place was a lovely, large and clean space. Walking distance to a gorgeous and quiet beach.
Excellent location ! Right by v land and sunset . We will come back !
What a great location. The ease to get to everywhere on the north shore was incredible.  Rainey was a great host and everything was great. We loved the loft experience and recommend it to everyone.

Rainey's magical loft was exactly as described, except no one mentioned that you will sleep so sound there! The windows just above the beds were so wonderful, the ocean sounds, and birds were Beautiful! Rainey was so easy to communicate with and made us feel very welcome. The location was perfection, your close to everything! We will definitely be back!

This place is a cozy loft in close distance to beaches, hikes and good food spots. Rainey also generously gave us an extra night because our flight had been delayed! I would definitely stay here again next time I'm back in the north shore.

Hi Rainey,how are you? Thanks you so much for letting us stay in your beautiful house. We had an awesome time. The house is perfect and very confortable. Location is the best in the north shore. The house has everything you need to have a great time and its just round the corner from the bakery!!! yum yum!!!.
The house is fully equipped with everything you need for cooking or for the beach. Towels, snorkelling masks, kids toys, etc, etc.!
We would love to come back again. 
Thank you very much again and hope to see you again some time in the future.
Bye bYe!!
Regards
Gonzalo and Marisa

Rainey' pad was exactly what we were looking for. The location was perfect, Right in the center of everything you need in the North Shore.
Rainey's place was clean and having 2 floors gave us a lot of space.We would   
 stay there again in a heartbeat.
  Thank you Rainey!!!!

Rainey's place was great! It was as described and we had no issues other than spotty wifi which she took care of. Close to a great beach and other North Shore attractions.  Would definitely recommend a stay here!
We had a great stay at Rainey's place. All you need is there, clean and good communication with Rainey. Walking distance to the V-land and Sunset beach.
편하고 넓고 깨끗하고 조용하고 안락하고 너무 좋은 숙소 입니다 강추
A great stay with everything you need. Felt very much at home and cant wait to return.

This place is so cute and exactly as described! Super clean and cozy . Very short driving distance to awesome food trucks, sharks cove for snorkeling, grocery store, amazing beaches etc. it was too windy when we went so unfortunate beaches were closed for swimming in north shore, but otherwise awesome to just visit.
Great location for the north shore.  Rainey was very helpful.
Le North Shore est un lieu incontournable à visiter et ce logement est très bien situé pour découvrir cette endroit.Cependant les équipements pourrait être modernisés.

We enjoyed Rainey's place. You can hear the ocean waves crashing at night easily from the house, and see the ocean from the loft. Its a fantastic spot for surfers, literally just a few minutes from the beach, but also a great place for families with small kids to explore the beach and experience the very chill north shore scene.
Great for living like a local!

Could not be located on a more beautiful beach on the island. Short two block walk to beach will never disappoint. Beds were comfy and fresh air was a bonus with great ventilation! Loved our trip! Great owner responsiveness!

Location, location, location! Awesome beach pad walking distance to amazing north shore beaches and an incredible array of eats! Teds Bakery will become your favourite stop...trust me! Four words ... Chocolate Haupia Cream Pie. You'll understand what I mean soon enough. 

If you are looking for a clean, spacious, well appointed pad - close to everything...book this.

The house was fully equipped with everything, the beach is in 5 minute walk, perfect for surfing although we didn't surf. We watched the sunset, which was beautiful. Ted's bakery is nearby, a good spot to have a quick meal. Overall, our family enjoyed the stay very much.
Thank you so much! Great location on the north shore and perfect communication and stay!

Rainey's place is in a great spot, a short walk to the beach and to a wonderful bakery just down the road.
The loft is equiped with all that you need, even beach towels and some (Hidden by Airbnb) s and flippers for checking out the beach.
A prefect place to discover the other side of Oahu, far from the big city life. Rainey's place is very good to relax and enjoy the North shore of Oahu.

Rainey' house is located at perfect place and was so clean and comfy to stay. My favorite thing at this house was the view from loft when we wake up at morning. That was awesome!!!!!! Also, Rainey is so kind and nice to communicate! She always sent me text back immediately if I had questions.

I'm so happy to stay Rainey's house and already miss life at near sunset beach... I hope I can stay again this house!!

Rainey's place was great with ease to get in and out of and explore. My kids enjoyed the spiral staircase to the loft. The loft might be a challenge to for anyone that is 6+ foot tall because of the low ceiling. The bench was within a few minutes walk from the loft.

Would recommend this place if you have a car and want to see the various sites on the North Shore.

We had a wonderful time on the North Shore staying at Rainey's place. The house is a very short walk to the unpopulated Velzyland beach!  Rainey's check-in instructions were detailed and easy. We valued her timely communication with all the questions we asked. There were three of us total and the space worked great for our week long vacation. We didn't want to leave!  Thanks so much, Rainey.

Raineys place is perfect, we all had a wonderful stay with the beach literally two minutes walk away. It was clean, tidy and had a perfect little balcony for drinks at the end of the day. Rainey also let us have an early check in which was perfect since we landed at 7am! Would come back for sure and highly recommend! Thanks for a wonderful stay!
We had everything we needed at Rainey's place. Beds are comfortable. The place was clean and safe. We were just a 5 min walk to the beach. She's a great host. Definitely recommend staying here :)
Great place. Very clean and walking distance to a beautiful beach.
Had a great time staying at this place. Perfect to enjoy surfing and the Northshore lifestyle with amazing beaches.
An excellent place for North Shore. Close to Pipeline, Waimea Bay and Park. Quiet and great value for money .Would highly recommend this place.
Excellent North Shore location.  Easy walk to an amazing beach!
Rainey's place is the perfect location! The house was clean and the pull out sofa was also very comfortable. It was a great stay and Rainey was also very responsive and kind.

Rainey's loft was in the perfect location and clean and comfy to stay.
We were just a 3 min walk to the beach. 
It's a best place to spend the great vacation.
Most importantly,Rainey is a great host,also very responsive and very kind.
We will come back.Thank you soooo much Rainey!!
Great location, we walked a couple minutes across the street to a nice beach! Area is great and friendly. A little warm in the house  but we got by with the fans and the ocean breeze.
Location was great. The home was well kept and clean.
We had a great stay at Rainey's place - good location on the North Shore, accurate description and easy check-in/check out.
とても綺麗なﾌﾟﾗｲﾍﾞｰﾄﾋﾞｰﾁまで歩いて5分｡住んでいるような感覚でﾉｰｽｼｮｱを満喫できます｡Foollandが近いので食材やらﾋﾞｰﾁ遊びに必要な買い出しもできる｡ちょっと車で走ればﾊﾚｲﾜの街もすぐ｡Sharks coveは小さい子供でもｼｭﾉｰｹﾙが楽しめるので､子連れには特にｵｽｽﾒです｡ﾎｽﾄのRaineyさんはとても親切で､いろいろ教えてもらえて非常に助かりました!

Came to this house with my wife for 3 nights. great location to explore the north shore . Walking distance to the beach (5 mins ) , just crossing the street was great for our morning walks and swimming at the beach. Close to all other famous beaches at north shore with only few minutes drive . Also conveniently close to foodland and a bakery . The house is at the back of a quiet street. House itself very simple with basic furniture for the basics. Beds are located upstairs with rather clumsy access by spiral metal stairs and ceilings are low so have to bend to walk about . Not a lot of wardrobes and furniture too. Only thing really bothered us was the fact the house had no AC units anywhere which made temperatures inside considerably hot during afternoon ( house gets afternoon sun).
At night we opened windows and let sea breeze in which was rather nice . Overall good cost benefit. Loved seating at front porch at night to relax after spending many hours at the beach .

Rainey was an amazing host! Check in was straight forward and simple and we were able to find the place very easily. The loft on the top of the studio is really fun unique space. There is a full kitchen with a stove, oven, toaster oven, and fridge so we were able to cook a late night snack :) lots of beach and bath towels were provided which is a great plus since the beach is near by. There is a little patio with some chairs to relax in as well as a great place to hang towels and clothes to dry after a day at the beach. 

I called Rainey a week before check in because another Airbnb cancelled on some of my friends who were also staying in the area for a wedding. Rainey was kind enough to allow all of us to stay at her place and even provided us with an extra futon. Thanks for saving our trip, Rainey and letting us stay in your home!!

Great location. But as described it does not have AC so on hot nights it's a bit warm. 
Would definitely stay again when on North Shore.
Great spot right near a lovely beach sunset/vesyland....we loved our time here and would definately stay again.

친절한 레이니였습니다 
동네가 너무 한적하여 밤에는 조금 무서웠습니다.

The place was great for our needs.  We knew it did not have A/C, so it was hot.  There are a number of fans, but a screen door on the sliding glass would have helped a lot.  Don't mind cleaning up after ourselves, but sponges and scrubbers were no where to be found.  Hole in the wall and crack in the toilet seat in the bathroom needs to be repaired, but didn't interfere with our stay.  Having paper towel and tissue available would have been nice.  Never met the host but check in was easy.  Key was in lock box and under the mat.  Fit our needs since we were out and about most of the time.

We really enjoyed our stay at Rainey's. Her lovely home was clean and comfortable We spent 5 days on the beautiful Oahu North Shore. We enjoyed the tourist activities--especially the beaches. A beautiful and less visited beach was just across the street from Rainey's.

Rainey's place was a last minute choice for us as our original choice had an issue. Rainey was sweet and eager to help with any issues. We wanted to spend two days on the North Shore because we had guest in town. The house got the job done! I wish the loft section had AC but I knew going in it did not. We could have also used some paper towels for the kitchen but we were out most of the day and night. Thanks for a great stay!

Super quick and easy to check-in! Never saw Rainey in person, but she was very helpful when we needed anything or had any questions. Her house is just lovely and cozy.  We had a magical week, every day on the beach across the street. Hardly anyone there, it was like our own private beach!

This is a garage apartment with a deck and loft area up a winding staircase. Loft has a lower ceiling and two double beds, downstairs has a pull out bed. The pull out bed is not very comfortable, even with the extra pad, so maybe good for children, less so for adults. The house is equipped with coffee pot  (BYO coffee and filters) and a large selection of pots and pans. There are some spices and food items. There is also a soft cooler and beach towels which is nice for the beach. There are ceiling fans and extra fans to help cool it down for sleeping which is also nice.
Rainey's home was very clean and central location for everything we were looking to do. The beaches and restaurants were only a 10 minute drive.

3.5~4

If you are on honeymoon, skip this house. 
There is no AC so house gets very warm even at night.
Lots of house rules tho so feel like living in a camp and not that welcoming.
Location was good.

Oh parking was horrible.
It was a sloped gravel by the stairs, with slight potholes and big boulder.
So parking with a sedan was difficult especially at night as we have to backup the car, to prevent front bumper damage. 4x4 will do.

First night we decided to park at the road side since the place the gravel was dark, and dont want to risk flipping the car on the slope. But guess what.. We got a fine.
Great location, nice views - perfect north shore location to everything. Thanks!

From Oahu and just wanted to have a weekend to go north to surf and chill. Rainey's loft exceeded expectations. Close to Sunset Beach, yet we spent most time at Rockys and Pupukea.  We had our privacy but she was great at communicating.
Nice place, super low key. Great location.

Great location to the beach. Just a short drive to the shops and restaurants in Haleiwa. Private location and overall a great place to stay with everything you will need. No a/c but the fans provided helped to keep you cool. The ceiling in the bedroom loft is a little low, but in a couple days you will get used to it (I'm 5'7 and my husband is 6'7") Thanks for a great spot to spend our trip!

I don't really want to share this I was it was so great. Location is amazing and it's beautifully furnished and equipped. My
Husband and I slept on the pullout couch and gave the teens the loft. Expected the worst - pull out couch + 6ft husband = bad night sleep. Nope. Put the extra mattress on and it was super comfy. Loads of fans. Great location. Quiet. Lovely. Again, would rather keep secret!!
Awesome authentic North Shore loft, location central for all that we wanted to do on the North Shore. Great local experience.
Stayed here with my husband and two children ages 4 & 11. The place was as advertised, clean and worked well for us. We'd definitely stay again.
Raineys place was perfect, location amazing. i will stay there next year. thank you

Hi Rainey! Thank you so much for letting us stay at your place for 6 nights! My family and I really enjoyed it. Your place is very comfortable with all the necessary amenities and it's super family-friendly. My kids thought that the loft area was so cool! It was terrific that you wrote down some local tips and we enjoyed walking across the street to the easily accessible beach to watch beautiful sunsets! Thank you for doing such a wonderful job staying in touch with us about the check-in and check-out times and making us feel very welcome. We will definitely be back and Happy 2018! May the new year bring you much love and happiness!!! :) The Lin-Alexander family
This  loft was the perfect place for our family of four to spend the Christmas vacation.  Not only clean and comfortable, it is steps away from the beach and on a quiet street.  Thank you, Rainey!
Rainey’s house is super cute and walking distance to the good surf spots. It was very private and comfortable.
とてもﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰなraineyさんでした｡
Great place, close to many top rated beaches in North Shore!

I stayed with my family and they were so happy to stay here. The listing was quite clean and I recommend for family trip or couples to stay. 
you dont need to bring beach gears too. there were so many towels and beach parasol too. just it was not ocean view as the other people said. but it was quite good and reasonable to stay
Rainey's place was exactly as described. I would stay here again!
Great location! Great space! Highly recommend to anyone looking to spend time on O'ahu
ｽｰﾊﾟｰも近く､海まで3分のﾛｹｰｼｮﾝは最高です｡すぐ隣のﾌﾞﾛｯｸにｻｰﾌﾎﾞｰﾄﾞをﾚﾝﾀﾙ出来るところもあり完璧なｴﾘｱです｡ﾎｽﾄも質問にとても丁寧に回答してくれて不自由は全くありませんでした｡

This place was in a nice and quiet location, decently close to the beach and grocery store. It was beautiful, however there were many ants everywhere in the loft even before we got there, which was a little unpleasant.  Make sure you keep your suitcase/belongings closed, otherwise they will be crawling out of everything Nonetheless, Rainey was excellent at communicating important information regarding the loft, and pleasantly left useful amenities.
Everything was as advertised. We loved it. Enjoyed walking to Ted’s for breakfast.
This spot is perfect for exploring the north shore.   Clean and comfortable with cute decor and everything you need to explore the beaches and relax at the end of the day.

Amazing location in the heart of the North shore. Great loft apartment in a quiet side street. Really well-equipped kitchen. Stairs to loft pretty steep so you need full mobility. There swell came in & we saw incredible big wave surfing. Highly recommended!!

The location is great , but we found the place in desperate need of a really good clean. 
Mould on side of hide a couch / stains on couch/layers of grease and dirt on light fixtures and fan. No smoke detectors/ all removed. 
Have used  air bnb all over world and this was by far not up to a clean standard. Disappointing .

Rainey’s place is exactly what the description says. The place is comfortable with the necessary amenities that you will need. We just had to purchase paper towels but there was enough toiletries in the bathroom which I think previous guests had left. Bring some bath soap & shampoo.
The place is in a cul de sac. It’s a nice neighbourhood. The beach is walking distance supposedly but we always drove to other beaches. The area is close to the grocery store & the historic Haleiwa town. Very close to the famous Ted’s bakery. Try their delicious Haupia pie! They also serve breakfast, lunch & I think dinner as well. At times, the lineup is very long. 
Rainey replies right away if you have questions or need advice. 
We like hearing the waves at night when it’s all quiet. You can see a view of the beach from the loft.

We thoroughly enjoyed Rainey’s place during our stay on the North Shore. The space was great and Rainey was very quick to respond to any questions we had. A few notes:

1) There were clean beach towels and a mat available for us to use.

2) It’s a pretty quiet area, which was something we certainly appreciated after spending the first part of the week in Waikiki. 

3) Only a short drive to some of the main attractions on the North Shore.

4) For food: Ted’s bakery and food trucks are only a short drive away. Foodland is also nearby (and sells pies from Ted’s bakery... for less).

5) Be careful if you’re above 5’ in the loft, the ceilings are quite low and there is a covered beam that drops down.

6) As others have said, it can be a bit warm, but Rainey has provided quite a few fans to help keep it cooler. 

7) Everything was as promised and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Rainey’s place.

Thank you again and we look forward to our next trip to the North Shore!

Très joli appartement très bien situé à 2 min à pied de la plage, rainey est très réactive agréable et respecte la tranquillité de ces hôtes. 
Les yeux fermés !
Great atmosphere with a 2 min walk to the beach. Just as described. Super clean, great amenities. We loved it!
I would be more than happy to come back and stay at Reiney's place.
Go

Rainy is such a kind, reliable host and her house is the best location to the beach, riding houses.
Our family ( two kids, two adults) had a wonderful experience at her house.

Perfect Loft just 5min away from Ted's Bakery (Which is amazing and a must if you come to the North Shore) and some great food places or just a short drive to some amazing beaches.  The Loft was perfect for my family of 4 that consist of two kids.  Comfortable beds, well equipped kitchen, nice patio with a fantastic view of the neighborhood,  and a washer and dryer provided as well.   The neighborhood is nice and safe with friendly people greeting you with a smile.   We really enjoyed our stay and hope to come back again soon.   
Rainey was a great host who made our first AirBnb experience wonderful.

So many great things to say about this location!  Rainey was fantastic to work with and the house was just as listed!  We LOVED the short walk to the beach (it was great because there was hardly anyone there), the walk to Ted's Bakery (breakfast and pies were delicious), so much to see and do just minutes from the house.   Rainey was absolutely wonderful to communicate with and very accommodating.  Everything in the house was very clean, which made the stay even better.   We would stay here again in a heartbeat and look forward to going back to North Shore.  Staying in North Shore was the best decision ever and picking Rainey's place was a great choice too.  

Mahalo!
Easy walk to a great beach! Enjoyed our stay!
A nice relaxing beach house with great amenities and comfortable atmosphere
Great location on the noth shore. Clean and comfortable with al the comforts of home.
Located close to Ted’s and Shark’s Cove was  a cozy place to enjoy north shore, thanks!
The place was great and host was quick to respond to questions and accommodating.
We had a great stay. There's a ton of food trucks and a grocery store nearby plus all the great north shore beaches. All of the directions provided made for a super easy check-in and stay.
Good spot.

Great location - a four minute walk to the beach, minutes drive to other beaches, hikes, snorkeling, restaurants, grocery store. Hosts are very warm and available if you need them. All amenities of home are at your fingertips. 2 queen beds sleep four comfortably. I brought two teenage girls and they loved it. So did I.
Great location, easy drive to many awesome spots! House accomodated 4 people nicely. We had a great stay!
Rainey’s place was so great for our family’s summer vacation. It was spacious and cozy and no a/c was not a problem at all with the pleasant natural wind.
It was a perfect place for those who love sea.

We came here before moving on to a hotel in Waikiki. This was a great pick, Rainey’s place is on a quiet street adjacent to other beautiful homes. I loved that the walk to the beach was   No more than 5 min. And the beaches were nearly empty! Great for a relaxing vacation. We had everything we needed there.

Very clean
Quiet neighborhood
Cute loft
Super close to a near deserted beach
I'd come back in a heartbeat

Nice place, plenty of space, nice and clean. With the moist air on Oahu we lacked an airconditioner but there were plenty of ventilators available to help out. We can recommend this place and the owner Rainey. :D
This place is perfect to explore the North Shore. It is clean and provides everything you need for your stay. We stayed for 2 weeks and had an awesome time at Rainey‘s place. Thank you so much!
Good space in a good location. Just down the road from pipe, sunset and Waimea
This loft is just the perfect place for couples or small families very close to the beach and right by TEDS bakery which is amazing!

Much bigger than anticipated. Wonderful location with lots of food trucks nearby and of course, the beach. We were surrounded by friendly locals and neighbors who loved to offer suggestions! The apt gets pretty warm during the day but there’s almost always a steady breeze so it wasnt too bad. the fans do a great job at night and i was comfortable on any of the three beds. You’ll enjoy this place!
Wonderful place

This quiet location was exactly as advertised, short walk to the beach, in a quiet residential neighborhood, and within a short drive of most everything one would want to do in the North Shore area.  The deck facing sunsets was a bonus.  The kitchenette/studio/2nd floor loft were all perfectly suitable for meals/relaxing/sleep when we were in the space, but otherwise we spend as much time as possible outside exploring the many natural wonders of the beautiful island of Oahu.

すごく可愛い家でした｡
ｻﾝｾｯﾄﾋﾞｰﾁやｽｰﾊﾟｰも車で近くてとても便利でした｡

Great place to explore the North Shore!

Had a fantastic time on the North Shore. Rainey’s place came as advertised, the perfect location. Was amazingly close to everything we wanted to see and do and far enough away from the busy streets of Honolulu. The beach was beautiful just 5 minute walk away. Could sit there for hours every day. 
Would recommend to anyone visiting.
Great place to stay for 3 people.  Super clean and just a walk down to world class surf. Epic spot on the North Shore!
This place is amazing! Literally 3 min walk to a beautiful beach(with no one else on it)
Exactly as advertised.  Great space--nice kitchen, comfortable beds in upstairs loft.  A very short walk to the beach and Ted's Bakery.  Easy check-in and out.
No

Great communication, easy check-in, and clean place to stay! Great for families, there are board games and beach toys stocked up for the kids! There is no AC but the home had a ceiling fan plus 5 additional fans to keep us comfortable.
Awesome spot would for sure come back
Great place in a great location and super private and quiet
This place so was cute! It was in the perfect location to explore North Shore.

We stayed 2 adults and 2 kids and the place had all we needed, and the kids loved it, with all the board games and the special layout with a loft made it kind of cosy. There was no ac but there was a ceiling fan and plenty of fans and the place was very well ventilated and always seemed to be a breeze, so ac was not needed. Location is really great. We snorkeled in nearby sharks cove and saw sea turtles on a beach near by. Really amazing!

We had a good stay here. It is a laid back, comfortable and beachy property. The location is great in terms of walkability to a lovely beach just down across the street, and to Ted's Bakery and Sunset Beach. The beds in the loft are very comfortable. You would need to be able to access the spiral staircase in order to sleep upstairs, but there is a sofa sleeper option on the main floor.
Rainey’s place was great! A 3 minute walk to the beach. We enjoyed privacy and plenty of space in this loft!
Mahalo Rainey for making our first Airbnb experience so pleasant.  Your Airbnb had everything we needed and such a fabulous location.
Great location close to North Shore famous beaches.

Great place close to teds bakery and sunset beach!  Perfect for families and anyone that would like to be close to the beach. Everything was clean and there were plenty of towels.  We would stay here again.
great location, good for the money
Rainey’s loft is very well located just walking distance from the beach. The loft is very confortable and private

name: Comfy bedroom in spacious apartment
summary: Share flat in Kowloon - fully furnished  I have a spare room in my spacious 600 sq ft apartment for rent. Short or long term ok.  Your room is fully furnished with a single bed, desk, chair, air con, big windows, etc. Sharing huge kitchen and the decent bathroom plus a very spacious living room  for relaxing. Free WiFi. Very quiet flat without traffic in front of the building.  My flat is in Tokwawan, Kowloon with convenient public transport to everywhere point-to-point. Safe neighbourhood.
space: Quite room with everything you need in a home. A lot of restaurants and supermarkets nearby. Well established bus system to bring you to most places in Hong Kong. Closest MTR station are Whampao, Homantin, Jordan, Mongkok, Hunghom. Also ferry to North Point.

Closest MTR station are Whampao, Homantin, Jordan, Mongkok, Hunghom. Also ferry to North Point. Guests can use facilities in kitchen, toilet, and living room. I'll provide tips to go around Hong Kong Quiet residential area with a lot of restaurants and supermarkets. Bus and mini-bus network is comprehensive in this area which is the most c
neighborhood_overview: Quiet residential area with a lot of restaurants and supermarkets.
transit: Bus and mini-bus network is comprehensive in this area which is the most commonly used daily commute. Closest MTR station is Whampao or Homantin.
access: Guests can use facilities in kitchen, toilet, and living room.
interaction: I'll provide tips to go around Hong Kong
house_rules: Kitchen cleanup after use. Wear indoor slippers at home. Switch off hot water after shower. Switch off aircon, lights, and other electrical appliances when out of home.

host.host_about: I enjoy meeting with travelers from all over the world. I will provide you tips for visiting Hong Kong and recommend you good local food.

reviews.comments:
房屋干净,完全和照片上一样｡门口bus最多半小时到尖沙咀非常方便｡

下次还会入住这家

Berky is a great host. She is easily reachable. She will offer you tips and good places to be visited. Her place is clean and tidy. Though it is far from MTR but it is reachable by buses. Various buses are available depend on your destination. Overall, I have a great time there.
Polecam

name: Beautiful interior designed flat in Montjüic
summary: Spectacular 2-bedroom apartment which has been completely refurbished, finished off with luxury details and which has plenty of natural light ideal for long stays in our fabulous city.  You will be staying next to the new up and coming neighbourhood of Poble Sec, which is just a 15-minute walk from the center and is in a very quiet area of the city and right by the magnificent Montjuïc Park.
space: This is a completely refurbished apartment with high quality furnishing details. The design maintains authentic mosaic floors as well as other traditional elements which are part of the building and combines them with a modern, practical and cozy design.  It has 2 bedrooms and can host up to 4 people. The apartment has all essentials to make you feel at home during your stay in Barcelona.   The main bedroom, with plenty of natural light, has a king size bed and direct access to the balcony. The second bedroom has a double bed. The spacious living room, decorated with beautiful plants, also has a balcony and a dining area, perfect for meals amongst friends and family.  The modern open plan kitchen is totally stocked up with everything you will need for your full-on cooking sessions!    The bathroom has a powerful stand-up shower – without doubt this will be your relaxing spot after a busy day in the city. The apartment also has a small space near the entrance which is ideal to dump your

You will be staying next to the new up and coming neighbourhood of Poble Sec, which is just a 15-minute walk from the center and is in a very quiet area of the city and right by the magnificent Montjuïc Park. The second bedroom has a double bed. The spacious living room, decorated with beautiful plants, also has a ba
neighborhood_overview: Poble Sec is a local residential neighbourhood located by Montjuïc mountain and right next to a big park with sporting facilities, museums, monuments, theatres and from where you can really enjoy some outstanding views of the city. Only 100m away from the apartment you will come across several pedestrian streets with many tapas bars and trendy restaurants. The city centre is just a 15-20 minute walk away – L3 metro is also near the apartment, and will take you to almost anywhere in the city.
notes: - For all rents longer than a 2 month period, it is a legal requirement to pay a deposit for your stay. This amount has to be transferred from us to a local institution called INCASOL. Full amount will be refunded upon check-out if no damages or loss is visible in the flat. We will let you know the exact amount to be paid when requesting to book. - It would be great if you could send ID and residence details prior to arrival  - You will have to sign a medium term rental contract when arriving to the flat. Please do not hesitate to ask us if you have any doubts about this!
transit: The nearest metro stop is PARAL.LEL (L3 green line), which will take you to all the tourist hotspots in the city centre in less than 20 minutes (get off at PLAÇA CATALUNYA). El Prat Airport: 20-minute car drive. The best way to get to the apartment in public transport from the airport is to get on the AEROBUS to Plaça ESPANYA and then change on to the L3 and get off at PARAL.LEL and walk 10 minutes to the apartment.
access: You will be required to present your ID/Passport upon arrival. In order to follow local regulations and to be able to register all our guests on the local police’s database, we will have to take pictures of ID documents for all guests. I hope this is not an inconvenient! According to the Law, you will be asked at the moment of the check-in for your IDs and to sign a contract for you stay. It is compulsory if you want to stay at the apartment. Hope this is not an inconvenience.
interaction: My friends at Hostmaker are looking after my home while I am away. They're an Airbnb management service team in Barcelona who are Airbnb hosts themselves. I trust them to give you a warm welcome! Hostmaker will look after you. If you have any questions about your stay, please get in touch through the Airbnb chat.

name: 1-Bedroom apartment at Icône Condos - 1105
summary: Ideal for your next long-term stay or as a pied-a-terre in the city, this bright 1-bedroom at Icône Condos offers open-concept living space.
space: Located in the heart of Downtown Montreal on de la Montagne Street, this 1-bed and 1-bath condo is 581 sq. ft. and features hardwood flooring, ample fenestration and a private balcony. Building amenities includes a conference room, a fully equipped gym, an indoor swimming pool and an outdoor terrace with a hot tub. The living space Ideal for your next long-term stay or as a pied-a-terre in the city, this bright 1-bedroom at Icône Condos offers an open-concept living space completed with a Smart TV, a 4-person dining area, as well as a fully-stocked European kitchen equipped with high-end appliances. Soak in the incredible views of the downtown core from your private 16th floor balcony, or cozy up after a long day in the bedroom’s plush queen-size bed. The modern bathroom includes a large walk-in shower, heated floors as well as a stacked washer/dryer. For your added convenience, unit #1105 comes ready with linens, towels and toiletries, and includes air conditioning, high-speed unlimit

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood Situated in the very heart of Downtown Montreal, this address puts you in the midst of it all. Within walking distance, find a multitude of shopping, dining and entertainment options, as well as metro stations and numerous bus lines right at your door. Start your day with a warm cup of coffee alongside a freshly baked pastry at the exquisite Myriad Café. Then explore the city’s vibrant cultural offerings with a visit to nearby Montreal Museum of Fine Arts and McGill University’s Redpath Museum. Continue your visit while enjoying the outdoors by taking a stroll through the historic Golden Square Mile and Old Montreal.  For all your shopping needs, department stores of renown such as Holt Renfrew and Ogilvy, as well as Montreal’s main shopping artery Ste. Catherine Street are all located in close proximity. After a busy day, revel in the city’s celebrated culinary scene with a visit to the critically-acclaimed Europea or Ferreira Café. For a more casual meal, head over

host.host_about:
Looking for a perfect stay with a host that understands your needs? 

Welcome to Loftel and Simplissimmo, Montreal based companies established over 10 years ago, that are operated by young and motivated team with a strong and valuable hospitality experience. 

We manage more than 200 properties and are fully dedicated to make every client’s stay unique and memorable. We’re always there to help, answer questions and provide the best services. So don’t hesitate and go ahead, and challenge us :)

name: ♕ Downtown Manhattan I Private Bedroom♕
summary: All you need cute private bedroom in a 2-bdr apt in ❤️of Manhattan. Everything needed for a great stay in NYC: air conditioners / heaters, fast WiFi, comfortable beds, clean bathroom.  Location: - 15 min to Brooklyn Bridge - 25 min to 911 Memorial / Wall Street - 30 min to Times Square / Rockefeller Center / Central Park (metro) Check-in: - Easy and fast at any time of the day or night: I can meet you and help with check-in and luggage or you can check-in yourself using keys from lockbox.
space: Beautiful newly renovated apartment would greatly accommodate every requirement: business trip, romantic weekend or touristy adventure. - Air conditioners, heaters, fast internet, blow dryer, iron / iron board - Bedroom: full-size bed, desk, closet - Kitchen: has all amenities (pots, pans, utensils), bar table, microwave, water filter, coffee machine, kettle - Bathroom: sparkling clean, shampoo, body wash, tooth paste - There is no designated parking. But it is pretty easy to park on the street for free. Parking garage is near by and costs ~$25-$35 for 24 hours - There is a laundromat just around the corner - only 30 seconds away from the apartment - Subway is literally next door

neighborhood_overview: There are plenty of main city attractions around - World Trade Center, 9/11 Memorial, Financial District, West Village, Greenwich Village as well as numerous cute restaurants and bars. The city’s most fashionable neighborhood has no shortage of trendy spots for shopping and dining, but careful explorers will find Soho’s true charm in the cobblestone streets, cast-iron architecture, and sweeping lofts and galleries.
notes: This is a non-smoking apartment! Check-in and check-out times are somewhat flexible depending on other guests departure time. However please let's make it 11 am checkout and 4 pm check-in.  I would be happy to accommodate all your needs upon request.
transit: F train is literally next door and it is only 1 stop away from Brooklyn!
access: Be at home as this is your home while you're here. Bedroom is private, however other areas are shared! Everything in the apartment is designed with your comfort in mind. From carefully selected furniture which includes comfortable mattresses and ear plugs to insure good night sleep and all necessary kitchen amenities.
interaction: I'm available 24 hours for anything you may need.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I’m blogger

reviews.comments: Great hosts! Apartment indeed is in the best location of NYC. Tons of beautiful restaurants and interesting shops. Neighborhood is more than just lovely. Apartment is clean and quiet. Great job Edhar & Darya!
Great clean spot. Perfect for budget travel. It's a very basic room with a clean bed and a shared bathroom and shared kitchen.  Great location.

The location is very prime, but be warned, because it's a very noisy part of town! That aside, the window blocks out the noise, just don't expect to sleep well if you keep the windows open at night. The place itself is very clean and looks nice. The location is very close to all of the shopping you can handle.

Amazing experience :)

5 Stars!

We really liked Darya and Edhar's place - although it is small it is clean, has a comfortable bed and really good location near to restaurants and bars, metro station and some of the main tourist sites! 

The room also had a nice small shared kitchen with lots of utilities like a water filter and coffee machine which we really weren't expecting!

Perfect for people visiting the city who just need a place to crash but also want a bit of comfort - will definitely be back when we return..

Thanks
Great location. Decent value. Responsive hosts.
The place seemed to be newly renovated so it was really nice and clean! Location is great as well! Definitely would stay again!
This a great place if you’re looking for just a place to sleep! Apartment is clean, bed is comfortable. Easy communication with hosts. Good price for the location.
Just perfect! Not a single con, it’s clean, good location and perfect communication. Edhar is super friendly. One of the best airbnb’s that I ever stayed in. I would repeat, for sure.

I highly recommend staying at Darya & Edhar's apartment! Edhar is responsive and respectful. Call or text and he will respond. Though keep in mind that English is not their first language, they make the effort to be understood and help out!

Location:
- It is right next to the hip area of SoHo and Tribeca. There are tons of shops and hip dining areas (though Tribeca is better for that).
- The Metro (Canal St) is about 3-5 min walk. Easy peasy!
- I go to CRUNCH gym, and there was a location 10 mins away.
- I walked to Ocolus and that was a 20 min walk! I went to Harlem and that was a 25-30 min subway ride. 

General:
- The place was incredibly clean, though not spacious.
- The kitchen had everything you need, utensils and microwaves, etc.
- The room itself was clean and incredibly comfortable. The comforter was so soft! 
- They provide towels, but I recommend bringing your own shampoo and conditioner as they don't have those items. 

Plus I actually forgot my jacket after I checked out! And he helped me get it back. 

Generally, great stay! I highly recommend!
Amazing location and host!
Perfecto para una pareja o una sola persona, tiene todo lo que necesitas pra que tu estadía en New York sea placentera

“Darya and Edhar are excellent hosts. They were extremely hospitable, helpful, polite, and immediately responsive via airbnb message making sure that all of your concerns as a guest are addressed. The apartment is impeccably clean and the perfect size and ambiance for a superb stay in the city. If I could give 6 stars out of 5 I really would.”
Great stay!
Clean place and good communication with host.
位置很好,步行15分钟的距离内,有酒吧,便利店,地铁站,Chinatown,购物街｡ 屋子很干净,十分推荐｡

The building and apartment is VERY clean, Edhar are incredible host, he went above and beyond to make my stay superb. The bedroom is decent size and the bed is SOOOOOO comfy. But that place is all about location!!! You are right in the heart of NYC, which never sleeps. There are a ton of beautiful restaurants and vibrant bars. But at the same time once you are in the apartment it is all quiet! Would love to stay here again!
Very nice place for those who want to stay in NYC Downtown. Very clean and well maintained room, very comfortable bed. I definitely recommend it!
Edhar's apartment is in a great location. The bedroom, kitchen, and bathroom were all very clean. Easy to follow check-in instructions, and Edhar is very responsive to questions.

Great location! Super walkable to everywhere downtown. Easy to get a cab nearby. It was easy to communicate with Edhar. I appreciated him letting me leave my bag post check out time. In the interest of a fully fair review, I did think the bathroom could have been cleaner, especially the sink. I also thought it was odd that the bed did not have pillows separate than the decorative ones and that there was no top sheet, but simply a fitted sheet and the comforter.
Very clean and nice
Great place! Clean and nicely decorated! Love to stay again!

Loved it! Great small apartment blocks away from restaurants, bars, and coffee shops. We cooked most of our meals and the kitchen had everything we needed. 
The bedroom worked well - and the mattress is super comfortable!
Perfect location! communication with host is number one. i recommande this place
Great location! Can't beat it!
Great comfortable place in the heart of soho! Loved it!
I arrived very late, but the landlord reply to me immediately. The room is perfect.

I booked a couple days before and the set up was quick ans easy. Edhar responded fast and made sure everything was set up perfectly. At first the curb appeal seemed sketchy but it’s the perfect place for a New York vibe and stay over.

Convenient, clean, nice bed, good coffee.
Straight and simple good value
Very friendly host, great room to stay. Close to tons of great food and restaurants.

Edhar's place was really cute! Exactly how it looked in the photos. I've never used Air bnb before so I wasn't sure what to expect. The apartment is very small, but if you're just looking for a place to rest your head, it's perfect. There are tons of shops nearby and the bed was very comfy. No complaints here.
Great place, checkin instructions were very well put together and had tons of images. Nice selection of coffees. Very warm bedroom and bathroom.
These guys were great! They responded very quickly and let me come to the place early which I really needed.

The apartment was very clean, beautiful and WARM! I was really worried about it, because last time I had an issue with another host. Location is great! I couldn't expect that so many things are going on around. Also it was nice to drink house coffee in the morning and use house towels! Thanks Edhar, would love to stay at your place again! Definitely recommend!

I'm in love with this huge poster of Times Square. Room has New York vibe. Also love neighborhood, very quite place in fashion center of New York, Soho! Clean and warm apartment. Perfect place to relax after busy day in fast paced New York! Thank you! 10/10
The place is really great! Perfect room, easy check-in process, and close to shops, restaurants, subway, etc. Thanks so much!
Great location, comfortable space!

Edhar's place was amazing. The room was exactly what was in the photos. We love how the room looks like, so fancy, comfy and clean. And Edhar answered all our questions in just a minute. We surely come back in his place

Great stay
Very comfortable
Thanks again
The location was amazing and the place was really cute and clean. Totally worth the amazing price.
Great!
Very responsive host, clear information and a nice room !

First time renting a room only. Worked out well with no problems. Perfect location for walking around lower Manhattan and close to subway stops if needed. Apartment was clean and freshened up each morning. Host was great and promptly answered questions. I would rebook.
Great location! Comfortable space and easy to get to. Very clear directions. Great communication.
Edhar is an excellent communicator; something much needed when visiting New York.
Awesome place. Fast check in. Great location!
Good location. The room is small but fully equipped.

Instructions were clear for the check in.
Location was good and easy to get around.
It felt like I was there at my own place. Nice room and overall nice apartment.
Excellent spot
It was a good stay.
Very clean, coffee for the morning, everything I needed for a comfy stay in the area I needed
I enjoyed my stay and hope to book again when traveling. it was a convenient area. I appreciate the space you provided.

name: Urban Venture @McGill Ghetto Social experience
summary: Come live with us to experience a very different side of Montreal lifestyle - never to be found at hotels. This Victorian townhouse is located in a very lively student neighborhood which is also only steps away from Downtown and Public transport. You will be hosted by Ayan and Frank the Cat and you will also meet other travelers from all over the world during your stay. Guests will be provided with high-speed wifi, fresh towels, linens, and if you are lucky you might get to taste our cooking!
space: We live in a Victorian townhouse spread on two floors. There are two rooms on the main floor, where the kitchen and the living room is. There are three more rooms upstairs along with 1 and a half bathroom. Three of the rooms are for guests and we keep two for ourselves. This is definitely not the fanciest place but we recently moved in and its a work in progress. We decorate bit by bit each day and we would love your help and ideas! The living room is often used as a psuedo-base for our operations with supplies stocked and there might be a small commotion during the mornings. On the bright side you will run into many sociable people.  Even with all the people around you will definitely have exclusive access to your room but this stay is more about the memories you will take home and the ideas we will share than about sleeping in your room. We have done our best to make your rooms as cozy as possible but we hope we don't get you too comfortable in them, we want you to come and share you
