neighborhood_overview: The apartment is at border of Plateau Mont-Royal and Downtown Montreal. The Plateau is characterized by brightly colored houses, cafés, book shops, and a laissez-faire attitude. It's the location of some famous attractions on Saint Laurent Boulevard, including Schwartz's Deli (famous for its Montreal smoked meat), and a weekend street fair during the summer that sees extremely crowded streets. In 1997, Utne Reader rated it one of the 15 "hippest" neighborhoods in North America. The neighbourhoods of Mile End, Côte Saint-Louis, and Milton-Parc (including the McGill Ghetto) are also located in the borough. Montreal's Little Portugal neighbourhood is situated in the western portion of the borough. The borough is largely composed of the well-known Plateau neighbourhood, famous for its bohemian reputation and characteristic architecture. The downtown region houses many corporate headquarters as well a large majority of the city's skyscrapers — which, by law, cannot be greater in height than
notes: This is our home and we expect guests to feel like its their own and respect it likewise. We will be charging sales tax as community fee from Octob (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) onwards.
access: Guests will have private access to their rooms and to all the shared common spaces.
interaction: We live at this location so you will be seeing our exciting faces everyday, wishing you a good night, and waking you up with smiles - not really, lol. We will give you space but we definitely look forward to chilling with you. Guests are encouraged to socialize in the living room. Feel free to watch TV, use the turntable or grab a book from the bookshelf.
house_rules: - No raving parties, but social gatherings are encouraged. Plan with your housemates if you want to organize a social occasion. Hosts must be informed of such gatherings. YOU MUST CLEAN UP AFTER PARTIES -Respect thy Neighbor - 420 Friendly, but no cigarettes (smoke cigarettes on the balcony). Be considerate of housemates and ask before lighting up. - We do not assume any civil liability - Check out is at 11 a.m. Late check out will be charged 20$/hour unless pre-approved by request - Lost keys will be charged 50$ - Guests must respect other occupants in the dwelling. Any complaints by other guests will be interrogated and guests might be asked to leave without refund under reasonable grounds. - House keepers come by once every 2 days to clean up the common spaces and any rooms if there is a guest checking out. Please respect our housekeepers and try your best to facilitate their work. - Guests from Montreal must attain approval before making a booking. - All guests maybe subject to ID

reviews.comments: Bien et pratique

The room was great, really big and very clean! The location was really good. Walking distance to the metro, downtown, Parc mont royal and lots of cafes, restaurants, bars etc. The bathroom and kitchen were not so good but do have everything you need. Would not recommend if you like to stay in and cook but you don't need to because there are loads of great restaurants only a short walk away. Otherwise would recommend because the location is great.
Awesome! Good location
Very clean, comfortable and spacious. Pretty central location and would choose to stay there again. Check in was smooth and completely hassle free!
Space was accurate and close enough to walk everywhere.
다운타운과 거리는 조금 있습니다. 대학교 바로 옆에 있어서 주말 저녁에는 대학생들의 음주가무 때문에 조금 시끄러울 수도... 하지만 전체적으로 조용하고 깔끔한 동네입니다. 다운타운 쪽으로 조금만 걸어가면 괜찮은 브런치 가게들도 있어서 좋네요.
The apartment was nice and in a central location. Good if you're looking for a cheap place to stay for a night or two.
The place is very convenient, close to everything and McGill University, the room is spacious and clean.
Está ubicado en una zona céntrica, accesible al transporte público, cerca de muchos lugares turísticos :) súper tranquilo, tienes tu propio espacio.

Der Vermieter ist freundlich und die Wohnung liegt mit der Nähe zur McGill Universität gut, der Blick aus dem Fenster ist schön. Das Zimmer welches ich hatte ist großzügig, quadratisch, hell und das Bett bequem. Im Grunde passt die Beschreibung und das Foto. Das Hauptproblem ist die miserable Hygiene!!! Überall in der Wohnung, beginnend mit dem Eingang, ist es schmutzig, unaufgeräumt, zerrissene Kisten stehen herum, Lebensmittelreste in der Küche überall, im Bad keinerlei Sauberkeit, schmutzige Wäsche, benutzte Unterhosen am Boden, mein Zimmer war schmuddelig und ich wurde das Gefühl nicht los, das meine Bettwäsche und die Handtücher nicht frisch gewaschen waren ja sogar, das es möglicherweise Ungeziefer wie Wanzen oder Milben im Bett gab, was allerdings schwer beweisbar ist. Montréal ist wunderschön aber diese Unterkunft besuche ich nicht mehr!!!

Une chambre qui correspond totalement à la description et un matelas correct. 

Par contre une salle de bain qui n’a pas été nettoyée depuis 6mois, un caleçon qui traîne par terre pendant 2 jours et un amoncellement de poubelles sur le balcon sont étonnants !

Les tarifs bas nous ont fait venir et nous ne le regrettons pas mais il ne faut pas s’attendre à trop...

Great place! It’s just as described - my room was big and comfortable, I could control my own heat which was great, and the location is excellent. The hosts were communicative even if I didn’t see them, sending emails checking to see how things were and to give me info on the house, and even a credit for a local electric car taxi company! You won’t have access to a common space and remember that you have to share the bathroom with a few people, but with those in mind this is a great stay and I recommend it!

Beautiful room in one of the most charming neighborhoods in Montreal! Many places near or reachable by waking, bus or metro. 
Shampoo, soap and towels included :)  
I would stay here again for sure!
Nice and welcoming host. The room is pretty large and cozy. However it’s necessary to take public transport to go to the main tourist points.
El alojamiento  y la atención  es igual a la que se describe en el mail, la habitación  en la que me quede era muy grande y cómoda, muy bien ubicada.
Great place to stay if you want easy access to downtown Montreal. The stay was exceptional considering the great price!

Absolutely great. Location excellent. I really enjoyed my stay here and I can say they are great in organization. Unfortunately havent met the host but communication was great they provide all the information you need. Highly recommend this place.
Great location!
Very nice and affordable place to live close to downtown McGill.
La habitación es tal cual las fotos. La ubicación es muy buena, es céntrica y el transporte público esta cerca.
Good!!!:D
Nice host
Great place
Very quiet and cozy place! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

He was a good host. He welcomed us at the gate because we couldnt open the door. The room was quite big but a little cold. It would have been nicer if we could see the photos of other areas as well. Overall it was good though. Thanks again!
good place
Clean room with an ample amount of space. Accessible and close to many things to do.
Great place - nice guys!
We had a great stay!
We had a great experience here! They also gave us great tips about things to do in the area.

We had a few awesome day's in Montreal. The apartment was very good location wise and the room was very big.
Would recommend

I had a great stay! The place is very easy to find and super close, walking distance, to everything in the city. My room felt very cozy. The natural light from the big window was great and the heating worked very well. Communication with Shakil was excellent and he promptly helped with all the concerns I had. Would recommend!! :)
The host was very attentive and the room is very clean. We really enjoyed our stay :)
The room was much bigger and the bed was comfier than expected. Hosts were very friendly and open to conversation. Lots of information was provided beforehand which was nice!

McGill Ghetto is an excellent place to be in Montréal. Communication was very easy and the room has completely satisfied all my expectations. Also the neighborhood is pretty nice, not far from a park and /or other spots where I have eaten delicious food.
I definitely recommend this place to other guests. 
Grazie tante! Andrea
I really enjoyed my stay here. A nice big comfortable room in a really cool neighbourhood in Montreal - Love it! The host was great - very friendly and helpful. A great value and highly recommended!
Good place for single male university age student travelers. Very close to everything and the university.

Simple hostel style accommodation, nice guys in charge who gave great travel tips that were much appreciated. Some noise from other guests and hosts so it's not totally peaceful but as long as you're using it as a base to explore the city and not as a home for any period of time it will suit your needs perfectly.

The room is clean, big and tidy. The house is in a great location, very quiet and walking distance to old town and Mount Royal. The host is very helpful and friendly. I highly recommend this place to stay and enjoy the nice city, Montreal.

We only stayed for one night, so we couldn't meet the hosts or experience the "vibe" of the place. 

The room is as depicted in the photos. Clean and spacious. However, it is worth keeping in mind that the other areas of the house, namely, bathroom and kitchen are shared with many other people. Thus, it is hard to keep them clean. 

They have a cat, which we were not aware of, but he is really nice and friendly. 

The location was very good, it provides free-parking right in front of the place, which made it easier for us.
Logement reellement prevu pour jeunes occupants .  tres bien situe au Centre .  bonne ambiance

Wonderful hosts at a great location! The place is situated between downtown and mcgill within walking distance of various beautiful quirky places in Montreal that the hosts will be more than happy to recommend! Would stay here again in the future. Hosts were kind and fun to hang out with (I even got to try their cooking)!
We loved the great location, the friendly hosts, the easy communication!  We would definitely stay there again!
Great location - close to campus, mount royal and cafés for working. Got great tips for exploring the area. Plus there's the coolest resident cat you'll ever meet - Frank.
My room was extremely spacious and clean. Thank you!

This space was right amongst downtown Montreal and was amazing value for money! Nice big bright room with a comfy bed. Great for a trip where you need to get some work done too.

Everyone was friendly and gave me tips on the area. Will pass back through.
Great location
Great spot for downtown Montreal, good for one night. Other guests in the house. Not a bad thing but I didn’t know there were othere guests in the house until I was there. But was a great time.
Great location and clean space! Amazing value
Très correct, rapport qualité prix acceptable et très disponible.

Great location. Quick walk to Contemporary Art Museum, Convention Center, Eva B's, tons of restaurants and bars around the corner. Bargain for the price. Roommates are very friendly and social. Can get a little loud on the weekends but housemates are very courteous if asked to keep quiet.
Great place for the price. Location is prefect for downtown. The check-in process is simple and straight forward.
Not very responsive and not attuned to guest needs
This room is exactly like the picture. The guys living in the house were friendly. Location is awesome, 15-20 minutes walk to restaurants, bars and nightclubs.

The place was fine and is as advertised.  You get what you pay for, at the low price the room is nice. The bathrooms were fine, shower handle fell off so it was difficult to work and it wasn’t working one morning. The cat is cute. 

Hosts were nice but loud late at night when I was trying to sleep, and the kitchen was full of dirty dishes all the time. Would not stay here again.
Great value for money and a perfect crashpad after a long day's work. Lots of cafes and bars nearby and downtown is only a short walk away. The hosts were friendly and their cat Frank was a gem!

Great location and smooth checkin and checkout. Would recommend since the space was large for two people. 
All nights there had lots of talking outside so it was hard to sleep but otherwise everyone is super nice.

저렴한 가격으로 괜찮은 방에서 하룻밤 자기 좋습니다. 호스트분들도 친절하고 몽로얄까지 걸어갈 수 있는 위치에 있어요. 다만 밤늦게까지 호스트분들이 떠들어서 조금 힘들었네요. 그점빼고 괜찮습니다. 

It is good place to spend one night for cheaper price. The room is beautiful and is not far from university, mont royal and downtown. Hosts are also sooo kind but they talked until the night when i was trying to sleep . Except this one, i recommend this house to you.
excellent place, excellent hosts
Buena ubicación, recomendado!
Amazing location!!!!
House in student ghetto
Airbnb très pratique pour un séjour à Montréal agréable.

They let me drop off my luggage early. They were very nice and helpful. 
Location was very convenient.

Accurate description of the room we rented. The rented room is fairly clean. The shared bathroom is dirty. Bathtub gets pretty slippery probably due to lack of a good cleaning. The shower nob is broken and fell each time when I took shower. location is good. parking is good. oh! one of 4 nights we stayed got pretty loud around mid-night and lasted couple of hours. My partner did get out of bed and walked to the kitchen just so they knew we were already in. Unfortunately, the noise level went down for a bit and then back up again.
Excellent communication and beautiful room in a nice area.
disappointed

These guys are very nice and friendly hosts and they have a very cute cat to welcome you.
The location is the biggest plus as it is just 5-10 mins walk to Eaton centre and other places in downtown.
Few things that were mentioned by previous guests and were not fixed by the host are:
The kitchen sink had unwashed dishes from days as it looked not too good to stand in kitchen with a sink full of dirty dishes.
The shower nozle even dislocates and comes in hand.
I would give 10 stars for the location if I could. 
Beware of the street parking signs guys as I got a $62 parking ticket for parking at the exact same spot the host asked me to park (the free parking spot) in front of the house.
The room was clean and spacious, the washroom is so dirty, I love cats but I didn't like see in front of my room a container with popo.
It has a very good location. The cleaning of hallways can be improved.
The host was very nice, friendly and helpful. It was an pretty good location. An ok stay but would have been better if common areas were better kept.
Sweet place to be in

I am trying to be honest here! I checked in late night and the access to place was good, the AC was broken and not working at all as written in the description, they have a cat, the kitchen and bathroom was horrible everywhere with ladies hair. 
There are too many people living in this place I couldn’t have a chance to take a shower at all till 11:00AM the check-out time so I left the place with not taking shower.

El lugar tiene buena ubicacion, las habitaciones son muy espaciosas y el ambiente es juvenil y  agradable. Me parece un gran acierto la forma tan detallada en cómo te dan la
 informacion de todo lo que puedes llegar a necesitar antes y durante tu estancia, que uno no necesita pedir que lo reciban personalmente!!Ademas de que se ponen a disposicion de los huespedes diariamente a traves de este medio como muestra de hospitalidad. Lo recomiendo totalmente!!

très belle grande chambre dans un appartement avec belle ambiance.  Hôte super: bonne communication et compréhensif concernant les contraintes des voyageurs. On recommande et garde l'adresse pour une prochaine fois
No air conditioner, but a great location near downtown Montreal and saint Laurent. Making it easy to go out.
It was good for a one night stay.
Stylish room in a convenient location within the heart of Montreal.
위치랑 방 크기 같은건 만족러운데 여름엔 에어컨이 없어서 많이 더워요
Great place to stay with excellent access to the McGill campus. Thanks!

Great place to stay the night, was a very short stay in our case, as we showed up in the afternoon to leave early next morning.

However, host is very pleasant and nice, and the place itself is great!
Clear indications, room as description.
Place is in a great location and it feels like living in a student flatshare/ hostel with a chill vibe with all its pros & cons. The room was impeccable: neat, clean, nicely furnished
Very nice and big room, very well situated
If you want to stay for a night and only sleep there it is fine. Location is good giving you the access to downtown.

Chambre individuelle dans maison ; partage des parties communes avec autres chambres locatives.
Bonne situation géographique pour tourisme.
Propreté correcte.
Je recommande !

El alojamiento es tal como en el anuncio, es limpio y ordenado, los únicos detalles fueron que había un poco de ruido exterior pero se entiende porque la zona es como de estudiantes y el otro detalle fue que la llave de la regadera está floja y se zafa y casi me cae en el pie, solo tengan cuidado con eso.
McGill Ghetto NEVER disappoints. Best value in Montreal!
The location was fantastic! Very close to McGill and a 10-15 minute walk to Downtown Montreal. Very convenient for a conference at McGill and near lots of restaurants.

une grande chambre dans un appartement très bien situé dans le cœur de Montréal. 
simple et fonctionnel.. adresse a recommander
Good overall perfect location and very large room. Common spaces not perfectly cleaning.
Best location in Montreal! Loved the style of the room!

The place is inexpensive and at a very good location for me. Very easy access to metro. Most places including downtown, mont royal, and old Montreal are within walking distance. However, the place wasn't as clean as I expected. For students, it is a good place to stay I guess.
Very great stay! Had all the amenities we needed, the host was very nice, and there was even a cute cat named Frank :)
고양이가 너무 귀여웠어요. 숙소 히터도 괜찮고 생각보다 아늑한 느낌이에요. 화장실 공용이긴 한데 깨끗해서 괜찮았습니다.
Very convenient!
Súper padre todo
Clean place

Nice, cheap place to stay close to downtown. Quiet and clean. There's a cat which you can smell. I don't mind but if you're allergic or sensitive to cat smell you might not enjoy. Thee fridge was a little gross as well. Host was nice. For a short stay not a bad spot ESP for the price.
i had to cancel last minute and they were very honorable and attentive , checking in on me and respecting the cancellation policy :) two thumbs up!
Just perfect ! 10/10 enough said !

The location of this bnb was really great, it’s really close to downtown. 

However, we had a strange time checking in, with another guest in our assigned room. In that confusion, we ended up in a different room which hadn’t been cleaned. There was garbage and dirty glasses. The walls in the house are also extremely thin, we were woken up every morning by people talking loudly out front our door and even a loud barking dog on the first night (though there was no mention that animals would be there apart from the cat - who is very cute and friendly).

The shower also wasn’t working, the handle had been broken off so we weren’t able to shower (but we didn’t have clean towels anyways). The front door also didn’t lock.

Overall, it was a mixed bag. Location was good but we didn’t really enjoy our stay.

Très correct pour le prix ! 
Chambre très grande et confortable.
Très flexible et arrangeant.
It an incredible place to stay, I enjoy my time there a great hospitality

Really nice place with a spacious room and easy check in option when the host isn’t there. I went for a job interview which lasted all day so I only used the apartment to sleep for two nights. Although there was hair on the toilet and in the shower the place was clean-ish, the bed was very comfortable and room very well decorated. The only complaint I have is that both nights I fell asleep early, like around 10pm and on both nights I was woken up by loud voices (mainly female) around midnight and then realized there was also a dog running around. When it happened the second night I went out to ask the hosts to please be quiet and they immediately were quiet. If I didn’t have to get up early I wouldn’t really care, but both mornings I had to wake up super early so it was a bit of a shame to have a broken sleep. Otherwise I would recommend this place to stay if they improve what I’ve suggested.
Place was great and everything was as advertised. Would stay again anytime
El cuarto estaba precioso, muy amplio y limpio. Las personas que viven ahí fueron muy amables.
Frank - the cat is very friendly and affectionate.
Lugar céntrico
Nice big room close to McGill -- can't beat the price for the setup and location!
Great place, comfortable bed, no complaints.
A very nice place to stay
Great place to stay close to McGill and downtown area -- it's a big open room with window and a nice living space, so you really can't beat the value!
Bonne place, bien située!
Appartement propre et très bien situé . Bon séjour

Nice and clean place close to town. Our main issue was that we did not get any keys for our room which felt quite unsafe since there are 4 other rooms in the apartment where unknown people lived. It was unpleasant to not be able to lock the door while sleeping or being out of the house. Also we asked for the keys both via text and by calling the emergency number. We got the information that there was no keys for the room we were staying in. After checking out thogh the host contacted me to ask where I put the keys. This is not a major problem but it is very unprofessional to not provide keys for the guests and later proceed to ask them for the non-exciting keys.

Please send request if you want late checkin after 6:00pm.

Request additional linens and towel AUD50.00 charge will apply.   10.Sofa bed only for

host.host_about:
Hey my name is Coffee, I have been living in Sydney for more than 10 years.  I'm a friendly and easy-going person. I love meeting new people and Airbnb gives a great way of meeting and networking with people from around the world. 
My goal is to host and network with as many people as I can through Airbnb, because I truly enjoy meeting new and interesting people from all over the world. 
I'm very responsible for my guest and will do everything to make the stay as pleasant as I can. Also, I would like to thanks all my guest who coming back to stay at my place over and over.

reviews.comments: Nice place nice host
Coffee's place is close to the city and great location with restaurants and shops around. Walking distance to the main tourist points. Highly recommended.
it is in the downtown. it is clean and good

Location. 
Size of unit could certainly be good for families too. 
Building facilities.
Good location... Clean..
The location was amazing and Coffee was very welcoming, but the food stench in the entire place was awful. Otherwise, I'd totally recommend this place!

The unit is in a good location near Central Station as well as museum.  We walked down to Circular Quay a couple of days, but it is a long walk.  Close to Chinatown.  Overall we were pleased with the location.  The unit itself is nice and clean.  There was laundry in unit which we took advantage of since we are traveling for 5 weeks.  Bed was okay, but pillows were not great.  Kitchen had everything we needed, and there is a store just downstairs where you an get supplies.  Overall I would recommend and we would stay here again.
Good location and close to China Town.
Great location.
Coffee e uma anfitriã maravilhosa sempre pronta a ajudar
Nice & clean place.

Coffee’s place was great, close to public transit and the fun part of the CBD. It was spacious, clean and convenient. 

Do note if you are only a party of two and expect to use the sofa bed as a second bed, it will be locked unless you pay a fee.
A very nice place and helpful host.

We had some miscommunication between my partner and the host, so my partner didnt really like when checking in. Also, we both really like to take a bath but bathtub was so dirty that we didnt even touch. Except for that everything was fine.
the location of the apartment is really convenient! Next to the central station. really nice to stay 8 days here! !
Coffee was extremely helpful and responsive. Her place was very clean and centrally located. Would definitely recommend :)

房东回复及时,有问必答｡房子靠近中央火车站和唐人街,周围有很多吃的地方｡走路五分钟可以到达海德公园和教堂｡植物园步行大概要25分钟左右｡房子干净,自助入住和退房
｡非常推荐,适合一家三口入住｡
Nice location with good price.Easy to go everywhere .
Great host with a great apartment in the heart of CBD. Thank you once again for hosting us

Make sure you are provided with the full address including the signage at the entrance of the building. Make sure you are inducted about door entry to the building and the apartment. Make sure you are clearly informed of the floor the apartment is on as the apartment number does not have any relation to the floor number!
If you intend to cook in the kitchen then do request the inventory of the cooking pans & pots, crockery (including glasses) and cutlery. Do check if there is and cleaning pads and washing up liquid in the kitchen. Do all these before booking the apartment.
Finally, compare the rate of the apartment with a 4 star hotel near by.

The apartment is in a good area with lots of good Thai and Chinese restaurants and about a 10 minute walk to the Central Station. The flat is rather basic and a bit dated and could use a bit of renovations and a deep cleaning. The kitchen amenities are sparse and not really adequate for a long term stay. The bed was comfortable, but the sofa was not. We were there for only 5 days which was OK. It is pretty much as advertised, but nothing really special. It was reasonably priced for what it was. 
Thanks Coffee
Great place. Nice and cozy.

Thank you to Coffee for allowing us to stay in your apartment for 2 weeks. The apartment itself was very centrally located with easy access to the trains and was all we expected. Would definitely recommend.
Great place to stay, close to everywhere. I would recommend this place for anyone who love you enjoy their new experience at Sydney
Great place to stay in central Sydney. Loved our stay!
周围非常便利. 正如房东所说的一模一样.! 附近有很多吃的. 不怕饿到. 打车都很方便! 很推荐
Very friendly host, great location. affordable price. Highly recommended!!!

Pontos positivos:
Localização excelente no centro, perto de parada de ônibus e de metrô, mercado grande, restaurantes, bares, no centro de Sydney. 
Apartamento grande de um quarto  e tudo novo, com varanda. 
Muito bem equipado (forno, fogão, geladeira, máquina de lavar roupa, máquina de secar, chaleira, torradeira, micro-ondas, mesa na sala com cadeiras, dois sofás, TV, cama muito confortável no quarto, ótimo chuveiro). Comodidades interessantes (shampoo, condicionador, sabonete líquido de banho, papéis higiênicos, detergente, secador, etc). 
Coffee é muito prestativo, responde no chat do airbnb muito rapidamente sempre. Check in e check out ocorreram perfeitamente. 
Pontos a melhorar:
Aquecedor não estava funcionando durante a minha estadia. 
Tampa da banheira era pequena e não segurava a água, portanto não conseguimos utilizar ela. 
Sofá cama para a terceira pessoa é desconfortável, o colchão é bem fino (uns 5cm de altura), fica a sugestão de, futuramente, trocar por um sofá cama mais confortável.
非常适合家庭旅游
Great location
Coffees place is in a great location.the apartment is very secure and comfortable.coffee was very quick to respond to any questions
This is a well located apartment very close to good food and public transport. Good and speedy communication from the host

Coffee’s apartment is conveniently located in the CBD, with close access (5-10min walk) to 2 train stations, supermarkets and endless choices of eateries. The apartment is (very) spacious and has everything that we need (washing machine, dryer, pots and pans, utensils, etc). The central heating in the apartment appeared to have broken down and Coffee rushed over to help us with it and brought us new extra blankets. She even called us in the middle of our stay just to make sure we were ok—absolute superhost! We’d give her 50 stars if we could!! Thank you so much for hosting us, Coffee! We’d definitely stay again at your place! 

Just a note for travellers coming in from Sydney airport: we got cheated by the taxi driver and paid $160 for our ride to the apartment when it should be just around $50. Please check the cost with the taxi driver before getting onto the taxi!
Good!
It was nice stay. If Aircon/ heater did work well, it would be much better.
Great spot in the city. Functional, everything you need for short stay. Good communication.
great place for a family visiting with great location. would definately book agan !
Coffee’s place is in a great location, and good value. Excellent communication.

Coffee's place is extremely clean and looks just like the photos! She is an amazing host that communicates quickly and efficiently. The check-in process was very simple and quick. Her apartment is in an ideal spot within the CBD and i highly recommend staying at her place for short/ long stays!
挺好的周边环境,距离火车站非常近,购wu物游玩非常方便!
시티중심에서 위치해서 이동이 편리했습니다.

very good location and apartment , would definitely come again . Coffee was very easy and flexible to communicate with , and would definitely recommend.

thank you
Great location
Nice place, really central to a lot of features, nicely styled inside.
位置很好
房屋实际比图片上明亮漂亮!客厅的窗帘打开后,是一个大阳台,可以晾晒衣物,洗衣机､洗衣粉､烘干机一应俱全｡厨房用具也很齐全,燃气灶､微波炉都很好用｡房屋地段方便､配置舒适便捷,非常满意!

Fabulous apartment in such a convenient part of the city. It’s a short walk to Central station and the city’s restaurants, bars and parks. Coffee is an excellent host and the apartment was so clean and comfortable. I hope to come back.
Excellent location. Close to everything I needed around CBD
位置很好,无论是去海德公园,QVB,还是达令港,基本就1公里多一点的距离｡去唐人街,中央车站也很近｡房东也给了不少很实用的建议｡公寓足够大,设施比较齐全,只是没有看见电吹风｡
Great communication from the host, and surprisingly quiet given it's position in the city.
Lovely apartment. Everything was as described and very helpful, friendly host.

사진과 크게 다르지 않고 위치는 완벽하게 좋았으나, 숙소가 오래되어서 인지 악취가 많이 나서 향초를 한참 켜두었습니다. 냄새가 특히나 화장실과 세탁실 하수구에서 많이 났습니다. 주방욕품 역시 얼룩이 있고 청결하지 못해 주방을 사용 못하였습니다. 체크인 시에 방 호수 및 올라가는 방법에 대한 설명이 부족해서 로비에서 조금 기다렸습니다. 하지만, 체크인 시간 전에 도착했음에도 불구하고 친절히 맞아주어서 오랜 비행의 피로를 풀 수 있었습니다. 감사합니다.
great place. great location
房源地点不错,就在中央火车站附近,去其他地方都很方便｡
Comfortable stay and good location
Good location.
you can expect a clean apartment with nice small touches to make you feel at home.

Coffee’s space was nice and clean. It was nice to have a full living room, bedroom with a king bed, bathroom, kitchen and balcony. There is also air conditioning and an indoor pool in the building. Coffee was a very nice host and very accommodating and quick to respond. We felt very welcome. There is a washing machine and dryer in the apartment but during our stay the dryer wasn’t working, not the host’s fault. We didn’t mind but asked for extra towels and sheets since we wouldn’t be able to dry ours. She only brought extra towels. The only negatives were that we had to buy some of our own supplies that we thought would have been provided. There were only two rolls of toilet paper provided for our 8-night stay. We also bought our own paper towels, dish sponge, hand soap (bathroom and kitchen hand soaps were only half full), trash bags, and salt and pepper for our food. Even though it didn’t cost much to buy these extra things, we felt they should have been provided for the price we paid.  Overall it was a good space and we enjoyed our stay.

Parfait pour la communication, la localisation de l’appartement et des loisirs offerts sur place. La piscine et la salle de sport sont des vrais atouts pour le séjour. 
A 3 minutes de « Central Station » idéal pour se rendre partout dans la ville. 
Apparemment au calme et Coffee toujours présent pour répondre à nos attentes. 
Ce séjour était tout simplement formidable. 
Très belle expérience.

We had a great (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was great and respond was always fast.
The place is great and better than the pictures as they we’re taken in the evening.
The location of the appartment is great
An ideally located and comfortable apartment.

name: Habitación con terraza y mucha luz en el centro.
summary: Dormitorio luminoso céntrico y bien comunicado. Dispone de calefacción y aire acondicionado con salida a la terraza. Mucha luz natural. Escritorio wifi e impresora. Vivienda confortable.
space: El edificio dispone debajo de un parking de pupilaje, no va incluido con el alquiler. Se proporcionan sábanas limpias edredón y toallas. Con mueble modular vacía para guardar ropa doblada y si es necesario se proporcionan perchas para colgar y espacio. Si necesitan secador de pelo, hervidor de agua o algún electrodoméstico se les puede prestar.
description: Dormitorio luminoso céntrico y bien comunicado. Dispone de calefacción y aire acondicionado con salida a la terraza. Mucha luz natural. Escritorio wifi e impresora. Vivienda confortable. Trato amigable y hospitalario intentaremos informaros de lo que necesiteis. Domicilio en pleno ensanche Barcelonés cerca de la Estación de Sans del hospital clínico y la escuela industrial, por lo que está muy bien comunicado. El barrio ofrece gran oferta de restaurantes, cafeterías y esta a 15 min de la rambla cataluña y del
neighborhood_overview: Domicilio en pleno ensanche Barcelonés cerca de la Estación de Sans del hospital clínico y la escuela industrial, por lo que está muy bien comunicado. El barrio ofrece gran oferta de restaurantes, cafeterías y esta a 15 min de la rambla cataluña y del paseo de gracia.
transit: En Metro (L5, L1, L3), Autobús(H10, 20, v9, V11..), Bicing(justo al lado), o renfe (estación de sants a 10 min andando)
access: Los huéspedes disponen de ascensor en la vivienda y podrán utilizar la cocina si lo desean ocasionalmente bajo acuerdo con la anfitriona.
interaction: Trato amigable y hospitalario intentaremos informaros de lo que necesiteis.

name: Porto, Costa Cabral Rooftop Apartment
summary: Apartamento confortável e acolhedor, ideal para usufruir de bons momentos em família ou entre amigos. Fica a 10 minutos do centro da cidade, localizado na Rua mais extensa da cidade do Porto com ligação ao centro da cidade e periferia. Local com bastante comércio, nomeadamente supermercados, cafés, farmácia, pastelarias, restaurantes ... Tem todo o tipo de transportes facilitando a deslocação pela cidade.
space: Apartamento com 2 quartos, 1 casa de banho, sala de jantar e estar com sofá cama. Cozinha totalmente equipada e lavandaria. Dispõe ainda de um terraço com vista para jardim
description: Apartamento confortável e acolhedor, ideal para usufruir de bons momentos em família ou entre amigos. Local com bastante comércio, nomeadamente supermercados, cafés, farmácia, pastelarias, restaurantes ... Tem todo o tipo de transportes facilitando a deslocação pela cidade. Dispõe ainda de um terraço com vista para jardim Os hóspedes têm acesso a todo o apartamento e garagem. Estarei sempre disponível antes e durante a estadia. Perto do apartamento tem paragem de autocarro, metro, praça de táxis. Uma farmácia, estação dos correios e vários cafés. Mesmo em frente existe um pequeno super mercado, Local com todo o tipo de meio de transportes, metro, bus e praça de taxis ao lado do edifício.

reviews.comments: Proche du centre de Porto
Parfait!
We had such a nice time in the apartment  of Nadia. It was really clean and Nadia was always avaiable. We would always come back!

A casa é excelente e correspondeu totalmente às expectativas. A localização é bastante boa, o espaço é muito agradável, confortável, limpo e com muitos detalhes que nos fazem sentir em casa. As camas são excelentes, muito confortáveis. Temos pena que tivesse sido a correr, pois não conseguimos desfrutar do terraço.
A Nádia é uma anfitriã super disponível, e encontrou sempre soluções para as nossas necessidades. É uma super host :-)

Casa remodelada com decoração muito agradável e confortável. Sofás e cadeiras na sala muito confortáveis, terraço amplo e com boa vista no topo do prédio, cozinha bem equipada e com tudo o que é preciso para uma família ficar por uns dias, como se estivesse em casa. Quartos muito confortáveis, e com aquecimento para os dias mais frios. Excelente hospitalidade e com mimos e cuidados especiais por toda a casa. Uma zona silenciosa e calma. Recomendo.

Nous avons passez cinq jours cette semaine. Nadia nous a accueilli avec une tres grande gentillesse
Elle a ètè à notre écoute
Son appartement est tres confortable  spacieux et calme malgré la circulation . Tres bien équipé.
Un grande terrasse. La literie est confortable
A mon prochain voyage à porto je reviendrais sans hésiter et grand plaisir chez Nadia
A noter : de l aéroport prendre ligne E violette jusqu à "trindad" puis la ligne D jaune jusqu à " combatentes" prendre le bus 701.702 ou 703 qui passe dans la rue costa cabral descendre arrêt "Barocaes"
Loved the apartment. It was clean and we had everything we needed there. Also lot of nice little details.

Accueil extraordinaire avec les bougies.les bullles.les mignardises pour le 31.hote disponible à l.ecoute.bienveillante.appartement cosy et au dela de nos esperances au niveau propreté.grande terrasse avec salon.garage avec porte sectionnelle.tout pres stade dragon fc porto.ligne combatentes à 10 min a (Website hidden by Airbnb) à 5 stations du centre historique sao bento.super semaine de vacances.

A nossa hospedagem na casa da Nadia foi maravilhosa. Além de ter um preço acessível e uma boa localização, o apartamento é lindo, bem decorado e super aconchegante. Nadia é uma excelente anfitriã, sempre muito atenciosa e solícita, disposta a sanar nossa dúvidas e nos oferecer a ajuda necessária. Amamos nossa hospedagem e recomendaremos esse espaço para todos que querem visitar Porto. Mal podemos esperar para voltar!
Nadia è stata una host perfetta. La casa è molto accogliente è pulitissima, siamo stati benissimo. Spero di ritornare presto!

Everything was fine!! The flat was really clean and Nadia is a very good host! Don’t be afraid to rent her flat. We had an amazing stay in Porto and Nadia is one of the reasons. Thank you Nadia everything!:)
Nadia est exceptionnelle. Tres reactive et absolument disponible. L'appartement est moderne dans ce site ancien, bravo. Sejour tres agreable dans cet appartement
L'appartement est très bien décoré très spacieux la literie est parfaite la terrasse est très bien et les équipements sont vraiment là il ne manquait rien.Très calme et bien situé.
Appartement confortable, pratique. Large terrasse très agréable. Un peu loin du centre avec des transports publics au passage très  aléatoire.

Nadia est une excellente hôtesse. L’appartement est très joli, propre et spacieux. Il est également bien équipé. De petites attentions très appréciés par les petits et les grands. 
Le logement est situé à 10 minutes à pied du métro. 
Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés !

Logement proche des transports, très propre, extrêmement bien équipé (notamment la literie, et une terrasse des plus agréables en été!). Nadia nous a fourni un accueil chaleureux malgré notre arrivée tardive, nous recommandons cet air bnb à 100%!
The place is very nice, clean and stylish. Nadia was a great host supporting all our needs. Great time staying there.
Nádia, uma pessoa encantadora, uma excelente anfitriã. Foi muito bom a hospedagem.
Le logement de Nadia possède un bon équipement et il est très proche des transports et du centre ville.
Nadia is a super host. Quick responses, nice touches in the house, spacious, wonderful balcony and all required amenities for a family. Near to the city centre also. Must book
Una casa  maravillosa, con todo lo necesario y muchos detalles.Un alojamiento inmejorable y la mejor de las anfitrionas. Totalmente recomendable
Everything was excellent and place is very beautiful and spacious. Perfect to stay with children.
Te sentirás como en casa.

Appartement très propre bien situé proche des commerces et de la ligne de métro. la terrasse pour le soir pour un petit apéro est très agréable un petit peu de vent ne faisait pas de mal Nadia est une hôte  très sympa et très réactive. Nous recommandons fortement cet appartement
Super sejour dans la très  belle ville de porto. On aurait pas pu attendre meilleur acceuille  et sejour. Encore merci !

Nous avons parfaitement accueillis par Nadia dans un bel appartement joliment décoré et tout équipé.
Superbe organisation

Nadia is very gentle and sweet mistress. The apartment is very beautiful, cozy, clean and located not far from the center. Great plus that there is a garage. One of the best apartments, where I had to stop, my friends and I felt like at home
Adoramos a hospitalidade da Nádia, o apartamento, a atenção aos detalhes, a limpeza. Tudo estava perfeito. Não faltou nada. Recomendamos!
Appartement très propre , une terrasse sympathique , nous sommes à 10 minutes  à pied de la station de métro. Très bon séjour avec un accueil très chaleureux .
Alojamiento perfecto
Uma casa em excelente condições , muito estilosa e uma host 5 estrelas!

There is a flight of stairs to get to a lift to the entrance. not recommended for elders. the building is still under maintenance, we found bags of sands in front of the premise as we arrived. Stanley let us check in early to leave our bags behind as cleaning took place, which was great. when we came back, the rooms were sparkling cleans. it's quite hard to find an apartment with modern Aircon in HK, but this premise has it! all amenities are still new. The bathroom walls were too transparent and there's no dining table but Stanley said he is managing it. the apartment is located ome step away from the ladies market at Temple street, also there's traditional market on the other side, very convenient. we met Stanley during out stay, he was very friendly and helpful. thank you.

name: Apartment in Copacabana Beach
summary: Apartment located on the traditional Av. Nossa Senhora de Copacabana, only a few steps from the beachh. It's a familiar building, very quiet and silent, perfect for families and people that want to relax and enjoy their time with no stress. There's a lot of facilities nearby, like supermarkets, restaurants, exchange houses. There's a metro station nearby and bus stops, where you can access the main places in Rio. The bulding have a 24h doorman.
space: Prédio familiar, silencioso em uma parte da Av. N.S. de Copacabana bastante tranquila com acesso resrito
description: Apartment located on the traditional Av. Nossa Senhora de Copacabana, only a few steps from the beachh. It's a familiar building, very quiet and silent, perfect for families and people that want to relax and enjoy their time with no stress. There's a lot of facilities nearby, like supermarkets, restaurants, exchange houses. There's a metro station nearby and bus stops, where you can access the main places in Rio. The bulding have a 24h doorman.
neighborhood_overview: Localizado na divisa com o bairro de Copacabana, o Leme é um bairro tradicional, com uma das mais belas praias do Brasil. O apartamento fica localizado a 1 quadra da praia, próximo aos bares, boates, restaurantes,supermercados, padaria, farmácia, teatros e shopping para compras
transit: Próximo ao Metro com acesso direto ao Estádio do Maracanã e diversas linhas de ônibus para todos os lugares da cidade.
access: Porteiro 24 horas
interaction: Moro em Belo Horizonte, mas estou disponível para sanar quaisquer dúvidas via (Hidden by Airbnb) .

reviews.comments:
Excelente estadia tivemos no apartamento da Sandra! Ela flexibilizou os horários de check in e check out de acordo com nossas necessidades e atrasos. Aluguei para o reveillon com alguns amigos e não tivemos nenhum problema no prédio ou no apartamento. Assim que chegamos, Sandra nos recebeu pessoalmente e deu todas as orientações de chuveiro, cozinha, etc. Ela havia deixado água na geladeira, uma coca cola e algumas frutas para quando chegássemos. O apartamento estava limpinho, o espaço é ótimo, ideal para seis, sete pessoas. Existem dois banheiros com chuveiro funcionando. Ao lado do prédio existe uma lanchonete e ao lado da lanchonete uma agência do Banco do Brasil. Na esquina há uma agência do Banco Itau e uma Loja Americanas. Em frente ao prédio há uma loja da Mundo Verde, para quem compra coisas saudáveis e sem açúcares e também um restaurante self service (por quilo) de comida caseira muito bom e barato.
Assim que pudermos, voltaremos!!!
Lugar muito bem localizado, apesar de não muito amplo o apartamento acomodou muito bem todos hospedes, lugar do jeitinho como descrito e com uma anfitriã fora de serie. Voltar e quase uma obrigação.

Bom, tivemos um problema com o check in. Eu e minhas amigas alugamos a casa de sexta de carnaval até quarta feira de cinzas. E por motivos pessoais, não podíamos chegar na sexta durante o dia e avisamos a Sandra que chegaríamos de madrugada. E a resposta dela foi que não poderíamos chegar de madrugada, e sim no sábado pela manha. Não gostamos, pois estávamos com a casa alugada e tivemos essa resposta. Assim que chegamos no sábado, Sandra abriu a porta do apartamento e disse “ué, vocês não iriam chegar no domingo?” Ficamos mais uma vez decepcionadas. Tirando essa péssima desavença, o resto foi ok. A casa limpa e bem arejada, tivemos uma ótima estadia. A casa muito bem localizada.

name: Casa Montreal (Perfect for Family/Group)!
summary: Wow, do not miss staying in the newly renovated Casa Montreal! You will want to come back! A house on 3 floors awaits you!
space: House: Upgraded to create a home perfect for families and large groups. A house on 3 floors!Entertainment: 4K TV, WiFi, Dartboard and fooseball.Rooftop Terrace: View with sun from morning until sunset. Kitchen with long countertop to reunite, and long dining table to seat 10. Rooms tastefully decorated with theme: Canadiana, Mexicana, the Moroccan.
description: Wow, do not miss staying in the newly renovated Casa Montreal! You will want to come back! A house on 3 floors awaits you! House: Upgraded to create a home perfect for families and large groups. A house on 3 floors!Entertainment: 4K TV, WiFi, Dartboard and fooseball.Rooftop Terrace: View with sun from morning until sunset. Kitchen with long countertop to reunite, and long dining table to seat 10. Rooms tastefully decorated with theme: Canadiana, Mexicana, the Moroccan. Hosts: We live close by so will be available to help you or advise you. We speak English, French and Spanish. 2 min walk to metro station Jarry  (15 min ride to central downtown). 5 min walk to Parc Jarry (great for picnics, to see the Rogers Cup, play Tennis in the Uniprix Stadium, play soccer, hockey, volleyball and just let your kids run around). Close to the famous Jean-Talon Market and Little Italy. Close to Montreal's restaurants and bars. Small Children's parks, and water splash park. In a quite & safe neighbourho
neighborhood_overview: 2 min walk to metro station Jarry  (15 min ride to central downtown). 5 min walk to Parc Jarry (great for picnics, to see the Rogers Cup, play Tennis in the Uniprix Stadium, play soccer, hockey, volleyball and just let your kids run around). Close to the famous Jean-Talon Market and Little Italy. Close to Montreal's restaurants and bars. Small Children's parks, and water splash park. In a quite & safe neighbourhood, & close to the Montreal action.
transit: Subway is a 2 min walk. Bixi station (bike rentals) is just outside the house. Bus station close to house. Free street parking for those that have cars.
interaction: Hosts: We live close by so will be available to help you or advise you. We speak English, French and Spanish.
house_rules: No parties allowed with additional guests that were not in the reservation.

host.host_about: I like traveling, food and more importantly, enjoying life.  Being a traveller myself, I will try to provide whatever assistance I can to make your stay comfortable and feel like home.

reviews.comments: Nous avons eu un accueille impeccable de la part de René. Tout était à la hauteur de nos attentes. Nous recommandons fortement ce logement où vous pourrez séjourner confortablement. Nous avons eu droit à un excellent service, personnalisé, de la part du propriétaire et nous vous recommandons fortement cet adresse.
What a great place!  Perfect for a large group or family. Very stylish and well laid out and Naomi and Rene are phenomenal and thoughtful hosts.  Highly recommend it!

This exquisite 5 stars three floors condo apartment was ideally located nearby the national tennis centre (Uniprix Stadium) where our tennis team lodge for 4 days during their tennis camp. This condo unit is ideal for large families or sports teams or to those wanting to have spacious living space. Thank you Rene for your warm hospitality.

Thanks to René and Naima, I rented their place for a small photoshoot and everything was awesome, clean and well representative of the picture.

I would definitively recommend that house for a weekend, long stay or small commercial production.

This space is absolutely great for a friends getaway! Rene's place is beautifully decorated, spacious and very clean. They were extremely accommodating when three of our friends had a late flight. They let them stay on past check out till they had to leave for their flight which was really nice! I would highly recommend this place!

Rene met me there upon arrival. He was very detailed yet brief in his tour of the place. He suggested a couple restaurants in the area and gave me great tips on ski mountains as well. Naomi was extremely helpful throughout the duration of the trip too. She got back to me instantly any time I reached out to her. The place was absolutely perfect for our bachelor party extravaganza in Montreal. It was even nicer than the pictures. I would recommend this place 100 times over!
Easy going and flexible. We had to move quickly and our hosts were quick to give us access. The place is beautiful and is exactly as advertised.
Great House!

All of our guest really enjoyed the place. It was beautiful & very clean. Well located as well. I strongly recommend it! The only downside was that the bunk beds were slightly uncomfortable. All in all it was an amazing experience!
The place was amazing and exceeded our expectations! Our host was so helpful, generous and kind :)

Renee and Naima have a lovely house! It was exactly what I had hoped it would be in a great location. They were easy to communicate with and the house has everything you could possibly need for a vacation in Canada. I highly recommend staying at their location!
Rene’s home was amazing. It is close to the metro and quick Uber ride downtown. The place was spacious, modern and stylish. Highly recommend for large groups.

This place is awesome.  We stayed here with a large group and there was plenty of room for all of us.  The place was super clean and very comfortable.  Also, a 2 minute walk to the metro.  Bike sharing station across the street from the apartment.  Would definitely stay here again.

Rene's townhome is perfect for large groups. It is spacious, clean, and well appointed with great comforting touches in a modern and functional space. The hosts were quick to respond to our questions and provided helpful tips/suggestions to help make our stay even better. We would recommend this place and these hosts for any group visiting Montreal!

We absolutely loved our time here! The layout is incredible and couldn’t be better for groups and celebrations - everything was sparkling clean, stylish and the ROOFTOP DECK IS THE BEST!!

Perfect accommodations and always timely responses... it doesn’t get any better! :)

Had an amazing stay! René was very accommodating, quick to answer, and overall a great host. The place is great for a big group, near some nice shops, and a quick Uber ride away from any part of the city. Definitely would recommend if staying in Montreal.
Love the place!!! The host were absolutely unbelievable and very responsive. We are coming back!

R & N were such gracious hosts! Their home was modern, stylish, and very cozy. We made great use of the outdoor patio area on the third floor. Very spacious and great for large groups - we slept 12 without a problem. Thanks again to you both for a weekend we will never forget!
Rene's place was perfect for our group of 6.  Plenty of places to sleep, really clean and spacious apartment, and located in a nice neighborhood with a short walk to the metro. Highly recommended!

René and Naima are wonderful hosts! René met us at check in and and tour the house. We felt so comfortable and relaxed here. I asked René about things to do in Montreal and he asked Naima to email a list. So helpful! The neighborhood is so welcoming . We went to 5 restaurants in walking distance and the staff were helpful and warm to these non-French speaking visitors! We enjoyed our stay so much , we hope to return soon to explore more of Montreal and this awesome neighborhood! On Our trip to Canada this was the best place we stayed! Merci!

Very nice house in very good location--as long as you don;t mind riding the metro...which by the way is extremely efficient, safe, and clean. We liked being in a real neighborhood. Stores and restaurants nearby had everything we needed. Naima and Rene were very responsive hosts.
This place was wonderful for myself and 6 friends. We loved the access to the metro and the house was amazing. Naomi was awesome and we loved our time.

Logement très agréable, jolie décoration, bien équipé. Il est possible de se garer pas trop loin.
Une bonne adresse

Une merveilleuse expérience du début à la fin. René nous a accueilli personnellement de manière très chaleureuse. Le logement est moderne, très propre, décoré avec goût. Le métro est à 5 minutes à pied. Toutes commodités à proximité immédiate du logement. 
Vous pouvez aller chez René les yeux fermés, vous ne le regretterez pas!

I can't get over our stay here. Had a group of girl friends and myself come for a weekend trip and we were blown away by this space. So clean and stylish. Has everything we could have needed. Walking distance to metro station and nearby restaurants. Beds were so comfortable. We honestly didn't want to go home.

We had a wonderful 3 nights stay in this stylish townhouse. Communication with the hosts before and during our stay was perfect and prompt! We ran late due to traffic and they patiently waited for us and were very nice and welcoming! The house was perfectly clean and beautifully decorated. Very large for being in the city! Awesome modern bathrooms. The location is perfect - near the subway station and lots of fun spots! The rooftop patio is awesome and they have a babyfoot table, TVs and offered some great suggestions of things to check out! Lots of towels, comfy beds and couch, the home is literally perfect! The kitchen is really well furnished! Keypad to the front door is super convenient - no risk of losing keys! We had a wonderful time and most likely will be back on a future visit to Montreal!

Wow! Wow! Wow!....I thinks this say it all.   Beautiful apartment with all amenities included. Located at nice and quiet area. Walking distance to convenience stores ,restaurants in the area, and the metro ( super convenience, easy to commute and cheap). Hosts were execellent receiving us and explaining every detail and even gave us suggestions for places to visit. Definetively will use this airbnb for my next visit to Montreal and will recommend as well.

Maison conforme aux photos,c est neuf et parfaitement propre avec une déco très sympa
Malgré notre arrivée tardive au delà de 22h nous avons été parfaitement accueillis pas Rene et Naïma!
L ambiance très détendue du quartier résidentiel fait du bien après une journée en ville
La terrasse est top également bref nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir!
Appartement parfaitement équipé et parfaitement propre. Parfait pour un séjour en famille avec enfants. Appartement décoré avec goûts. A recommander sans aucune hésitation.
My Friends and I had a great stay at Rene’s place. It was everything the pictures show and more.

We were a group of 9, and had a great time! Probably more ideal for 8 or so people, but was doable with the 9 of us. Location is far from downtown, but there are easy ways to get there. We would definitely stay here again. Hosts were fantastic with providing help and information.

Naima was an amazing host and the house was sparkling clean in a cute family friendly neighbourhood.  I loved walking down the street and see all the different stairs and doors.  The space was modern and beautiful as in the pictures.  We enjoyed our stay and highly recommend anyone to book with them.  We will definitely stay there again when we visit Montreal again.

Rene and Naima’s home is a modern, beautifully appointed place that we can highly recommend! Plenty of room for all our family , magnificent kitchen ( with Nespresso coffee machine)and bathrooms and lots of room for relaxation. A couple of minutes walk to the subway that will have you in downtown in about 12 minutes. Small cafes, convenience stores very close and can walk to numerous restaurants and pubs. Our hosts met us as planned even reserved a car space out front. Can highly recommend this air bnb for your stay in the beautiful city of Montreal

Amazing modern and spacious place. Location is in a safe neighborhood, takes about 20 mins to downtown. There is a small game room and lounge on the third floor. The patio deck is amazing, great for hanging out with friends. The kitchen has everything you need and it has a huge island and dining table. Bathrooms are modern and clean. Great for big groups.

Clean modern space! We loved drinking coffee on the rooftop terrace in the morning. Perfect place for our group of 7 people. Close to the metro, shops, restaurants, and also was nice to have a Costco close by so we could load up on drinks and snacks. We would definitely stay again!
Beautiful place. Very clean and very modern-chic. Would definitely recommed this place to anyone. Also, the hosts are super pleasant and helpful.
Great place, 5 minute walk from the metro. Very fun for a large group.
Great space in a fabulous location. 8 ladies had plenty of space, and the rooftop Terrace was a perfect spot for cocktails. Very clean and had everything you need for a weekend in Montreal.
Beautiful home - amazing hospitality!!  If you’re looking where to book in Montreal, look no further!!

Myself and 5 other ladies stayed at Rene’s for a girls weekend. Rene’s property is in a nice safe neighbourhood with easy access to stores, transit & restaurants.  It’s a bit of a distance from downtown area, but not too far in an Uber.
The condo itself is beautiful! Very clean, kitchen was fully equipped and perfect for entertaining our group. I would highly recommend Rene’s condo!

René and Naima are outstanding hosts! They were very hospitable and we had excellent communication with them because they responded very quickly. They met us upon our arrival and gave us tips on where to go. The house is beautiful and exceeded our expectations! Everything was clean, everything was neat and tidy. They also had basic supplies ready for us, and they also have a netflix membership! Our trip was indeed too short and we hope we can go back again!

Renee and Naima's home is beautiful and exactly as the listing suggests.  Everything we could have needed was provided.  Communication was responded to promptly and pleasantly.  We had a great stay and hope to come back again.

René and Naima's place was way above our expectations. It accommodated 9 girls for our trip to Montreal. Every room was clean and well decorated. There were more than enough towels and beds for every girl. René and Naima were also very sweet and made check in super easy especially since we arrived after midnight. They recommended a few places for us to check out and responded quickly to our questions. They even let us know that they had found one of our girls keys and made the time to send it back. This place deserves more than 5 stars and I would highly recommend! Thank you René and Naima!

L’appartement est parfaitement situé dans un quartier très vivant et a proximité du métro ce qui permet de rejoindre très rapidement le centre. La deco est tres sympa et l’équipement est parfait ! Rene et Naima sont des hôtes très prévenants qui font tout pour que le séjour se passe bien. Nous avons passé en famille une super semaine et nous reviendrons chez eux avec grand plaisir lors de notre prochain séjour à Montréal . Je ne peux que recommander ce lieu pour visiter cette ville.

This home is super comfortable for a large group and we were beyond comfortable. The kitchen is well stocked with coffee, pots, pans, a toaster, blender, etc. The house is a 5 minute walk from the Metro which is also perfect. Parking is a bit tricky, but even with street construction we made it work for our 3 vehicles. Beds are super comfy too!!

The host went above and beyond. This home was recently updated and you will notice the small details. The bathrooms had heated floors!!! Rene made great recommendations around the neighborhood and further. She provided us with a map with highlights. Definitely worth the stay and will be back.
You will love this home, it is spacious, clean, and the hosts are wonderful!
Thanks Rene for a great stay, beautifully appointed apartment, great location and very responsive and helpful host. Another great Airbnb experience
Every recommendation!

Nous avons très bien été accueilli par notre hôte dès notre arrivée et il s'est assuré que tout se passait bien tout au long de notre séjour. Il est facile de communiquer avec lui et il est très disponible.  

Le condo est situé dans un quartier tranquille à proximité du Métro Jarry, donc facile de se déplacer dans Montréal. Les photos de l'annonce représentent très bien le logement qui est fraîchement rénové et au goût du jour. Moderne, très bien équipé et extrêmement propre, je retournerais avec plaisir chez René lors de mon prochain séjour dans la métropole. 

*Prendre note qu'il y a 8 places pour dormir dans les lits, donc si vous êtes plus que 8 voyageurs, vous devrez utiliser les divans lits.

The place was great !!! The host on the other hand HORRIBLE. 
This guys i currently trying to scam 1000+ dollars for damages we did not do after kicking us out.

This Airbnb was great. Thanks to the  Naima who I dealt with primarily. Everything went smoothly and their place is amazing really modern and is as good as it looks in the pictures. Their is also a great breakfast place just around the corner only a 3 minute walk that Naima recommended. It’s definitely worth trying!

The only thing we had a small issue with was finding parking but I believe that it was mainly because of the snow and we arrived in the evening. There is plenty of areas to park around that are free just need to get a spot. 

Overall this place was exactly what we wanted and everything was great! 

Thanks again!
Amazing place for small groups

Rene & Naima's place was perfect for our group of 4. They met us at the AirBnB upon arrival and had saved a parking spot on the street for us which was very considerate. They provided a tour of their place and gave us some helpful tips on near by restaurants, grocery stores, locations of the metro, etc. They were extremely kind and helpful throughout the entire experience. Always responding quickly to questions and even offering us a late checkout on our final day.

The space itself is amazing and I found the pictures did not do it justice. It truly felt much bigger in person and for 4 people it was plenty of space. It was exceptionally clean and had all amenities you would need. It is within walking distance (5-10 mins) from the metro station, pubs/breweries, restaurants, a small grocery store, and a amazing butchers shop. I would highly recommend booking their place if you are in the area!

The house was gorgeous, modern and clean with so many nice details. The shower heads were incredible, there was shampoo and conditioner, plenty of towels and pillows, comfortable beds and blankets. It was a great experience. We were a group of 8 and everyone was comfortable and loved the space. The hosts helped suggest things to do prior to the trip and even helped answer questions during and after the trip. They were very quick to respond. There were restaurants within walking distance and it was a reasonable Uber ride to many of the cities popular attractions. We hope to go back during the summer!

name: ENDLESS SUITES TAKSIM
summary: Centrally located, Endless Suites Taksim is just 350 metres from Taksim Square and a 5-minute walk to the Istiklal Street. Spa facilities including a sauna and a Turkish bath, and the gym are offered free of charge. Free WiFi is available throughout the premises. Rooms are decorated in taste and comfortable modern style, equipped with a minibar, air conditioning, an LCD TV with cable channels, safety box, and a hairdryer. Most of the suites offer a kitchenette with full kitchen equipment.
description: Centrally located, Endless Suites Taksim is just 350 metres from Taksim Square and a 5-minute walk to the Istiklal Street. Spa facilities including a sauna and a Turkish bath, and the gym are offered free of charge. Free WiFi is available throughout the premises. Rooms are decorated in taste and comfortable modern style, equipped with a minibar, air conditioning, an LCD TV with cable channels, safety box, and a hairdryer. Most of the suites offer a kitchenette with full kitchen equipment.

reviews.comments: El sitio es muy agradable. El anfitrión es amable.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Chambre assez confortable et propre..le petit déjeuner très copieux et bon..plutôt bien situé aussi..par contre gros effort à faire concernant leur réactivité (3 jours pour changer une ampoule)
DO NOT BOOK - TURNED UP AND NO ROOM AVAILABLE, WAS LEFT AT 2AM WITH NOWHERE TO STAY, MANAGER REFUSED TO TALK TO US OR STAY WITH US

name: Private room with great breakfast
summary: This is the biggest room in the house. It has 2 windows and 2 doors (one to the living room and one to the hallway). It's very bright and with good air circulation. Besides the bed, guests can rest on a hammock or on the sofa. There are two bathrooms available, both with showers. A big one and a small one. We offer guests a great breakfast with self-made bread, many fruits, yogurt, cereal, jams, different types of cheese, ham and more. It also changes from time to time so you won't get bored!
space: We live in an old two store house on one of Santa Teresa's hills. Very close to all the bars, restaurants and shops, but still in a quiet street. The tram station is also nearby. Parking is also not a problem, if you come by car you can park it right in front of the house for free.
description: This is the biggest room in the house. It has 2 windows and 2 doors (one to the living room and one to the hallway). It's very bright and with good air circulation. Besides the bed, guests can rest on a hammock or on the sofa. There are two bathrooms available, both with showers. A big one and a small one. We offer guests a great breakfast with self-made bread, many fruits, yogurt, cereal, jams, different types of cheese, ham and more. It also changes from time to time so you won't get bored! We live in an old two store house on one of Santa Teresa's hills. Very close to all the bars, restaurants and shops, but still in a quiet street. The tram station is also nearby. Parking is also not a problem, if you come by car you can park it right in front of the house for free. The house has fast wi-fi internet, a fully-equipped kitchen and a washing machine. We live in the upper floor, that has a separate entrance, but we're available most of the time since we work from home and also prepare
neighborhood_overview: Santa Teresa is an unique place in Rio. It's full of charming old houses, has a tram and lot's of street art. It is known as an artistic neighbourhood since many artists have their ateliers here. Santa Teresa is on a hill, so be aware that you will have to walk through some steep streets but as a reward, it offers unique views over the city. It is also very close (walking distance) to Lapa and the city center.
transit: We live close to the tram station, so to visit other parts of Rio we suggest taking the tram (for free) to the subway station in the city center or walking about 15-20 minutes down the hill to get to the closest subway station. Uber is also a cheap and practical option to move through the city.
access: The house has fast wi-fi internet, a fully-equipped kitchen and a washing machine.
interaction: We live in the upper floor, that has a separate entrance, but we're available most of the time since we work from home and also prepare and serve the breakfast every day. So if you have any doubts, issue or just want some advice, we're available. We like to give guests space but we are available when needed.

host.host_about:
I moved from Berlin to Rio in 2012. Davi and me bought this big old house that needed a lot of work to be done. We renovated it completely and tried to keep it as original as possible. We did most of the work ourselves, so it took about 4 years to complete it. Since we had more space than we needed, we decided to give Airbnb a try and it's being a really good experience since. We have been lucky to have nice guests that share many common interests and have a fun time in the city.

I work also with photography (artistic, street) and some graphic design. Davi works as a carpenter building furniture. Most of the house's furniture was made by him. If guests share these (or other) interests, we are always open to show and hand out, what we know about brazilian culture, habits, photographers, artists and etc.

reviews.comments: My girlfriend and I stayed at Ewa's and Davi's house in Santa Teresa, Rio during the new years holiday of 2013/2014. It was a very good experience. Rooms are confortable, wide and clean. The house is also well decorated and breakfast is tasty. It is well located in Santa Teresa (which is my favorite neighborhood of Rio) in a quite street that is close to bars and restaurants (less than 5 minutes walk). I definitely recommend, 5 stars!

We had a very nice stay in Ewa's house, in the lovely area of Santa Teresa. Welcoming host, comfy house and bedroom, good breakfast.   The area is also well connected by bus to other districts of Rio, and 10 mins walking from the vibrant neighborhood of Lapa, full of bars and nice restaurants.

The house is centrally located in the charming neighborhood of Santa Teresa. From there it is easy and cheap to explore the city's attractions by bus. We felt safe in the area, even if we have came home after sunset.

We spent one week at Ewa and Davi’s house and were very warmly welcomed. Both were glad to assist us in any possible way and gave us a lot of helpful informations to the city. Great was as well the small guide, written by Ewa, containing small walking tours through the quarters of Rio.

The rooms are located in an old building that has been affectionately renovated by the two. The photos in the profile give a realistic impression of the accomodation.
The rooms and the public areas were clean of great amenity value. Convenient for us was the fully equipped kitchen that we could use at any time.

The highlight of the day was the excellent breakfast. We could not even make it better. It contained the best home-baked bread, fresh fruit juices, french cheese, fruits, cereals, eggs, ... 
And even though we were there for one week, some individual components of the breakfast vary, so there was always something new to discover.

We would warmly recommend this accommodation to each of our friends and can not wait to come back ourselves.


*****


Das Haus liegt zentral in dem charmanten Stadtviertel Santa Teresa. Von dort kann man gut und günstig mit dem Bus alle Sehenswürdigkeiten der Stadt erkunden. Wir haben uns in der Gegend sicher gefühlt, selbst wenn wir erst im Dunkeln nach Hause gekommen sind.

Wir haben eine Woche bei Ewa und Davi verbracht und wurden sehr herzlich aufgenommen. Die Beiden standen uns bei allen Fragen mit Rat und Tat zur Seite und konnten uns jede Menge hilfreicher Tipps zur Stadt geben. Toll war auch der eigens verfasste kleine Reiseführer von Ewa, mit kleinen Stadtrundgängen durch die einzelnen Viertel Rios. 

Die Zimmer befinden sich in einem Altbau, der von den Beiden liebevoll renoviert wurde. Die Fotos im Profil geben einen realistischen Eindruck von den Räumlichkeiten wieder.
Das Zimmer, sowie die allgemeinen Räume waren von großer Aufenthaltsqualität und vorbildlich sauber. Praktisch für uns war die voll ausgestattete Küche, die wir jederzeit benutzen konnten.

Das Highlight des Tages war das grandiose Frühstück. Man könnte es selbst nicht besser machen. Es gab die besten selbst gebackenen Brötchen, frische Fruchtsäfte, französischer Käse, Obst, Müsli, Eier, … Und obwohl wir eine Woche dort waren, variierten einzelne Komponenten des Frühstückes, sodass es immer wieder etwas neues zu entdecken gab.

Wir würden jedem unserer Freunde diese Unterkunft empfehlen und können es kaum erwarten selbst wieder zu kommen.

Great place in the coolest neighbourhood.  Rooms are very clean and well kept, Breakfast was prepared with love, the hosts are very nice and helpful.  I will definitely stay there again when I'm back in Rio.

My boyfriend and I spent a memorable weekend in Rio, hosted by Ewa. The house and room are gorgeous, located in the beautiful neighborhood of Santa Teresa. The breakfast is full of all good things, like the homemade bread and the fresh fruit juices.
We used all the time the small guide printed by Ewa, containing walking tours in every neighborhood of Rio.
Hope to be back soon!

Estamos muy contentos de haber dado con Ewa en nuestro viaje. 
Fue muy gentil, atenta, y lo mejor es que prepara unos desayunos muy buenos, con mucho amor. 
La casa está bien ubicada en el barrio de Santa Teresa, un lugar de Río muy interesante, para quien le gusta sumergirse en la cultura e historia de Brasil. Queda a unos minutos caminando del barrio de Lapa. El diseño y la decoración de la casa están 10 puntos, se nota que saben...
Recomendamos sin dudas la casita, de volver a Río me hospedaría nuevamente ahí.

The hosts were the hosts that EVERYONE wants! They responded to messages promptly,made sure that we arrived safely, helped us order tickets for events/sightseeing on websites that were in Portuguese.... they really went beyond the duty of hosts, and I must  mention, they are just kind people. The house was awesome...clean, comfortable with a minimalistic and artistic flair. The big shower with the window followed by the perfect latte is the perfect start to anyones morning. The breakfast menu consisted of homemade bread,cheese,hard boiled eggs,meats homemade muesli,yogurt,tropical fruits,juices,pao de quejo...DELICIOUS! When my girlfriend and I go back to Rio, we know exactly where we're going back to stay!

We arrived early in the morning and were greeted right away by Ewa. She offered us breakfast and a chance to shower even though we had not stayed there the night before. The place looks exactly as it appeared in the photos. The design is perfect and you can tell Ewa and David put a lot of thought into it. David designed and made almost all the furniture in their place.  Our room was a good size, had a hammock that we used every day, and two big windows with amazing views. There are two bathrooms, both with brand new fixtures, and great design as well!  Breakfast was amazing! It was the best I have had in Brazil. Homemade bread, fruit, meats, cheeses, fresh juices, and other things that kind of vary day to day. Ewa also makes an amazing cup of coffee with steamed milk that she offered to us throughout the day. She also hand made books and maps highlighting cool things to do in Rio De Janeiro and Santa Teresa which we used every day we were there. Her husband David is from Rio and gave us lots of good tips and ideas about what to do as well. 
This was our first time using Airbnb and weren't quite sure what to expect but were more than satisfied with our stay, in fact, I can't even imagine there being a better place to stay in Rio. We will definitely stay there again!

The house is located at the top of a hill in Santa Teresa. It is quite a climb to get there, but that didn't stop us from wanted to go out and do stuff. We walked around the neighborhood quite a bit actually and really enjoyed the location. We felt pretty safe too, which is a big plus. Can't say enough good things about Ewa and David's ace so I will just leave it at that!

Among our 30 nights in Brazil, the 3 nights at Ewa's place were THE BEST! 
Firstly- super welcoming and friendly hospitality!
The room itself was very clean, inviting and beautifully designed (Ewa and Davi designed and built most of the furniture).
Blankets and towels were super comfortable. The Soaps were the best we had in Brazil and we took them with us and used them during the rest of our trip very carefully that they will never end... 
Every morning- Delicious and NEW brekfast +  New collection of Fresh Juices+ Brazilian music "playlisted" by Davi especially for us. 
Also, Ewa prepared a variety of small tour guides-handbooks with 1 day trip suggestions including maps and places handpicked by her and some of her beautiful photo-artworks 
the neighborhood is amazing- quiet, friendly and inspiring.

Beautiful place built with love and the best breakfast in Brazil. Add the trendy area and this Ewa and David's bnb, a gem.

We stayed for 5 nights and used it as our base to explore rio. 

They make sure you have a great stay and have suggested trips for each district and always offer tips. We felt safe in Santa Teresa and enjoyed walking around and the cafés a bit down the street. There is even a bus that goes by that you can take to the base of the Christ statue mountain and walk up yourself.

They've built out the entire place themselves with four rooms for guests and have done a great job. The pictures do a good job showing you ;)

Highly recommend and hope we can come back.
The Bnb is amazing! The room is amazing! The environment, location and, specially, the breakfast that Ewa prepares! Santa Teresa and Ewa's BnB is the place to stay and relax in Rio!

Ewa and Davi have just the perfect place in Santa Teresa. We felt very welcome and for us this was the ideal place with a feeling between a B&B and staying with family or friends. Every morning  a delicious breakfast with a huge variety of food and drinks was served; the perfect start of a day!
Too bad they could't arrange better weather, but as they provided umbrella's they made us make the most of it! We'll definately come back to these great hosts.

We went for a long weekend in Rio from Sao Paulo and got the chance to meet Ewa and his husband, in their home, which they restaured by themselves. They are charming and very helpful - they even gave us a ride to see the Christ Corcovado.
The home and room are very clean - and the breakfast is just MARAVILHOSO - home made bread and juices, all kind of cheese and dried meat, fruits... all that is needed for a fresh start in the morning!
