We stayed only one night in this suite. The room was great and very clean. The bed was also comfortable. The place was easy to found and finds itself in 10 minutes on foot of the Blue Mosque and Saint-Sophie. I strongly recommend this room if you want to live in the district of Sultanahmet.

A 5 to 10 minutes walk away from the main Sultanahmet area, we enjoyed the convenience of staying in the heart of the historic old district, yet away from the touristy crowds. The place was more of a hotel room than an apartment, clean, modern and tastefully decorated. 

Mustafa (the building manager) was helpful in helping us get orientated with the place and giving travel recommendations and tips.

I needed assistance in finding the suites and Savas gave me the number of his manager, Mustafa, to arrange help in moving both me and my luggage from the hostel I was staying in initially. Mustafa was wonderful - polite, pleasant to chat with, helpful in moving all my luggage, and extremely generous with his time when I asked him innumerable questions. Suite #3 is an extremely pleasant room, well-furnished with excellent lighting and facilities. The neighborhood is low-key - few tourists walk it on a regular basis - but close to all the historic Sultanamet sights as well as the sea, with wonderful restaurants within easy walking distance. I would certainly recommend this suite - and host - to anyone.

A fantastic place to stay in Istanbul. Savas is very kind and helpfull we all the informations about the city. Super fast replay. The rooms are beautiful, clean and fully equipped. A good place to reach all the attractions of the city. Thanks also to Stephan's assistant! Very friendly and pleasant.
房子的位置非常好,位于伊斯坦布尔旅游区很中心的地方｡天台的风景也很不错｡房间稍微有一点点小,不过也是可以接受的｡

Zeer goede accomodatie op een nog mooiere plek! Midden tussen alle hoogtepunten van prachtig Istanbul. We werden ontvangen door Mustafa met koffie en hij heeft ons meteen mee uit genomen de eerste avond. Super gastvrije kerel die terecht trots is op zijn stad. Turkse gastvrijheid zoals het bedoeld is...

We enjoyed our staying at Savas' Luxury Suite in Sultanhamet. The B&B is really central, close to the main touristic attractions and to many restaurants and café. Savas was very quick in his replies, and his helper, Mustapha, is a reliable and friendly manager. The B&B is clean and well organised.

I spent 5 nights at Savas' place in December; I would say it's essentially a mini-hotel but it really is what it is described as: small comfortable room with wifi and warm water. The thing that impressed me was Mustafa (hope I spelt his name right): didn't get to meet Savas but Mustafa was a great host - had a nice chat over tea with him and he helped to call a cab for my friend and I on one of the days that we needed it. With regard to location it really is a safe place with other hotels in the vicinity, and as said in the description: 5-10min walk to the blue mosque/sultanahmet tram station. Really is a great vantage point for the Old Istanbul area!
magnífica ubicación!
Great place

They were just very very nice people! ( just like all other turkish people we met in Istanbul ) service was excellent and the location cannot be better! Bed was a little unconfortable and some broken things in the room but i am sure they will fix it if you ask. ( we were just too exhausted to tell about it from exploring city )

My girlfriend and I had a 20 hour layover in Istanbul, so decided to stay the night here. The apartment is right in the old district, which is easily accessible via public metro/tram system. Savas gave us the address of his apartment, but without walking directions, it was a little unclear as where to go ( (Hidden by Airbnb) maps wasn't clear). We realized after the fact that there was a map in the photo section of his listing. He gave us the cell number of one of his employees who was going to meet us, but without international cell service, it is tough to use. Once we met the employee, he was very friendly and helpful.

His apartment was as pictured. The location was perfect: easy access to the big destinations, restaurants and a sweet view from the shared roof space. The space was mostly good. Warm, inviting, and ok wifi. Unfortunately when we settled into the bed, we discovered that the sheets hadn't been washed. There was no top sheet, and the bottom sheet had hair on it. Not what we were hoping to find. It was late, so we just slept on the blanket. We also found some of the molding in the bathroom to be breaking off as well. For the price, we expected a little nicer facilities.

Our host was very nice and helpful. Room was like in the pictures and also clean. It was very close to Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque in the Sultanahmet area (10min on foot) but the neighbourhood was apart from the crowd and noise of Sultanahmet area. The mansion had also a nice terrace on the rooftop with a magnificent view of the sea and also of the Blue Mosque.
Great location. My second visit at this AirBnb. The airport transfers were on time and much more enjoyable than a taxi ride.

What a nice experience from beginning to end. Although we didn't meet Savas, he was very quick to response. Mustafa and his friend were very welcoming hosts and pleasure to deal with. They gave us good recommendations about sights, restaurants etc. The location was great. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed for our 5 night stay. We had a little problem with the shower but upon contacting Savas, the problem was dealt with immediately. We had a great time in Istanbul and would definitely stay at Savas apartment again. I recommend staying here to everyone!

We stayed 4 nights.  Perfect location, size and amenities for our stay.  Everything we wanted to see and do was a short walk (250m), or a few tram/train stops away.  Communication was great.  We used the offer of transfers from airport, but would use public transport next time.  We arrived early morning and left our luggage at the apartment building while we explored - it was safe.  Plenty of eating choices in the area.  Train station nearby was closed for renovations (April 2015) but the tram was not too far anyway.  Highly recommend to visit the Bascillica Cistern and walk Istiklal Cadessi (from Taksim Square downhill).  If you want to experience an authentic Turkish Bath without the tourist price, catch a tram to Yusufpasa Tram Stop, find the other side of the main road past Aksaray Train St., wander up Sofula Cadessi, under the bridge and Sofula Hamam is on your right - the best (55TL + tip).  Thanks Savas & Istanbul for a great holiday.  We would definitely stay there again.
We were very happy with our accommodation in Istanbul. Our room was comfortable, modern and clean giving no reason for any complaint. The location of the house is perfect! Absolutely recommended!

Great room, it was exactly as pictured. Excellent location, impeccably clean. Everyone that we met was kind and they let us store their luggage there for the entire day while we wandered town, waiting to depart Istanbul via night bus. One problem was that there are children who live across the street who yell and scream and generally have a lot of fun all day and into the evening, and sometimes people stop and have loud conversations just outside. As the room is on the ground floor, it was quite loud, which was surprising given it's tucked away location. The building seemed to have a number of other rooms, as well, so if we were to go back we'd love to stay at the same place, just a room on a higher floor.

As described in the listing. Amazing location, clean, and convenient. I would definitely stay here again. Savas and others were very responsive and easy to get a hold of by phone to help our driver find the address.

Clean, modern, and perfectly located for sightseeing in Sultanahmet! We had Savas arrange transit for us from the airport, which went perfectly and is highly recommended. Mustafa, the building manager who met us upon arrival, was a joy and a wealth of information. Recommended!!
We extended our stay at Savas' beautiful apartment and everything went perfectly! Thank you!

it was a nice apartment near the old city center. the room is clean and the hosts are really helpful and they showed me around the city for the first day. there is also a patio where you can get nice view of the sea. the only pitfall is that the bathroom is a little bit small and the toilet doesn't work quite well

Comfortable lodging in the old city, in a converted and renovated house with 5 hotel style rooms. Modern facilities, very nice rooftop terrace. Lively neighborhood,  somewhat noisy at night. Our issues with the bathroom were quickly addressed after contacting Savas, and we had a pleasant stay.

Our stay at the suite was perfect. The location is amazing, easy to reach and close to all the major attractions.
Sadly, we did not get the chance to meet Savas because he was out of town but we were received by Mustapha. He was very nice. Had a really interesting conversation with him and even offered to take us around the city center.
The apartment itself is well furnished, clean and cosy!
The best part was the rooftop and its view. We just couldn't keep ourselves from spending at least a couple of hours, up there, every night.
Will definitely recommend it!

We spent four nights in this perfectly located flat and we really enjoyed our stay in Istanbul. Mustafa was here to make our stay perfect, responding to every demands we had. The terrace with view on Blue Mosque is just amazing. We will come back with pleasure. Enjoy!

We never met the host but a wonderful young man named Mustafa who was really helpful and even though our flight was 1.5 hours late he still met us and had a great attitude. The room was pretty much what you see in the picture, minus some of the decorative items. The hotel/ guesthouse is in an alley-way in the old part of city which was a bit odd but the view looked at the Blue Mosque and the Hagia Sofia on one side and the sea on the other. We could walk to our tour and there was a lot of places within a 10-15 minute walk. The down side to the location was that outside was a bit noisy and to no fault of their own, there was a wedding one of the nights and it was super loud as the walls are thin.
One of the best things in the roof top. A great place for the value in the right location.
Good place to stay. Beautiful view on the rooftop. Nice room, very clean and large shower.

The flat was perfectly located in Sultanahmet in a charming residential area. Only 10 minutes walk from the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofia. 

The room was perfectly clean and modern with an en-suite bathroom, TV and fridge. The best part of the flat was the terrace on the top floor of the building with a great view of Istanbul!
We really enjoyed our stay in Istanbul. The apartment was clean and well furnished, and the best part is definitely the roof and its splendid view. I definitely recommend this location. Thanks

We didn't actually meet Savas, but we had a lovely young man called Mustafa help settle us in :) Both gentlemen answered all our questions promptly, and made us feel extremely welcome and comfortable. The room was clean, and the house was in a really central area- very close to the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia, and plenty of other historical attractions. The only downside was that there was no cooking facilities- just a basic area where we could make tea and coffee. 
Other than that, it was a fantastic experience, and we would definitely stay there again if we are ever in Istanbul :)
Thank you very much for our lovely stay. We loved the clean room and the kind help by Mustafa and the driver who was so nice. Loved the terrace  and the friendly neighborhood.

Wie booked the appartement for 1 week and also the transport from the Airport from  Savas. We didn't met Savaş but Mustafa welcomed us very friendly at the appartemend and helped us during the whole stay if we had any questions. The room was exactly like on the pictures, the view at the rooftop is beautyful. It's the perfect place to discover  the great City Istanbul.

호스트는 저에게 자신의 전화번호와 집 전화번호를 모두 알려주었습니다. 또한 숙소 도착 전에 알아야 할 것들을 미리 메신저를 통해서 친절하고 체계적으로 전달해주었습니다. 저는 구글맵을 이용해 숙소를 찾아갔는데, 호스트가 알려준 주소는 정확했지만, 구글맵에 터키의 지도가 완벽하게 업데이트 되어 있는 것이 아니라서 숙소 근처까지 가서 정작 숙소를 찾지 못해 다소 곤란을 겪었습니다. 이때 호스트의 집으로 전화를 걸어 호스트의 아버지 되시는 분으로부터 필요한 정보를 추가적으로 얻을 수 있었습니다. 호스트와 호스트의 아버지 모두 영어를 하기 때문에 소통이 원활했습니다.

게다가 호스트는 여행 전부터 제가 여행 계획이나 이동 경로에 대해 조언을 구하면 친절하고 빠르게 답변해주었습니다. 덕분에 안심하고 제 계획을 따라 여행을 할 수 있었습니다.

숙소는 구시가지의 아야소피아와 술탄아흐멧 사원으로부터 도보 5분 정도 거리에 있습니다. 평균적인 체력을 가진 사람이라면 숙소로부터 이스탄불의 다른 관광 명소들로 이동하는 데 전혀 무리를 느끼지 않을 것입니다. 숙소 근처에는 상점가와 시장이 있어 간단한 음식이나 과일을 사는 것이 편리합니다. 그러면서도 주택가에 있기 때문에 상점가의 번잡함이 느껴지지는 않습니다. 숙소 건너편 주택에서 종종 파티를 열거나 아이들이 뛰어다녀서 아주 조용하지는 않지만, 평범한 주택가의 소음 정도를 벗어나지 않습니다.

숙소 설명은 정확했으며, 설명된 대로 화장실이 포함되어 있는 방 한 칸입니다. 시설은 말끔하고 침대와 화장실의 상태도 좋습니다. 변기를 사용할 때에는 버튼 두 개를 동시에 눌러야 물이 잘 내려갑니다. 처음에는 방법을 몰라서 물이 잘 내려가지 않는 줄 알고 걱정했지만, 이내 사용법을 알게 되었습니다. 청소 상태도 좋고, 에어컨 성능도 매우 좋습니다. 숙소 벽에 걸린 커다란 거울도 매우 편리하게 사용했습니다.

단, 저희가 도착했을 때 침대에 이불이 없어서 가지고 간 담요를 사용해야만 했습니다. 청소를 해주셨던 분의 실수인지, 아니면 원래 제공되지 않는 것인지는 잘 모르겠습니다. 다행히 터키의 여름 날씨가 매우 더워 이불이 크게 필요하지는 않았지만, 그래도 여분의 이불이 있다면 좋을 것 같습니다.

체크아웃 이후에도 숙소 로비에 짐을 두고 나갔다 돌아올 수 있습니다. 로비에 관리인이 없어 조금 걱정했지만, 안쪽에 가방을 잘 두면 의도적으로 누가 알고 가방을 함부로 가져가지 않는 이상 크게 걱정할 필요는 없을 것 같습니다.

숙소로 들어가는 대문은 열쇠로 열거나 번호키를 이용해서 열 수 있습니다. 보안 상태 역시 양호하다는 생각이 들었습니다.

위치 면에서나 위생적인 측면에서 전반적으로 매우 좋은 숙소라고 생각했으며, 이스탄불에 여행 가는 친구에게 추천할 수 있을 정도로 마음에 들었습니다. 편안하고 깨끗한 숙소 덕분에 이스탄불 여행이 더욱 즐거웠습니다.

This was a reasonable room in a beautiful and convenient part of town. While we would have preferred a few more square feet and space to stow things, what was there was lovely and well kept. Unfortunately the toilet flusher persisted in having mechanical issues and while they serviced it the first time promptly, the second time they didn't come at all and we resorted to several days of pouring water bottles down the toilet to flush it. The hosts are generally responsive and helpful, keeping the roof terrace quite nice. If you're hypersensitive to smoke, don't stay in room 3 because when folks smoke outside it wafts in under the door and pollutes the room. It's also a little noisy some nights, but not overtly so.

The room is very nice and clean. There is everything you could need. The location is fantastic because it is located just 5 minutes walk from the Blue Mosque and Aya Sofia. Mustafa was very kind and friendly and helped us in our demands. Highly recommended!

Best place for sightseeing in Istanbul! The apartment is located 5 minutes walk from the Blue Mosque, other attractions also near by. And you have evrething you need down the street, stores, restaurants, souvenir shops. The apartment is nice and clean. There is also a roof terrace, which offers amazing views and a small kitchen in the vicinity.  Separately, it should be noted the hosts Savas and Mustafa. They work very professionally and efficiently. Always ready to help and answer questions.
p.s Mustafa makes an excellent Turkish coffee!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Mustapha, qui nous a servi un café turque dès notre arrivée. Nous n'avons été en contact qu'avec lui pendant le séjour et il a toujours été très agréable et disponible. Un super toit terrasse avec une vue imprenable sur la mer de Marmara et sur le Bosphore. Seul petit hic, l'appart donne sur la rue et c'est très bruyant le soir.
Lovely simple appartment and perfectly located next to all the main sites. A warm welcome and would visit again.
lovely house , good location and great host

We stayed 6 wonderful Istanbul days in this perfectly located appartment with a stunning roof top terrace. Our host Mustafa was waiting for us the night we arrived (pretty late); he even asked us on our way to the appartment if we needed any help in finding the place. We felt welcome immediately. 
Our room was perfect for a city trip: good bed to rest after a long day acting as a tourist and a good shower (although you certainly have to do the hamam experience!). We made our own breakfast in the communal kitchen and consumed it 'with a view'. Early evening, it's a great place for a drink and a read or for just enjoying the view.
If you like to stay very close to the old town (Sultanahmet), but without the hassle and noise of a city... go here!

Exactly as described. Lovely room, fridge, air con, very clean and great shower! 
There are more suites in the building and there are tea/coffee amenities on the top floor near the roof terrace.

We didn't get to meet Savas but his colleague Mustafa was very welcoming and set everything up in terms of airport transfers, local knowledge. Sultanahmet is a great place to stay if you are looking for a slightly quieter area (compared with Beyoglu and Galatasaray)
5 minutes walks from the Blue Mosque which you can see from the roof terrace. there is also the main street which is full of great bars, cafes and restaurants. 
wo minutes walk to the port where all the ferries depart for Bosphorus ferry trips.
We couldn't fault our stay at the apartment. Highly recommended
10/10

Die Unterkunft ist schön, sauber und die Lage ist sehr gut (viele Sehenswürdigkeiten sind zu Fuß zu erreichen). Die Gegend ist eher ruhig, auch wenn das Haus an sich ein wenig hellhörig ist. Absoluter Pluspunkt ist die wunderschöne Dachterrasse. Unser Gastgeber war zwar leider weder beim Check-In noch beim Check-out anwesend, er hat sich aber zwischendurch gemeldet und uns sehr gute Restaurant- Tipps gegeben.

Fantastic place in a great location. Easy to book and find. The real gem of the place is Mustafa - he helped us with directions, showed us into the apartment, and kept top-notch recommendations for Istanbul's many great spots flowing throughout the weekend! Thank you Mustafa - highly recommend this place!

Great position close to the Blue Mosque, perfect small room, typical building and a breathtaking view from the roof...Mustafa is a nice guy very kind and he does a good Turkish coffee! Only thing: room 3 is ground floor and from the street come some noise: better ask highest floors.

An ATTRACTIVE place in an ATTRACTIVE location at an ATTRACTIVE price. Very comfy bed (2 pillows). A large room with modern ensuite, small 'frig, TV with many stations, central heating and air con.  Great open roof terrace. Good price, and friendly greeter/fixer Mustafa.

Room is in a block of 6 or so assumedly similar rooms. Not a self contained APARTMENT, & nice but not luxury per se.  Washing machine, elec jug, large bar 'frig, small micro wave, 4 plates & bowls, cutlery, cups & glasses, free tea/coffee in shared utility room adjacent to terrace 3 floors up. Tables & chairs only on open terrace. No pots, pans, hot plate or oven.  A fold up is the only clothes drier.

I was in Istanbul only for 3 nights and stayed at Luxury Suites owned and operated by Mr. Savas. Everything was perfect with the apartment. Very clean, internet worked great. No ever bothered me and it located only couple blocks from all main attractions in old Istanbul. It's a very safe area. I was coming back to the apartment quite late at night and I never felt unsafe walking the streets to get there. 

The apartment has a very nice terrace with a great view of the city and the mediterranean. They also have a little kitchen with coffee and tea, and dishes for you to prepare some light meals. You have access to it 24/7.

It's a highly recommend apartment and very inexpensive. I will definitely stay there again.

I did not meet Mr. Savas only Mustafa who I saw the very last day but I did not need him at all, since everything was fine and working perfectly.

If you ever visit Istanbul and want to stay in a great, comfortable and inexpensive apartment just meters away from main attraction, look no further, stay in this beautiful suite.

A nice room with an excellent location. Less than a 10min walk to the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofia. Local restaurants are great too.
Mustafa who is the point of contact is friendly and useful.

Location is near the blue mosque but still spend some effort to find it.
Room is clean and everything daily necessary are ready.
The manager Mustafa helps me a lot.
The top floor can also enjoy good view to the city.

Very lovely area, safe to walk to town. Breathtaking rooftop balcony with a view of water and Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque. We were only there for a one night layover. Would have loved to stay longer. The room was very nice and comfortable. Mustafa was very welcoming and helpful. I requested transportation to and from Airport and Savas hired a taxi, so all we had to do was get off our plane. Everything was wonderful and took the stress away, so we could just enjoy every moment in beautiful Istanbul!

Mustafa went out of his way, literally to meet me on way from airport. Lovely man and most helpful.
sadly, however, as a high user of Airbnb, I had a different experience to many of the other clients. the area is VERY noisy... kins and teenagers on the streets late at night, playing loud music on ghetto blaster on Saturday night, about 10-14 teens I think... I begged them twice to quieten down and had to get out of bed twice and go out to them.... same thing on Monday night, when a local man walking a dog chased them. also alot of cars and vans coming and going until maybe 1am at weekend. I understand, the kids have no playground, so this is where they meet and play... not their fault.... but do not say quiet area when it is not.
bedroom fine.... but if you wish to sleep, I suggest maybe somewhere else. Clean , tidy, and adequate. One thing though, I paid €184 for three nights, incl cleaning and fees.. much better and cheaper hotels in the area, so Savas might need to rethink his prices... lovely hotel, with breakfast €40 about 100m and very quiet.. many others similar.

I stayed at Seba's place for 3 nights while in Istanbul. The room is comfy and very well located. If you're looking to spend a long time in the room, I wouldn't recommend it, but if you just need it to sleep then it's perfect! Sevas was very nice and he would answer right away to anything.

We met with the the local contact, Mustafa, who took good care of us. Mustafa offered to make us tea and coffee. He's friendly and easy to get along with.

After some initial confusion about the location (I recommend you have Mustafa's phone number handy), Mustafa showed us around the nice property. The views are stunning from the rooftop -- even better at night.

Our suite was on the ground level facing the street. While there was some initial noise from neighbors speaking outside, no noise was heard when we went to sleep.

We stayed two nights in Istanbul. This amount of time was enough for us to feel like we experienced everything we wanted to do / see. 
The apartment is comfortable and features the basic essentials - bed, shower, toilet. There's a terrace 3 or so flights of stairs, it was too cold to really sit and enjoy. 
The apartment itself certainly isn't 'luxury' in any form of the word but we were fine with that. 
Location wise, we got a airport transfer organised by Mustafa and it was a lot more expensive than any other private shuttle company you could find by a (Hidden by Airbnb) search but for simplicity we opted to go this way. 
If you're on a budget look for alternatives. 

The place is located in the Old Town, it's quite a trek to get anywhere. I do strongly recommend if you book this place you go to Tria Terrace Restaurant for the best meal we had in Turkey - short walking distance from apartment.

We would walk to Grand Bazaar and it would take 30 mins or to Galata and it would take 1 hr - fine for us because we're active people and enjoyed the walk but for those not up for lots of walking and don't want to get cabs everywhere then consider somewhere else. 

We didn't get to meet Mustafa directly but he was helpful with any correspondence via messages sent.
Every thing perfect.

We spent two nights at this place, and it was good. Nice cozy room, very close to the city center, and absolutely wonderful patio with a sea sight. Minor negative things: there was dark in the room, the shower was leaking, and we could not find a warm blanket. But it was not serious for us.
Amazing view from the rooftop of Bosphorus, Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia. Great hosts and clean rooms, perfect
Güzel bir daire, turistik mekanlara çok yakın mesafede. Teras manzarası Haliç'i bir taraftan, Sultanahmet'i diğer taraftan görüyor. Telefonla görüştüğümüzde oldukça yardımcı oldular.

Savaş ve mustafa beyler çok ilgili ve yardımseverlerdi. Ev genel olarak temiz, iyi aynı belirtildiği gibiydi. Tavsiye ederim. Mr. Savas and Mr. Mustafa were very helpful and very kind. The house is generally clean, good for stay. I recommend all of you.

Une super expérience et un logement propre et proche de toutes les commodités. Ayasofia et la Mosquée Bleue sont juste à côté, alors que la place Taksim est à quelques stations de tram. À recommander.

The apartment was very nice, modern, and located in the center of the Sultanahmet neighborhood. The staff person who helped us get into the apartment, Mustafa, was also really helpful - he gave some good recommendations for restaurants and called us a cab to get to the airport. The roof top patio had amazing views of the bay and the neighborhood. If you are in Istanbul as a tourist, staying in this neighborhood is a great idea because everything you need to see is in walking distance.

Savas/Mustafa was very helpful and quick to respond to messages. He organized transfers to/from the airport and our arrival & departure were very smooth.  The apartment was fine if you don't plan to spend much time there - I wouldn't describe it as "luxury" but it has all the necessities and is close walking distance to the attractions as listed.

Mustafa (Friend of Savas) was very helpful, he explained all the interesting places I should visit, ordered me a taxi at the last day. Savas apparment is really close to historical center. And the view from terassa was amazing. The appartment was comfortable and cozy. Definitelly would stay here next time and recommend to any of my friends.
The room was ready we did not see our host but received a message about how to get in. This is convenient to all important Sultanhet sites so we were quite happy.

Savas friend Mustafa warm welcome made us feel right at home. The room we had on the lower floor was close to the street where families hangout till around 20:00 some boys played football which was interesting for us to hear. The room is bright and modern with aircon and with little fridge however no kitchen which we expected. There is a comunity kitchen shared on the top floor but no cooking facility. All in all good experience and Mustafa took the time to show us everything and gave us good tips etc.

Had a great time in Savas' place. The building manager, Mustafa, was friendly and helpful in arranging transportation to and from the airport. Check in and out was simple. The lodging was exactly as expected - close to the square and updated and clean. Rooftop terrace had great views of the bay and the mosques.
Sava's place is clean, comfortable and well- located. He was helpful and allowed us to leave our luggage the last day so we could continue sightseeing. Would stay here again.
An amazing experience hosted by great hospitality.
Gastgeber war super. Alles perfekt.

Sava's place was amazing. The room was really clean and quite. The top view was amazing, especially during night times. The location is a centric and easily accessible. I really enjoyed my stay and would definitely stay again. They were also helpful in accommodating my luggage storage. Thank you

Contrairement à ce qu'on peut croire sur les photos, la chambre se situe en rez-de-chaussée, donnant sur une rue fréquentée jusque tard dans la nuit.... Et il n'y a pas de terrasse 

Pas de drap non plus 

De plus, quand je suis revenue dans ma chambre le deuxième soir, quelqu un y était entré car la télévision était en marche ...j'ai d'abord cru que quelqu un était venu faire le ménage ( je ne pensais pas que c était prévu mais bon, j'avais peut être mal compris) mais le ménage n'avait pas été fait 


Bref, basique et un peu décevant 

Le quartier en revanche est très bien

The location is very good if you want to be in the touristic area. Mustafa was very kind with us answer our questions and waiting for us.
We thought that the room include the terrace as the picture, but not. A little noisy in the weekend nigth.
Mustafa was very helpful and communicative during the entire stay. Close to lots of restaurants and shops. Would stay here again!

Very good location in the old part of Istanbul, barely 5 minutes from sultanahmet and the square in front of Blue mosque and Aya Sofia. 

The house is nice - though its more like a hotel rather than an apartment (individual kitchenette or utensils are limted in the room, have to go all the way up with the stairs for the kitchen).

However if you can ignore that everything else is good. Special mention for Mustafa who was very helpful also shared a lot of good local shops to eat and places to see.

would surely recommend the place for the price.

regards
Saptarshi

I arrived very late and they were able to help me by picking me up at the airport and bringing me directly to the room. The room was in a very convenient place for everything. I was able to walk everywhere I needed to be. If you want to immerse yourself with the Istanbul society, this is your place. Very clean and comfortable.
The apartment was great. I enjoyed my stay. Looking forward to stay in it again
All good location, ground floor so a bit noisy but it's a quiet area so not too bad

das Appartment liegt ideal in der Nähe der blauen Moschee und Hagia Sophia. Mustafa hat uns super betreut und Tipps gegeben. das kleine aber feine Zimmer ist mit allem wichtigen ausgestattet. die Dachterrasse ist zur allgemeinen Nutzung.

We highly recommend this wonderful place to stay. Mustafa met us and gave us a great introduction to the apartment. He gave us many suggestions on restaurants to eat at. The apartment is extremely clean with a comfortable bed. There is a mini fridge in the room. The bathroom is small but it works perfect with plenty of hot water. Just  around the corner we ate our Turkish breakfast at a little cafe with a super nice owner. It is also a great place to have a glass of wine. Istanbul itself was a fabulous stay and I encourage all people to visit - don't let the media scare you away. We are so happy we went.

Great apartment, very close to the tourist points. The terrace and the kitchen were very handy. Mustafa helped us with any questions and helped us organize a taxi to the airport. I recommend this place to everyone visiting Istanbul
Местоположение отличное, все рядом, Мустафа очень гостеприимный, проинструктировал, дал рекомендации по интересным местам. Терраса на крыше очень располагает к душевным завтракам и ужинам!)
没预想的好,倒是还是很实惠,地理位置超棒,楼顶超级棒,但是我们住的是一楼,所以有一些小虫子,开窗透气也不是很方便｡
Sava's place was great. A fantastic location near very touristic places but close to transport to get to other places. He was super helpful and answered all the questions we had.

My wife and I were very excited to stay at this wonderful little spot in Istanbul. Our host was incredibly gracious. Since we don't speak Turkish, he spoke to our taxi driver over the phone to give directions from the airport and greeted us when we arrived. The room was cozy, but very welcoming, and the rooftop has an incredible breathtaking view of the Sea of Marmara and the nearby mosques.

We had a great night walking around the cobbled streets, eating musakka, sampling Turkish delights, and drinking salep! The location is a 15 minute walk from many great spots to visit (Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, etc), and there is a great coffee shop downstairs with WiFi where we sat and worked and had Türk Khavesi (Turkish coffee) and çay (tea).

We would definitely recommend this spot to travelers looking for an affordable spot with easy access to the sights and sounds of Istanbul.
Great spot! Definitely has more of a hotel feel than most Airbnbs... But that suited my needs perfectly. Excellent value and location.

La casa muy buena, limpia y la terraza con buenas vistas. El anfitrion muy servicial, ayuda con todo y esta en contacto contigo si fuese necesario.
Lo menos bueno es que en mi opinion esta un poco alejado (5minutos a pie de la mezquita azul). No es mucho pero de la parte de Galata esta lejos.
everything was perfect

I came to Istanbul for 5 nights in December. Our flight arrived very late, but a late check in was not a problem at all. This place has the best location and it was also very easy to find. Room was very clean and cozy. Heat and shower also worked very well. All in all, Savas's place is more like a tiny hotel, than a local apartment, but very lovely in any way. Would visit again anytime. :-)

The place is small, but really all a single traveler needs. It would be cramped for a traveling couple. I found it a little small even for myself, but open the window and you forget about that. I was in room #3 which is at ground level. Bring your Apple TV, iPad, and/or HDMI cable. There is a TV, but I could not get it to work. The internet is decent. For some strange reason the electricity in the city went out for several hours. This was no fault of Mustafa's though. Just beware when traveling to Turkey! The place is really clean, and the bed is comfortable!!!! Enjoy! I recommend it.
Замечательное расположение аппартаментов в историческом центре. Постоянная связь хозяев и их коллег по поводу заселения. Отличный вид на Босфор с крыши.

The location was great for exploring the city- only about a 5 min walk to Aya Sofia and the Topkapi Palace, very easy to find as Savas directions were great. Lots of local bars and restaurants within an easy walk. Just be aware that the kitchen is shared with the other guests - which was never a problem. We were there in January and it was a lovely warm place to retreat back to out of the snow.
Mustafa is nice and friendly. He even ordered a taxi for me early in the morning.

房东很热心,积极为你解决问题｡这位置附近有相当多的旅馆,在淡季其实无需预订,可以直接过来一家一家挑选｡
这家非常干净整洁,公共区域有洗衣机､烧水机､咖啡机,有各种杯子和红茶､土耳其咖啡,你可以好好利用它们,悠闲地在屋顶上看海上日出｡
Its a great location, close to main attraction. Tram station is walkable, grocery shop is next door and the place is clean, cozy and warm.
Location is very good, close to all place for tourist. Easy contact to the host and get answer fast. Strong recommend!

I didn't get a chance to meet Savas but Mustafa greeted us and was fantastic! Really helpful, sent me all sorts of suggestions for places to visit and eat. The room was super clean, spacious and comfortable. Would definitely stay again  - thanks!
It was a great location and there is great food around.
Great location. Mustafa is the best host! He made sure we would be able to find the place, then gave us tips and recommendations how/where to go. Highly recommended!

perfect!
Although it takes a little time to get the room from the tram station, Sultanahumet, very good apartment it was!!!
他の皆さんのﾚﾋﾞｭｰ通り､本当にとても良い部屋､良いﾎｽﾄです!!
近隣のお店の方々もとてもﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰで､安心してｳﾛｳﾛできます｡
屋上の景色は写真通り本当に美しくて､反対側のごちゃごちゃした景色もｼﾞﾌﾞﾘｱﾆﾒに出てきそうな雰囲気で私はとても好きです｡
料理ができるｷｯﾁﾝはありませんが､ｸﾞﾗｽ等の食器､ﾎﾟｯﾄ､ﾁｬｲはあります｡
#3は1階なので､重い荷物のある場合でも楽でした｡
部屋は9~10帖ぐらいの広さかな｡広いとは言えないけれどｽｰﾂｹｰｽ2個広げられるｽﾍﾟｰｽは十分あります｡冷蔵庫もあり､ｺﾝﾊﾟｸﾄで無駄がなく過ごしやすい部屋でした｡
とにかく､ﾎｽﾄ､立地､部屋､周辺環境､その他いろいろ含め､ｺｽﾄﾊﾟﾌｫｰﾏﾝｽがめっちゃ高い部屋でした｡絶対おすすめです!!!
Clean room. Good communication with hosts.
Все отлично!!!!

Sava's place was great. It's nearby the coastline and walking distance from shops, places to dine, mosques and more. We were in Istanbul for a 16 hour layover and the location allowed us to see many things within a short time frame. The room itself was clean and comfy. Thank you!
Perfect place to stay, safe, clean, close to all the sights. I watched the sunrise from the roof terrace! Will stay here again

Savas' place is situated near the most frequented historic sites of Istambul, still it is quiet. There is a highly rated fish restaurant 50ms from the place, which we enjoyed twice during our 5-day stay. The view of the city and the Marble sea is spectacular from the roof terrace. And you can't miss the muezzines' call to the five daily prayers even if you wanted to. But hey, you are in Istanbul!

The place is in a great location, 10 min from Hagia Sofia and the Blue Mosque. Savas arranged transit for me from and to the airport. A warm greeting with a cup of Turkish coffee on the roof top terrace upon arrival. Will definitely stay there again!
Very nice view and the host is friendly. Also there's all the stuff you might need during the travel.
Great location and clean. I would definitely go back again!
A great base from which to explore an incredible city!  Make sure you head up to the roof terrace
Great location very close to Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia. Savas was very friendly and communicative and the check in was perfect even though we arrived late at night. I would recommend.

Lovely place, with a very nice terrace with great views. Excellent location, 5 minutes walking from Hagya Sophia. If I come back to Istanbul, I would repeat and I recommend it! The landlord was very helpful and flexible!

So weit so gut, 
der Lärm war schon störend (EG Zimmer). Gastgeber hat aber alles getan um uns zufrieden zustellen. 
Das Bett war eine Zumutung und auf meine Beschwerde hin wurde es sofort ausgetauscht.
Fantastic place!

A really nice room, clean and well maintained with a very nice bathroom. A little noisy being on the ground floor, but not a problem. Nice shared roof terrace with a great view. Location is good, a few minutes walk to the seafront and 5 mins walk to restaurants and bars.
The description of the apartment is quite deceptive. The apartment is far behind of what could be possible called luxurious.

I only spend 24h in Istanbul.
The room was very clean and close to the great mosques. The neighborhood is really nice and the view on the roof is very beautiful.

Very clean room and balcony has insane views. However from the pictures I assumed the balcony was part of the room however it was for all guests' uses. Very good location, close to the mosques and the square.

Savas' place is exactly as described. It is in an excellent location, very clean, and the rooftop view is awesome. We were even allowed to keep our bags in the room for a while after we checked out so that we could pick up later before our flight. I recommend this place if you are visiting for a few days and plan to see lots of the sights in Sultanahmet.

After what seemed a long ride from the airport, I was dropped off at the location. I was welcomed and shown  the room. The room was perfect. At first I thought I was in the middle of nowhere when I started walking, then I turned a corner and realized I was blocks from everything I wanted to see, the bazaar, the mosques, the old city. Turkey is beautiful and the people very friendly.
Nice and clean apartment in a decent location.
Muy bien todo!

Хорошая комната прямо в историческом центре города (около 8 минут пешком до Голубой мечети, недалеко от набережной). Качественный ремонт, мебель. Великолепный панорамный вид с террасы на Босфор и мечети. Комната была на первом этаже и вечером иногда были слышны разговоры людей на улице, так что рекомендую захватить беруши, чтобы выспаться.

Good location and cheap, however this is not a full flat as advertised and is little more than a room. There is access to a coffee machine and the balcony, but they are shared. Also, the bedding had stains on it which we weren't too impressed with. For the price, it was ok, but the description is misleading as this certainly isn't "luxury".
This was my second stay at Savas's place. I love the location and the staff is very friendly. Highly recommended!
Clean, close to central tourist area, close to the water. 5 minute walk to Sultanahmet metro station. Beautiful terrace.
Savas is very nice, he help us in everything

Amazing place, clean and modern and with classic touch. The host communication is outstanding and very helpful. Definitely recommend this place for those who's looking explore the main landscapes of Istanbul.
Clean and nice

Savas's place i great. Clean and comfortable. It is very near to sultanahmet area too. Very walkable. The rooftop balcony is super nice. The view is great. Can see blue mosque and hagia sofea from there. Thanks for the experience. I highly recommend this place :)
5 stars. The apartment was easy to find, close to everything, and host was extremely helpful. Would stay again.

Savas building is simple, clean and great if you're staying in Istanbul for 3-5 days. It's located in a cozy and quiet neighborhood which we really enjoyed. There were tons of restaurants in a short walking distance which was helpful in the morning and evening. The roof deck view exceeded my expectations and it was very relaxing to spend time up there in the evening (and during the day). If you are just looking for a place to rest your head and shower, this is the spot. There is a washing machine and a small kitchen, but I would say the roof deck is the real treasure.

The location of Savas's place is perfect- a short walk from the water, major attractions, good restaurants, and public transportation. The building has a small kitchen on the top floor and a terrace with beautiful views. The room was clean and well-equipped. 

I didn't meet Savas, but he was very responsive through messages. I did meet the housekeeper, Lale, who was very sweet and welcoming. I would definitely stay here again!

My stay was great, the place was clean, quite and comfortable, Savas was very friendly and it was very easy to communicate with him, the check in was quite easy and straightforward as Savas was waiting for my arrival.
Everything was as listed, had a pleasant stay. Thanks Savas

Das Zimmer liegt ca. 5 Gehminuten (bergauf) von der Hagia Sofia und Sultanahmed Moschee entfernt, also super zentral. 
Ich musste bei der Anreise etwas suchen, aber ein Freund von Savas kam nach einem Telefongespräch heraus und hat mich auf der Straße empfangen, also super Service. 
Bei Eurer Anreise am besten bis Sultan Ahmed Station der Straßenbahn fahren und dann (bergab) von (Hidden by Airbnb) (oder mit Stadtplan) bis zum Zimmer führen lassen.
Klima, Kühlschrank und Sat TV ist vorhanden, habe ich aber nicht genutzt. 
Das Bad war sauber und heißes Wasser beim Duschen auch durchgehend sofort ausreichend da.

This place is in a prime location. Walking distance to the blue mosque and haga Sofia. The place is good for a couple nights not longer than that. It can be a little noisy outside in the early morning. The host came in our room late at night to get the TV fixed even once we said no. Savas was great and easily contactable about any issues and offered to help as much as possible.

Muy bien el lugar solo que la gente no lo ubica y la dirección no la
Conoce casi nadie
A little hard to find the first time, but in a great location. Bring good walking shoes for Istanbul's  cobblestones and hills.
The host is great and gave all the information needed for staying in Istanbul. The place is walkable to various attraction and many restaurants.
Great, come back.

We had a good stay at Savas's apartment. It was really close (& an easy walk) to a many of the principal sights. The apartment was clean and comfortable with access to a shared kitchen and roof terrace.

Quarto muito limpo e localizaçao sensacional. Foi um pouco dificil de achar ao chegarmos a noite de taxi do aeroporto. Melhor chegar de dia.
Savas nos acompanhou por mensagens até entrarmos no apartamento e foi muito solícito.
Decent location close to the sea and within an authentic Turkish neighborhood.

My husband and I flew into Istanbul very late night and we checked in at 1:30am despite that Savas was super responsive and we checked in and settled with great ease. The space is cosy and the place is at a comfortable walking distance from all main attractions and a lot of great restaurants. Cabs are easily available at a 3 min walk. Great experience and highly recommended.

En realidad viene a ser un Hotel, fueron muy amables y estuvieron pendientes a nuestra llegada, la habitación básica pero si piensan tener una estadía corta pues no es mala elección, lo mejor de todo es la vista desde la terraza.

The house's location is well because near all the famous place....but if you don't know where the house...maybe you would difficult to find it....and I felt not easy to contact the host...for the environment in the room.. Not the same as the Airbnb's photo...but if need me give a summary...all is ok for this house....thanks Savas...
Nice place

Хорошее местоположение, на самом деле рядом с Султанахмет, но как только проходишь под ж/д дорогой, райончик кажется немного забытым, хотя это только ощущения. Рядом магазинчики, рестораны на каждом углу. До моря 3 минуты ходьбы, можно выйти на классную набережную. Поднимитесь на крышу! Наверху открывается потрясающий вид на море и Голубую Мечеть. Наверху есть маленькая кухня, где можно сделать чай/кофе. Комната красивая, стильная, уютная, что не скажешь о кровати. Нам было крайне неудобно, матрас "деревянный". Во время нашего проживания случился потоп: прорвало трубу на крыше, и вся вода лилась по лестнице куда-то вниз. Хорошо, что не залила номера (не уверены насчёт номера на цокольном этаже). В здании не было никого, я звонила хозяину, отправила ему видео и сообщение. Муж метался по округе, чтобы понять, где найти кого-то, чтобы остановить потоп. Хорошо, что минут через 40 пришла женщина, которая нас заселяла и стала метаться вместо мужа. За реагирование на проблему жирный минус. Понимаем, что потоп - не вина хозяина, но вот реагирование на проблему (тем более такого масштаба) могло бы быть более быстрым. Хотя справедливости ради отмечу, что когда в ванной перестал работать слив унитаза, а также были перебои с горячей водой (её не было), я написала хозяину, к вечеру проблемы были устранены. В общем, рекомендовать не стала бы. Но если решите заезжать, берите беруши, т.к. слышимость очень хорошая. 
Итог. Плюсы: вид, комната, расположение, инфраструктура. Минусы: общение (ситуация с потопом), матрас, слышимость.
Nice location
Very nice place in the middle of the old town.
Great location, just 5-10 mins walk to blue mosque :) Nice and clean and comfy :)

Savas place was perfect for seeing the sights in Sultanahmet! Only 5-10 minutes walk from the Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, and Topkapi Palace as well as tons of restaurants and shops. The room was very clean and comfortable. We also loved the view from the terrace.  Would definitely stay again!

Номер нам понравилась. Хозяин быстро отвечает на сообщения. Нас встретила и разместила приветливая девушка(забыла как ее зовут) Она говорит на русском, что очень нам облегчило задачу.
Всегда была готова прийти на помощь. Терраса  на верху имеет вид на море и мечеть. Очень красиво, но не помешало бы ее облагородить. В номере чисто. На кухне имеется микроволновка, холодильник, но он был и в номере, посуда, фужеры, стиральная машина. Плиты нет, но и необходимости в ней нет в Стамбуле.  Готовая вкусная еда на каждом шагу продается. До моря спуститься минут 10 максимум даже чуть меньше. 
До Голубой мечети идти минут 15.
Минимаркеты рядом с домом. 
Из недостатков: не было фена в номере, ночами шумно за окном, слив в душе и туалете плохо работал.
В целом все понравилось.
Savas is very friendly and helpful. Check in and check out very convenient. The location is good. Would recommend this studio

Staying at the mansion was excellent! The location was perfect if you're going to be visiting a lot of the attractions as it's a walking distance from plenty of restaurants and things to do. It's located on a quiet street, so noise wasn't a problem while sleeping. The room was the perfect size for 2 of us as we had little luggage and were barely in the room. I think this is a perfect spot if you're going to be touring the city all day as we were. Make sure you spend your mornings and/or nights on the terrace. It's a beautiful view of the city and Bosphorus! Note that this room is on the first floor, so we kept the blinds closed most of the time, which left the room pretty dark. I highly recommend staying here!
Amazing location and host was very good at replying to all our messages and was very accommodating. Would highly recommend this place especially for small groups or solo travelers.
Savas placed was exactly what I expected on the listing. Hot water went out for 2 days. Savas managed to get someone out to fix it. The area is safe. I recommend the place for location and value
Все было супер!!!
Clean and central location. Near by Restuarant and ocean .

Awesome location for tourists. Nevertheless overrated! The quality of the room for this price range is low.  I therefore do not understand why so many people gave such a high rating.  The high grades might only come from the location.
good service

We loved our stay! Is only 5 minutes walking from the Blue Mosque. The building is beautiful, and the terrace has great views from the Bosphorus. Is not a common apartment, is an hotel boutique. The staff is very kind, we are very happy wit the experience!

Sava is very approachable, easygoing, friendly and wiling to help. You can reach him and solve the problem any time. He helped us to solve the bed issue when it was already late night. He also helped us to arrange transport to the airport in the early morning. The apartment is new, clean and cozy. You can easily find restaurants and grocery shop near by.
Lo recomiendo, es como una habitación de hotel y está buen ubicado. Todo limpio y acorde a las fotos.
Rien que l'accès à la terrasse pour le lever et le coucher du soleil c'est magique !

Savas place is central but kind of difficult for a taxi driver without a GPS to find it. loved the neighborhood and was very close to the blue mosque and other famous attractions. it is on the 1st floor so expect a bit of noise from outside.
Perfect apartment! Specifically in terms of accessbility to the city-centor, cleanness, flexibility! I strongly recommend this apartment!
Great value and amazing location. The place is modern and clean, while pretty basic.
Very nice place, clean, good location, and Savas was very responsive to my messages.
Basic, nice and clean, easy access to area attractions, great and timely communication from the host. Would stay again!

name: Design studio in Copacabana
summary: Noble street, calm and safity.The fourth better street in the neighborhood,close to stores, restaurants and bars. Just one block from the Siqueira Campos subway station,24/7 doorman, total safe,studio decorated by a designer, new and well equipted.
space: Espaço ideal para casal moderno que tem como praticidade seu lema, apartamento funcional, com todos os confortos, ar-condicionado porém bem ventilado, agradável, silencioso.Cozinha moderna com cooktop e geladeira, espaços planejados,Wi-Fi com alta velocidade e  várias opções de canais por assinatura e banho quente e frio, com ducha potente.
description: Noble street, calm and safity.The fourth better street in the neighborhood,close to stores, restaurants and bars. Just one block from the Siqueira Campos subway station,24/7 doorman, total safe,studio decorated by a designer, new and well equipted. Espaço ideal para casal moderno que tem como praticidade seu lema, apartamento funcional, com todos os confortos, ar-condicionado porém bem ventilado, agradável, silencioso.Cozinha moderna com cooktop e geladeira, espaços planejados,Wi-Fi com alta velocidade e  várias opções de canais por assinatura e banho quente e frio, com ducha potente.  Porteiro 24 horas em rua super tranquila do bairro de Copacabana. Rua e prédio residencial, com muitas arvores, que favorece a um clima ameno e agradável de verão.Acesso fácil ao apartamento, perto do metrô e de todas as paradas de ônibus do bairro, a 3 quarteirões da praia de Copacabana, ideal para a Copa do Mundo.    Estarei a disposição para dar dicas dos melhores restaurantes, bares, compras e divers
neighborhood_overview: Vizinhança calma e amigável, onde o dono da banca de jornal conhece e fala com todos da rua, porteiros receptivos a ajudar sempre, com vagas de estacionamento por toda a rua.Perto de ótimos restaurantes, das mais diversas cozinhas, a 2 quarteirões do bucólico Bairro Peixoto, com feirinha aos sábados pela manhã. Apartamento situado no coração do bairro de Copacabana, perto das compras.
notes: Apartamento decorado por designer e totalmente reformado para melhor atender as comodidades atuais, bem ventilado,  possui refrigeração de ar condicionado , é uma rua bem arborizada e muito ventilada, o hóspede não sentirá calor algum.
transit: Estação do metrô da Siqueira Campos a um quarteirão do apartamento, estações de paradas de ônibus também muito perto, para todas as direções da cidade, a 7 minutos a pé da praia de Copacabana e a 2 minutos de um ponto seguro de táxi. Quando vier do aeroporto para o prédio, peça para vir pelo túnel Rebouças e pegar o túnel velho ( antigo túnel de ligação dos bairros de Botafogo e Copacabana) ou pegar o ônibus ´´Frescão`` no aeroporto e pedir para saltar na altura da rua Santa Clara e serão apenas 3 quarteirões até a rua Anita Garibaldi..
access: Porteiro 24 horas em rua super tranquila do bairro de Copacabana. Rua e prédio residencial, com muitas arvores, que favorece a um clima ameno e agradável de verão.Acesso fácil ao apartamento, perto do metrô e de todas as paradas de ônibus do bairro, a 3 quarteirões da praia de Copacabana, ideal para a Copa do Mundo.
interaction: Estarei a disposição para dar dicas dos melhores restaurantes, bares, compras e diversões, nada como dicas a partir da visão de um carioca da gema. Estarei presente durante o seu check in para melhor atender.
house_rules: Use e cuidem bem do apartamento, mantendo limpo,não tenho regras contra fumantes, peço apenas cuidado com os móveis novos e com os aparelhos domésticos,animais é permitido no prédio, mas peço apenas que zelem pelos tapetes.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Brazilian, living in Rio de Janeiro. Working in advertising with local brands. I enjoy worldwide travel and hosting people from every culture.

reviews.comments: Excelente servicio y atención! El departamento es muy lindo, cómodo y muy bien ubicado. Las fotos muestran tal cual es el departamento y la zona es segura y muy bonita. Recomendable 100%!
Everything was great: the apartment is really cut, the location perfect (not far away to Copacabana), the fast check-in and out. Thank you for all
Apto bem pensado e com ótima localização.

Apartamento design legal, internet, tv, sound sistem e muito bem localizado em Copacabana. Cozinha completa com fogão, geladeira, forno e o Adriano deixou alguns itens de "necessidades básicas" tanto para cozinha, quanto para banheiro, tipo café, sabonete, toalhas limpas, roupa de cama, etc. Apto realmente tem o que vc precisa, estava bem limpo e o Adriano sempre muito prestativo e atencioso ao responder minhas mensagens. O que deixou um pouco a desejar foi o chuveiro, que não estava esquentando, mas acredito que isso já tenha sido resolvido. Agradeço ao Adriano por nos alugar a casa e com certeza recomendo um estadia lá.
All was very nice. Adriano was very helfull. I recomand this flat to everybody !

Studio simplesmente fabuloso! Ambiente muitíssimo aconchegante seguro e familiar, no coração de
Copacabana, exatamente como nas fotos. Não precisamos nos preocupar com absolutamente nada por o Adriano é um excelente anfitrião. Fez questão de nos acompanhar e dar suporte durante toda a estadia. O Studio do Adriano ganhou medalha de ouro de Ap preferencial e, ele, de melhor anfitrião. Obrigado e até a volta, amigo.

Apartamento impecável igual as fotos, excelente localização, perto de pontos de ônibus, padarias, rua tranquila. Adriano ajudou super na minha estadia, respondendo no mesmo momento todas nossas dúvidas.
The host canceled this reservation 385 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Agradecemos a Adriano por la excelente predisposición, siempre fué muy atento.el lugar está ubicado estratégicamente en una zona muy tranquila a sólo 3 cuadras del mar, 1 cuadra del supermercado y 1 cuadra del metro
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Apartamento muito bonito, limpo e organizado. Contendo items essenciais pra quem já chega na correria de viagem. Móveis elegantes, internet veloz, tv com todos os canais por assinatura em HD, cama extremamente confortável, cozinha equipada, porteiros educados e bem informados. Adriano também forneceu roupas de cama e banho novas a cada semana, e esteve pronto a tirar dúvidas a qualquer momento. Bem localizado, bairro silencioso e com muitas opções de lazer por perto. Muito próximo do metrô e da praia. Excelente lugar para ficar. Valeu muito a pena e recomendo fortemente.

Localização ideal para quem quer estar perto de tudo e dormir uma noite tranquila e silenciosa. Apartamento bem equipado e confortável com tudo o que é necessário. Porteiros e vizinhanças simpáticos e prestativos. Foi uma boa experiencia.

O apartamento é ótimo, exatamente como as fotos! O ar condicionado, banheiro, cozinha e demais instalações funcionam perfeitamente. O lugar é tranquilo e bem localizado, super recomendo a estadia! E o Adriano foi um ótimo anfitrião, atencioso e pontual!
Muy lindo y cerca de todos muy atinados todos tus consejos Los restaurantes q me dijiste simplemente excelentes
Adriano foi super atencioso e o apartamento é muito bacana e bem localizado. Tudo está novinho e limpo. Recomendo! A única ressalva é que fica no térreo, um certo barulho da rua é ouvido.

A estadia foi otima! O apartamento muito limpo, muito aconchegante, exatamente como esta nas fotos! Adriano e um otimo anfitrião sempre respondeu as minhas mensagens de forma solicita e prestativa. Recomendo a todos
Adriano super prestativo, responde rápido as dúvidas. O apto é igualzinho da foto. Ótima localização, super perto do metrô Siqueira Campos, comércio, restaurantes, praia de Copacabana.

Oi Adriano, já estamos voltando prá casa, agora na conexão de Sampa.
Foi tudo bem, acomodação perfeita. O pessoal da portaria, gentil e atencioso!
Um abraço,  bom fim de ano!
Ana Maria
Ambiente limpo, organizado, moderno, exatamente como nas fotos. O Adriano foi super atencioso e me respondeu super rápido todas as vezes que precisei. Super indico!

Adriano ist ein sehr netter, zuvorkommender und zuverlässiger Gastgeber. Die Wohnung liegt ruhig und trotzdem zentral, sie ist sehr gepflegt. Durch einen 24-Stunden Service an der Rezeption hat man Sicherheit und Ansprechpartner die sehr nett und hilfsbereit sind. Metro, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und Strand befinden sich in walking distance. Sehr empfehlenswert. Paola
Apartamento super gracinha, aconchegante.. Cozinha bem equipada, cama boa, tudo funcionando bem! Adriano é um ótimo anfitrião, é super atencioso!!!  Indico demais

Adriano fue muy amable con nosotros y respondió rápidamente nuestras dudas. 
El departamento es muy acogedor y silencioso. Al llegar encontramos todo en condiciones,  el departamento muy limpio, toallas limpias, jabón en el baño y agua mineral en la heladera. En sí el departamento esta muy equipado en general y tambirn para poder cocinar.  Encantada volvería a hospedarme allí.
Apartamento super lindo, todo equipado, comporta confortavelmente 4 pessoas, o bairro é super (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza recomendo!
Studio muito bem localizado e com uma infra estrutura muito moderna! Foi excelente o período que passamos lá, e pretendemos voltar! Adriano sempre muito solícito e cortês. Recomendo a todos!

Adriano's apt was the ideal place for our stay in Rio. Only one block and a half from subway, next to several bus stops and three blocks from the beach were you can get the express bus that takes you to the airport. The neighbourhood is great, you have several supermarkets and restaurants and is walking distance to other interesting places. The apt itself is very nicely decorated, clean, easy to check in/out and with a doorman 24/7. Adriano was the perfect guest, made sure we had everything we needed and was very responsive for any doubt and recommendation. We'll came back to Rio and for sure we'll stay at his place again!

The place was very nice, and very close to the subway station 3 minutes by walk, and close to the copacabana beach 5minutes !! The ideal place to visit Rio. 
I Will recommend.

Thank to you Adriano !

O Adriano é extremamente atencioso e prestativo. Se preocupou com todos os detalhes. O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, muito limpo, agradável, equipado com tudo, chuveiro excelente, rua tranquila e segura, muito próximo ao (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza irei recomendar e reservar nas próximas viagens ao Rio.

Appartement parfaitement situé dans Copacabana.
Irréprochable sur la propreté, cet appartement moderne et confortable se situe dans un immeuble gardé sous surveillance permanente par un gardien.
Il se situe à moins de 5 minutes de la plage et du métro et est entouré de nombreux commerces et de restaurants. 
Adriano à su se montrer disponible et réactif quand nous avions des questions à lui poser.
C'est un très bon appartement pour séjourner dans Copacabana.

Perfeito.Tudo limpo, Adriano deixou cerveja na geladeira e café. A rua é silenciosa, fica próximo do comércio, do metrô e da praia. Só evite andar com objetos de valor a mostra, ocorre muitos furtos, tanto a noite quanto de dia.
Apartamento dentro das expectativas! Muito aconchegante! Proximo a tudo! Recomendo

O anfitrião nos fez sentir a vontade. Sempre que tínhamos dúvida entrávamos em contato com o Adriano e éramos respondidos prontamente. O apto é exatamente como descrito. A rua é bem localizada, arborizada e tranquila.

Fui muito bem recebido pelo Adriano. Sempre solicito, me ajudou em tudo que precisei prontamente. O apartamento condiz exatamente com a descrição e fotos, e foi perfeito para a estadia de 4 pessoas. Equipe da portaria também foi sempre muito atenciosa. Quando retornar ao RJ certamente irei procurá-lo.

Adriano fez com que nos sentíssemos super à vontade. Sempre foi muito atencioso e respondeu de imediato. O apartamento é muito bonito e confortável, exatamente como mostram as fotos. A localização também é ótima e próximo de tudo. Recomendo o apartamento e pretendo voltar.

Tudo tranquilo; o apê é um achado; a rua, uma graça – das melhores de Copa. Adriano sempre foi atencioso. E pegar e entregar as chaves com o porteiro facilita muito. Experiência muito tranquila e agradável, recomendo.

O apartamento é exatamente como descrito: pequeno mas super funcional. Tivemos uma otima estadia.. Tudo funcionava super bem, a tv é otima, os eletrodomesticos tambem..
O apartamento é no terreo, e isso me incomodou logo que cheguei, pois da pra rua e a porta de entrada é exatamente na frente do porteiro.. Mas apesar de tudo, nao é barulhento e isso acabou nao sendo um problema!!
Super recomendoo!!!
Ótimo apartamento! Muito bem localizado e é exatamente como na descrição e nas fotos. Adriano foi muito atencioso!
Bom apto. Bem localizado. Bom preço.

Nous avons passé un agréable week end. Adriano a été très réactif et arrangeant. Il s'est toujours rendu disponible pour répondre à nos interrogations et ce très rapidement ! L'appartement est fidèle aux photos, très bien situé et propre. Merci encore Adriano.

Adriano siempre respondio a nuestras inquietudes. El departamento es muy lindo y moderno y se encuentra en una zona tranquila. Hay un sereno en el edificio las 24 hs.
Lo recomiendo !

Local privilegiado em copacabana. Anfitrião muito prestativo.
Local perfeito para dois.

Muy lindo el departamento. Limpio,  con todo lo necesario para la estadía. Fuimos 3 personas y nos sentimos muy a gusto. Dentro de Copacabana, en la zona comercial, a pocas cuadras de la playa, excelente ubicación. ADRIANO en contacto permanente por mail y SMS, muy amable siempre.

Adorei o apartamento, além de ser aconchegante tem ótima localização, sem contar a precisão de atenção disponibilizada pelo Adriano.

Espero voltar mais vezes.

O apartamento é bem parecido com as fotos! O fato dele estar localizado no térreo foi muito útil, já que nós saímos constantemente do prédio. A rua é extremamente calma, então não tivemos problemas com ruídos. Próximo à estação de metrô, supermercados e restaurantes. Muito bom!!!

O espaço é realmente como nas fotos. Pequeno porém muito confortavel, perfeito para um casal. Fica a 2 quarteirões do metro em uma rua super tranquila e arborizada. Unico ponto negativo é que o apto fica no terreo e a janela não fecha totalmente por conta da tubulação do ar condicionado, o que resulta em um péssimo isolamente acústico e por conta disso durante o final de semana acordamos de madrugada com o barulho de algumas pessoas passando na rua e conversando alto.
Apartamento muito bom, ar condicionado funciona perfeitamente! Localização boa e facilidade no check in...Rua tranquila e com tudo perto.

O anfitrião foi diretamente questionado se o espaço estava preparado para quatro pessoas, sendo duas crianças, no entanto, não havia toalhas e lençóis suficientes. O chuveiro é péssimo para dar banho em crianças que precisam de auxílio pois é impossível não tomar banho junto. Se você vai em casal provavelmente não terá problemas. Também me incomodou o fato do anfitrião ter alterado o valor da diária após eu fazer solicitação de reserva. O apartamento é bem localizado, limpo e moderno.

O apartamento é bem confortável e é exatamente como nas fotos.
Ar condicionado, chuveiro são muito bons.
Localização ótima, fica a 1 quadra do metro.
Os porteiros são muito legais e atenciosos e o Adriano foi um excelente anfitrião responde a mensagens super rápido, nos ajudou prontamente quando surgiu um pequeno problema no chuveiro (que foi resolvido rapidamente pelo Zé Porteiro).
Apartamento excelente, ótima localização e anfitrião muito atencioso. Quero voltar sempre que possível!
Great communication with the host, the place is at the groundfloor so a bit noisy in the morning, otherwise its cool.
Adriano muito receptivo, apartamento pequeno, mas muito confortável, localização muito boa! Recomendo!
Adriano foi um otimo anfitriao. O apartamento é como nas fotografias e muito bem localizado.
O apartamento é incrível, super bem decorado e estava impecável. Além do mais a localização é ótima, numa rua tranquila! O anfitrião foi super prestativo, tivemos uma maravilhosa estadia!
O anfitrião Adriano foi muito prestativo desde o início. O apartamento é muito bem localizado e limpo. Adorei a estadia e voltarei com certeza.

Commençons plutôt par les points positifs pour ne pas paraitre trop méchant par la suite. Appartement très bien situé dans Copacabana, à 7-8 min à pied de la plage, et à 2-3 min du Métro. Communication avec Adriano parfaite. Appartement cosy mais quelques points négatifs tout de même. 
Voici les points négatifs, une des fenêtres du salon reste en permanence ouverte, pour y laisser passer un tuyau de l'évacuation de la climatisation, bref, Isolation du bruit et du froid à l'extérieur 0/10. L'appartement se trouve au rez de chaussée, certes c'est l'idéal pour les bagages quand on arrive et pour ramener des courses, mais c'est au même endroit que se trouve un gardien (Jour et Nuit), et ils sont malheureusement un peu bruyant, donc un conseil, prenez des boules quies. La cuisine n'est vraiment pas fonctionnel, très peu de couverts, ou de verres, vraiment à renouveler. Et dernier point un peu effrayant je vous l'accorde, mais personnellement, nous aurions aimé le savoir en lisant les commentaires, il y a des cafards, et oui pas que un mais des, nous en avons trouvés 4 et pas des tout petits :-((((. Encore une fois Adriano, ce commentaire n'a rien contre vous, votre communication est parfaite, vous semblez être un gentil garçon, mais honnêtement le statut de SuperHost est à mes yeux un peu exagéré. Il y pas mal de choses à améliorer dans l'appartement.
Here are the negatives, one of the windows of the living room is permanently open, to let pass a pipe of evacuation of the air conditioning, in short, Isolation of the noise and the cold outside 0/10. The apartment is on the ground floor, although it is ideal for luggage when arriving and to bring back shopping, but it is in the same place that there is a guard (Day and Night), and they are Unfortunately a bit noisy, so a tip, take earplugs. The kitchen is really not functional, very few cutlery, or glasses, really to renew. And last point a bit scary I grant you, but personally, we would have liked to know it by reading the reviews, there are cockroaches, and yes not that one but of the, we found 4 and not very small: - Adriano, this comment has nothing against you, your communication is perfect, you seem to be a nice boy, but honestly the status of SuperHost is in my eyes a little exaggerated. Things to improve in the apartment.

A localização do apartamento é excelente. Fica em uma tranquila rua muito próxima ao metrô e a poucas quadras da praia. Nas proximidades existe todo o tipo de comércio e serviços. O apartamento é muito agradável. A internet é excelente. O espaço ainda possui TV a cabo e ar-condicionado. A cozinha é pequena, mas cumpre bem o papel. O prédio é seguro e há porteiro 24 horas por dia. Adriano foi um excelente anfitrião, sempre comunicativo e flexível (permitiu check-in e check-out com tolerância de horários). Recomendo muito o espaço e certamente voltarei em outras oportunidades.
Just as described in picture fast and reliable Internet. Some noise from sidewalk outside. Had a Cool draft from the window since it doesn't close. Overall decent place to stay
Ótimo local!
Adorei o apartamento. Muito bom e exatamente como anunciado. Adriano, o proprietário, também é (Email hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei, bem como indicarei para amigos. Obrigado!

Caracaaa ... eu adorei a minha estadia no estúdio do Sr Adriano, limpo, organizado e ótima localização (realmente perto de TUDO). Não tive muito contato com Sr Adriano mais ele foi até o estúdio desejar boas vindas e entregar alguns itens de higiene porém o mesmo ficou a disposição no que eu (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei outras vezes !!! Galera eu mais que recomendo a descrição e as fotos são 100% verídicas. Abraços Sr. Adriano até logo !
The host canceled this reservation 180 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Apartamento fiel às fotos, bem localizado, próximo à estação de metro(o que ajuda muito) e de mercados, lojas e farmácias. Boa portaria, 24hrs, rua tranquila e bonita. Poderiam ocorrer algumas melhorias no banheiro e na janela, mas são pequenos pontos. O anfitrião é atencioso, educado, flexível quanto a horários e compreensível. Um bom lugar para casais.

Adriano's place was well located and by far the cleanest airbnb we (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was good and we got the keys easily.

Two minuses however:
- The pillows did not have pillowcases.
- During the second night of our stay, someone started violently banging the bars in front of our window and then the door. The doorman let this person in after a while, they went up and then came back. This continued about 3am-6am, preventing any attempts at sleeping. Although I understand this is not the host's fault, be wary that the apartment is ground floor and located in the busy Copacabana area.
Espaço como descrito. Excelente localização.

O apartamento é tal qual nas fotos. Próximo de todos os serviços e da praia de Copacabana. Adriano responde em segundos o que facilita o contato.
O apartamento poderia ter uma máquina de café... A janela tem um defeito e uma parte fica sempre aberta. O resto perfeito!

Apartamento aconchegante, bem localizado e muito confortável.
O Adriano é um ótimo host, a comunicação sempre foi rápida e eficiente e ele sempre esteve à disposição para tudo o que precisávamos.
O apartamento de Adriano é lindo! Boa internet, rua tranquila, tudo é maravilhoso, voltaria a ficar lá sem dúvidas! Maravilhoso!
Ótimo apartamento!

El apartamento tiene muy buena ubicación en Copacabana, fácil de llegar. Cerca de la estación del Metro. Limpio y justo para las dos personas que nos hospedamos. Agua de cortesía, toallas y sábanas limpias. Adriano fue muy amable al recibirnos.
O apartamento é muito aconchegante, bem localizado. Eu e meus amigos fomos bem recebidos e tivemos uma ótima estada.
A localização fez toda diferença. Rua muito tranquila. Próximo ao metrô e praia. Pode se fazer tudo pedonal. Foi maravilhoso. Voltarei outras vezes.
Excelente localização. Ótimo sinal de WiFi. Cozinha com bons recursos. Cama confortável.
Excelente ubicación del lugar. La cama es cómoda. Tenía servicios como agua, café y otros. El precio es muy bueno en comparación a otras ofertas por un espacio similar.
O apartamento é bem localizado, e o Adriano é bem flexível e gentil.
Excelente ubicación de apartamento para dormir.
El lugar es muy comodo y lindo. Esta ubicado en el centro de copacabana a dos cuadras de la playa cerca de ipanema. Supermercado cerca.

On arrival . Easy access and lower floor so great for Arrival and exit. Tidy and clean and everything was there for my use. Small clean bathroom and nice warm water if required. Bed was good and comfortable. Padaria just 100 meters awsy and a good boteca too. Great place and would stay here again . Thanks Adriano
O apartamento é ótimo, bem localizado, rua tranquila e segura, tudo em perfeito funcionamento, meu retorno é certo!

Apartamento muito bonito em uma rua super tranquila e próximo de supermercados, lanchonetes, restaurantes e farmácias.

O Adriano teve todo o cuidado com a decoração do apartamento e o check in foi super fácil.

Me hospedaria novamente em outra oportunidade.
Muy bien ubicado, un espacio ideal para dos personas, muy armonioso, muy limpio y con buen gusto. Adriano siempre estuvo atento a nuestras consultas.
El departamento es muy lindo y está ubicado en una zona inmejorable. Cerca del metro, los colectivos y las playas.
Ótima localização, equipe que trabalha no prédio muito bacana, vigilância o tempo todo, ao lado do metro, rua silenciosa. Maravilhoso! Se pretende usar muito a cozinha talvez não seja o melhor lugar.

El apartamento es cómodo y esta súper bien ubicado. Adriano ha sido muy atento y siempre dispuesto. Lo único que diría en contra es que el apartamento es en la planta baja, justo al lado de la entrada al edificio y justo al lado de donde está el portero por lo cual el silencio es imposible sobretodo después de las 6 am que empieza el movimiento.
Me sentí em casa, foi uma ótima experiência nesse lugar,   Está súper cómodo,pertinho de tudo. um ambiente maravilhoso.. Excelente!!!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

O apartamento do Adriano é super confortável, aconchegante, e limpo. Bem próximo de mercados, lanchonetes, farmácias, tudo que vc precisar.  
Somente algumas quadras do posto 5 de Copacabana. Adriano também foi bastante flexível em relação ao check in. Amei a estadia e espero voltar mais vezes.

Estúdio de quarto/sala, cozinha, banheiro e também um espaço adicional atrás da cozinha com tanque, tudo decorado e limpinho. Ótima localização em Copacabana, próximo ao metrô, restaurantes, a uma distância da praia que podemos percorrer a pé. O Adriano é muito atencioso e responde as mensagens rápido, ajudando com outras dicas e também o estúdio é pet friendly, levamos a nossa gatinha e deu tudo certo! Deixo a minha recomendação aqui ao ap do Adriano e uma outra dica é comer num restaurante chamado Tipicamente que fica na esquina, lá encontramos muitas opções de comida brasileira, o local é simples mas gostamos muito e repetimos.
Ótimo o espaço do Adriano, tudo como na descrição, perfeito para duas pessoas e com ótima localização, com certeza indicarei para amigos e mais certeza ainda, voltarei!
It was a nice place, very well located... I had some issues in the apartament, but Adriano was very kind and tried his best to solve these ones.

I had a great stay at the Copacabana design studio. 
This was my 1st time using Airbnb, and while there was some initial confusion as to how to use it Adriano was more than patient with me. 
The space is very clean and is exactly how it appears in the photos.
Check in and out was very seamless, just pick up and drop off keys from the 24 hour doorman.
And like other reviews have pointed out, being on the 1st floor you will hear the noise from the street. With that being said I found the street itself to be very tranquil and quiet.
The host, Adriano, is very quick to respond to any inquiry, whether it be about the apartment or just things to do locally.
Overall a great 1st time Airbnb and I’ll look to stay again if I’m in Copacabana in the future.

Recomendo, além de limpo, organizado e estiloso, o Adriano é super gentil, nos ajudou quando precisamos. 
Iremos voltar em breve!

This place was great to get to know Rio. We stayed about a week and enjoyed nice breakfasts and dinners at the studio. It is very well located, we walked everywhere from there. The only thing it is that it is on the ground floor and it can be very noise, specially from the security guard in the hallway right next to the apartment.

Se buscam excelente localização, conforto, limpeza, ambiente com excelente design e sobretudo atenção e generosidade do anfitrião,  então reservem o apartamento do Adriano e desfrutem das maravilhas do Rio de Janeiro.
Apartamento é bem localizado, muito lindo e Adriano está sempre rápido para te ajudar.

La comunicación con Adriano fue muy fluida y siempre estuvo dispuesto a brindarnos alternativas para hacer nuestra estancia muy  agradable.
Definitivamente lo recomiendo, el departamento tiene todas las comodidades necesarias y más!
100% recomendable. Excelente ubicación
Muito boa localização e um bom apartamento..gostei...

summary: Whether it’s for business or pleasure, each unit has been meticulously designed to offer the best in furnished accommodation, including an inviting den area with 40” Smart TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen complete with 4-person central dining island. Enjoy optimal calm and comfort in the master bedroom thanks to blackout blinds, a wall-mounted Smart TV and a premium king-size memory foam mattress, while a designer bathroom features a Zen vanity and a sleek, walk-in glass rain-shower.
space: THE LIVING SPACE Whether it’s for business or pleasure, each unit has been meticulously designed to offer the best in furnished accommodation, including an inviting den area with 40” Smart TV, a personalized air-conditioning system, and a fully-equipped kitchen complete with 4-person central dining island. Enjoy optimal calm and comfort in the master bedroom thanks to blackout blinds, a wall-mounted Smart TV and a premium king-size memory foam mattress, while a designer bathroom features a Zen vanity and a sleek, walk-in glass rain-shower. Add to that unlimited high-speed Wi-Fi Internet, high-quality linens, concealed washer/dryer, Nespresso coffee machine, complementary Netflix subscription, and Simplissimmo’s extremely competitive and comprehensive guest services, and it’s easy to see why the Pierce Hotel is more than just a place to stay for the night.
