neighborhood_overview: Located in the center of all the action and surrounded by every major service, staying at Pierce Hotel really does put Montreal at your doorstep. A true walker’s paradise, this address offers direct access to both the prestigious Golden Square Mile and the bustling Downtown core with numerous cafés, elegant restaurants, and shopping options of all kinds literally around every corner. The nearby Guy-Concordia metro station connects you to the city’s most exciting attractions within minutes, and the always-lively Crescent Street and its infamous nightlife are just steps away. Why be a tourist when you can live like a local with Simplissimmo!
notes: House Rules :  - The maximum sleeping occupancy in the apartment is 2 persons.  - The maximum guest occupancy in the apartment is 4 persons (including people sleeping in the apartment).  - Special events (party, meeting, birthday, dinner, wedding, baby shower, photo shoot or commercial use) are not allowed in the apartment.  - It is strictly forbidden to smoke and/or consume drugs in the apartment.  - The reservation can be submitted for a complementary ID verification process. We reserve the right to ask for the identity proof of all our guests via a selfie taken with your picture ID readable.  In the case any of these rules is not respected, your security deposit will be retained and a formal complaint will be sent to Airbnb for non respect of the house rules. **A starting kit will be provided upon your arrival. It contains consumable products such as detergent, toilet paper, shampoo, soap,... Those products will not be replenished during your stay :)
transit: Pierce Hotel is 2 min walking distance from  - Subway station Guy-Concordia (green line). -  Main buses lines  -  Taxi station Parking is not included with this reservation. We suggest to park at a public parking 1 minute away from the apartment, daily cost is $20.
access: Your reservation gives you the exclusive use of the apartment.
interaction: If you happen to have any questions, we're here for you.  You can contact us by email, by text or by phone Monday to Friday, 9.30am-6pm.
house_rules: It is strictly forbidden to accommodate commercial or private events. Capacity: There is a maximum capacity of 4 people within the living area. No exception will be tolerated. Please contact us for more information

host.host_about:
Looking for a perfect stay with a host that understands your needs? 

Welcome to Loftel and Simplissimmo, Montreal based companies established over 10 years ago, that are operated by young and motivated team with a strong and valuable hospitality experience. 

We manage more than 200 properties and are fully dedicated to make every client’s stay unique and memorable. We’re always there to help, answer questions and provide the best services. So don’t hesitate and go ahead, and challenge us :)

reviews.comments: My stay at Pierce Hotel was perfect. The apartment was clean, fully furnished with all amenities required for a nice stay. Good communication, i will come back to this place for my next seminary in Montreal.
This Air BnB was as advertised. Everything was very clean, and the host responded quickly to any inquires we had during our stay in Montreal. I would definitely stay here again on my next trip!
10/10 just like the pictures! Very clean, very stylish, quick answers ! would definitely go again
It was a really good location. Pictures don't do the space justice and the host was quick with responses and provided everything you needed.
Je recommande fortement très classe, bien situé et très intime et sécuritaire
Je recommande cet emplacement!

Getting this place again end of Feb. Was really happy! Super clean and loved the decor. Only issue I had was the cleaning person forgot the bigger towels in the washing machine and I was drying myself up after the shower with the smaller ones. I only found them inside the washing machine on my last day... I only stayed there 3 nights but it was still pretty disappointing. Still giving them a 5. Just be careful, if you can't find any towels to shower with, they're most likely in the washing machine.
Très très bien!
its an amazing place that is right in downtown close to all restaurants, transportation and entertainment!
This was probably one of the best airbnbs I've ever stayed at. Amazing unit, nicely styled. 100% accurate to the photos and very nice touches to the place. Would definitely stay again!

Identical to pictures! Do not be alarmed by outside of building. It is not a pretty sight, but the apartment is perfect! 
Modern and clean. Comfortable bed with a relatively well stocked kitchen. I highly recommend it
Great location, very clean.. would stay here again.

This was a clean, well maintained, stylish unit located in the heart of Montreal. Great restaurants within blocks, high end shopping around the corner, close to the Art Museum. Great value. Cozy with all the amenities to make a long or short stay comfortable. Highly recommended!

conventional location, well designed and decorated space.  really felt comfortable with a lot of the trappings of a boutique hotel but the convenience of home. 

would return again.  self check-in was flawless.

A fantastic stay! A great spacious flat with all amenities necessary. Very secure and clean. Communications were very clear with several follow-up emails regarding self check-in. Exceeded expectations and would definitely stay again.
The best matress i've ever tried!
Cute place. Great, convenient location. Hosts were very communicative. Would definitely recommend.

Great place to stay. Clean, very stylish and well thought out. Comfortable and large king size bed. It was steps away ~90m from Guy-Concordia (green) subway line, which was extremely convenient. We bought a $13.50 bus-subway pass valid for entire weekend at the airport and took the 747 bus to/from the airport. We were able to go to Atwater market, Bota Bota spa, walked around beautiful Old Port, China town, downtown Montreal, le Banquise for poutine and back to the airport with this $13.50 pass. Just be careful not to lose it it’s paper. We also went to Adonis (8 min walk from the place) for extra food to go along with the microgreens we bought at the market. We will definitely be back.

The place is downtown Montreal, and close to everything. It is as shown on the website, clean and well furnished. The information were clear and accurate.
The host is very communicative , and answered our questions while required .
we enjoyed our stay in this lovely place.
Thank you
Great place to stay. Very close to many of the bars and other sights to see in Montreal. I would recommend parking at Concordia University. It’s underground and a block away.
great place for a quick weekend getaway, right in the heart of the city and close to all the action.

name: The Porto Concierge - Tullins Palmeira Apartment
summary: Practical and conveniently located 1 bedroom flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer!  10 minutes walk to the beach and famous beach pools! In this apartment can sleep up to 2 people comfortably.  Bus stop nearby! Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay.
description: Practical and conveniently located 1 bedroom flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer!  10 minutes walk to the beach and famous beach pools! In this apartment can sleep up to 2 people comfortably.  Bus stop nearby! Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay.
house_rules: - Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, only in the balcony when available or at the window-sill. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it. PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please call. The neighbours appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h. Use the place as if it were your own. Check out time is before 11h. If request

reviews.comments: Very nice flat close to the sea in a calm neighbourhood.

To be honest our stay was disappointing. Check in itself was okay. We were able to check in early which was nice but in order to do so we had to go to the company's office (nowhere near the unit) to pick up the keys. However, we did appreciate being able to get the keys early. We were told the company very recently acquired this unit so we expected it would be in good shape. Unfortunately it seemed they knew very little about the unit and it didn't seem ready for guests. The living room (and basically whole unit) smelled of smoke and burnt coal - I think it was coming from the fire place in the living room. I have no idea when it was last cleaned. We were looking forward to having a kitchen to have our own breakfast in and maybe cook dinner etc. Unfortunately the kitchen was in bad shape. It was poorly stocked, things were simply thrown into a cupboard, and the fridge smelled strongly of something rotten. Needless to say we opted not to use the kitchen. There was also poor water pressure and very unreliable hot water (ie. One minute bursts of warm to hot water followed by immediately cold water). As a plus the company was receptive when we contacted them about the fridge and water but our stay was so short and we were hardly in the unit so did not want to spend much of our vacation time dealing with these issues. The company seems good but we wouldn't recommend this unit until they fix things up a bit. Also beware the location is very suburban and quite far from the center and main sights.

Apesar de já ter usado bastante o serviço airbnb desta vez fiquei totalmente desagradado com o serviço, estivemos cerca de 1h30 para dar check in, no qual apos algumas questões sobre a área a nível de supermercados, não me souberam informar, puxadores da cozinha saiam foram quando tentamos aceder ao móvel, espelhos dos interruptores da luz também caíam quando utilizamos. 

Enfim algo para não voltar a repetir, sem dúvida.

Estive em Leça da Palmeira, em trabalho na Exponor ficando o apartamento muito perto! A  simpatia e profissionalismo com que fui recebida, foi de extrema importância, deram-me dicas de locais onde podia visitar, nomeadamente a zona de praia, zona de bares, supermercados,  Impecável!!!! O apartamento apresenta um nível óptimo de limpeza e conforto para além de ser muito bem localizado, facilitando o acesso aos meios de transporte e por ser tao próximo à zona de Matosinhos que para além do comércio local, encontram-se excelentes restaurantes! O apartamento é muito sossegado e está numa zona muito calma, o que facilita o descanso nocturno. É uma excelente opção, seja em férias ou em trabalho. Recomendo
Nice big apartment, half hour train ride form Porto city center. Check in was very easy and we were going good information about the surrounding area.
A nossa estadia foi bastante agradável. O local é bastante calmo e o apartamento tem excelentes condições. Os acessos, para quem visita o Porto de carro, são muito bons. Perfeito para 2 pessoas! :)
Fomos muito bem recebidos pelos anfitriões sempre muito disponíveis em ajudar , o apartamento é bastente confortável e limpo correspondeu por inteiro ás nossas expectativas. Recomendo!

O apartamento tem óptimas instalações e uma excelente relação qualidade/preço. 
Está bem localizado e tem um terraço também muito agradável. Existe um grande cuidado com a limpeza e algumas comodidades que dão imenso jeito para quem vai passar uns dias fora de casa. Gostei muito e recomendo!

TPC Team it is super nice, very good communication, nothing to say, but, unfortunatelly the flat - Tullins Palmeira Apartment was totally under our expectations. The dust from the flat (livingroom - floor & bathroom - abouve the door) was an unpleasent "surprise". Also the furniture looks old, taking into consideration that in the pictures, the flat, looks like a new one.

Best regards, hope that we didn't offend anyone, we just give you this feedback in order to help to improve.

Cosmin&co
Perfect stay and host
Me encanto el apartamento en general. Todo genial

Buen campamento base para ver la obra de A. Siza en Leça Palmeira ...
Apartamento espacioso y con buena luz natural.

Für 2 - 3 Personen ausreichende Grösse und Aussttatung. Sauber. 
Zum Strand nur 15 Minuten Fussweg. Zum Bäcker 5 Minuten.

Nice apartment near the beach
and the communication with the host was excellent. 
Also there were good sightseeing tips. 
Thanks for your hospitality!

Es gibt ein Bett für 2 Personen mit einer sehr guten Matratze.Wir konnten  sehr gut schlafen.
Der leistungsstarke Radiator erzeugt eine angenehme  Temperatur

De lamentar chegar ao apartamento para check-in e não ter as condições para receber os hóspedes.
Também de notar a falta de lealdade quando no anúncio não mencionam as anomalias do apartamento.
De notar algum descuido na limpeza dos utensílios da cozinha.

name: Copacabana Flat Palace
summary: Lindo apartamento reformado localizado no coração de Copacabana (em frente ao Copacabana Palace) Quarto e sala, com ar-condicionado, internet 15mb, TV à cabo. Cozinha completa com bebedouro e todos os utensílios.  Maquina de lavar. Banheiro com otimo tamanho. Ducha forte, à gás, proporcionando um ótimo banho. Predio com portaria 24 horas. Distancia de 1 a 2 minutos à pé da praia. Desfrute do conforto com o melhor custo x beneficio.
space: O apartamento é todo reformado. Piso em porcelanato, todos os itens de qualidade. TV à cabo, tela plana. Cama confortavel, arário no quarto.
description: Lindo apartamento reformado localizado no coração de Copacabana (em frente ao Copacabana Palace) Quarto e sala, com ar-condicionado, internet 15mb, TV à cabo. Cozinha completa com bebedouro e todos os utensílios.  Maquina de lavar. Banheiro com otimo tamanho. Ducha forte, à gás, proporcionando um ótimo banho. Predio com portaria 24 horas. Distancia de 1 a 2 minutos à pé da praia. Desfrute do conforto com o melhor custo x beneficio. O apartamento é todo reformado. Piso em porcelanato, todos os itens de qualidade. TV à cabo, tela plana. Cama confortavel, arário no quarto. O apartamenoto fica no posto 3. Proximo ao Copacabana Palace.
neighborhood_overview: O apartamenoto fica no posto 3. Proximo ao Copacabana Palace.
house_rules: - Silencio após as 22h - Não entrar com areia - Não deixar chave na portaria

reviews.comments: Gostamos muito do atendimento, apartamento reformado e muito bem localizado, equipamentos novos e muito organizado. Primeiro andar, alguns ruídos da rua (movimentada) porém não nos atrapalhou. Aprovado!

Anyone traveling to Rio... wants to be centrally located this is a no-brainer great location just a little noisy as far as the street is concerned, but other than that everything's very close Banks the beach public transportation and the subway... highly recommend

Amamos o flat. Localização ótima. A Fabi muito bem receptiva e comunicativa. 
Não tivemos problema pelo barulho da rua, devido ao flat ser em frente a Av Nossa Senhora de Copacabana.

Eu tive uma ótima estadia. O apartamento estava bem limpo e organizado. Apesar de ser um espaço pequeno é aconchegante e atendeu as minhas necessidades. Tem uma ótima localização, perto de tudo, metro, praia, farmácia, mercado... ótima anfitriã, atenciosa e prestativa. 
Muito obrigada!
Apartamento lindo, super limpo, muito bem localizado. Anfitriã Fabi muito atenciosa e prestativa.

name: Convenient in Heart of the City **FREE PARKING**
summary: Come here if you want to feel and experience the real vibe and culture of our lively City. Close to many restaurants, coffee shops, and nightlife venues - bars, lounges, and festivities, 5mins to tamtams and Mont Royal Park!  This great location apartment has a comfy queen bed, living room with 55' Smart TV open to a dining space with access door to a private patio, kitchen equipped with cookware, and a bathroom with basic needs. Paid parking available on request. Metro/subway is a 5min walk.
space: Positive: This unit is about LOCATION uniquely positioned in a lively neighborhood, safe, and busy part of the city, yet you can enjoy a quite atmosphere inside the apartment, it also have a private patio on the quite side. Negative: Please note this is a student building, yet to be renovated the unit has wears and tears.
description: Come here if you want to feel and experience the real vibe and culture of our lively City. Close to many restaurants, coffee shops, and nightlife venues - bars, lounges, and festivities, 5mins to tamtams and Mont Royal Park!  This great location apartment has a comfy queen bed, living room with 55' Smart TV open to a dining space with access door to a private patio, kitchen equipped with cookware, and a bathroom with basic needs. Paid parking available on request. Metro/subway is a 5min walk. Positive: This unit is about LOCATION uniquely positioned in a lively neighborhood, safe, and busy part of the city, yet you can enjoy a quite atmosphere inside the apartment, it also have a private patio on the quite side. Negative: Please note this is a student building, yet to be renovated the unit has wears and tears. In the unit you will have access to a private patio. Open the unit door and you're steps away from an indoor pool on the same floor, parking is also available for a daily charge.
neighborhood_overview: Around the corner is Mcgill University, St Laurent St., St Denis, Parc, Place-Des-Arts, St-Catherine, Sherbrooke,  Tam-tams, Mont royal, The Bay, Eaton Centre,  & Concordia University are all a walking distance! The area is alive with local cafes, grocery stores, restaurants, a chocolate cafe
transit: Many locations are of a walking distance, the metro is less than 10 mins walk and operates from 5:45am to ~1am.  Cabs are seconds away
access: In the unit you will have access to a private patio. Open the unit door and you're steps away from an indoor pool on the same floor, parking is also available for a daily charge.
interaction: I am available by phone or text and respond quick
house_rules: - Smoking is allowed only in the patio

host.host_about:
I just moved back to Montreal after living abroad for several years. Being back feels awesome, I love this city and what it has to offer. 

Being a frequent traveler, I enjoy meeting people from all over, learn about new cultures and eat different dishes. 

If you're ever down in Montreal, I look forward to host you !

reviews.comments: Great value, exactly as advertised.

Notre séjour chez Carlito s'est bien passé dans l'ensemble. L'appartement est bon marché et très bien placé. Le quartier est calme. Petit bémol pour la cuisine, très peu équipée, il était donc très compliqué de se faire à manger. 
Bon séjour dans l'ensemble :)
Bel appartement dans un joli quartier. Propre
Great area in the university section of Montreal, walkable to everything.

Carl's place is in an older, unrenovated high-rise, but the apartment is tidy and spacious as the photos show, and Carl is adding improvements all the time. The bed is new and the sheets are fresh. My husband and I wanted to stay near McGill University and this was a great budget option. The metro was only a 5 minute walk away and the Plateau is a few miles walk each way. The kitchen has a toaster and electric kettle. If you want to cook hot meals, you would have to bring all the basics, like cooking oil and salt and pepper, but . 

I really liked how close the apartment was to cute coffee shops and it's right next door to an excellent little vegetarian restaurant and a small used bookshop. Check-in was super easy and flexible with my needs. Carl was always ready to help when I had any questions and his hospitality is among the best I have received from an Airbnb host. Thanks Carl!

I was so grateful to be able to book Carl's apartment on the day I arrived in Montréal, after my previous plan fell apart.  Carl responded very quickly and made it possible for me to get to the apartment with no delay.  The building is older, but the apartment itself is warm and cozy.  The bed was comfortable, and the living room very pleasant.  I did not really cook during my stay there, but I could have, as there was everything needed.  Carl provided me with breakfast essentials (tea, instant coffee, and even nutella), which was so nice.  The location is perfect, especially if you want to visit McGill university.  You can walk to so many places, the location is central. I will stay there again if the place is available when I come back to Montréal.
Great host, the location is a 7 minute walk to the groceries. Lots of bars to go to very close to the strip and anything you need.
This place is for people who need a place to sleep and be on their way. Pretty good location, complimentary parking spot was helpful.

Great host and very responsive. The apartment is in a fairly central location in Montreal near plenty of restaurants, cafes, and other shops. Quite accessible by public transport. Carl was responsive regarding any issues we had. spacious and sunny living room.  Apartment is ideal if you want to cook for yourself. Highly recommended.

Carl's place is in the residential area of McGill. It is a good location, especially given the price. The place itself is nothing fancy, but it gets the job done. Our only real complaint is that the unit is quite cold and the heating didn't work properly - so it made our winter stay somewhat difficult. However overall, Carl was a great host who made check in and out very easy, and we'd recommend this place to anyone who is travelling on a budget, and won't mind that the place is a little worn in.
Great host and available for any accommodations you might need! Definitely staying again!
The location of the apartment is absolutely ideal. The apartment itself is perfect, meets exactly the needs we had for our travels. Carl is super nice and always available.
Communicates fast! Easy check in, check out. Loved the decor in the place. Very kind host. Good location.
Great location, cozy!

The location is amazing! It's close to everything and really easy to get to and from. The unit itself is charming and perfect for a weekend getaway of touring around. Carl was really helpful and accessible, responding to our messages within minutes and going above and beyond to make sure we had a good trip. We would definitely stay here again.

We really enjoyed staying at here for a week! The place is newlly renovated with great furnitures. The location is very convenient. 1 min walk to McGill campus and 5 mins walk to Av Du Parc.  I would like to visit this place again if I have a chance!
Provided wrong wifi network/password on page, eventually found on back of router and that's why chromcast wouldn't work! Everything else was great!!!!
Close to everything. Montreal was very walkable in general. Friendly host. Check-in process was also easy. Only complaint was leftover hair on linens.
We had a great stay at Carl's place.  It's a wonderful location, quiet building, plus a pool and parking.  Very clean apt.  Responses were quick and helpful.

Great location, right near metro station/McGill/downtown. Carl is a great host, very quick to respond, super informative and provides great restaurant recommendations. Would highly recommend staying here!
Carl’s place has a great location and was really nice and clean inside. Carl was quick to reply if we had any questions as well.

The place was the same in the picture, it’s hard to find a parking slot around the area, it took us 30-45 mins before we find a slot coz it’s in Downtown Montreal. There were some garbage at the porch but we don’t mind coz we’re not using it. It turned us off when the host asking us for addition 50 dollars cleaning fee coz the cleaning service told him that we left the space “really messy.” Few cups of Timmys left on the table coz the bins were too small that’s the mess that we created and it’s not worth 50 dollars to pick those up. Disappointed on our stay.

Convenient location, clean, great value, and great hosts! If you care about water pressure and temperature like I do, you will love this place. Better water pressure than my own house and so quick to get hot water!!! Carl and his co-host were very attentive and were ready to make our stay as comfortable as possible. The apartment is in a university area so it’s lively and there are many great eateries nearby. Subway and buses are very close too, but if you like walking you can walk to Old Montreal in 20 minutes while enjoying the scenic old streets and getting good coffee and sweets on your way. The wifi signal was a bit weak but the hosts were aware of it and tried to fix the issue. Overall I recommend this place to everyone!

Réactivité parfaite échange en temps réel sur le site... Carl nous a gardé nos bagages le dernier jour un gros + quand vous avez l'avion en debut de soirée. Situation géographique parfaite pour visiter Montréal
Its just as the pictures show!! And he is very helpful!!
I recommend this apartment to anybody who is visiting Montreal!
Carl was very helpful are friendly, the apartment was as expected. Thanks!

Excellent location and friendly host who is accommodating. It is very close to everything, but the place desperately needs some deep cleaning, because the first thing that greets a guest is a stale food smell that won't go away. Kitchen in general including utensils was downright dirty. Not bad, but not a five star residence.
Tarek's place is very well located and close to everything you want to see in Montreal. Tarek was very responsive and had great restaurant recommendations. We would definitely stay here again!
Great place for a weekend in Montreal! Very close to McGill and other cool neighborhoods, walk-able to great restaurants and sites. Tarek was a fantastic host and had great recommendations!
Carl is very kind, and quick with responses! Home was very clean! Grabbing the key from a dark alley way was nerve racking. Other than that, host was very kind!
Great place for a weekend getaway in Montreal. Within walking distance to many shops/restaurants/clubs. Had a very easy check in.
Great location, super friendly host, everything was as expected. Would stay here again 100%

This was my first experience with living at an AirBnb over a hotel. Carl's place is conveniently located right next to McGill university. Carl was always very responsive when required. I would recommend this to those who are considering a stay in Montreal.
was fine really and affordable with a good location. could use a deep clean and some extra bedding if it sleeps 5
Great spot close to the centre of MTL. Perfect for a  weekend getaway.

Great place at a great location! The apartment itself is quite old but Carl makes the best out of it: new furniture,  very clean and comfi bed. Also Carl was very helpful with everything and very fast responding.
Great communication Carl really tried to accommodate our needs.  Great location

We liked to stay at the property: good location close to downtown and McGill U, clean apartment, quiet, comfortable bed. We used kitchen to make breakfast and dinner for our family. A swimming pool with a sauna were available (unfortunately we did have time to enjoy it), quite spacious balcony.
Wonderful host who is quick to help with everything.  Great location near McGill - quiet and enjoyable.

Carl's place was in a great location, walking distance to downtown and cool bars/restaurants. Carl made the check in process super easy. The air conditioner was a lifesaver with the humidity during the night.

Carl was very available and always answered quickly.  
The apartment itself was nice and tidy,  and located in a good neighbourhood with shops and markets nearby.
A good place to stay !

Recommended for the location, so close to downtown and Mont Royal Park. The apartment has all you need for an easy stay. The decor is not quite as sparkly as in the photos and the taps drip, stuff like that, but otherwise we had everything we needed and Carl is an excellent host who is very quick to respond to messages and was very helpful in arranging parking for us.
Had a great time (stayed only 2 nights) in Montreal. Apartment is located in student district, spacious, huge tv and small kitchen. Would recommend for short stays!

The location of this place is great (very central) and Carl was a good host: the communication went well and we very much appreciated his flexibility around the check-in and check-out times. But we were sorely disappointed with the apartment in itself. Why? Because while the pictures correspond to what we were looking for, the actual place did not: the state of renovation is far from being as good as suggested by the description and pictures (ex: there was a big hole in the bathroom door, by the doorknob, that was filled with kitchen paper, and that is just one example); the place could use a deep clean and we were greeted by a hospital smell that we could not get rid of during our stay. If you are seduced by the idea of using the pool, beware: we love swimming and were planning to use it but did not because its cleanliness was very questionable (there were for example what seemed to be dead spiders at the bottom of it). This place is for people who want a place to sleep and be on their way.
Great location but be ready to be in student housing. Good wifi. Nice furniture. But really old bathroom and kitchen. Very responsive host
Local extremamente bem localizado. Indicado para viagens curtas ou longas. Gostamos muito da hospedagem e recepção com a ajuda de Carl.
This was in a perfect location, the apartment was a bit less boujee than the pictures made it seem but it was perfect for us and our stay!

I do not recommend this place at all. The pictures are so misleading. It looks luxurious, it is nothing but. I so wish I could add in my own pictures, the actually reality of what this place looks like, for exemple an improperly installed bathroom door knob stuffed with toilet paper, and with visible screws. Filth on the walls, on the fan. A flimsy piece of plastic/cardboard in the top part of the window were the AC unit is installed. It felt so unsafe we did not leave any valuables every time we left the Airbnb. 2 towels for 5people for 3days 2nights (that includes the hand towel and then there is no mat for coming out of the shower, so basically that leaves no towels for showers, we used our own towels we’d brought for swimming) and when I asked for more towels that did nothappen , I was ignored completely on that request. But we ended up using our own towels, because we saw a beautiful pool in the pictures. Well turns out the pool wasn’t as expected at all. It was too cold to swim and the place looked like it was in need of repairs (holes in the ceiling) just bad! 
The dresser had a broken drawer bottom, when I attempted to open the closet in the bedroom the knob came off in my hand, the closet door wasn’t on right and difficult to manage. The toilet didn’t flush properly, the bathroom sink was leaking and the caulking in the bathroom was coming apart and either dirty or moldy. The walls were filthy, I could see where posters had been on those walls in the past. Gross. 

This is so dishonest. This is not right. 
Awful. Awful. Awful. 
You want to rent your place, that’s fine. Don’t need to steal from honest people. Just sell what you have to offer, don’t mislead people and on top of it bully them into giving you a five star 5 rating. I paid. Therefor I have paid my right to say my honest opinion and I don’t want anyone else to get ripped off by you.

It is a clean and comfortable place to live and the host reply the message very fast.
Especially the location is very convenient to travel most of the tourist spot. My family and I  had a good time staying there.

Location may be what you are looking for; be sure to inquire and make arrangements in advance for parking and for key access prior to booking to ensure that the process fits your expectations.   Host communication is great and issues are attended to immediately.

We booked this Airbnb for a group of 4 guests. Check-in was a fast and easy process. Upon arrival we were very satisfied with how neat, and clean the furniture and apartment were. We enjoyed the location - walking distance to major sites of the city (St. Laurent, downtown Montreal, Mount-Royal Hiking Trail, and 10mins drive to Old Port Montreal). Carl was very helpful in providing us with suggestions on places to visit/dine, and responded fast to calls and texts! Furniture was nice, one bedroom with a bed and couch, living room with pull out couch, tv, and dining table, kitchen and patio available. The infrastructure of apartment and building was a bit old. Apartment was located in a safe area to walk in at night. Overall, we had an amazing stay,  and would recommend it to anyone for short-stays.
Great location, but needs maintenance.

Perfect location for our visit to McGill for their open house! We were comfortable and enjoyed the neighborhood very much. Plug for Lola Rosa restaurant!!!! Carl's place was just what we needed! Carl was very good at communicating and kept in touch throughout our visit. Make sure you get all his texts/messages before you arrive so you are informed about parking and access to the apartment. We drove from quite a distance and couldn't download all of them before we arrived...all worked out just fine.  Thanks for a great weekend in Montreal!

Carl’s place is walking distance to everywhere you want to visit in Montréal. It is a little bit smaller and less luxurious than it seems in the pictures, as it is a student residece.But overall it was a pleasant trip if you are looking for home one person or even more.

i had a nice stay at Carl’s place! The communication was perfect, the check in easy. The house was super clean, the bed was very comfortable. The location is also good, close to the subway, stores. The little patio is perfect if you smoke. 
I recommend this place!

This is a wonderful place to stay! Great layout, very clean, within easy walking distance to everything. Carl is a kind and responsive host, I always try to stay at one of his locations when I'm in Montreal.

A good host.
an old apartment and smaller than i expected .
Logement très bien situé, à proximité du centre-ville !
Excellent
It’s a nice place to stay!!

My friend and I had a great time staying at Carl's place! As other reviewers have said, it's a nice place with some old features but the location, responsiveness from host and parking all make up for that! The decor is new and modern and the bed was really comfortable! I would definitely stay here again (maybe in the summer when it's not so cold)! Also check-in and check-out were SO easy and convenient!

The place was just how it looked like in the pictures. The balcony was actually very spacious. The TV also had Spotify and YouTube on it, so it was perfect as we didn’t need to use our speakers to listen to music. Very close to McGill as well as shopping and a SAQ (liquor store).

The photos are misleading - the apartment is old and fairly shabby with new Ikea furniture. Also - it's freezing (my phone said inside temp was 12 degrees C)! We cranked the heat and I still could not sleep because I was so cold. I almost wore my coat to bed. I wish I had. For the location (close to McGill) and the price point, I'm not surprised. It's an old building that desperately needs updating. Some fairly simple repairs are neglected in favour of shoving plastic bags and toilet paper into crevices or hiding them behind paintings. If you're only worried about location and price, it's a decent place to stay (maybe not in winter though). We were just looking for a warm place to wait out a snow storm and unfortunately we were very disappointed since we were still so cold! Check in was a breeze and Carl was very quick to respond and easily reached.
Nous sommes resté-e-s 2 jours à Montréal. Thanks to Carl ! Il a été réactif et à adapter tant le check in que le check out. Il s'est soucié que nous soyons à notre aise !
Nice
Great location. Exactly as described. Great value for price point. Great communication with hosts. Very comfortable stay. Would stay here again or recommend in a heartbeat.
Location is great, perfect and close to downtown areas! Would recommend to all

Good location, good pricing, a little cold at night in the winter but manageable with the extra blankets and radiator. Parking was a bit of an issue but I was assured that it was not usually like that and was accommodated for accordingly. Check in instructions were also a little unclear but the host was able to get in contact and explain them once we had arrived.
The space was exactly as shown in the pictures! It is perfect for a couple that is going down there to explore around as it is very close to everything. Overall great stay, thank you Carl!
Great stay at Carl’s place! Really cute place. Great location too :)

name: Large Studio Apartment, 15-20mins from downtown
summary: Great private (not shared) Studio apartment located on the 2nd floor of a nicely kept brownstone building,  It has lots of character and charm. Hardwood floors, Exposed brick/ Fire place, Queen bed, 43" Flat Screen Smart TV, Full bathroom with Clawfoot Tub, High ceilings (10.5 ft), Kitchen brand new Stainless steel appliances * Walking distance  to Columbia Presbyterian Hospital  Transportation in walking distance  Trains: A, C & 1 Buses: M (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
description: Great private (not shared) Studio apartment located on the 2nd floor of a nicely kept brownstone building,  It has lots of character and charm. Hardwood floors, Exposed brick/ Fire place, Queen bed, 43" Flat Screen Smart TV, Full bathroom with Clawfoot Tub, High ceilings (10.5 ft), Kitchen brand new Stainless steel appliances * Walking distance  to Columbia Presbyterian Hospital  Transportation in walking distance  Trains: A, C & 1 Buses: M (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Excelente en todo, hay dos líneas del Metro muy cerca y también se puede llegar en camión, Katrina es muy amable y respetuosa, todo estuvo impecable. Definitivamente volvería a quedarme con ella
Bellissimo appartamento pulito e confortevole,comodo per spostarsi e situato vicino a negozi e ristoranti

Katrina is an ideal hostess--always helpful but not hovering.  The apartment is huge and has everything one needs; the bed is super comfortable and there is always plenty of hot water in the shower.  The neighborhood is friendly, garage parking across the street, busses and subways very close.  I would return--and stay longer.

name: Cosy Single Room in the Centre
summary: The flat is located in the upbeat neighborhood, La Raval. It's a bright and airy flat on the 4th floor, with views out to Montjuic. We get great sun sets.  You have you're own cozy room with a super comfy bed.  It has a big bath and toilet in the next room. The flat is spacious and airy with everything you need. It's a great location, close to the centre, beach and metro stops.  It's great space for someone who is coming to do a course or immerse themselves in the delights of this city.
description: The flat is located in the upbeat neighborhood, La Raval. It's a bright and airy flat on the 4th floor, with views out to Montjuic. We get great sun sets.  You have you're own cozy room with a super comfy bed.  It has a big bath and toilet in the next room. The flat is spacious and airy with everything you need. It's a great location, close to the centre, beach and metro stops.  It's great space for someone who is coming to do a course or immerse themselves in the delights of this city.

host.host_about: I am a 30 year old woman who has an adventure for life. I lived abroad for 7 years and was deeply touched by the hospitality of the people I met along the way. I love to meet people when I travel even if it is within my own country. I am a psychotherapist and eco therapist amoungst other things. I have a love for nature that drives my passion for life.

name: Casa com quatro quartos em área verde.
summary: Casa em condomínio fechado, com portaria 24 horas. A casa tem quatro quartos sendo dois com ar-condicionado split e dois com ventilador. A casa tem televisão a cabo com tela de LCD e internet wi-fi. Cozinha equipada com geladeira, fogão a gás e de micro ondas.   Na área externa existe um agradável jardim com churrasqueira e local para rede na área dos fundos. Tem vaga para dois carros na casa. O condomínio tem piscina, câmeras de vigilância e ampla área verde.
description: Casa em condomínio fechado, com portaria 24 horas. A casa tem quatro quartos sendo dois com ar-condicionado split e dois com ventilador. A casa tem televisão a cabo com tela de LCD e internet wi-fi. Cozinha equipada com geladeira, fogão a gás e de micro ondas.   Na área externa existe um agradável jardim com churrasqueira e local para rede na área dos fundos. Tem vaga para dois carros na casa. O condomínio tem piscina, câmeras de vigilância e ampla área verde. O bairro um dos que possuem maior área verde no Rio de Janeiro, com muita natureza. No bairro, existem cachoeiras, sítios, haras e trilhas. Boa parte de sua extensão é tomada pelo Parque Estadual da Pedra Branca, área de preservação ambiental. Também por ser um novo centro em gastronomia, Vargem Grande apresenta inúmeros restaurantes, além do parque aquático Rio Water Planet. Distancia entre a casa e: Os transportes Urbano- 1,5 km - 19 min   caminhando. Rio Water Planet - 2,2 km -  7 min de carro ou 22 min caminhando Recreio Shop

notes: A casa e excelente para quem quer descansar e curtir a natureza, próximo a ela você pode encontrar cachoeiras, sítios, haras, trilhas e excelentes restaurantes  rústicos, variados, destacando-se o Gepetto, Quinta, Jardineto, Skunna, Barreado, Gugut., Dom Pascoal entre  outros. A casa é próxima das mais belas praias do Rio de Janeiro como as praias de Grumari (12Km), Prainha (9km) e da reserva (12 km) entre outras.   A proximidade com o Centro de Convenção do RioCentro e com o Parque Olímpico torna um lugar perfeito para quem vai ao Rio a Negócios, para assistir um evento esportivo ou show musical como o Rock in Rio.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: I enjoy the beach, the sun, the fresh air, the beautiful nature and the joy of the people in this city. I am from Rio de Janeiro. I lived in Portsmouth, England for a few years and also lived in Sao Paulo for near 17 years always working with Consulting Projects dealing with Process and Technology. Now that I retired, I usually travel to other countries two to three times a year. Travel is a very energizing activity. I love to meet people and  other cultures.  That is why I enjoy the activity of having guests in my properties and offer the best stay they deserve.

reviews.comments:
Great apartment. Location is amazing, it is literally on the beach!! Plenty of restaurants, bars, supermarkets etc nearby. You literally have everything within a 5 minute walk. The apartment is super safe with a 24hr doorman and cctv. Everything in the apartment was as described and it was like our second home. 

Lea was an amazing host. She went above and beyond a normal host for us during our stay. Her and her son introduced us to the area, showed us where all the shops, restaurants were etc. it was like having a concierge service! 

I cannot commend lea enough on our stay. She really looked after us. The property was amazing, and everything was brand new! If anyone is looking for an alternative to a hotel. Then look no further! 

I will definitely be visiting again real soon.

Lea foi uma excelente anfitriã. Sua atenção durante a estadia foi além do esperado. Nos orientou quanto a todas as facilidades da area, nos recebeu com muita atenção, nos sentimos como em nossa casa. O apartamento tem localização privilegiada, a praia, transporte, metro,  e todas as facilidades estão a alguns minutos. O apto em si e´ exatamente como anunciado, tudo muito limpo e novo. O edifício e´ muito seguro.  Obrigada Lea, por nos proporcionar tudo de bom durante nossa hospedagem.

The apartment was clean and conveniently located near the beach, restaurants, public transport and shopping! Lea and her family helped us from the time we arrived until we left! We felt like we were at home!

PLEASE READ the full description prior to booking.  NOTE: Specific details (entry, key lockbox code, WiFi etc) will be accessible after confirmation of booking.
space: This is one of the original 1940s fishing cottages by the beach – clean and comfortable, with heaps of rustic charm. The garden's a tropical jungle.
description: Unique furnished 1+ bedroom with large deck. Sunny, fully self-contained granny flat on quiet leafy street, steps to beach, cafés & transport. Suit mature-minded couple.  PLEASE READ the full description prior to booking.  NOTE: Specific details (entry, key lockbox code, WiFi etc) will be accessible after confirmation of booking. This is one of the original 1940s fishing cottages by the beach – clean and comfortable, with heaps of rustic charm. The garden's a tropical jungle. You'll have exclusive run of the whole flat, as well as the large outdoor covered deck area. Also includes the smaller 2nd bedroom (see 'other things to note'). There is a cast iron claw-foot tub in the bathroom for your enjoyment, and laundry washer & dryer within the flat for your use. Small stereo, bedside clock, Foxtel movies on the TV and WiFi complete the package. We just live upstairs, and are happy to show you around the neighbourhood or answer any questions you may have. We can give you the 2 minute welco
neighborhood_overview: Dee Why is considered the heart of Sydney's Northern Beaches region, with the beach being the neighbourhood’s main attraction. If you’re looking for a beach holiday without sacrificing proximity to the city, This may be your best choice of Sydney accommodation. The beach stretches 1.8 kilometres, offering plenty of space for both locals and holidaymakers. This gorgeous shoreline is a mecca for couples and families alike with shower facilities, barbecues, a childrens' playground and terrific surfing conditions. The Dee Why SLSC patrol the beach each day. A fantastic bushwalk over the headland provides some sweeping views across the Tasman. If you need a break from the beach sun, head across the street and grab a table at any one of the many local restaurants or cafés with a great view of the surf instead. The beach’s promenade is also a fantastic place for a walk in the evenings.
notes: The flat is best suited to a single or a couple, but within the flat there is a small, somewhat scruffy back storage room with a built-in single bed (listed here as 'bedroom 2', for lack of a better description). This area could be – and has been – used to accommodate a third person (kid, tipsy dinner guest?) should you require it. Refer to the floor plan 'spare' area. It's an older, creaky building and sound travels. You may hear us upstairs to some extent from time to time, and we may hear you.
transit: Easy stroll to Dee Why Beach, parks, seawater pools, and a multitude of beachside cafés, patios & restaurants serving both local and international fare.  Convenient public transport to Warringah Mall (15mins), Manly and the Ferry Wharf (15mins) and express buses to Sydney CBD (45mins).
access: You'll have exclusive run of the whole flat, as well as the large outdoor covered deck area. Also includes the smaller 2nd bedroom (see 'other things to note'). There is a cast iron claw-foot tub in the bathroom for your enjoyment, and laundry washer & dryer within the flat for your use. host.host_about: We are a married couple with young son, and live upstairs. My wife works at the local hospital, and my son works at the bookstore in Westfield Warringah Mall. I am generally around most days, as I work from home as a designer.

reviews.comments:
Joseph is welcoming you and the apartment get a lovely terrace to have lovely moment !
We enjoy the barbecue and have a very good rest.

Very value flat. Homeowner is very passionate! My dad was a very picky person on sleep and all the extra requests were soon fulfilled, we sleep well in there. Great location, just 5 minutes walk to the beach and public swimming pool. Coles, woolworth and bottle shop are nearby. Inside house sound insulation is not good, suitable for family living. Neighboring animals keep small animals and occasionally see chickens during the day. However, These animals are quiet at night. Housing fully functional. Front yard is particularly beautiful.

很棒的房子!走路到沙滩和建在海边的公共游泳池只需要5分钟｡房东很热情,发短信要加枕头之类的一般立刻就能会｡小镇上的coles,woolworth和bottle shop很近,开车要5分钟｡房屋内隔音不是很好,我是和父母一起住,所以没有很大影响｡前院很美,泡杯茶看看书挺不错的｡周围邻居会养一些小动物,白天偶尔会看到隔壁养的火鸡....晚上很安静,没有动物吵｡

Joseph is a great host.
I had a wonderful stay - 10/10.
Great spot, superb location, super friendly courteous landlord.
I was here in Sydney on work and it honestly felt like an amazing holiday.
Will be back soon

The Garden Flat is quite unique hidden away as it is in a wonderful jungle-like garden with many interesting features. There is a feeling of being away from the bustle of the town yet it is actually near the beach, ocean pool and the Strand.
Joseph has made the flat very comfortable with some nice extra touches to welcome travellers on arrival. We loved tucking into the local fruit.
It was so relaxing to sit eating breakfast on the deck while looking out at the garden and identifying the local bird life.
We thoroughly recommend the Garden Flat for a delightful stay in Dee Why,

The hosts were very friendly at all times.
They brought us a big box of toys so that our son can play with them.
The place was very clean and close to the beach, just a 5 minutes walk. 
Parking was very easy. 
We hope to come back soon!
A clean, quaint little place close to the beach!
Nice space with an awesome under cover entertaining area for a small gathering. Nice and quite and the host was extremely responsive and attentive when needed. Thanks for the easy stay Joseph!
