Upon the check-in we give you all the information needed for a pleasant stay, including places to visit, transportation, restaurants, cultural programs and tours, and much more. Besides this, we have an app available for all the guests with the information. En el check-in damos toda la información para proporcionar una estancia agradable, como lugares para visitar, medios de transporte, restaurantes, paseos y programaciones culturales, entre otros. Además, tenemos la aplicación disponible para todos los huéspedes con toda la información.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

name: Winter Escape in Morningside Heights
summary: Welcome!! Enjoy this cozy space with the full bed and optional twin size mattress. Located just a block away from the 125th St 1 train, our beautiful prewar building is the perfect distance from busy downtown. Our quiet street is only a block away from Starbucks, amazing restaurants, and trendy new bars! Grocery, liquor, and drug stores all within five minutes walking distance. Hope to meet you soon!!
space: Subway just around the corner! Restaurants one block away include Starbucks, a trendy new restaurant/bar, sushi, juice bar, ramen, Chinese, classic NYC pizza, Italian, American, Indian, Mexican, Cajun, falafel, and dumpling house. Also within two blocks are multiple small corner deli bodegas, a liquor store, grocery store, drug store, and wine shop. 100+ neighborhood restaurants deliver to our apartment through Grubhub or Seamless!!
description: Welcome!! Enjoy this cozy space with the full bed and optional twin size mattress. Located just a block away from the 125th St 1 train, our beautiful prewar building is the perfect distance from busy downtown. Our quiet street is only a block away from Starbucks, amazing restaurants, and trendy new bars! Grocery, liquor, and drug stores all within five minutes walking distance. Hope to meet you soon!! Subway just around the corner! Restaurants one block away include Starbucks, a trendy new restaurant/bar, sushi, juice bar, ramen, Chinese, classic NYC pizza, Italian, American, Indian, Mexican, Cajun, falafel, and dumpling house. Also within two blocks are multiple small corner deli bodegas, a liquor store, grocery store, drug store, and wine shop. 100+ neighborhood restaurants deliver to our apartment through Grubhub or Seamless!! Our shared spaces include the kitchen, living room, and bathroom! There is designated shelf space in the kitchen cabinets and fridge for you to use, as well a
notes: Our steam radiator pipes can be noisy at night, including some banging and hissing. Usual amount for a building from 1905 but can be surprising if you are not used to or expecting it!
transit: The 125th Street subway stop on the 1 train (red line) is just a block away from our apartment. From there it is only 11 stops down to Times Square, about 20-25 minutes. It is safe to use any time of day, though at night or in nasty weather I love using Via, a ride share car service. I can send you a link to the app and a free first ride!
access: Our shared spaces include the kitchen, living room, and bathroom! There is designated shelf space in the kitchen cabinets and fridge for you to use, as well as a plethora of cooking gadgets at your disposal! There is also laundry in the basement and laundry card provided.
interaction: I am always available to answer questions through AirBnB, text, or call. My co-host Ellen is also around to help you with anything you might need. We love to hang out and chat, though are often out of the apartment working!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hello!! Friendly outgoing artist, originally from Seattle and dancing through NYC the past few years. Love coffee, knitting, yoga, and Cheetos Puffs.

reviews.comments: nice cozy place o a nice location near starbucks,subway,couple of nice bars.we loved this place we were feeling like we are in our own house. we recommend this place

Amazing people and a great apartment! We had a lovely stay and the location is good, only 2 minute walk to subway and grocery stores. We had a lovely stay and would recommend this anytime. Thanks for having us!

Erika was a super attentive host and very considerate. I had to check out a day early and she was very accommodating and always responded quickly to any communication. The appartment was nice furnished and clean. Public spaces were very clean had all the normal amenities you'd want. 10/10 would buy again.
Lovely place to stay in a great neighbourhood. Easy to move around Manhattan from there. The room is charming.

This is a great option for those of you who are traveling alone or a couple. 

The room is clean, cosy and super cute. The area is also very nice, you have everything you need in a walking distance (restaurants, supermarket etc...) and a subway just around the corner to get wherever you want in the city.
This was exactly what i needed and i would definitely recommend it to others.
Thank you guys you have a lovely home:)

Próximo a estação do metrô, silencioso, limpo, chuveiro bom e quente. Tem uma cama de casal e um colchão extra. Não passamos aperto, em 2. Mas da pra 3, tranquilo.
Adoramos!
It's a good location and communicating with Erika was really easy.

Chris&Erika's apartment is located near the 125 streer subway station.If you go to downtown,you can take line 1,just a couple minutes (Website hidden by Airbnb) thing I think has to be informed before booking is that when the warmer is open,the pipes is noisy,especially in midnight,but it doesn't matter,because almost all the old apartments in NYC have this problem,or maybe it could not be considered as a problem.Above all,Chris and Erika are so nice and friendly.And absolutely,I love this place.
Erika's place was clean, quiet and in a location that was convenient and safe. It was a good value for NYC!

Ventajas:
- Está a 2 minutos andando de la parada 125 de la línea 1
- La comunicación con Erika es muy buena, contesta rápidamente y te ayuda en todo. Es muy atenta y busca el detalle 
- La habitación es grande, con armario, cajoneras, productos de higiene, secador...
- La casa está bien, con independencia total, puedes usar la cocina y todos los utensilios 

Inconvenientes:
- Las tuberías de la calefacción hacen un ruido horrible como si alguien las golpeara. 
- El metro pasa dos calles más  allá y no está soterrado aunque te acostumbras.
Ambas cosas no  dependen de la anfitriona, pero es ruidoso sobre todo para dormir
Erika was a real pleasure to stay with. She was very accommodating for our schedule, which helped with our late flight.  The room and location were exactly what we expected. Would recommend!
Thank you for your kindness!
The apartment is located in upper Manhattan and it takes only 3- minutes walk to the subway. It is a very convenient place! Erika is really nice and considerate.

We loved to stay at Erika's apartment. Eventhough the metro station (line 1 to downtown) and some nice restaurants are right around the corner, the apartment is absolutely quite located in a beautiful house. Because it was Christmas, nobody was at home, so we had the huge apartment with our room mostly for our own. Both, Erika and her co-host Chris welcomed us sooo warmly and sweet, it was a real pleasure to meet them! And we've never stayed in such a clean apartment, that was really outrageous. absolutely recommend to stay there :-)

My friend and I stayed at Ericka's place for NYE.
The apartment is very clean and comfy. The location is very convenient and very close to the subway station!
I definitely recommend this room for your stay in NYC!
Very nice and clean place ! We loved it !

We had to cancel our trip to NYC due to winter storm Grayson the night before, but Erika was gracious enough to accommodate to our change in travel plans. Communication was prompt and transparent; I certainly hope to check out Erika's place when the next chance to visit NYC arises!

We have nothing but good things to say about our stay at Erika's!

Erika has managed to recreate the coziness of a bed-and-breakfast six stories into the Manhattan sky. Our accommodations could not have been more pleasant. Our room was tucked in the very back, behind the kitchen, and it usually felt like we had the place to ourselves!

Oh, and there is a really cool fire escape right outside the room! 

In addition to all of the above, Erika's place is conveniently located right around the corner from the 1 line, which enabled easy access to the rest of the borough, perfect for ensuring the ultimate Manhattan vacation. We would not hesitate to stay here again.

~Robert & Damian

Erika est disponible, l'appartement est très sympa. La chambre est parfaite pour un séjour. Seul bémol indépendant d'Erika, le chauffage à la New Yorkaise. Je recommande ce logement pour un séjour de quelques jours.

Great location, room, hosts, and stay!  We were visiting a friend who attends the Manhattan School of Music and it was only a 3 min walk from the airbnb to the school!  Additionally, the subway stop is SO close!  We would definitely stay again :)

Great place, I unfortunately didn't get to meet Erika but Chris was super nice. The room is exactly as it looks, very spacious and roomy with tonnes of storage for your clothes. The location is great, and it is quiet at night despite being close to the train. Great stay, highly recommend! Thanks for everything!

Such a plesure to stay in this little gem of an apartment. Beautiful, clean, really great location. Erika (the host) was friendly, helpful and very considerate. Can not recommend this enough. Certainly plan to return!

This was a really good AirBNB experience. For New York, the room felt pretty large and it made for a great place to chill in the downtime during my visit. As for location, you can’t beat it if you are trying to go to Columbia University (I walked to and from the university each day of my visit no problem). For everything else, you are right next to the main subway line that brings you most places you’ll visit in NYC. 

The only drawback? I am used to having a heater that makes noises, but for this one it was like someone was banging a hammer on a metal pipe two feet away from me! It did wake me up in the middle of the night (and I’m not a light sleeper)

Everything else was awesome. Erika is a great host, the room is great and the apartment is in a great location, the only consideration is the heater may disrupt sleep. Overall, I recommend

Unfortunately we were not able to stay with Erika due to our travel being cancelled but she was very understanding of the situation and responded quickly. Hopefully we will be able to stay with her in the future.

Erika’s place was in the perfect location for me to visit my daughter at Columbia.  The place was very clean with a comfortable bed.  Erika is very nice and has an outgoing personality.  She truly cares that you enjoy your stay.

Erika is a friendly host eager to provide hospitality. The room was comfortable and amenities such as ironing board were provided. It’s a nice building and I felt very safe and rested well. Great location close to subway and restaurants. Highly recommend Erika’s place! Marta
Erika is a nice host. Her house is neat, it is just the room we sleep is too crowded for three of us.
What a wonderful place! SOOO quiet. I was able to sleep nicely with the window open which you cannot do in all areas of NYC. The bed is super comfy.

Erica is a wonderful host! She is very considerate and truly cares about her guests! Her place is clean and spacious. The apartment is convenient and close to the subway. I will definitely stay at her place again!

We had a great stay at Erika's place. The room is just as in the pictures and it felt like home immediately. The neighborhood is very nice and the accomodation is very close to a subway station.

Thanks again Erika!
This was a wonderful stop on our college tour!  Erika was a very gracious host, making sure we felt comfortable and orienting is to the neighborhood.  Great location.  So many food options!

Erika’s place was in such a great location! It was a block away from the transit so it made getting around so easy. The room was extremely clean and well decorated. Very cozy! Erika was great with communication- didn’t have any problems. Would definitely recommend!
This place is very lovely. Perfect for what I needed while staying in NYC.

Erika's place was great. The location is close to Columbia University Campus. The subway is one block away and an easy ride to Times Square. The room was very clean and the beds were very comfortable. It was quiet and felt very safe. We were gone all day every day - but even so we never even saw any of the other dwellers and never had to wait for the bathroom. Erika was available whenever I needed her. I highly recommend her place~

Lovely host, room and kitchen :)
Recomended!
Excellent Location

Erika's place is on a quiet street right at the seam of the Columbia U neighborhood and Harlem. Loved the location and the room was super comfortable.  It was very private and she is well organized for guests, so everything was like clockwork. Very much recommended.

H Erika είναι ευγενέστατη και πολύ φιλική!!! Το διαμέρισμα είναι λίγο μακριά από το κέντρο, αλλά η στάση του μετρό είναι 5 λεπτά με τα πόδια και το μετρό πολύ γρήγορο. Σε μισή ώρα το πολύ είσαι στο κέντρο. Το δωμάτιο πολύ κομψό και καθαρό. Είχαμε τη δυνατότητα να φτιάχνουμε το πρωινό μας στην κουζίνα. Όλα ήταν μια χαρά εκτός από μερικούς ήχους του καλοριφέρ κατά το ξημέρωμα...όχι όμως κάτι το πολύ σοβαρό, μια μικρή ενόχληση για όσους δεν πάσχουν από αυπνίες :) ! Επίσης η γειτονιά μας φάνηκε πολύ ωραία και ο δρόμος 125str έχει πολύ ενδιαφέρον με ωραία παλιά jazz bars πολύ κοντά, στα οποία μπορείς να φτάσεις με τα (Website hidden by Airbnb) συστήνουμε ανεπιφύλακτα σε όποιον ενδιαφέρεται να επισκεφτεί το Manhattan.
Beautiful home and super close to the subway! Good pizza and restaurants nearby! Erika was super responsive and helpful!
Safe comfortable and convenient. Excellent value and sweet host.
호스트가 궁금한 점이나 문제가 생겼을 때 바로 답장해주고 잘 대처해 줍니다. 숙소 위치가 센트럴파크랑도 어느정도 가까워서 시내에 돌아다니기 좋아요. 내부도 깔끔하고 편안합니다
Erika is an awesome host.   She made sure to communicate everything we needed to get in and make our stay as comfortable as possible.   We look forward to staying again in the future.
We had a great time staying at Erika’s place. So helpful and quick to respond! Made the stay easy and enjoyable!

Great value for money at Erika’s place. 
Amazing eateries nearby would definitely stay here again when in NY. 
The place is clean and comfortable and very close to the Subway. Definitely felt safe here, thanks again!

A gracious smile from our host Erika, with welcoming touches and offers to help with anything we needed during her busy work schedule, superb location, great functioning kitchen, a clean comfortable bed, a suitcase stand, good simple air conditioning, and ample space to move around, topped with the use of a luggage scale, gives Erika 5 outstanding stars and 2 thumbs up.  Also the elevator was invaluable as compared to walking four flights up in other airbnbs I've stayed in near Columbia University.  This would be my first choice and I would book again.  I'm a seasoned international traveler and can recognize kind and excellent hospitality in a second.  This is it.

We stayed with Erika in March and were so comfortable, decided to stay again. The location and easy access to subway, restaurants, etc. helps make our visit to a busy city more relaxed. Erika is a lovely host and we highly recommend her place!

The room is spacious enough for two people (I stayed with my mom), and it’s nicely decorated. Transportation was super easy; I’d recommend taking the bus early morning or late at night, otherwise, there’s lots of traffic. The line 1 (train/subway) is only a couple blocks away, which takes you pretty much anywhere in a short time (15-20 min). Also, there’s a park by the Hudson River also couple blocks away. 
We really liked staying here as it gave us a better sense of the regular daily lives of residents rather than just seeing the craziness of NYC. 
Erika was super kind and easy to reach via text. The only minor “complaint” is that the room is facing the street and it can get pretty loud, having us wake up in the middle of the night. I stayed with my mom, so we were home by midnight, but if you are out and about later than that, maybe the noise from outside won’t be an issue. 

Thank you Erika!
I loved staying here. Quiet. Clean. Safe. Erica is a great host. The room is realy cute and comfortable. I felt at home and very relaxed during my visit. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Everything was great at Erika's place. My plane was delayed and I arrived at 3am but she found a way to let me in. Erika is very friendly and helpful. The room is very cozy and the flat is perfectly located in a great neighborhood. I would totally recommend it!

Erika is very nice and the room is super!  The mini lights bordering the window are a nice touch.  The apartment is a hundred years old but it all works.  The toaster toasts a perfect bagel.  Thanks Erika, I’m sure others will enjoy a stay in your place as we did!

The room looked exactly like the pictures and was bigger than what was shown. It was very comfortable and private. In the hot and humid New York summer, the air conditioning was a life saver. The room had easy access to the kitchen and the building elevator was quick and efficient. What was also great is how close the subway was. Erika was very responsive and made sure check in was smooth and I had everything I needed.

Erika’s place is great! Location is close to the metro, room is comfortable with aircon, she responds right away for any question/request. Would love to stay again if I’ll go back to NY and definitely will recommend to my friends and family!

Erika’s place is FANTASTIC! The room is super clean and superbly and thoughtfully decorated. Bathroom is very clean as well! We arrived at around 11:30pm and Erika still waited for us to complete the check in process and showed us around. Erika is a wonderful host, and I thoroughly recommend her place to anyone who visits NYC!
The public transportation is very convenient. Room is clean and tidy and has a lot space to storage the stuff.

Erika’s place was great! The room looks exactly like the picture and comes with ample amount of storage space for your items. Erika’s check-in involves a tour of the spaces and the kitchen amenities which was very helpful. Location is close to everything you could need and/or a subway that can take you there. Erika was very friendly and helpful & check-in & out was quick and easy! Would love to come back!

A comfy bed, friendly housemates, and somwhere close to transport and other amenities. Some issues with cooling despite aircon- nobody’s fault, it is just the top floor of an old building and traps heat. Not ideal if you are sensitive to heat though. It was cool to see how New Yorkers live, rather than staying in a hotel.
Beautiful room and great location! The bed was very comfortable and the decor was nice and homey. Air conditioning is available and worked great! It’s a great room at a great rate!

We were super content with our stay at Erika's place. The communication with her was great, she reliably replied all messages quickly and friendly. The room and the apartment were very sweet, comfortable and clean and there was everything one needs. The apartment is very well located, one minute from the subway with two subway lines that bring you directly to the main places in Manhattan. We would stay at Erika's place again and can highly recommend it. Thank you very much for everything!
公寓位於安靜的住宅區,離地鐵站很近,附近也有不錯的餐廳｡入住時房東不在,但事前提供詳盡的入住說明可以快速入住,其他室友很友善｡由於停留時間短,沒有見到房東本人,期間如有問題,亦能親切地回覆｡

Erika's place is a great find and an almost unbeatable value for its price.
You're close to the 125th street subway station, which is important because you'll have to use it a lot if you want to discover anything else than Harlem or the Columbia University area.
It takes about 30 - 40 minutes to get to the city center.

The place itself was as described: a room that accommodates two with nothing of note.
It was airconditioned, roomy and quiet at night... so perfectly adequate!
Don't expect too much from the common areas though, it's an older building with its blemishes and a private room in a shared appartement.

We didn't get to meet Erika in person, but we got a very hospitable welcome from her roommate Ellen.
In fact, her roommates were a real added value because they weren't only super welcoming, they also were our window into the twenty-something lifestyle in this wonderful city.

In conclusion: this place is as authentic as they come and I would definitely recommend Erika's place if you're looking for an affordable place to stay.
Great host!

I loved staying at Erika’s place, it was such a good deal for a large room that is very close to the subway station. I didn’t even feel like I was sharing a space really, and I had everything I needed ready for me so I didn’t need any additional contact with Erika. Erika was also very helpful as she asked when I would be arriving and offered to let me keep my bags in her apartment well before check-in, that was so helpful. I definitely recommend this place!

Erika's room was very clean and super comfy. It's an antique building yet nice and tidy, makes it a unique experience. Although I didn't get to meet her, she was very attentive through messages, she gave me an my cousin fresh towels and bed linens.
Very cute spacious apartment located close to the subway, easy access, fast communication. Definitely recommend!

Cozy and quiet space. Loved the 1920’s vintage building. Location was close to subway, bus, and coffee. We especially appreciated the deli down the street (Bahamas) that made delicious food on a budget. Thanks Erika!

Erika's place was just what we needed for a comfortable bed and hot shower during our stay in New York.  The neighborhood was relatively quiet and the subway was conveniently around the corner.  The bedroom was clean and beautifully decorated.  We never met Erika, but chatted with her roommates a couple of times, and Erika checked in with us to make sure everything was okay, and she responded to our questions instantly.  The check-in was a breeze thanks to her clear instructions.  In addition, Erika was very accommodating and understanding when I messed up our date of departure.  She agreed to let us stay an additional, unplanned night since we were leaving at 3 am and she was still able to clean in time for the next guests.  Highly recommend!  Thank you, Erika!

My stay with Erika and Ellen was perfect. Communication and check in procedures were great. The apartment is close to the subway and there are a lot of food options nearby. The room was exactly as pictured, beautifully decorated and clean. I didn’t meet Erika in person but she was made check in a breeze and was quick to respond. Ellen was kind and gracious when we chatted for a bit at the apartment. I would definitely stay here again.

El lugar supero las espectativas, muy buena ubicación cerca a estacion del subway, tiene lugares cercanos para comer, es seguro y confiable, recomendado, la comunicación con Erika fue perfecta, gracias.

Nice turn of the century building and elevator. Street a little noisy late,  but it was a Saturday night in the big city. LOL  Great building security. Nice location for visit to Grants tomb & Riverside Park area.  Huge room,  nice roommate. Very comfortable bed and linens. Great Breakfast place off Amsterdam looking forward to staying again.

Erika and her roommate were very nice and helpful. The room is just as advertised and in a perfect location for visiting Columbia U as well as on the subway line. The only thing that surprised me was the noise from the heater when it came on - got used to it but I didn’t know ahead of time so took a minute to figure it out.  Great value for staying in NYC.

Erika and her roomate Ellen were very open and friendly hosts. The room was very nice and spacy. The heating pipes sometimes make some noise but nothing terrible. 

We would definitely come again and stay at your appartement.

Erika's place  is warm and has an elevator, so no stairs to the 6th floor. Close to the train. Close to great foods. Not far away from Central Park, Broadway shows, time square,Rockefeller center. I will recommend Erika's place. She is a great host.

My girlfriend and I LOVED our stay at Erika’s apartment. We were able to meet her when checking in, had a nice conversation, and got a tour. The apartment is exactly as photographed and a lovely home away from home. The layout is perfect for those wanting some peace, quiet, and privacy as well because the room is away from all other rooms only bordering the kitchen. The building is perfect and token “old New York” having been built in the early 1900’s (I believe). We were very comfortable and provided all fresh linens, towels, wash clothes, and shampoo and soap. Her apartment is very clean and I love the personalized touches. Thank you for a great experience and we’d love to return!

Erika’s place worked out perfectly for visiting my son who is going to the Manhattan School of Music which is on the same street and a very short walk away. Check-in was clear and easy. I didn’t meet Erika, but she was very attentive through emails. I would definitely stay at her place again. it was my first time just staying in a room on Airbnb rather than having the whole place and I couldn’t have been more pleased.

This is such a nice room! Big, lots of light, clean! 
Theres a Subway right around the conor, and the a lot of small local shops. 
We came quite late to check in, but that was not a problem. 
The people who lives there keeps to them self.
Great place to stay! Close to Harlem and Upper Manhattan and lovely apartment.

Erika's place is in a charming older building. The bedroom itself is nicely decorated, with a bathroom down the hall, and lots of thoughtful touches in the amenities. The only issue to be aware of is that the radiator in the bedroom is quite noisy at night; it woke us several times with banging noises.
Erika’s place was great and really convenient!
The stay was amazing at Erika's. The location was perfect and had all tiny and good food places around. The room was cozy and was very well decorated.

Nice place to stay specially if you need to attend some part of Morningside campus at the Columbia University, it is pretty close (3 blocks away).  Also it is very close to the line 1 metro.

The heating pipes make some sound sometimes. You must consider this if you cannot sleep well with sound.
Awesome place, could stay here again.

Erika’s place was fantastic and one of my best experiences staying in NYC!  It was very spacious, the bed was comfortable, and the apartment is nicely decorated and well organized.  I’d highly recommend!  Thank you, Erika!
Super good value for NYC, minutes from subway. Everything was clean and as advertised. Erika was great about responding quickly.

駅からも近く､朝6時半に家を出て地下鉄に乗りましたが､人も多かったので安全でした｡
近くにｶﾌｪやﾚｽﾄﾗﾝ､ｽｰﾊﾟｰがあるので､長期滞在にもよいと思います｡
冬でも暖かく過ごせました!

Erika’s place was way better than I expected! The location was really good, very close to the subway station that takes you to all the main attractions of the city. Room had very cute little touched and overall would definitely recommend this place!

This is a great space with location and value. The room is private with all the amenities to be comfortable. The location is amazing, close to subway, Riverside Park, great restaurants and more! Erika is a great host and I hope to stay with her again some time!

I had a fantastic stay in Erika's space. The location of the apartment is great, it's very close to public transit and in a lovely neighborhood. Erika provided very clear, easy to follow instructions for check in. The room is lovely and very comfortable. Erika and her roommates were all friendly and welcoming. I would definitely book this room again.
Spacious room, as advertised, conveniently located for 125th St /Broadway & Columbia campus. Thank you Erika and (Hidden by Airbnb) for the warm welcome.

name: Absolute harborfront 2-bed luxury heaven MAR SALE!
summary: SALE MAR 27-APR 1!!! Directly on stunning Sydney Harbour in Rose Bay. 50m from beach, marina, cafe, Regatta restaurant, fishing, playground, kayaks & bus. 5 minutes from shops, Double Bay boutiques, bars, restaurants & nightlife, golf-course and sea-planes. 10-min from Westfield, trains & Bondi. HUGE Fendi Case designer sofas, 2x4 poster beds, down pillows, fine linen, fluffy towels, artworks, toys, 55" QLEDTV, fast wi-fi, Stan and Netflix. Beds for up to 5 and 2 further 6'6" sofas for kids.
space: The photos don't do my place justice - you have panoramic views of stunning Sydney Harbour, which is literally a stone's throw away. My apartment is filled with art and furniture collected in Europe and even upgraded since the photos were taken, especially the artworks. Having said that, it's all very child friendly with locks on all windows and toys for a wide range of ages. I love my tech... NBN wifi is lightning fast, unlimited and streams to wall-mounted screens in the living and master bedroom, and to back bedroom via a repeater. Music is via new Yamaha Bluetooth soundbar in the living room, G Home in the master bedroom and G Home Mini in the kitchen for music and timers when cooking. No real limits on noise, within reason and sensible hours. TV in living room is new Samsung QLED 55" 4K with 4K subscriptions to Netflix and Stan for 4K/UHD streaming which will blow you away, and master bed TV is Samsung 40" HD panel with a Chromecast for Stan/Netflix/streaming from your own devices
description: SALE MAR 27-APR 1!!! Directly on stunning Sydney Harbour in Rose Bay. 50m from beach, marina, cafe, Regatta restaurant, fishing, playground, kayaks & bus. 5 minutes from shops, Double Bay boutiques, bars, restaurants & nightlife, golf-course and sea-planes. 10-min from Westfield, trains & Bondi. HUGE Fendi Case designer sofas, 2x4 poster beds, down pillows, fine linen, fluffy towels, artworks, toys, 55" QLEDTV, fast wi-fi, Stan and Netflix. Beds for up to 5 and 2 further 6'6" sofas for kids. The photos don't do my place justice - you have panoramic views of stunning Sydney Harbour, which is literally a stone's throw away. My apartment is filled with art and furniture collected in Europe and even upgraded since the photos were taken, especially the artworks. Having said that, it's all very child friendly with locks on all windows and toys for a wide range of ages. I love my tech... NBN wifi is lightning fast, unlimited and streams to wall-mounted screens in the living and master bedroom
neighborhood_overview: You are literally 20m from Sydney Harbour, Regatta Restaurant & Bar, Rose Bay Marina, bus stops and Tide waterfront cafe!  50m from a hidden beach with kayak hire and playground.  250m from Plumer Road Shopping Village and Rose Bay ferry stop.  500m from a public golf course, tennis courts, seaplane pier, Catalina Restaurant, Rose Bay shops including Woolworth's, dozens of restaurants and cafe, Double Bay shops, restaurants, bars and clubs, and Redleaf Pool, a free harbourside swimming pool set in stunning gardens with its own cafe.  Bondi Beach, Westfield Bondi Junction, Centennial Park, Nielsen Park and Paddington are 10 minutes drive.  The CBD is under 15 minutes drive or better yet hop on a ferry, while the airport is around 30 minutes drive.
transit: 1 minutes walk to nearest cafe, bar, restaurant, park, beach, bus stop & playground. 5 minutes walk to local shops, golf course, croquet, plus Rose Bay Wharf ferries, water taxis and sea-planes.  10 minutes drive to Bondi Junction train station, Westfield Bondi Junction and Bondi Beach. 15 minutes to the CBD. 30 mins by taxi from airport - around $40 in an Uber. Lots of taxis right out front.
access: The whole place is all your very own and you'll never hear the neighbours (being on the top floor helps). The laundry is on the ground floor and is coin operated with an industrial quality washer and dryer, plus washing line.
interaction: I may be overseas or interstate but always on phone and email and I have a team of local help as needed - cleaners, sitters, etc.
house_rules: Smoking is only allowed on the small balcony thanks.

host.host_location: Rose Bay, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about:
I'm a half English / half Australian creative management consultant, currently based in Sydney.

I'm fanatical about good design and I hope that's reflected in my homes and how I treat other people's spaces

I have a lovely 9 year old boy Roman.

I love traveling with UK, Bali, Spain and Thailand particular favourites.

reviews.comments: The location is very nice. Every morning I can wake up by a very nice water-front view! All the furniture and facilities are luxury and perfect. We had a very nice New Year holiday in this house. Ben is a very nice guy, he help us a lot and gave us many trip advises in Sydney. There is a complimentary parking space, and if you wanna walk or take public transport, it's always very convenience. I think whether you are alone or with families, the apartment is always a best choice!

Ben’s place is even better than in the photos, amazing views straight over bay and marina. Beds very comfy, lots of hot water and good heating. Apartment is homely with books and plenty of games for our kids. Ben was quick to respond and gave local tips for cafes and getting about. Had a wonderful stay.

Nous avons séjourné une semaine chez Ben qui a pris soin de nous accueillir et de nous renseigner très chaleureusement. L’appartement est très agréable et la vue très belle, avec des facilités de stationnement. Je vous le recommande vivement.

We had a wonderful staying at Ben’s place.  It is such an awesome (Website hidden by Airbnb) two year old absolutely loves boats and imagine his excitement waking up to boats and ferries everyday!  It was such a treat for us to get into town using the ferry; we took the ferry to Barangaroo and Watson Bay for lunch and my son was over the moon.

Ben was also great organising things we needed for our baby, like a cot and baby booster seat, and provided little touches like toys, hair dryer, candles, heater in the bathroom etc.  (winter when we were there). It was also great that he stocked up! We arrived so late and were so hungry the first night we were grateful there were lots to eat in the fridge and snacks too!

The entertainment in this place is awesome, also large sofas great for entertaining if you have people over.  I love this location with options of cafes, restaurants, parks and the ferry close by.  We treated ourselves to Catalina on the last night and it was so romantic.  The only thing I wished for is a coffee machine for some good coffee.
 
We slept fine through the night, but for light sleepers the slight traffic noise is not ideal.  

All in all a great stay!
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Absolutely wonderful apartment right on the water at Rose Bay, with a very thoughtful and welcoming host. We particularly loved having the park and small beach just across the road, there's also a cafe and restaurant right there too for added convenience! Ben is a wonderful host, very responsive and flexible with arrangements, he also took a lot of trouble to make the apartment comfortable for our son, with a cot and high chair. It's a fabulous space, would highly recommend it for a lovely place to stay in Sydney!
We had an amazing time at Bens place! Great location and communication with Ben was on point. Would highly recommend this place and would definitely come back :)
This is a great place with a wonderful view and within easy reach of a lot of interesting places and things to do.  I highly recommend Ben's place.

Ben's place is really cool.  Very high tech. TVs in every bedroom and living room. It's on the 3rd floor of an older building with a great front view to the bay which brings a nice breeze.  It's convenient located to bars, laundry and the ferry. The ferry journey to CBD is just amazing. A must do. It's very quiet to sleep even with the windows open. During the day though there is noise from the cars passing in the busy road.

neighborhood_overview: Copacabana beach, located at the Atlantic shore, stretches from Posto Dois (lifeguard watchtower Two) to Posto Seis (lifeguard watchtower Six). Leme is at Posto Um (lifeguard watchtower One). There are historic forts at both ends of Copacabana beach; Fort Copacabana, built in 1914, is at the south end by Posto Seis and Fort Duque de Caxias, built in 1779, at the north end. One curiosity is that the lifeguard watchtower of Posto Seis never existed.[4] Hotels, restaurants, bars, nightclubs and residential buildings dot the promenade facing Avenida Atlântica. The Copacabana promenade is a pavement landscape in large scale (4 kilometres long). It was rebuilt in 1970 and has used a black and white Portuguese pavement design since its origin in the 1930s: a geometric wave. The Copacabana promenade was designed by Roberto Burle Marx. The fireworks display in Rio de Janeiro to celebrate New Year's Eve is one of the largest in the world, lasting about 30 minutes. It is estimated that 2 million

THERE IS ONE ENTRANCE TO THE 10TH AND LAST FLOOR, WHERE ALL THE APARTMENTS ARE LOCATED, WHICH CAN BE PRIVATIZED IF ALL THE UNITS ARE RENTED.

notes: -i dont know my availability too ahead of time so you should better book for 7 or fewer days ahead. house_rules: -house key will NOT be provided -for ONE guest only -shoes OFF in flat -please shower BEFORE going to bed. -NOs: smoking, drug, bringing other people over. -Food and drinks are NOT provided by host, although you can use the fridge to store your own food. -guest MUST leave the flat during the day  (when host is NOT around; if you plan to stay in a lot, you're better off looking elsewhere.) -bring a cheerful mentality for the stay.

reviews.comments:
My stay at Guy's place went extremely well! Staying at his place was just what I needed for my trip. It was very comfortable and he made me feel very welcome. 

Guy is a very smart and accommodating person. He speaks several different languages and is a wonderful conversationalist. He is also respectful and understanding if you prefer some alone time.

His place is in a great, central location (in Tsim Sha Tsui). It's quite easy to find and the MTR is very close. There are some nice shops and restaurants nearby. If I were to repeat this trip, I'd do the same thing all over again and stay here. 

I would easily rate this experience 10 out of 10!

Thank you, Guy!

Guy was the perfect host! Very friendly, polite, and a good conversationalist. He was able to assist me in my travels and was very accommodating. The apartment is in a great location and close to the subway/metro. I would highly recommend Guy for a trip to Hong Kong~

I had a brief yet great stay here! Guy struck me as an incredibly intelligent, and independent thinker. He's also a great conversationalist. I felt very welcomed and comfortable at his place, albeit a couch. A very generous host indeed! A+ recommended!

La propriétaire est très gentil, il est sympa, chaleureux. La location est très centre de ville, juste dans la TSIM SHA TSUI, 1 minute on pourra arriver à métro. La maison est petite, mais cool. 
位置非常中心,走几步就到尖沙咀最繁华的地方! 还有房东GUI非常的友好,健谈! 热心!

Good place to stay,  gui is very talkative and he is a very smart person.  He was very kind and he helped me with the doubts that I had.  He even offer me a breakfast.  I definitely recommend to stay there.

Gui,really nice.I was surprised.He met me on the bus station,prepared orange juice for me. And in the morning He can make coffee or breakfast for you. But I was surprised again when he went with me got the bus station(around 5:60 a.m.)
Really polite and nice person.
If you need to stay for one-two nights with nice price and big help:your welcome !!!

It's my 4th time to HK, and it's my best time ever! Gui is a little bit shy first, but he is very nice and talkative, we chat until midnight. He also offers me snacks,n the most important thing is he helped me cleared my thoughts,which I'll start on my road soon.

Thank you,Gui!See you next time!

Central location in Tsim Sha Tsui near the K11 and Metro station. Gui was a very welcoming host, meeting me at K11, helping me feel at home, and even preparing toast and apples in the morning. He informed me of places to see in Hong Kong. Highly recommend if a coach is sufficient for your stay!

I only stay one night,but Gui treat me like friend
really care about what i need
and location is near MRT,very convenient
thank you Gui!!
非常热情好客房东,房东很健谈,和他聊天的过程中能更加亲切接地气的认识和了解香港的本土文化｡此外,非常感谢Gui的早餐!

The flat is quite near the MTR and in the center of downtown. The host is friendly and considerate. I would recommend here to guys who are looking for a convenient quiet place to stay in HK with few people living in.

I really don't know what to say and why I booked here...  

超過 176 CM 的男性不要考慮.

Very easy going guy, typical Hong Kong apartment, small but no problem with one or two nights stay. The host prepares a café and simple breakfast for me also. For individual travelers is a good choice.
真好,房东不错,
Good location, in the center of Tsim Sha Tsui, it is suitable for backpackers stay, Gui warm and hospitable , stay in communication with the landlord before.

Gui is a very experienced host. He performed the spirit of airbnb of meeting new people with an open mind. And he showed me the local bus route, which helped me through visiting HK. Recommended to visitors for new experiences.
这是在旅行途中歇脚的优选之地,地铁站附近,尖沙咀各个购物场所不远,虽然位置不是很好找,但是可以跟房东在K11会和｡机缘巧合,没仔细看,订的是个公寓合租,沙发,在客厅｡房东是位男士｡但是没关系,挺安全｡

A fully recovered and equipped apartment, with great light and very cozy. It has a double bed, and a double sofa bed in the living room, comfortably accommodating up to 4 guests. This property is perfectly located for those who wish to experience all the vibrant energy of Porto. Do not miss this opportunity! Because Liiiving is Easy :)

neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of the city, the Aliados Cosy Apartment is located next to Porto's biggest metro station (Trindade) and just a few minutes walk from the cultural and tourist center where all the excitement is! Within walking distance, you can find the main attractions such as Avenida dos Aliados and the famous Bolhão Market, as well as excellent restaurants and bars such as Candelabro and Cervejaria Brasão.
notes: In order to make Porto more attractive, the municipal tourist tax came into effect. The rate of € 2.00 included in the price of stay, is for guests over the age of 13. It is charged per person and per night for a maximum of 7 nights. We have a transfer service that will leave you at the apartment! You only need to ask it (consult us for price) You can also enjoy a delicious breakfast, which can be delivered every morning in your apartment, upon request (consult us for price)
transit: You can request our transfer service whenever you need it (consult us for price) There is a vast public transportation network at your disposal.
access: You have full access to the apartment
interaction: We leave our guests at ease, but we’re available whenever they need us.
house_rules: Treat the apartment and its items well and with care as it was your own  Smoking is not allowed. Please respect the neighbors: No loud noise allowed before 10h00 am or after 10h00 pm Please Respect the check in and check out times: •	Check in: from 15h00-24h00. Please provide a check in time at least 24h hours before you arrival. If you need a baggage drop (from 12h00) please let us know in advance. A member of Liiiving Team will have the pleasure to meet and welcome you at the apartment at the arranged time. •	Check-out: until 11h00. (If there’s availability, we would love to provide you a late check-out). Please do take care of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. We are looking forward to welcome you in our properties :)
We were born and we have lived in Porto. We will be happy to help you out to know and enjoy every city where we are installed !
We love to meet new people, enjoy literature, cinema, to travel, meeting other cultures, other ways of being and living life !
We are delighted to give a personal welcome to our guests and to receive them the best way we can :)
Hope to see you soon !

reviews.comments: Nice apartment and perfect for a couple or 2 good friends. It was not too big but everything you need and even a very nice television and couch in case you need a night in.

Propre, bien equipe, confortable et bien situe. On sent cependant qu'il s'agit d'un business et pas d'un loueur individuel. Differents interlocuteurs pour la reservation et le check-in, ambiance showroom ikea, instructions standardisees dans l'appart, bip a l'interphone 15 mn avant l'heure de check-out. C'est efficace mais assez impersonnel.
Attention : L'immeuble juste en face des fenetres de l'appartement est actuellement en travaux (mi-aout 2018). Nous n'etions pas au courant et le reveil a 8h15 tous les jours nous a pas mal gache le sejour.

This place is perfect for any couple that’s looking to be in the heart of Porto. The location was exactly what we wanted for exploring by foot, but also very close to bus and tram systems. “Tucked away” from the hustle and bustle of large crowds but still very much a part of everything you want to experience. We didn’t spend a ton of time inside the space but was accommodating to us when we did. Nice, clean, and comfortable, which is exactly what we wanted. The construction next door was very punctual at 8am, but for us that was no issue because we would already be up. If you’re looking to sleep in bring ear plugs, but we recommend getting up and exploring while you can! Overall, definitely recommend the space. Kind host with a great app for tourists to use with great recommendations. Great stay!
Impecable,

name: Kihei Akahi C-607 - 1 Bedroom, Top Floor, Ocean Views, 2 pools, Tennis - Condo
summary:
Unwind in paradise with ocean views from this lovely condo on the 6th floor. With its elegant furnishings, beautiful community pool, and ideal location, you’re sure to have the vacation of a lifetime!

Warm wooden floors lead you into the bright and spacious living area of Kihei Akahi C-607. There is a plush corner chair and the huge sofa converts into a queen-sized bed, providing a comfortable spot for two additional guests to sleep. Relax as you watch a movie on the large HDTV, or use the fast and free Wifi to upload a few vacation pictures. This open space keeps everyone connected, while the air conditioner keeps the space cool. The sliding glass doors look out over an incredible view, and lead out to your private balcony. The roof overhead provides shade, and the open railing doesn’t obstruct your view of the palm trees and the ocean beyond. Bring out a couple glasses of wine and sit at the bistro table for a romantic drink beneath the stars!

When it’s time

host.host_about:
Hey there!  We're VacayHome Connect.  There are tons of owners out there that hire local experts to manage their homes.  VacayHome Connect helps those managers connect with guests like you, helps answer your inquiries, and otherwise facilitates bookings on popular channels like Airbnb.

Our team in conjunction with the local property manager will treat you like you want to be treated!  We'll provide answers to your questions just as quickly as possible, and if we don't know the answer, we'll get one for you.  Once your reservation is completed, you'll receive information that tells you how you can connect directly with the local manager.  But don't worry, aside from being able to reach out to them, you'll always have us too!  We've got your back and you can call on us at any time!

reviews.comments: My girlfriend and I spent 8 days at the Kehei Akai condos, apartment C-607. The place was great. Here were some of the things that made it great: ocean view w balcony, fully stocked kitchen, 5 minute walk from 3 great beaches, awesome breakfast spot and the best grocery store on the island within walking distance, beach supplies included - umbrella, cooler, chairs and towels, the property is meticulously maintained and the 2 pools, BBQs and tennis courts are really nice. Highly recommend and would give it a 9/10 for this price range.

Very nice apartment for two people! I'm so glad I chose this instead of staying at the resorts in Lahaina. Property was very clean and comfortable. Location is close to beaches and restaurants. There is a conditioner in the unit but it is located in the living room so while it does a great job cooling that space, the air doesn't make it to the bedroom. We had the ceiling fan and table fan on all night and still found ourselves waking up sweating. I'm assuming this is the typical layout of apartments in Maui so just want to give everyone a heads up. Also, you may need to purchase more toilet paper. We stayed for 6 nights and ran out of toilet paper by the 3rd. Not because we used excessive amounts, but that there wasn't enough. Overall, I would definitely stay here again! Check-in was a breeze and did not run into any major problems.

Great experience at Kihei Akahi. Centrally located in Kihei and walking distance to lots of restaurants and stores. Kihei had great weather even when other parts of the island was rainy. The starter kit of supplies lasted us the entire trip. Only thing we would've liked was if there was a separate air conditioner in the bedroom, but we were able to use the fans in the unit to get the AC into the bedroom. Overall great experience and the host was responsive to our questions.

Perfect way to enjoy the island! The condo was right across the street from the beach and Kihei was a great location. 

The apartment was clean and had plenty of space. Everything that you would need for enjoying the island was provided (towels, beach chairs, beach umbrella, body boards, snorkel gear, etc. 

Also, the management company was quick to respond to emails.
The condo was as easy as it gets. Clear instructions and easy access so we didn't need to interact with anyone. Hard to beat that price for the condo and location.

We had a wonderful stay at the Kihei Akahi C-607 on the top level. Breakfast with Ocean view and a different sunset view every evening across the road.
The condo was exactly as described and very clean. The kitchen was well equipped. Towels bed sheets and a lot beach stuff including chairs available.Also the resort is well maintained and organised.
Shops and grocery stores around(you need a car)
Maui C and C is well organised and easy to communicate with. Upfront communication is very well organised including reminders and rechecks. Very customer service oriented.

My boyfriend and I had a great stay here. The condo was clean and came with a perfectly stocked kitchen. (I like to cook a lot.)  I thought it was nice that there was coffee samples of Kona beans and bath soaps. It felt welcoming. 

My favorite part of our stay here was starting out the day eating breakfast on the lanai, looking over at the ocean. Which is literally a couple minutes away. Awesome! Another awesome thing is there are beach toys (beach chairs, snorkel gear, cooler, etc) for your use. That saved us some $$. 
 
I definitely recommend staying here. It's clean, quiet and close to restaurants, bars and beaches. The check in process is a total breeze. We had zero problems at this cozy condo. We'll come back for sure. Kihei is a fun little neighborhood.

The host provided plenty of information prior to our stay regarding gaining access to the condo. Once we were there the condo had everything we needed to make our stay enjoyable. The condo was extremely comfortable and welcoming, it felt like a home away from home. We also loved that it was walking distance to a great beach and in a super quiet and peaceful area.

The condo was nice, cozy and clean. It was good to stay there as a party of three. The kitchen was aswell fine. So we could cook our on little dinner or use the bbq grill at the pool. We liked that there was equipment like boogie boards, beach chairs and things for snorkeling which we could take to the beaches. So we had a good time here in Maui.

Thank you for allowing us to rent your Maui condo. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The rental was both spacious and clean. The entire complex was kept up and we always felt safe. Your condo is in a perfect location. The beach located across the street was beautiful and not too crowded. It was within walking distance to some of the best eateries in town. The only suggestion we would make is to place an a/c in the bedroom. It was too warm for us to sleep in. With the only a/c being at the front of the condo and the bedroom being in the far back, we felt there was no other option than to both sleep on the fold out from the couch in the living room. We are from Texas where we're used to the heat, but this was too much to be able to sleep comfortably. On the plus side, we found the foldout to be more comfortable than we imagined. That was a nice surprise and helped the non use of the bedroom a little more tolerable. We found the beach towels, iron, blow dryer and such to be extremely helpful. Thank you for thinking of those little touches that made our stay a wonderful one. We hope to be back someday. Again, thank you!

Our stay was very easy and convenient with amazing views.  The host sent several confirmations with directions, codes, and phone numbers.  The condo was clean, comfortable and a great location. Definitely will return!

The condo was clean and had an umbrella and beach chairs along with snorkel gear. Nice location across from the beach and with in driving or walking distance to stores. 
The bedroom was very hot as there is no AC in the room, but I slept comfortably on the pull out bed in the living area with the TV at night. 
BBQ by the pool made it easy to
Grill up steaks. 
Over all a great condo and great trip.

A nice and well maintain top floor condo with a view. Everything works and clean. Could use a better cooling in the bedroom but the unit has ceiling fans, AC in the living room and extra fans. Will highly recommend to friends and family.

This condo was in a great location in the heart of Kihei. We were right across from the beach. We were in walking distance to many restaurants and shops on the Kihei strip. The staff from Maui Condo and Car rental were friendly and efficient. We had a few problems with Wifi and entry code but these issues were quickly resolved. The condo was kept clean and had beach chairs and towels - very convenient! If you are looking for a quiet place to relax, this is the place to be.

Our stay here was really good, close to the beach great central location. Air conditioner was not needed due to the breeze threw the bedroom and patio windows. Thank you for the info on that. 

My only issues were small things. 
1) knives so dull you can't cut to cook. 
2) wasn't as clean when we got there as it could be. And maybe foam pillows to have as a spare as people (like me) have allergies to feather pillows. But that's just an idea. 

All in all our stay was great other then that, and would book again for sure if we came back. 

Thank you.

We loved staying at this place. Everything from booking to checking in and parking was very convenient. The condo was very clean when we arrived and we had everything we needed and more in the condo. The neighborhood was great too, within a short walking distance to many shops and restaurants and to a gorgeous beach. We would definitely rent this place again.

My mom and I stayed at this condo for one week and I can say that I if could, I would probably buy it.  The condo is really well situated, just in front of Kamaole II which is a great beach for family.  We saw lots of turtles there and the snorkeling gear that they provide at the condo helped to see them even closer.   At the 6th floor, you can perfectly see the sunset from the balcony.  My mom was worried that the room would be too hot at night because of reviews saying that the air conditioned didn't cool the room but Maui's wind not only let us sleep well, it made the condo so comfortable that we never opened the air conditioning of our trip.  Other then that, everything was super clean, safe and easy.  I will probably go back to this place next time because like a local said at the beach: Maui no ka o'i!  Mahalo!

This was a great condo to stay in, was clean, lots of equipment in the kitchen and clear instructions on check in/ check out policy's. It was in a great location close to the beach in Kihei. Only thing was we only had 3 towels which made it hard with going to the beach for the two of us.

The listing was as shown in the pictures. I loved our stay here. It was our first time in Maui and Kihei was a good home base. This condo was a one minute walk to the beach. Lots of good eats in the area. I like how this condo had vents in the bedroom so at night the cool air could flow through the unit. I would stay here again.

Very spacious condo, that has really everything. Often we found a pot only in airbnb listed places, but not here! Full arrayof plates, pots, pans and all cooking utensils!
The area itself is really chill and lovely, tennis court has full day of shades, so you can play all day around.
Would highly recommend for anyone!

Great and convenient location for exploring Maui. Apartment was stocked with useful beach gear and travel books. Only complaint would be that the "Ocean View" description is somewhat misleading since the view of the ocean from the balcony is blocked by other condos. Nonetheless, you're still about a 5 minute walk from the beach.

We really enjoyed staying in this condo. We were happy with the location, very close to the beach and close to the best restaurants. It's in a good neighborhood, within reasonable distance of all other frequently visited areas of the island. The view is beautiful! Would stay here again.
We loved it! Everything was accessible and the condo had everything we needed.

Overall, good experience. The condo is close to beach. When we first arrived, we feel so hot in the bedroom because there is no AC. However, we gradually get used to it in the next few days. There are some extra amenities proved in the condo such as a safety locker, a small cooler and even two boogie boards. The only thing I would complain is only 2 garbage bags were supplied.

Pratique et accessible, un bon lieu central pour des vacances balnéaires à Hawaï. Rien à redire, même si le nombre de règles peut faire un peu peur au début. Kihei n'offre pas le dépaysement le plus total, mais les plages et les options à proximité valent le coup, quitte à se balader en voiture après!

The unit was very easy to find and checking in was a breeze. It's located just across the street from a gorgeous beach and has many restaurants and shopping within walking distance. The condo itself has in-unit laundry, which was a huge plus. The kitchen was well-stocked with supplies/utensils and the air conditioning in the living room worked well. There is no air conditioning in the bedroom, which meant some nights were uncomfortably warm, but the unit had electrical fans available to plug in to help with the heat. The unit also had some beach supplies, including beach chairs, towels, umbrellas, and coolers, which was a nice touch. Overall, the unit was very nice and we certainly enjoyed our stay - I would recommend this condo.

Great condo, good location and views. 

Only cons include really hot and humid bedroom, there was noise from people walking in corridor. Also there was some carpet being placed in outside area causing noise, we weren't informed in advance for it.

This condo is in perfect location. Two minutes walk to the beach. It's nice and clean with everything you need from pots and pans to snorkels and body boards. Could not find better place for our holidays. Thank you very much.

Maui Condo and Car was a great location and quiet facility right across the street from the Kam Beach II. It was really easy to get into the condo and checking into the front desk was self explanatory. The only downside was how hot the bedroom got with the AC unit being in the living room and we spotted a few roaches in the kitchen area. We understand that trying to keep out bugs in a warm climate can sometimes be unavoidable. Overall, the stay was enjoyable and the location in Kihei was fantastic.

This was the perfect place to stay for our little vacation. You do have to step on to the balcony to actually get your "ocean view", but it is still beautiful. There are restaurants and shops close by and just a short walk down to the beach. Don't forget to try the snow cones that are just down the road!

The location was perfect with the beach across the street and lots of shops a short walk away. The place was as described. The only little things were some of the extra bed sheets we needed for the sofabed had a strange smell and we found a little cockroach in the bathroom. We also had some communication issues about storing our luggage after checkout because it was the holidays and we weren't told about special hours, but overall still a good stay.
The condo was in an ideal location. Close to the bar, restaurants and beach.

Easy checkin with a code on the door. We didn't have to even carry around the key. It seems like the building is for older couples but we still had a nice time. Great location! The barmuda triangle (the 4 bars in Kihei) is a 20 minute walk away and you can see the ocean from the balcony. They had bath and beach towels. Very clean.

This was a fantastic place to stay in Maui! We absolutely loved catching the sunset over the ocean from the bancony. It was the perfect size, clean, and had everything we could possibly need to feel at home and more! The bed was comfy, kitchen was stocked. The beach chairs and beach umbrellas were awesome. Perfect location across from a beautiful beach, walking distance to amazing food and shopping. I couldn't recommend it more! It was perfect!
exactly as advertised. GREAT location right next to the beach and close to local restaurants and stores. recommend
The room fit me and my girlfriend really well. A lot of space, clean and top facilities. We enjoyed every minute and hopefully, we will soon come back.
Amazing view and great space. We were able to watch some beautiful  sunsets also with a view of the mountains on the other side. Check-in was also very quick and convient.

name: Habitación acogedora en zona muy tranquila
summary: Habitación muy luminosa, en zona tranquila y bien comunicada. A 10 min andando del Hospital de Vall d’ Hebron y a 15 minutos en metro del centro. El piso es muy limpio, ordenado y bien equipado.
space: El huésped puede utilizar todos los espacios de la casa

name: Feel at home.. in a cosy and warm
summary: My place is very close to public transportations. Bus stops, metrobus and subway is only five minutes walk. There are plenty of restaurans and a very big shopping mall including cinemas, theatre and amusement park. 7/24 open shops around...
space: we have two options: First one has a big wordrobe -suitable for your items- and a very comfortable double bed. It s on the 4th floor with a lovely tree scene in front of the window. Second option is the roof room which has a single single bed for one person. Also it has a private bathroom and a big terrace good for watching the beautiful scene of the city. For both rooms the kitchen is shared. The guests can use the kitchen to cook. But if you like to taste local dishes, we can talk about the details as extra. Our place is located in the middle of everthing. There is a big shopping mall called CEVAHİR which is only 3 minutes walk .This area is known as a bussiness and shopping area so you can find hundreds of shops near my place.There are different types of restaurants with reasonable prices. You can go to Beşiktaş or Taksim on foot around 30 minutes.  There are public transpotation options also. Subway and bus stops are 3-4 minutes and metrobus stop is 6-7 minutes by walk. You can als

neighborhood_overview: This is one of the safest area in İstanbul. Even though it is super close to the main street, very quiet at nights. Thanks to public connections and being very close to the centers like Taksim, It s very easy  to reach home whenever you want. There are facilities around. If you feel hungry at 3 am, you can just go out and get what you need only in 3 minutes.
notes: We have two parakeets living inthe living room They are so peaceful and  never visit you in the room :P Well if you  have a fobia,we can put them in the cage when you want to spend time in the living room.
transit: Subway & bus stations 3 minutes walk. Metrobus is 5-7 minutes walk.
access: My place is very close to public transportations. Bus stops, metrobus and subway is only five minutes walk. There are plenty of restaurans and a very big shopping mall including cinemas, theatre and amusement park. 7/24 open shops around...
interaction: During your stay we will be staying  in the other rooms too. So feel free to have coffee & tea with us.
house_rules: smoking is not allowed at home. we take off our shoes. keeping the bathroom and kitchen clean is necessary.

host.host_about:
Hey!

I'm Naz, a teacher living in istanbul trying to survive and enjoy at the same time :) I have been in istanbul for many years and i love sharing my ideas about the hidden parts of istanbul. As i like talking a lot, do not hesitate to ask anything.
I share the flat with my sister. Either my sister or I will be meeting you. Both of us are generally described as very friendly and easy going people . Hope to meet you

reviews.comments: Naz and her sister Gülcin were very gracious hosts. We appreciated all of their help. The house was conviniently located with a great view from the terrace. 5 minute walk to metro, bus stop, and Cevahir mall; well-located yet surprisingly quiet. We would recommend staying here

Staying with Naz was a very wonderful experience for my girlfriend and I. Her and her sister are great people, and I would highly recommend booking at her apartment. The apartment is well located next to a large shopping mall that also has the metro station in it. Only two stops to Taskim Square.

The room was exactly as described in the listing and is very comfortable, clean and spacious. We spent one week there and we would definitely stay again if we are in Istanbul.

To met naz and to visit istanbul was a great experience and .
First of all we want to say thank you to naz for her  wonderful hospitality.Our room was very comfortable and clean

Naz was the best host ever. She was very comunicative, friendly and helpful. Everything was like in the pictures. What we liked the most was the hygiene. It was very very clean. The location is central, 3 min away from the metro which can take you to any part od Istanbul, you just need to ask someone. I want to thank Naz for the great time and I highly recommend her place!

Naz was a great host! The room was big with a really comfortable bed. Both Naz's sister and her flatmate are very warm & easy-going people, I enjoyed our conversations. I hope to see you again one day!:)
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Naz, nous sommes contentes d'avoir passé ce court séjour chez toi! La chambre était lumineuse et spatieuse, tu nous as très bien accueillies, merci pour tes conseils! Bonne continuation

We really liked to stay here. Naz and her sister Gulcin are very good and friendly girls, always ready to help and gave a lot of useful information. Location is perfect, 5 minutes to big shopping mall, subway and other transport points. Thank you very much! Hope to see you again someday ;)

I had an amazing time with Naz and her sister. The room was spacious and clean and both hosts were lovely, very helpful and hospitable. I was offered to join them for tea and coffee and had great conversations with them. It was also possible to relax in my room whenever I needed some rest from this lively city. The location of the flat is very convenient due to its proximity to the metro, metrobüs, supermarkets and Cevahir Shopping Mall and the neighbourhood is safe. 
I felt very comfortable there and would always recommend to stay with them :)

Naz and Gulcin are very nice and available we had a great time staying in their apartment and we are really grateful for their hospitality. place was really clean and comfortable in a nice and quiet neighborhood, also location was really good around 3 minutes walking to metro, bus and shopping center. We felt the real Turkish culture, they made us Turkish breakfast and shared a lot of useful information about Turkey and Istanbul. We really enjoyed our time staying there and we definitely recommend for everyone.

Like to meet and make friends.

name: Azur Lodge and Beach House
summary: Azur Lodge Beach House - está situada num dos lugares mais mágicos de VILA DO (Website hidden by Airbnb) vista para a praia e para o rio, pode usufruir de todas as comodidades da cidade a poucos minutos a pé. Com passadiços para longas caminhadas sobre a praia, Azurara é também um excelente local para praticantes de surf. A menos de 30 minutos da cidade do Porto, é o local perfeito para visitar locais históricos bem como usufruir de umas férias em família onde se aliam conforto, a praia e a gastronomia local.

reviews.comments: Een geweldig appartement, en geweldige verhuurders op een mooie plaats bij het strand.

Beautiful modern apartment right next to a stunning beach. Isobel and Andre were incredibly helpful on our arrival and had provisioned the place well. 
The complex pool is beautiful and pretty quiet. 
There isn’t a huge amount of facilities in the area so you’d need a car to get to shops etc. 
Great surf for beginners surfing

Appartement top: mieux que sur les photos. Suite parentale très spacieuse et chambre pour 2 enfants (ou ados) avec salle de bain attenante. Grand salon avec écran plat digne de ce nom avec des chaines pour toutes les langues. Isabel et Andre sont très challeureux et disponibles pour tout renseignement durant le séjour. La localisation de l'appartement est idéalement situé pour visiter Porto et les alentours. Vila Do Conde est une ville agréable avec commerces, marché, restaurants, plages...
Couple très gentil et accueillant, appartement moderne et propre, parfait emplacement si vous assister à un mariage à la plage à coter. Je recommande.

Die Wohnung ist sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Sie liegt auch sehr schön und ist ruhig. In der Küche ist alles Notwendige vorhanden. Die Waschmaschine ist super! Wir wurden sehr freundlich empfangen und eingewiesen. Wir werden gerne wiederkommen!
Apartamento excelente y el trato con Isabel muy bueno
We  were very satisfied in all aspects. The apartment was clean, bright and well equipped. Communication with the host was great and fast for all the time. Who prefer calm location  is good choice.
