Carlyn siempre tuvo una buena disposición para ayudarnos en caso de cualquier problema que tuviéramos. Te ofrecerá soluciones y ayuda para que tengas una buena experiencia de viaje.
The apartment is really great. It is very convenient to take the subway. The room is awesome. I would like to live there next time.

The location is so great. Subway is just at end of the block. Check-in was easy and we are able to have the keys to let ourselves in and out during our stay. Carlyn and Dave are very friendly and thoughtful. I will definitely recommend this place to my friends when they come to New York.

This is the second time I stayed at Carlyn and this time I actually got to meet her in person. She is always so quick to respond and works with us!  Also I stayed in a different room this time and the bed was AMAZING! I am sure we will stay again if she will have us!
Clean. Friendly folks. Easy access to train and close to good restaurants.
We had a great stay! We didn’t ha e the chance to meet Carlyn. However, Carlyn’s roommate was super nice! Great location. Beautiful home!
Acceuil, propreté, coopération!

Carlyn is a great host, the appartment and the bathrooms are impeccable, and the location is perfect. So close to lines 1&2, and many shops / places to eat around. Even a park on the Hudson with pool / sport facilities

I’ve stayed at many Airbnbs and some hosts and places are just meant to be Airbnbs; Carlyn’s place is definitely one of those. The set up of the place is perfect. Large, private room right next to a bathroom. Additionally, excellent touches like a welcome sign and daily reminders that fresh coffee is made. Every roommate was super friendly and kept explaining to treat their place like it’s your home. Overall, this was a great experience. I would absolutely stay again. Thanks, Carlyn and roommates!

This place is wonderful and I highly recommend it. It's very clean and tidy, it has fantastic amenities, it's so close to the subway, and the neighbourhood has a lot of charm. 

Carlyn and her roommates are super helpful and gave me some great tips on where to go and how to get places. After long days walking around as a tourist it was a treat to come home to a comfortable bed and some friendly people.

Thanks for making my New York experience amazing!
Great location! Clean private room and well kept building with elevator. Host responded back promptly and was understanding!  I would stay here again!
Beautiful home in a great location
Carlyn was super helpful, and the space was super clean! Convenient location.
Actually I had a great time staying here. It’s a nice and cozy bedroom and the kitchen is great !The whole house is very clean. Carlyn is nice and you can find some good food around the house
Carlyn place is located very near 137 st subway. A nice cosy location., great hosts and a pleasurable stay. Recommend this place to all those visiting this part of NY
Carlyn and David are so careful! Thanks for all!

Thank you so much for welcoming us into your home . Hands down the best AIR B N B service ! The place was clean , and organized with the bookshelf which was a lovely touch to the room. We got hot coffee on one of the days we needed it the most hahaha! This place made my stay in NY more memorable! A very beautiful place to stay w/ close proximity to the Subway Station which was also very convenient for us.

Alojamiento tal y como se describe en el anuncio.Los propietarios muy amables y con ganas de ayudar en lo que necesites.Verdadero espíritu Air bnb.
Para ir al centro necesitas metro que está a 2 min de casa,línea directa.Quiza si vas a estar muchos días pueda resultar algo pesado...Aunque son pocas paradas.
Saludos
Localização excelente, David um ótimo anfitrião, ambiente limpo!

Convenient, clean, and comfortable. This was a great place to come back to after exploring the city. We were able to find parking relatively easily, and the subway is right at the end of the block. We would stay here again.

The apartment is wonderful much bigger than you can see on the pictures. Carlyn and David are both very nice and are always eager to help and give you nice tips about NY. 
The apartment is super close to the subway station (train 1) that will get you in about 30 minutes to the city center.
Everything we needed was in the apartment. I highly recommend the place.

Carlyn's place is a real jewel! The apartment is spacy and clean with very comfortable beds, two modern bathrooms and a lovely living room & kitchen. We felt like staying in a four star hotel! The hosts are extremely kind and helpful. And the location ticks all important boxes: the Hudson, subway 1  (15 min to central Manhattan), crucial stores (foodstores, pharmacies etc) and nice restaurants almost literally around the corner.
Highly recommended!

Endroit très bien situé... hôtes aux petits soins et disponible. 
Appartement très bien tenu et bien décoré...cuisine spacieuse ....

This place is very nice, very clean, great amenities, good location near the 1 train, excellent and friendly hosts. Great experience, felt very much at home there. If you have a car, finding street parking is difficult at night but during the day is not bad at all. Thanks again.
Very nice place
Very clean and nice place. All great host, kind and friendly!
Strongly recommend. Clean convenient and thoughtful for travelers. Hosts and roommates are all friendly and polite.
Thank you :)
Everything was above expectation. Nice and clean room, bathroom, and spacious living area. And above all, friendly hosts. Thanks

name: Stylish executive studio in inner Sydney
summary: • Elegant and spacious one-bed apartment set up for executives and high-end single travellers or couples • Smart double master bedroom with storage and an immaculate and spacious ensuite bathroom • Access to the building’s gym, pool and sauna • Cleverly designed kitchen and dining area, including an office space • Clean, modern design with soft colours and good natural light • Private balcony with dining area • Walking distance from major restaurant hub, bay views, the CBD and Central Station.
space: With a slick, modern design and good spaces for both work and leisure, this one-bedroom apartment is perfectly set up for executives or high-end single travellers. Being in central Pyrmont in a stylish development, the apartment is conveniently located just walking distance to tram, ferry, busses, Darling Harbour, the centre of the city and Pyrmont’s dining hub. At home there’s an office space for freelance work, as well as a roomy lounge with a massive tv, and a private balcony. There’s also access to a gym, pool and sauna.
description: • Elegant and spacious one-bed apartment set up for executives and high-end single travellers or couples • Smart double master bedroom with storage and an immaculate and spacious ensuite bathroom • Access to the building’s gym, pool and sauna • Cleverly designed kitchen and dining area, including an office space • Clean, modern design with soft colours and good natural light • Private balcony with dining area • Walking distance from major restaurant hub, bay views, the CBD and Central Station. With a slick, modern design and good spaces for both work and leisure, this one-bedroom apartment is perfectly set up for executives or high-end single travellers. Being in central Pyrmont in a stylish development, the apartment is conveniently located just walking distance to tram, ferry, busses, Darling Harbour, the centre of the city and Pyrmont’s dining hub. At home there’s an office space for freelance work, as well as a roomy lounge with a massive tv, and a private balcony. There’s also acc
neighborhood_overview: Pyrmont is mostly known by outsiders as that one suburb in Sydney with a casino in it. That’s a bit of an unfortunate reputation because the folk that live around here know just how charming and spectacular the booming area can be. By the water there’s newly developed park land that shows off the Sydney’s incredible sandstone cliffs and high-end dining establishments that feed the city’s power offices (both (Hidden by Airbnb) and Fairfax are in the wharfs). Further inland there’s hip cafes like Clementine’s and Miam and a surprisingly multicultural food scene - try Kopitiam for Malaysian, Vic’s Meats for American barbecue, and Willis Canteen for Indonesian.       Then there’s the big draws, the Fish Markets and the Casino itself – not for gambling though, simply because it contains some of best restaurants in Sydney.
notes: Late check-out and early check-in is available where possible. When you arrive at the property you will find a kitchen and bathroom welcome pack with travel size amenities to ensure you do not need to head to the shops on your first day. We also provide top quality linen and towels. Cleaning services are available during your stay at additional cost. Your host has chosen to use the services of MadeComfy to ensure your requirements are met. A MadeComfy concierge service is available to help you with transport, theatre tickets, food and grocery deliveries or any special requests.
transit: We highly recommend using ride sharing service Uber.  Check out the TripGo app for transport timetables.
access: The entire property will be available for guests.
interaction: You'll have the full support of the team at MadeComfy, a Sydney company helping hosts provide the best quality stay even whilst they are away from their home. A team member will organise your arrival and will continue to provide any assistance during your stay.
house_rules: You are staying at a friendly and peaceful neighbourhood area. Your help in keeping noise to a minimum is much appreciated between 10pm-8am. Excessive noise such as amplified music, vocals will cause neighbours to complain to the Building Manager or Council Rangers or Police. This could lead to an on-the-spot AUD200 fine and/or eviction of the property. This can all happen very quickly so your cooperation is very much appreciated. Please treat our home with the same love and care you treat yours. We have the following house rules whilst you stay with us: 1. Please be mindful of sound levels after 10:00PM to avoid neighbour complaints. 2. If you break something please let us know to replace it. Please leave your beds unmade Kindly clean up your dishes and put them away In case you have rearranged furniture, please put it back to the original location We would highly appreciate if you could take out the trash Please ensure all appliances and lights are off and doors and windows are close

reviews.comments: The location was perfect for our needs and the apartment was quiet.  The check in did not go well as we weren't told which apartment it was and the key had to be collected from another location over 1km away which we didn't know either until we got there, and had sent the uber off.  The listing says there is a key safe but they didn't use it for us.  The host wasn't contactable either despite calling the 24 hr number a couple of times and leaving messages, so the whole process took about an hour and a half.  The apartment is tiny and is more of a bedsit rather than having a separate bedroom.  This also made me wonder about the very expensive $170 cleaning fee.
Great apartment with walking distance to bus stops and cafes. The property is very safe with the access control system. Suitable for the girls. Nice and helpful staff.

Very clean and well put together apartment. Would suit a longer stay. I was on a business trip so just needed a bed. The location is amazing.  Comfy bed. Lots of additional amenities to make your stay more comfortable.

The apartment was super clean and had a lot of conveniences.  There is no view to speak of but we only slept there so that wasn't such a big deal. Quiet street. Great washer/dryer for use. Good amenities. Beware of the footboard on the bed- it sticks out beyond the mattress and loves to bite your shins. The biggest headache was the check in process; we arrived a bit late and had to check in at a hotel that was kind of far away - especially when dragging our luggage uphill most of the way late at night. Also, do NOT get on the elevator - in our jet lagged state we failed to notice the lettered-wing and got on the elevator only to get stuck for 10 minutes... especially concerning as the emergency button didn't seem to work. You'll be on the first floor; door was open and unlocked when we arrived but for the rest of the visit it was locked when arrived to add to security.

Great comfortable little apartment for a business trip.  Full size ironing board and good quality iron was nice.  Later check in meant I had to get the keys from another location which was easy enough, just a little annoying.

I really enjoyed this unit. It was probably the most functional space anyone could have created for a studio. It has everything you need and more. A workplace, living area, kitchen, washer/dryer, balcony, nice bathroom, and plenty of storage space throughout. The only downside is the unit is not equipped with AC. Fortunately they provided two fans which were very helpful and needed. Everything else was perfect and the host did an excellent job communicating and assuring I had a great stay. The location of the unit is within the Darling Harbour area and only a ten-fifteen minute walk from the Central business district. Near a park and many businesses and restaurants. Would recommend it to a couple or single person.
Verything was perfect!
Great location, great place.

The apartment is fantastic and the stay was one of the easiest experiences I had in terms of check-in/out and overall communications. The surrounding area is nice with the various piers and parks. The apartment was very clean, well decorated and spacious. Would highly recommend for future visitors to the area. Only feedback I can give is that I couldn’t work out access to the gym but that may have been my failure. Other than that, the stay was excellent and responses to any messages were very fast. Thanks!
Location is great. The place is well decked out and true to the advertisement. The sofa bed can use a firmer mattress but the main bed is comfortable .   Satisfied in general .

The place was clean and equipped with everything, including extra soap and towels, and even a face scrub. Facilities are great, especially the swimming pool. The only downside is that checking in requires picking up the key at a nearby hotel, which took a few minutes
Great, neat flat with everything you need in a beautiful pocket of Sydney.

My parents, both in their seventies, stayed in the apartment for eleven nights.  They were very satisfied and found it to be very comfortable and well furnished.  They did suggest that it would have been helpful if the equipment, e.g. washing machine and coffee machine, had simple instructions on their use.  Also, there was very little cutlery - especially a shortage of spoons.

They did appreciate the surrounding quiet environment.
Clean, confortable place in an outstanding location.
An absolute stunning apartment, so stylish and spacey, very modern and great location, everything was very easy with checking in and out l, host was very very helpful!!

This property has a decent-sized balcony with open or closed shutters and is a terrific space for a quiet sit or a nice breakfast.  The lounge is also decent-sized and has an awesome Smart TV.
The bedroom is a ‘nook’ style, behind the full-sized kitchen - which has a large, clean and effective fridge.  So privacy has to be managed, but for a couple this is not an issue.
The bathroom is new, modern, roomy and has a larger cnr shower.
Everything was provided from toiletries, towels, milk, bikkies, even spare batteries for the remotes.
This property is 1 min walk to Star Casino, 3 mins to a full-sized Coles supermarket, 5 mins to Darling Harbour and 15 mins the the city of Sydney.  This was all walking times, not driving.
I rented a car from AVIS in the casino and they let me park it for free in the casino for 3 days as well.
This is a super apartment for a couple or 2 individuals.  It is very quiet - like dead quiet, but the city noise is heard when the windows and balcony doors are open.  I love that noise, but you hear nothing when they are closed.
The pool is large at 30m long, but it is on the opp side of the complex.
Great location and cute apartment. We really enjoyed our stay and would stay again.
Very nice appartment !
Perfect studio apartment in Pyrmont in Sydney. A short walk from the CBD and the fish market. Very clean and comfortable. One queen/full bed and one sofa bed that sleeps two.
perfect location for fantastic value!

Do not book this apartment on summer season. Don’t make the same mistake I did: Note that there is NO AIR CONDITIONING and the apartment gets really warm; it is very hard to sleep. Communication with the host was impossible; still waiting for a “solution”.

Thank you for such an amazing stay. We really enjoyed our time and it was everything we expected. Loved the apartment  and swimming pool was a plus. We only just realised a few days in that there was a bus stop right round the corner from us. This came in very handy. Close to the casino, close to shopping malls, close to a supermarket. Even had Netflix which made our time that much more enjoyable during our downtime. 20min walk to cbd and nearest train station. Only thing I could recommend is having a more powerful fan as we ended up sleeping with the sliding door open. I ended up getting bitten a few times. But other then that was an awesome stay. Thank you for being a lovely host.
Apartment was clean, well equipped and in a good location with bus stops nearby and a 8min walk to the pier.
Great location, perfect for the two of us and would defiantly stay there again

name: Sunny Apartment in Surry Hills- great location!
summary: Our apartment is a bright and breezy space that is in a prime location for travellers, everything you need is within walking distance with Central Station just a few blocks away. The bedroom is cosy with a comfortable queen bed and built in wardrobes with large mirrors. It has large windows and a sunny outlook.
description: Our apartment is a bright and breezy space that is in a prime location for travellers, everything you need is within walking distance with Central Station just a few blocks away. The bedroom is cosy with a comfortable queen bed and built in wardrobes with large mirrors. It has large windows and a sunny outlook.
house_rules: - Smoking on the balcony is OK

reviews.comments: I would definitely recommend this place for other travellers . Bella is very helpful and friendly. There is a bus stop right in front of the building and it only takes 10 mins to CBD. Plus, her apartment is super nice and clean.

Pros - great host, location, clean, quiet.
Cons - Temp accommodation whilst FT occupant away hence their stuff present in storage drawers / cupboards.

name: Aina Nalu Pumehana, in Old Lahaina
summary: Aina Nalu is an oasis of lush tropical beauty located in the heart of Old Town Lahaina, Maui  just moments from coffee bars, restaurants, galleries and activities. The beautifully grounds features a salt-water infinity pool, BBQ's, poolside bungalows
space: We hope you'll enjoy our condo, we've gone to great efforts and expense to provide you with a clean and exceedingly comfortable experience. Please check out our Reviews section. A few of our features include: - New A/C units in both the living room and bedroom - Child safety covers on outlets. -  Hand set stone work in the kitchen - All the kitchen utensils you'll need - Ice Chest and masks for snorkeling (you'll need to rent fins) - Fresh Water Aquarium  - Free WI-FI, Free Cable, 2 DVD Players, 2 TV's - A Sleeping Experience - 700 thread count sheets & comforter, memory foam mattress cover,  lot's of pillows 'you simply won't want to get out of it'  - Large bathroom with walk-in shower - Full sized 'locally made' Shampoo and Conditioner -  make-up mirror - Q-Tips, Cotton balls & pads - Full-sized detergents & fabric softener - Full-sized Beach Towels - Carpets shampooed & Deep-cleaned every 45 days, preventing musty smells and dust.
description: Aina Nalu is an oasis of lush tropical beauty located in the heart of Old Town Lahaina, Maui  just moments from coffee bars, restaurants, galleries and activities. The beautifully grounds features a salt-water infinity pool, BBQ's, poolside bungalows We hope you'll enjoy our condo, we've gone to great efforts and expense to provide you with a clean and exceedingly comfortable experience. Please check out our Reviews section. A few of our features include: - New A/C units in both the living room and bedroom - Child safety covers on outlets. -  Hand set stone work in the kitchen - All the kitchen utensils you'll need - Ice Chest and masks for snorkeling (you'll need to rent fins) - Fresh Water Aquarium  - Free WI-FI, Free Cable, 2 DVD Players, 2 TV's - A Sleeping Experience - 700 thread count sheets & comforter, memory foam mattress cover,  lot's of pillows 'you simply won't want to get out of it'  - Large bathroom with walk-in shower - Full sized 'locally made' Shampoo and Conditioner -
notes: You will find quite a number of condiments in our Kitchen Pantry, so look there first before picking things up at the store (ie. mustard, salt & pepper, etc) you will also find Foodland Market just .5 miles away and it's open 24 hours. Again, try to hit Costco prior to coming to Lahaina as Wine, steaks, etc are much less expensive. PARKING:  Land is quite expensive in Lahaina, and so are parking fees. The charge at Aina Nalu is $20. per night. If you find parking on the street it's free and the best time to find parking in front of Aina Nalu is between 1P - 3P.  Now, just across the road you'll find a Catholic Church on the corner and across from that is a lot that is either $12 or $15 for the night.  Also, the first night if you do not pay the parking charge and get a sticker then Security will simply place a paper notice on your windshield.
access: LOCATION: - Just moments  from coffee bars, ice cream shops, nightlife, galleries, the best restaurants Maui has to offer, no need to drive.  - About  7 min to Lahaina Shores Beach, nice beach for a stroll at sunset before dinner. Note: All the restaurants are quite casual. - 4 Min to Warf Center and & Front Street and Lahaina Harbor   - Beautiful salt-water infinity pool, large with wonderful view of the mountains. Note: additional BBQ areas near the large pool as well. - Second pool (smaller and has BBQ areas and comfortable chairs) - .5 miles from Foodland Market, Starbucks, Jamba Juice & Kasagawa Deli - Don't miss the views of the West Maui Mtns.  from the Salt Water pool, awesome moonrise, (Hidden by Airbnb) 'Full Moon Calendar for Maui'  - The pavilion is equipped with , a 60+ inch flat screen TV, high speed internet connection, comfortable teak chairs and cabanas, and best of all private Balinese style bungalows.
interaction: (Website hidden by Airbnb)   (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Try the Village Trail in Kapalua, it's really a nice one and easy to follow. This is located 18 min North of Aina Nalu, just up from the Ritz Carlton, it's an old golf course, so you can follow the cart paths, great views.  Note: this trail is only about 3 min from Kapalua Bay or 4.7 min from Honolua Bay and both are great for snorkeling. So, snorkel early, go hiking, then down the hill to Honolua Store (next to the Ritz) for breakfast:) just bring something to throw over your swimsuit.  Also WAIHEE RIDGE TRAIL (2.5 miles) - personal favorite, you can also go for a horseback ride at Mendez Ranch, it's right across the road. For post strenuous activity, (Hidden by Airbnb) Plate Lunch Wailuku Maui before you depart, then go searching, remember two things. 1) if you get lost at least you're with someone you like and misery loves company, but you won't get lost 2) However if you do, just turn either R. or L. when you come to water.
house_rules: We really don't have any house rules, just a few requests: - Please don't cook bacon in the Microwave, the smell is super hard to remove. - Please try to remove makeup with the cotton wipes in the medicine chest instead of our towels:)  Please try your best to leave the sand at the beach, it plays havoc on condos. Can't think of much else.

reviews.comments:
James was very accommodating to special requests.  James condo is very nice and comfortable.  He thought about everything which someone would want during their stay.  Location is very good for Lahania and other locations around Maui.  
Parking can be an issue though.  
I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again on my Maui visits.  Thanks

James is a very nice host, the apartment is charming, very well decorated and full of delicate details and thoughts, it is very very comfortable and very clean. There are 2 swimming pools on the complex. the city of Lahaina is quite touristic but at a human scale, no big hotels or high rising buildings, you can walk to the main street or to the grocery stores.
We have been able to visit most of Maui during our stay and have been inside the volcano crater which I do strongly recommend to anyone visiting the island. you can go in the early morning to the top of the island at 10,000 feet and finish the day at any of the magnificent beaches for a swim and to assist to the always wonderful sunsets.

The cupboards were filled with everything that I needed.  The linings and whole condo was nice and clean and neat.  James was very responsive and I am really happy that I chose this rental for my short but sweet vacay!

We had a fantastic time in James' apartment. Although we didn't meet him in person, James was very communicative and helpful, and had loads of really useful tips and advice. The location was perfect for using Lahaina as our base for exploring Maui, the place was clean, the air conditioning and shower worked perfectly (both very useful out there!) as did the washer/dryer. 
A perfect stay on a perfect island.

James is an excellent host and you can tell he cares a great deal about his apartment he rents out and for your personal experience on the island. His place is conveniently located right in the heart of Lahaina and is a great central location for all your Maui needs whether you want to chill out in Lahaina or Kaanapali, or make the long trip to Hana or Haleakula  (sp?), amongst many other attractions (go to Paia and eat at Mama's Fish House, you won't be disappointed). The Aina Nalu also has two really nice pools if you just feel like chillin around the apartment and some seriously nice staff that are most helpful. We spent a great week here on our honeymoon and I'd recommend his place to anyone coming to the island.
We had a great time in Lahaina and the room was a haven for us after our busy day exploring Maui!
The entire stay was perfect and all accommodations at Aina Nalu were great.  The location is really quite perfect as it's within walking distance of Lahaina.

The location can not be beaten! Walkable to grocery stores (Foodland & Safeway), art galleries, restaurants, Banyan Tree, ... Great beaches for swimming are within 10 min. driving distance. James is a wonderful host, and communications with him is quick and easy.  Kitchen is truly fully equipped, and pools at the complex are great! 
Two minor downsides are 1. Noise from the complex easily gets in (cars park right outside the bedroom window, and kids run in the hallways)
2. The front desk staff are very rude and uncooperative because they don't get any profits from owners like James. We asked if we could leave one luggage with them for 1 hour, and they said they will charge us $75, and rambled on for 15 minutes on why they'd have to charge a rediculous amount. This brings me to my 3rd minor downside (I know, I said there were 2, because this is apparently everywhere on Maui, and not necessarily Old Lahaina area where James condo is at: It is not safe to leave any belongings in the car. We saw a car with a shattered window on the street in front of the complex, so leaving your luggage in the car if you arrive earlier than check-in time or leave later than check-out time is not wise.

James has done a nice job making this a very comfortable unit. Especially the wide variety of condiments.  My wife got food poisoning in Seattle on the way over and wanted some apple cider vinegar and turmeric as a natural remedy.  Guess what you had it.  The proximity to town is very convenient.  The grounds are very well kept and the pool and BBQ areas were very nice.  Thanks again for a great stay!

We enjoyed our stay at this unit! It was a clean and well organized condo and had all the amenities (hair blow drier, shampoo/conditioner/shower gel, picnic basket, beach towels, ice chest, iron, etc.) that we needed. 
Host was responsive and provided clear and timely response and information on the check-in process and the surrounding area. 
Fresh flowers greeter our arrival and filled the unit with the perfect island smell. 
Wish we had same taste in mattress firmness with the owner (we prefer it to be more firm than the unit's airy and pillowie mattress), but we adjusted. 
Thank you for making it a comfortable stay for us!

This place was perfect as it's not to crowded like resorts, it's quiet, and everything is in walking distance. We had a chance to meet James and he told us awesome snorkeling spots. His place left like home instantly, and it was clean and had everything we were needing. We left planning our next trip to stay again!

We had a great time staying at the condo. Great location not more than a couple of blocks from ocean front,  shopping and restaurants. Condo is in  great condition and has everything you need to enjoy your stay including a washer and dryer. We couldn't be more happy to stay there and definitely will again. James's eating and recreational sugestionz were great and helped us enjoy the area even more.
Easy access to restaurants, shops, and the beach. Quite area, street parking wasn't terrible to find

James's place was great!  A clean and happy condo - great location in Lahina - walkable to everything in town.  Definitely need a car to explore the rest of Maui.  James had great ideas and suggestions for our trip!
James' place was super clean, looked just like the pictures, and he was so helpful with suggestions leading up to the trip. No brainer that we would stay here again. Thanks so much, James!
숙소 자체는 관리가 잘 되어 있었지만 환기가 잘 안되는지 아니면 주변의 냄새가 유입되었는지 습한 냄새와 고기 구운 냄새가 남아 있었어요~ 호스트는 모든 질문에 응답을 아주 잘 해 주셨어요. 수영장 이용도 잘 했고 바베큐장 이용도 편리하게 잘 이용하였어요.
The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Ideal for visiting Lahaina and a great base for seeing Maui. Really comfortable bed and the apartment is stocked with all the relevant essentials.

Location was perfect for us to walk everywhere we wanted to go in Lahaina. We would drive to beaches during the day and then park back near the condo early to ensure we had a spot on the street. Then in the evenings we walked Front street to find dinner or a massage close by.

A compact and stylish condo with basically everything you'd need! We appreciated how close it was to Front Street - where all the action is - without being too close to all the crowds. Communication with the host was frequent and helpful. This unit has jalousie/louvre windows which aren't the best at keeping out noises, like neighbors or groundskeeping crews and their leaf blowers...  We had a great stay.
Very good location.  Just a couple of blocks from Front St.  The unit was clean and well set up.  Great experience!!
James is a first rate host. Everything was accurate, clean and supper close to downtown.  5 stars.
It was exactly what I was looking for. Central to everything in lahaina

Top Three Reasons to Stay at James's Place: 
-Killer location. It's literally a five minute walk to the beach, grocery stores, and great eateries
-Great amenities. Kitchen, washer dryer, dish washer, great bed, and french press. What more do you need?
-Great host: James not only made it completely clear how to get into the place, but offered great tips for novice Hawaii-goers. 

Five stars!
Great place to stay! I highly recommend, great hosts and central location

James’s place is amazing and he is a fantastic host if I could give more stars I would! Lots of little touches such as the snorkelling gear and 2 sets of beach towels, and tips for things to do made for such a memorable trip. His place is fantastic and it’s location is perfect the harbour is just down the road and so many places to eat, drink and shop nearby and we didn’t drive so was a perfect location. Highly recommend and will be advising all friends and family to stay and looking forward to when we can come back again.

James and Sri's place is in a great location! We weren't in town long, but appreciated the tons of wooden hangers, plentiful kitchen amenities including tea bags, and lovely open-style shower. Would definitely recommend!

This was a great place!  The condo was beautiful and right in the heart of the action.  The beach was three blocks away and there are  lots of great shops and food!  James responded quickly to all questions, and the resort concierge was extremely helpful in booking some good tours.
Mahalo, James.

Great place, perfect location, and James was very helpful with providing local tips and quick response times.  Would recommend to ANYONE looking for the perfect spot to stay in LaHaina for their Maui vacation.
Absolutely loved our stay and would highly recommend James’s place. Wish I could stay longer!
Perfect location

Upon arrival I was taken back by how cozy this condo was. It felt very much like "home away from home". James and Sri were amazing and communication between myself and the hosts was very prompt and informative. The condo was exactly how it was listed and would stay here again on my next trip to Maui.

Thank You,
James and Sri
Condo was wonderful!  It is well stocked and very clean. It takes just a couple of minutes to walk to Front Street.

I enjoyed my stay. My unit was exactly as advertised.  I found the bed especially comfortable. The pool area was nice and relaxing, although busy at times with lots of children.  I enjoyed being walking distance to all the restaurants and shops. The complex was much quieter than I expected, given the number of units and guests. I slept well.

Jame's condo has everything you need for your stay! Great location for walking distance to Lahaina and all of its shops and history! The condo was comfortable and homey. James offered great local tips too for activities that we were interested in. We definitely would stay here again and recommend you do too!
Just as described! Great location!
La ubicación del lugar es excelente, el apto es increíble, James esta atento todo el tiempo para resolver las dudas, es muy buen anfitrión!!! Super recomendado :)
Das Apartment von James und Sri war grossartig - alles was man braucht, sehr gute Lage, super Gastgeber, tolle Tipps für die Zeit in Maui. Einfach spitze!

We LOVED our stay! James’s place was beautiful. The location was fantastic and the apartment was really well appointed. Perfect for family with a 18 month old. Best value in Lahaina! 

James was so helpful and even came to our rescue when we left an electronic behind! What a prince :)

A few highlights were the two pools and pagodas; comfortable living room; fantastic king bed with excellent linens; washer / dryer; sleepy laid back complex.

Couple of notes if you’re staying:

- Baby Beach is a 15 min walk north! Beautiful, calm waters if you’re there with young kids. Easy to get to with an umbrella stroller!

- Local supermarket is an easy walk for essentials. If you’re there for a week it’s worth the trip to Safeway or Costco en route as their produce and options are better. 

- 1 min walk to the bus. You definitely don’t need a car when staying at Jame’s place. The bus loop to Kaanapali is a 1 min walk. $2 and runs every hour (30 min trip). Try the Hula Grill in Kaanapali - the food is fantastic.

- Fab coffee shop 2 min walk from the apartment called Banana Bread and Coffee Co. Great coffee and excellent breakfast sandwiches and wraps. 

Jame’s place is an exceptional deal and won’t disappoint! Thanks again James :)

name: Awesome Oasis! 3 stops Away from Manhattan!!!
summary: Very good sharing for students, Interns, travelers, and professionals bargain hunting for a cheap and good quality room in a no crowded building. The apartment is on the 2nd floor of a fairly new Townhouse Building full of natural lights! The room has a huge king size bed, window and  balcony and fully furnished & its own bathroom. It has closets, lots of storage space to store all of your belongings  to get you organized.  An easy commute of 15 minutes to Manhattan with the A Express Train.
space: All appliances and furniture are brand new. You  will be sharing the Living-room, kitchen area, and dining room with other Guests. There is a TV, cable, with Free Netflix. There will be a Biweekly cleaning and changes of Bed sheets and Towels, and supplies. Laundries are a half a block walking distance. Full supermarket within 1 block or head to Fulton to shop at Whole Foods or other supermarkets, fruits and vegetables stores. Lot of bars and restaurants with diverse cuisines to chose from. The YMCA is 3 blocks away.
description: Very good sharing for students, Interns, travelers, and professionals bargain hunting for a cheap and good quality room in a no crowded building. The apartment is on the 2nd floor of a fairly new Townhouse Building full of natural lights! The room has a huge king size bed, window and  balcony and fully furnished & its own bathroom. It has closets, lots of storage space to store all of your belongings  to get you organized.  An easy commute of 15 minutes to Manhattan with the A Express Train. All appliances and furniture are brand new. You  will be sharing the Living-room, kitchen area, and dining room with other Guests. There is a TV, cable, with Free Netflix. There will be a Biweekly cleaning and changes of Bed sheets and Towels, and supplies. Laundries are a half a block walking distance. Full supermarket within 1 block or head to Fulton to shop at Whole Foods or other supermarkets, fruits and vegetables stores. Lot of bars and restaurants with diverse cuisines to chose from. The YMC
neighborhood_overview: Come live in one of the nicest and quietest block in Brooklyn tree-lined block. The neighborhood is mixed and had changed a lot! The Police station is 3 Blocks away on Tompkins. You will see police officers all around! There are plenty coffee shops, bars and restaurants lounges around. The area just earned the "Historical Landmark"!
notes: Only single professionals with good background (checked before signing a lease with them) live in the building and it is non-crowded. They mostly work in Manhattan and few in Brooklyn. They have been staying in the building for a longtime especially the First Floor Tenant (more than 6 years and working in the Midtown area). The House is very quiet and the Super lives right across from the house. This help to keep the house clean, have someone readily available to help and promptly in case assistance is needed and remove the snow as needed.
transit: Head to Nostrand and Fulton, Grab the A train express line and you will be in 15 minutes in Manhattan. You have as well the choice to pick up the C and G line to make local stops. There are buses in both cross streets and the street before (no more than 1 minute walking distance) to go to wherever you want in Brooklyn or Queen, Long Island, and Manhattan.
access: You have sole and full access to your private bedroom and your own Private Bathroom. You will be sharing the common areas: Fully furnished kitchen, Dining room, Living-room and all the entertainment center (Internet, cable TV, Netflix,...).
interaction: I can be reached anytime by email or phone, or when I am around. I like to give to my Guests space and privacy and interact with them when I see them or whenever they need me.
house_rules: -Guests must clean dishes and other areas immediately after usage - House must be quiet from 10:30 PM to 8 AM - It is your responsibility to always give me an accurate count of the number of Guests staying in the apartment. NO MORE than TWO persons staying in the room at any given time. - DO NOT flush anything except toilet paper down the toilet. There is a waste paper basket in the bathroom to dispose of napkins, paper towels, wet wipes, sanitary napkins, tampons, and dental floss. - Do not walk with your shoes on the rugs. - No walking shirtless Inside/outside your apartment, It could be seen as  disrespectful and offensive to other Guests. - All locals without exception must be approved prior to booking a reservation. -No eating in the Sofas. -Other people live on the first floor be mindful when walking on the floor with high hills or noisy shoes. -You must Clean after yourself immediately after using the common areas to ensure your roommates can use the same facilities and tools as

host.host_about:
Hello, I am a Certified Public Accountant/Certified Fraud Examiner during the day and a grand-vivant at night. I speak English, French and Spanish. I lived and visited Europe, Africa and few Caribbean’s islands. Asia is next on the list. So, be ready to share your travel stories with me. A few things your soon to be pad: Myrtle-Marcy area is an easy commute, very diverse and full of things to do. Walk for less than 5 minutes (3 blocks) to the G train and several bus lines taking you anywhere in NYC. Manhattan is 15 to 20 minutes away. The commute to both JFK, LaGuardia and Newark is very convenient. Several different types of restaurants and bars on Myrtle Avenue giving you a variety of choices of dishes: Asian, Spanish, Caribbean and American.
The apartment has hardwood floors. All new appliances and furniture! the living room has a large couch with a queen sized pull out bed. That creates an extra bed. Full kitchen with all brand-new appliances will allow for you to cook comfortably.
The house is quiet, clean, full of light, and currently occupied only by professionals. Feel like home.

At no charge, you will have a High-powered Wi-Fi, full cable, HBO, along with a DVR to play your own movies and a Chromecast device to cast on the TV what you want from your computer.

reviews.comments: Hands down the best host you could possibly have with a great place to match. Johny’s place is near multiple restaurants including Angela’s and several others off of Fulton Street. It’s also just a few moments away from the Kingston-Throop Station which is only but 20-30 mins away from Manhattan. All the appliances, utensils, and dishes you need are there. Johny also regularly has the place cleaned. It’s practically spotless. Work with Johny and he’ll work with you to ensure you have an awesome stay.

name: 1 BEDROOM APARTMENT @ SAI YING PUN & SAI WAN AREA
summary: One bedroom apartment from Sai Ying Pun near Western Mid-Levels Escalators at Centre Street Hong Kong. All the best bars, restaurants, and shops at your doorstep! Modern, light and airy with all conveniences. Wireless internet and bi-weekly cleaning by professional maid included.  15-20 minutes walk to Escalators in Central Hong Kong, 1 *City / Area : Sai Ying Pun *Neihborhood:  Sheung Wan , Central Mid-Levels, Western  Luaguage: English, Chinese, Japanese(日本語対応)

name: Columbus Circle Studio
summary: Columbus Circle studio apartment.
description: Columbus Circle studio apartment.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Bicoastal artist based in New York and California.

reviews.comments: Nice studio in a good location close to Central Park and restaurants and shopping!
